Andres Serrano (amụrụ n'ọnwa Ọgọọst 15, afọ 1950) bụ onye Amerịka na-ese foto na onye na-ese ihe
Ọrụ ya, nke a na-elekarị anya dị ka nka mmebi iwu, gụnyere foto nke ozu ma jiri nsị na mmiri ahụ
Piss Christ ya (1987) bụ foto na-acha uhie uhie nke obe nke a na-etinye n'ime akpa iko nke ihe a na-ekwu na ọ bụ nsị nke onye na-ese ihe
O mekwara ihe osise maka egwu egwu Metallica's Load na Reload
A mụrụ Serrano na New York City n'ọnwa Ọgọọst 15, afọ 1950
Ọ si na ọkara Honduran, ọkara Afro-Cuban, a zụlitere ya dị ka onye Roman Katọlik siri ike
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ site n'afọ 1967 ruo 1969 na Brooklyn Museum Art School, ma a na-ewere ya dị ka onye na-ese foto n'onwe ya
N'ọnwa Disemba afọ 1980, ọ lụrụ onye na-ese ihe Julie Ault
N'ajụjụ ọnụ nke afọ 2012, Serrano zoro aka na Ault dị ka 'nwunye mbụ' ya na Irina Movmyga dị ka nwunye ya ugbu a
Serrano ekwuola na ọ bụ Onye Kraịst
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka osote onye nduzi nka na ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi, tupu o mepụta ọrụ mbụ ya n'afọ 1983
Onye na-ese foto bụ Alex Harsley tinyere ọrụ Serrano na ihe ngosi mbụ ya na New York City na Fourth Street Photo Gallery
E gosipụtara ọrụ ya n'ebe dị iche iche gburugburu ụwa gụnyere Katidral Episcopal nke St
John the Divine na New York City, World without end (2001), na ihe ngosi na Barbican Arts Centre na London, Body and soul (2001)
Ihe ngosi ya na-akpali mmeghachi omume iwe mgbe niile
N'ọnwa Ọctoba 5, afọ 2007, otu foto ya a na-akpọ The History of Sex nọ na ngosi ma ọtụtụ ndị e bibiri na gallery nka na Lund, Sweden site n'aka ndị e kwenyere na ha bụ akụkụ nke otu neo-Nazi

N'abalị iri na isii n'ọnwa Eprel n'afọ 2011, mgbe izu abụọ nke ngagharị iwe na mkpọsa nke ozi ịkpọasị na oku ekwentị mkparị na ụlọ ngosi nka na-egosi ọrụ ya, nke ìgwè ndị Katọlik nke France haziri, ihe dị ka otu puku mmadụ gafere n'okporo ámá Avignon, iji mee ngagharị iwe n'èzí ụlọ ngosi ahụ
N'abalị iri na asaa n'ọnwa Eprel n'afọ 2011, e bibiri ọrụ ya abụọ, Piss Christ na The Church
Onye nduzi galarị na-eme atụmatụ imeghe ụlọ ngosi ihe mgbe ochie ahụ na ọrụ ndị mebiri emebi na ngosi 'ka ndị mmadụ wee hụ ihe ndị na-eme ihe ike nwere ike ime'
Serrano na-emekarị nnukwu ihe osise nke ihe dị ka 20 site na 30 sentimita (51 site n'afọ 76 sentimita)
Ọ gbagburu ọtụtụ isiokwu gụnyere foto nke Klansmen, foto ozu, na foto nke ndị ọkụ gbara
Ọ banyere n'ụgbọ oloko New York City na ọkụ na akwụkwọ foto iji gosipụta ndị na-enweghị ebe obibi, yana ịmepụta ụfọdụ ihe osise dị nro ma mgbe ụfọdụ na-egosi na di na nwunye
Otu n'ime ndị ikpeazụ a na-egosi ihe Adrian Searle nke The Guardian kọwara dị ka 'di na nwunye na-eto eto, ya na dildo, ya na ngosipụta dị nro'

Andrew Dosunmu bụ onye Naijiria na-ese foto na onye na-eme ihe nkiri bụ onye bịara bụrụ onye ama ama na United States mgbe ọ duziri vidiyo egwu maka ndị na-agu egwu dị iche iche nke gụnyere Isaac Hayes, Angie Stone, Common, Tracy Chapman, Wyclef Jean, Kelis, Aaron Neville, Talib Kweli, na Maxwell
Dosunmu bi n'etiti New York City na Lagos, Nigeria
Foto
Dosunmu malitere ọrụ ya dị ka onye enyemaka na-emepụta ihe na ụlọ ejiji nke Yves Saint Laurent

O mechara bụrụ onye nduzi okike (na-eje ozi n'ọkwa ahụ maka mkpuchi album maka ndị na-ese ihe dị ka Erykah Badu na Public Enemy) na onye na-ese foto ejiji, ebe foto ya na-apụtakwa na magazin mba ụwa dị iche iche
N'afọ 2007, a kwanyeere ya ùgwù site na arịrịọ ikwu okwu na nzukọ TED Global

Dosunmu eduziela ma were ọtụtụ mgbasa ozi maka mgbasa ozi na TV maka ụlọ ọrụ dịka AT&T, General Motors, Levi's, Giordano Jeans, Kenneth Cole, Buddy System for ABC, My Kind of Town for AMES, Soul Food for Showtime
E bipụtara foto sitere na ihe nkiri ya The African Game na akwụkwọ kọfị nke powerHouse Books

A họpụtara Dosunmu n'oge na-adịbeghị anya isonye na ihe ngosi foto Snap Judgments New Positions in Contemporary Photography na International Center of Photography Dosunmu abụwo onye na-ese foto maka mbipụta dị ka Vibe, Clam, Fader, Face, Paper, Interview, i-D, Vogue Hommes - France na Italy, Complex, na Ebony
Dosunmu mere ihe nkiri izizi ya na vidiyo egwu maka Isaac Hayes na 1996
Ọ gara n'ihu iduzi vidiyo egwu maka ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ na-agu egwu nke gụnyere Angie Stone, Common, Wyclef Jean, Kelis, Aaron Neville, Maxwell, Tracy Chapman na Talib Kweli

Dosunmu eduziela ihe omume nke usoro ihe nkiri telivishọn nke South Africa a ma ama bụ Yizo, Yizo, nke na-eme ihe nkiri arụmụka iwu gbasara agụmakwụkwọ na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Johannesburg na South Africa mgbe ịkpa ókè agbụrụ gasịrị

N'afọ 2010, n'ihe na-eduga na iko mba ụwa nke mbụ na Afrịka, Dosunmu mepụtara ihe nkiri ọzọ, The African Game, nke ọ na-enyocha egwuregwu bọọlụ (soccer) na kọntinent ahụ na mmekọrịta ya na ọdịbendị Afrịka n'ụdị ya niile
Mgbanwe ya n'ime ihe nkiri bịara na 2011 na ihe nkiri Restless City, nke malitere na Sundance Film Festival na nyocha dị mma
Andrew Esiebo (a mụrụ n'afọ 1978) bụ onye Naijiria na-ese foto
O meela ọrụ onwe ya na ọrụ ya na Naịjirịa na ọdịda anyanwụ Afrịka mana ọ nwetara nkwanye ùgwù mba ụwa

Malite ọrụ ya dị ka onye na-ese foto n'onwe ya, ọrụ ya ekpuchiela mmepe ngwa ngwa nke obodo ukwu Naịjirịa na nsogbu mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya dị iche iche dịka mmekọahụ, ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nwoke na nwanyị, bọọlụ, ọdịbendị a ma ama, na mbata
Ọrụ ya agbanweela karịa foto onwe ya ma malite inyocha ọrụ vidiyo na multimedia
A mụrụ Esiebo na Lagos, Naijiria
N'inye igwefoto n'afọ 2000 dị ka onyinye site n'aka enyi ya Jose Maria, Esiebo malitere ịkụziri onwe ya foto wee malite ịse foto mmepe ngwa ngwa nke Obodo Naijiria
Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, Esiebo malitere akwụkwọ ozi ịntanetị na onye na-ese foto na United States, Paul Udstrand, onye nyere ya akwụkwọ foto mbụ ya nke ọ malitere ịzụlite ihe ọmụma ya banyere foto n'ihu

Esiebo nwalere foto ojii na nke ọcha na nwanne nna ya, Esiebo Joseph bụ onye na-ese foto azụmahịa na obodo kachasị ukwuu na Naịjirịa; Ibadan, nke o nyere aka na nhazi foto ojii na nke ọcha n'ime ụlọ ọchịchịrị ya
Esiebo na-ebi ma na-arụ ọrụ na Ibadan, Naijiria, mana ọrụ ya enweela ọganihu karịa West Afrịka ma ruo n'ihu mba ụwa

Ọ bụ onye otu Participating Artist Press Agency ma nwee ọrụ ya na Nigerian Landscape and Culture gosipụtara nke ọma na Lagos Lab na Migrationpapa Ọ bụ onye mbido na onye nhazi nke 'My Eye, My World', nzukọ na-ese foto maka ụmụaka na-anọghị na Naịjirịa
Ọ bụ onye guzobere otu na-ese foto na Naịjirịa, Black Box, Naịjirịa
Ndị otu a bụ ndị na-ese foto nke afọ na agụmakwụkwọ dịgasị iche iche n'Afrịka niile nke ndị otu na-arụ ọtụtụ ọrụ nka, ma ọ bụ n'otu n'otu ma ọ bụ na mmekorita ya na ndị otu
Esiebo bụ akụkụ nke Ọganihu nke Ịhụnanya, ọrụ mmekorita n'etiti Menil Collection, Houston; Centre for Contemporary Art, Lagos; na Pulitzer Arts Foundation, St
Louis

Esiebo emechaala ọtụtụ ebe obibi nka gụnyere ịnọ ọnwa ise na Paris n'okpuru Cultures France's Visa Pour Creation, ebe obibi ọnwa atọ na Gasworks na London dịka akụkụ nke mmemme Africa Beyond na ebe obibi ọnwa atọ na Gyeonggi Creation Center na [South Korea] Disemba 2011

N'afọ 2007, Esiebo meriri Cultures France (nke bụzi Institut Français) Visa pour la Creation Award wee malite inyocha ụzọ ndị ọzọ nke foto akụkọ na vidiyo mbụ ya na ọrụ multimedia akpọrọ “Living Queer African” nke na-egosipụta ndụ nke onye Cameroon na-eto eto na-edina ụdị onwe ya bi na Paris
N'afọ 2011, Eseibo ritekwara ihe nrite Artistic Creation nke 2011 site na Musee du Quai Branly, Paris

O jiri onyinye ahụ malite nyocha foto akpọrọ Pride nke gosipụtara ihe omume nke ndị na-edozi ntutu isi na mba ndị dị n'ebe ọdịda anyanwụ Afrịka Nigeria, Benin, Ghana, Ivory Coast, Liberia, Mali, Senegal na Mauritania
Esiebo na-enyocha ọrụ nke onye na-edozi ntutu isi dị ka ụdị ntutu isi na usoro na-enye onyinye dị ukwuu n'ịrụ njirimara nke onye ọ bụla na nchịkọta na West Africa
Esiebo na-enyocha ọrụ ndị na-edozi isi na-arụ na-agagharị agagharị, na ụzọ ngalaba ahụ si arụ ọrụ dị ka ebe njikọta n'etiti ndị si n'agbụrụ niile

N'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2006, Laia Libros, Barcelona, Spain na mmekorita ya na UNESCO nke akpọrọ Lagos Life goes on bipụtara ọrụ Esiebo na Nigeria Culture and Natural Heritagema gosikwara ya na ihe ngosi na Syria nke akpọrọ Nzukọ na Middle East
N'afọ 2010, a họpụtara Esiebo maka ọrụ World Press Photography Dream nke ndị nta akụkọ iri na isii bụ ndị ga-enye akụkọ ndị ọzọ maka iko mba ụwa na South Afrịka
Nchịkọta ya 'Alter Gogo' weere ụzọ dị iche na ihe omume zuru ụwa ọnụ nke Soccer World Cup na South Afrịka n'afọ 2010
Mgbe ọ gara n'otu obodo nta dị nso na Johannesburg, Orange Fam, ọ zutere otu egwuregwu bọọlụ nke nne nne mejupụtara ndị Gogo Getters
Usoro ya juxtaposed oyiyi nke agadi nwanyị nọ n'ụlọ ha na ụmụ ụmụ ha dị iche na ihe oyiyi nke ha n'uwe bọọlụ ha n'ụlọ ha

Usoro a na-emegide ihe oyiyi nke ndị agadi South Afrịka ka ọ na-agbagha echiche nke egwuregwu na ntụrụndụ dị ka nke naanị nke ọgbọ na-eto eto ma na-etinye echiche nke ụlọ ọrụ n'ime ụmụ nwanyị ndị a na-elegharakarị anya n'ime obodo egwuregwu
Ya mere, ọrụ Esiebo na Alter Gogo gosipụtara na nke mbụ ya na France na Photoquai 2011
E gosikwara ihe ngosi a na 11th Havana Biennial na [Cuba]
N'ọnwa Ọgọọst afọ 2015, Esiebo pụtara na akaụntụ gọọmentị Instagram maka ọrụ ya pụtara ìhè

Ihe odide ahụ nke hotara Esiebo, mgbe ọ na-ekwu okwu n'oge mbụ ya dị ka onye na-ese foto na-agbasi mbọ ike na Lagos, Naijiria, na-ekwu, “N'oge ahụ, m ga-eji igwefoto ihe nkiri m ese foto, nyochaa ha ma zigara Paul ozi email maka nzaghachi ya
Na oge ụfọdụ, o zigara m akwụkwọ ndị nwere utu aha na ìhè, ngwá ọrụ igwefoto, azụmahịa nke foto na nhazi ụlọ gbara ọchịchịrị
Amụrụ m akwụkwọ ndị ahụ n'ụzọ okpukpe ma nweta obi ike iji nwekwuo ihe okike na nkà na igwefoto m
Esiebo azụlitewo ọrụ ya site n'idekọ ala na obodo nke Naịjirịa nke ọ họọrọ ihe ndị na-esonụ ka ọ pụta ìhè dị ka akụkụ nke pọtụfoliyo ya n'ịntanetị
God is Alive - ka a na-agbasa ebe okpukpe na mba ahụ niile, ọrụ a na-egosi otú ndị Naijiria si too ụdị otuto nke ha na ụka Pentikọstal na nke ozi ọma
Esiebo na-ekpuchi nnukwu nnọkọ a maara dị ka 'crusades' nke a na-eme n'ofe mba ahụ ebe ndị Naijiria na-ezukọta ọnụ iji kpalie okwukwe ha
Ihe ngosi a bụ akụkụ nke Lagos Photography Festival n'ọnwa Ọktọba afọ 2010, bụ ememme nka na foto mba ụwa mbụ e mere na Naịjirịa
Femi Kuti and the Afrika Shrine - ọrụ a na-akọwa ndụ abalị na-ekwo ekwo nke Lagos ebe azụmahịa nke Naịjirịa na obodo kachasị nwee ọnụ ọgụgụ mmadụ na West Afrịka
Ọ bụ ezie na ọ bụ obodo nke mpụ, njupụta na ịda ogbenye nye onye na-ekiri ihe nkiri n'èzí, Esiebo na-emepe obodo ahụ dị ka obodo ukwu dị egwu karịsịa na-egosipụta otu klọb abalị obodo, Afrika Shrine
Nigeria on my mind - 'Nigeria on my Mind' bụ njem foto nke njem Esibo na Naịjirịa niile
N'ime ọtụtụ afọ, na-arụ ọrụ na ọrụ onwe onye ma na-arụ ọrụ maka ndị nduzi njem na NGO, Esiebo eseela foto nke ọdịbendị ọdịbendị bara ụba, agbụrụ dị iche iche na ịma mma nke Naịjirịa nke ọma
Living Positive - gbadoro ụkwụ na ndụ Thoko Ngubeni, nwanyị ojii, nwanyị na-edina nwanyị nwere nje HIV
N'ịbụ onye ndị ezinụlọ ya na ndị enyi ya jụrụ, n'otu oge ọ nọ n'akụkụ ọnwụ, mana taa ọ jisiri ike gbanwee ndụ ya, na-eji nkà ya niile na ihe onwunwe ya mee ka ndụ ka mma maka onwe ya na ndị ọzọ
Ngubeni bụ onye guzobere otu nkwado ụmụ nwanyị a na-akpọ Mafithobelae
Esiebo na-eso Ngubeni na njem foto na obodo ojii ya na Mpumalanga, ebe ọ na-ahazi nzukọ ọha na eze iji kụziere ndị obodo banyere nsogbu metụtara nje HIV na Aids

Site na usoro foto ahụ, a na-eme ka ahụmịhe Ngubeni na-ebi ndụ na nje HIV pụta ìhè dị mma ka anyị na-ahụ mgbalị ya inye ohere ịnweta nyocha na ọgwụ n'obodo ya na mgbalị ịlụso ihere metụtara nje ahụ ọgụ

Vuvuzela Journeys - Esiebo na-ekpughe na usoro foto a njikọ dị n'etiti onyinyo nke vuvuzela na 2010 South Africa World na njikọ ya na ọdịnala ụka narị afọ nke iri abụọ ebe e chere na ọ nwere ike ịgwọ ọrịa
Esiebo juxtaposes foto si 2010 World Cup na ndị eji omenala na KwaZulu-Natal dabeere Shembe Church
Ebe ndị na-adịghị mma
Akụkụ nke usoro PRIDE nke bụ ọrụ na Barbershops na Male Hairstyles na West Africa
'Alter Gogo' bụ usoro ihe osise diptych nke gosipụtara otu nne nne bụ ndị otu Gogo Getters Football Club na Orange Farm, South Africa
Usoro foto nke na-edekọ obodo Lagos
Akụkụ nke usoro nke na-eso nwa ojii, nwanyị na-edina nwanyị nwere nje HIV, Thoko Ngubeni na ọgụ ya megide ụdị ịkpa ókè na mmechuihu niile

Lagos nwere otu n'ime ihe nkiri ndụ abalị kachasị mma na Africa na 'Members Only' na-enye ohere na-adịghị ahụkebe na ụwa abalị nke Lagos nightclub bouncerN'ịgbaso otu onye na-agba ọsọ site na mgbatị awa atọ ya kwa ụbọchị ruo n'ọrụ abalị ya, Esiebo na-enye nghọta na-enweghị atụ banyere ndụ na-abụghị klọb ahụ nke ọtụtụ ndị mmadụ na-agbalị ịbanye

Chineke nọ n'obi nke ndụ na Naịjirịa na Esiebo na-edekọ nnukwu nnọkọ a na-akpọ agha agha nke a na-eme n'ofe mba ahụ ebe nnukwu ìgwè mmadụ na-ezukọta iji kpalie okwukwe ha ma chọọ ngwọta ime mmụọ maka nsogbu ha dị iche iche
Photoshoot for Soundcity Magazine with Nigerian musician Nneka, whose social conscious music flies in the face of the R&B/hip-hop music so popular in contemporary Africa today

N'afọ 2007, Esiebo meriri Cultures France (nke bụzi Institut Francais) Visa pour la Creation Award wee malite inyocha ụzọ ndị ọzọ nke foto akụkọ na vidiyo mbụ ya na ọrụ multimedia akpọrọ 'Living Queer African' nke na-egosipụta ndụ nke onye Cameroon na-eto eto na-edina ụdị onwe ya bi na Paris
Ịgbasa Alaeze ahụ na-enyocha nzute, mmekọrịta, na esemokwu dị n'etiti Katọlik na Pentikọstal nke Afrịka site n'itinye mkparịta ụka ndị pastọ Naịjirịa na Ghana na ndị ụkọchukwu Katọlik
Ọrụ mmekorita ọzọ ya na Annalisa Butticci a Crazy World Crazy Faith
Andrew Lane bụ ónyé na-emepụta ihe ndekọ pop-hip hop-R&B na ónyé na-ede egwu
A mụrụ ya na San Diego, California
Lane esorowo ndị na-ese ihe dịka Backstreet Boys na Irene Cara rụọ ọrụ
Dị ka ónyé na-emepụta ihe na ónyé na-ede egwu, Lane enwetala nzèrè ọla edo na platinum màkà ọrụ ya na ndị R&B na-ese egwu Speech, Keith Sweat, na Alsou
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ na ndekọ platinum kwadoro High School Musical, Hannah Montana, Disneymania 4, na Manny Fresh
2012 Billboard Awards Ónyé na-emepụta ihe nrite Andrew Lane esonyerela na MP3 Music Awards iji nye nkwekọrịta US Demo Recording na 2012 BUA Award Winner - Best Unsigned Act
N'afọ 1995, Lane kwagara Atlanta, Georgia, wee guzobe ụlọ ọrụ Drew Right Music, Inc
N'oge mgbụsị akwụkwọ nke afọ 1998, Lane nwetara otuto màkà mmepụta-ide egwu màkà egwu atọ na Keith Sweat's Didnãot See Me Coming album
Andrew Tshabangu (amụrụ na 28 Nọvemba 1966) bụ onye South Africa na-ese foto
A mụrụ ya na Dube, Soweto
A maara ya maka ọrụ foto ya na-acha oji na ọcha ọcha nke e gosipụtara na nnukwu ihe nkiri akpọrọ Footprints at Standard Bank Gallery site na Febụwarị ruo Eprel 2017, nke akwụkwọ bipụtara
A mụrụ Andrew Tshabangu na Dube, Soweto na 28 Nọvemba 1966
Nne Tshabangu si n'ógbè Rustenburg ebe nna ya si na Vaal
Ọ bụ nwa ikpeazụ n'ime ụmụ ise, ya na ụmụnne atọ na otu nwanne nwanyị
Otú ọ dị nwanne ya nwanyị anwụọla kemgbe
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị Thabisang na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Phefeni Senior, ha abụọ dị na Soweto
Tshabangu kwuru na foto abụghị nhọrọ mbụ ya dị ka ọrụ, ọ nwere mmasị na mbụ ịchụso ọtụtụ ọrụ ndị ọzọ
N'oge ọ bụ nwata, ọ nwetara mmasị na nkuzi, mgbe ahụ ọ nwekwara mmasị na ihe nkiri nke mere ka ọ tinye akwụkwọ na Mahadum nke Witwatersrand iji mụọ ihe nkiri
Otú ọ dị, a nabataghị ya mgbe ọ gara nyocha maka nnabata
E nwere ihe ndị ọzọ na-amasị ya dị ka ịghọ onye na-echekwa ego na ịbanye na seminarị iji mụọ ọrụ ụkọchukwu nke na-abiaghi na mmezu
Onye na-ese ihe anyị na-ahụ taa bụ onye Alexandra Community Art Centre nuchara n'oge ọ nọ n'ebe ahụ na 1990, ebe ọ natara nkuzi mbụ ya na ịgụ na ide na foto
Ọ na-ekwukwa na ụmụ klas ya na Alexandra Community Art Centre, dịka mmetụta dị ịrịba ama na-emetụta ọrụ foto ya n'akụkụ akwụkwọ ọ na-eri
Mgbe oge ya na Alexandra Community Art Centre gasịrị, ọ rụrụ ọrụ onwe ya ruo ọnwa asatọ na New Nation
Tshabangu kụziri foto na Children's Photography Workshop na Market Photo Workshop
Ọ kwadoro ọmụmụ ihe foto na Kenya, Ethiopia, Cameroon, Mozambique, Reunion na Guyana, ma sonye na ebe obibi na Reunion, London, New York na Nairobi
A na-egosi ọrụ ya na mba ụwa na ihe ngosi na ọtụtụ akwụkwọ
Andriëtte Norman, onye na-arụkarị ọrụ dị ka Andriëtte, bụ onye Afrikaner na-abụ abụ si na mpaghara Cape Town Brackenfell
N'afọ 2007, Andriëtte bụ onye nke abụọ na oge nke anọ nke Idols South Africa, ma wepụta otu egwu site na ihe ngosi ahụ ('Love Is All Around')
O wepụtara abọm mbụ ya, Diamant, na 2008, Dink Aan My (2009), Vat My Hoër (2011), Wat Rym Met Liefde (2013), na Pêrel vir 'n Kroon (2015)
Dịka ụfọdụ nsụgharị nke usoro ọmụmụ nke ndị Merina nke etiti Highlands nke Madagascar si kwuo, Andriandravindravina bụ aha onye ọchịchị mbụ nke Highland
Ọ bụghị Merina kama ọ bụ vazimba, ndị bi na Madagascar dị omimi nke ọtụtụ ndị ọbịa zutere mgbe ha rutere ebe ahụ

Tantara ny Andriana eto Madagasikara, usoro ọmụmụ a ma ama nke aristocracy Merina, na-ekwu na Andriandravindravina ('Prince of the Leaves', ihe na-akọwa maka oké ọhịa ndị dị n'ebe ọwụwa anyanwụ ọ ga-achọ ịgafe iji ruo na ngafe etiti ala) chịrị Ambohitsitakara nʼebe ugwu Imerina ebe a kọrọ na e liri ya
Ụmụ ya nwoke atọ bụ
Andriamanjavona, 'nwa eze nke nwere njikọ abụọ' na nwa nke Andriandravindravina, ka ọ dị n'akaraka i were ya, nke o mere site n'ịbụ abụ anwansi
Ọ na-ejide akwụkwọ ahụ ma were ya laa n'ụlọ
Akwụkwọ ahụ ghọrọ nwanyị aha ya bụ Andriambavirano ma ha lụọ dị na nwunye
'Vadibe', nwunye mbụ, chụpụrụ ụmụ atọ Andriambavirano (ụmụ nwoke abụọ na otu nwa nwanyị), mana nna nkuchi zọpụtara ha
Andries Johannes Botha (amụrụ na 22 Septemba 1952) bụ onye na-ese ihe na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke bi ma na-arụ ọrụ na Durban, KwaZulu-Natal, South Africa
A maara ya maka ihe ọkpụkpụ ya
A mụrụ Botha na Pretoria, ma ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Natal n'afọ 1970
Dị ka nwa okorobịa, Botha tinyere aka n'ịbịputa akwụkwọ na ihe ọkpụkpụ, guzobe ma bụrụ onye isi oche nke Community Arts Workshop (1984-86)

O ritere ọtụtụ ihe nrite maka nka ya, nke gụnyere Volkskas Atelier Merit Award na 1987, Cape Town Triennial Merit Award (1988), Standard Bank Young Artist Award (1990) na National Vita Art Award (1992)
O mepụtara ihe osise dabere na usoro ọrụ aka ọdịnala
Botha malitere ịkụzi ihe na Mahadum Teknụzụ nke Durban n'afọ 1998
O guzobekwara otu NGO a kpọrọ Create Africa South Trust n'afo 2002
N'afọ 2006, a kpọrọ Botha ka ọ sonye na 'Table of Free Voices' na Berlin
Ihe okike ya 'Dropping Knowledge' gwara ndị isi na ngalaba nke echiche okike na nke sayensị ka ha zaa ajụjụ otu narị nke ọha na eze na-enye ha n'otu oge na tebụl gburugburu
N'afọ ahụ, e nyere ya ọrụ maka Beaufort Triennale
Botha guzobere Amazwi Abesifazane Trust, nke edebanyere aha n'afọ 2008, na Human Elephant Foundation, (nke edebanyere aha na 2009)
Botha egosila ihe osise na ihe ọkpụkpụ ya na Brittany, Canary Islands n'afọ 2008, South Korea n'afọ 2011 na mpaghara South Africa n'afọ 2010 na 2011
Botha guzobere Andries Botha Foundation (nke edebanyere aha na 2012)
N'afọ 2012 o sonyere na 'Planet under Pressure' na London ebe ndị isi na ngalaba ha kwurịtara okwu metụtara mmepe na-adịgide adịgide na egwu ọ na-eweta n'uwa
Botha ejirila nka ya kwuo okwu banyere ihe ịma aka mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke oge ya
O meputala ihe banyere isiokwu dịgasị iche iche, nke gụnyere ịdị adị nke ụmụ mmadụ na ụdị ndụ ndị ọzọ, ihe okike, nwa amaala na mmụta ndụ
N'afọ 2010, a kwụsịrị ọrụ na ihe ọkpụkpụ ọ na-emepụta maka obodo eThekwini n'ihi na a sịrị na atụmatụ ahụ dị nso na akara ngosi nke otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Ihe a tụrụ atụ ga-abụ otu enyí
Mgbe ọtụtụ afọ nke mkparịta ụka gasịrị, e kwekọrịtara na a gbanwere atụmatụ ma Botha malitere ịrụ ọrụ ọzọ
Ka ọ dị ugbu a, e zuuru ọtụtụ n'ime usoro nke ha abụọ wụnyere ma ree ya maka ihe mkpofu
E jikwa ágbá na-acha ọbara ọbara na oji mebie ihe ndị ahụ a tụrụ atụ
Andropogon gayanus
nke a maara dị ka gamba grass, Ahịhịa Rhodesian n' acha anụnụ anụnụ, tambuki grass, na aha ndị ọzọ, bụ ụdị ahịhịa a ekere n'ọtụtụ ebe okpomọkụ na mpaghara okpomọkụ nke Afrika

A matara Andropogon gayanus ma nye ya aha site na afọ otu puku, narị asatọ na iri atọ na atọ Aha ya ndị a na-ahụkarị gụnyere gamba grass, bluestem (Africa, Australia); Rhodesian andropogon (ebe ndịda Africa); Rhodesian blue grass (Zimbabwe); onga, tambuki grass (ebe ugwu ọdịda anyanwụ Africa); na sadabahar (India)
Mkpụrụ osisi a na-eto eto nwere ike itolite na agbata mita anọ n'ogologo na sentimita iri asaa n'obosara, ma nwee akwụkwọ nwere ntutu

Ọtụtụ n'ime mgbọrọgwụ ya bụ fibrous, -agbasa n'akụkụ ala ruo otu mita, mana o nwekwara mgbọrọgwụ eriri siri ike nke na-echekwa starch ma na-ejikọta osisi ahụ yana mgbọrọgwụ kwụ ọtọ nwere ike iwepụta mmiri site na omimi ka ukwuu n'oge ọkọchị

Ọ na-emepụta ọnụ ọgụgụ buru ibu nke mkpụrụ dị mfe, nke na-egbuke egbuke (ruo mkpụrụ narị puku abụọ na iri anọ na anọ kwa afọ, na pesenti iri isi na ise na itozuoke), nke ikuku, anụmanụ ma ọ bụ ígwè ọrụ nwere ike ịgbasa
Ọ na-agbasa ngwa ngwa ebe ahịhịa na-emetụta, mana ọtụtụ mkpụrụ na-ada n'ime mita ise nke nne na nna
Ahịhịa a bụ nke a mụrụ n'ọtụtụ ebe okpomọkụ na mpaghara okpomọkụ nke Afrika, na-agbasawanye n'ebe ndịda n'ime Mozambique, Botswana, Namibia na South Africa na mpaghara nwere ogologo oge ọkọchị
Ọ na-eme n'ụzọ okike na ala ahịhịa xerophytic na ala doleritic, ájá ma ọ bụ ụrọ, na ịdị elu nke mita otu puku na na narị ise, ma na-anagide oke ọkọchị
Otú ọ dị, ọ naghị eme nke ọma ebe okpomọkụ kachasị ala na-ada n'okpuru digiris celsius anọ na anọ, ọ naghịkwa anabata oyi
Otú ọ dị, e webatara ya n'ọtụtụ akụkụ nke ụwa, gụnyere mba ndị na-ekpo ọkụ nke Amerịka, ma bụrụkwa nke mba Brazil na mba ndị ọzọ
A na-ewebata ya maka iji ya mee ihe dị ka ahịhịa ahịhịhịa ka mma

E webatara ahịhịa Gamba n'ime Northern Territory nke Australia na afọ otu puku, narị itoolu na iri atọ na otu maka nnwale dị ka [nri ehi], ma bubata ya na steeti Queensland dị ka ahịhịhịa ahịhụ na afo otu puku, narị itoolu na iri anọ na abụọ, mana a kụghị ya n'ụzọ buru ibu ruo n'ihe dị ka afọ otu puku, narị itoolu na iri asatọ na atọ

Ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ ebe niile a maara Queensland dị n'ebe dị n'okpuru mita narị itoolu na iri asatọ, mita dị puku atọ na narị abụọ na iri na abụọ nke na-enweta mmiri ozuzo, 4001,500 mm (1659 in) kwa afọ
A na-eji A
gayanus eme ihe dị ka ihe ọkụkụ maka ehi n'ọtụtụ mba, gụnyere n'ebe ugwu Queensland na Australia
A na-ejikwa ya na Naịjirịa iji weghachite ala a na-atabiga nri ókè
Akụkụ nke ahịhịa a kụrụ n'ubi ọka na-enyere aka belata mbuze ikuku nke ala

A na-ekwupụta ya dị ka ụdị na-emerụ ahụ, nke a na-akpọ 'Weed nke mba dị mkpa' na Australia kemgbe afọ puku abụọ, na iri na abụọ, ebe o gbanyere ndakoro na anwale agbụrụ nke dịwara na emetutaghi ecosystem
, ebe ọ na-emepụta ọtụtụ ebe, na-asọmpi karịa ụdị ala na-agbanwe usoro okike
Mpaghara ndị jupụtara na ha nwere ihe ize ndụ ọkụ dị elu karịa ebe ịta nri
Ọ na-eguzogide ma ọ bụrụ na a na-egbutu ya ma ọ bụ ọkụ, na ezé ndị na-egwupụtaghị ya nwere ike ịmepụta ọkụ siri ike, na-eduga na ọnwụ nke mkpuchi osisi na mmebi gburugburu ebe obibi ogologo oge
Ọ na-anọchi ahịhịa ala, na-ebelata ụdị dị iche iche nke ihe ndị dị ndụ n'ala na-enweghị ala
N'ịbụ nke na-awakpo nke ukwuu, ọ nwere ike ịkwaga n'ebe nchekwa, ala obibi nke ọkara obodo na ịgbazite ala

Na NT, ebe e nwere nnukwu osisi dị n'etiti Darwin, Northern Territory na Katherine, onye na-echekwa ihe bụ Mitch Hart kọwara ahịhịa gamba dị ka 'ihe egwu atọ' maka ndụ ndị mmadụ, maka akụ na ụba nke Territory, na mbibi nke savanna ugwu Australia
WA, NT na Queensland nwere iwu steeti nke machibidoro ịkụ osisi ọhụrụ, ma na-amanye ndị na-elekọta ala ịchịkwa ọrịa

David Bowman, prọfesọ nke mgbanwe gburugburu ebe obibi na Mahadum nke Tasmania tụrụ aro na afọ puku abụọ, na iri na atọ na iwebata enyí Afrika na Australia nwere ike iwere iji chịkwaa ahịhịa gamba, dị ka nnwale rewilding

Steeti nke Western Australia, ebe infestations na-agbasaghị dịka NT na Queensland, guzobere Gamba Grass Eradication Program, ọrụ mmekorita nke Ngalaba Biodiversity, Conservation and Attractions, Ngalaba nke Primary Industries na Regional Development, El Questro Station na Kimberley Rangelands Biosecurity Association kwadoro

Usoro nchịkwa ahụ, nke malitere na afo puku abụọ, na iri na otu, enweela ihe ịga nke ọma, na-ebelata ọnụ ọgụgụ osisi ruo saịtị puku ato na afọ puku abụọ, na iri asatọ, na naanị saịtị iri abụọ na atọ na afọ puku abụọ, na iri abụọ
Ha chọtara naanị osisi asatọ n'oge mmiri ozuzo nke afọ puku abụọ, na iri abụọ na otu
Otú ọ dị, ọ naghị enweta ego ọ bụla site na gọọmentị etiti, nlekota dịkwa mkpa maka afọ ise ọzọ iji hụ na ọ naghị agbasa ọzọ
Andrzej Sawa (amụrụ n'afọ 1941) bụ onye Poland-South Africa na-ese foto
A mụrụ Sawa na Poland ma kpọga ya n'ogige ọrụ mmanye nke Germany n'afọ 1943 ma soro nne ya na nne nne ya biri ebe ahụ ruo ógè Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ biri n'afọ 1945
Ma nna nna Sawa na nne nna ya bụ ndị Roman Katọlik ma nwụọ n'ogige ịta ahụhụ Auschwitz
Ọ kwetara na ịhụnanya ya maka foto bịdọrọ ógè ihe ngosi foto nke Family of Man bịara Poland n'afọ 1956, n'oge nne nne ya nyere ya igwefoto izizi ya

Sawa nwetara akara ugo mmụta injinia na Poland mana o mechara bídó ịrụ ọrụ n'onwe ya n'ihe banyere akwụkwọ akụkọ ma gbaa foto maka ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi telivishọn dị n'ógbè ahụ tupu ọ banye na ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa akụkọ dị ka onye na-ese foto, ọ bụ ezie na n'obi ya ọ nọgidere bụrụ onye na-ede foto
N'afọ 1970, Sawa kwagara South Africa, na-arụ ọrụ na ngwá electronic na STC
Ógè ọ nọ n'ebe ahụ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ n'onwe ya dị ka onye na-ese foto maka akwụkwọ akụkọ Sunday Times nke South Africa
O mechara were ọrụ afọ abụọ na-ese foto n'efu na Johannesburg Sunday Times na-ekpuchi ihe omume egwuregwu
Na ngwụcha ọrụ ahụ, e nyere ya ọrụ oge niile na akwụkwọ akụkọ ahụ
Site na mbido-etiti afọ 1970 e kenyere ya ọrụ na Sunday Times Colour Magazine mana a kpọgara ya na akwụkwọ akụkọ ahụ ógè emechiri magazin ahụ
Ọ gara n'ihu na-ese foto n'ihe gbasara akwụkwọ akụkọ ahụ, na-ekpuchi asọmpi ịma mma Miss South Africa n'etiti afọ 1974 na afọ 1983
N'agbata afọ 1981 na afọ 1992 o bipụtara foto maka Sunday Times Colour Magazine
N'ime afọ 1980 ọ rụrụ ọrụ n'akụkụ onye na-ede akwụkwọ akụkọ, Jani Allan
Dị ka onye isi na-ese foto nke akwụkwọ akụkọ ahụ, ọ na-ese ndị a ma ama na-agba ya ajụjụ ọnụ na ndị a ma ma ama
E mechara chịkọta foto ya na Face Value, akwụkwọ nke ogidi ajụjụ ọnụ Allan tinyere foto zuru ezu nke Sawa sere
Ya na Allan na ndị nta akụkọ ndị ọzọ rụkwara ọrụ n'ihe gbasara akwụkwọ akụkọ ahụ na ndị ama ama n'ụwa niile
Ọ bụkwa naanị onye na-ese foto na-abụghị National Geographic nyere ikike ise foto nke ụmụ anụmanụ na Etosha National Park na Namibia
N'èzí magazin ahụ, ọ gbara ihe abụọ LP maka otu Queen
Onye na-agụ egwú Queen bụ Freddie Mercury hụrụ ọrụ Sawa ógè ọ nọ na South Africa wee kpọọ ya ka ọ gwa ya ka ọ rụkọọ ọrụ na mkpuchi
Sawa rụkwara ọrụ n'ihe gbasara Flying Springbok, magazin ụgbọ elu nke ụlọ ọrụ ụgbọ elu mba South Africa, South African Airways, site n'afọ 1987 ruo afọ 2007, na-ahụ maka njem na foto anụ ọhịa
N'oge a, ọ gara mba iri asaa
O bipụtara akwụkwọ foto izizi ya bụ Children of South Africa n'afọ 1993

A na-asọpụrụ ya site na mkpakọrịta nwoke na nwanyị site na ụlọ ọrụ foto atọ dị iche iche; Royal Photographic Society of Great Britain (afọ 1987); Photographic Society nke Southern African (afọ 1987); na Professional Photographers nke Southern Africa (afọ 1997)
Sir Jayantilal Keshavji 'Andy' Chande KBE (7 Mee 1928 - 7 Eprel 2017) bụ onye ọchụnta ego Tanzania a ma ama, onye na-enyere ndị mmadụ aka na onye freemason
A na-akwanyere ya ùgwù maka ihe niile dị mma o mere n'ime mba ahụ, dịka aka ya dị arọ n'ịzụlite usoro agụmakwụkwọ ka mma, mana ọ bụkwa onye isi ụlọ ọrụ nke nwere ike ịgafe ahịa Tanzania
Chande bụ onye isi oche nke Board of Governors nke Shaaban Robert Secondary School na onye isi oche nke Dar es Salaam Secondary Education Society
Ọ bụkwa onye nlekọta na-asọpụrụ nke ụlọ akwụkwọ Indian - Dar es Salaam
Ọ natara President's Golden Century Citation site na Rotary International maka nraranye ya na nkwa ya na 1995/1996
O nwetakwara ihe nrite 'Service Above Self' n'afọ 1998 site n'aka Rotary International maka nkwanye ùgwù maka afọ ole ọ rụrụ ọrụ maka ntọala ahụ
N'afọ 2003, a họpụtara ya dị ka onye nlekọta nke Rotary Foundation ma n'afọ 2004 a họpụtara ya dị ka onye isi oche nke Rotary Foundation nke United Kingdom
Vincent
N'afọ 2003, ọ natara onyinye 'Hind Ratna' site n'aka IK
Gujral, onye bụbu Prime Minista India
International Congress of Non-Resident Indians (NRI) kwupụtara na ọ bụ 'onye India na-abụghị onye bi n'afọ'
E nyekwara ya Pride of India Gold Award site n'aka NRI Institute na London
Emere ya onye na-asọpụrụ Knight Commander of the Most Excellent Order of the British Empire na abalị iri na iteolu na onwa asatọ, na afọ 2003, nke mbụ n'ụdị ya nyere nwa amaala Tanzania
Na abalị iteolu, na onwa Jenụwarị, na afọ 2005, Onye isi ala India, Dr APJ Abdul Kalam nyere ya Pravasi Bharatiya Samman Award

Na abalị iri, na onwa Ọgọstụ, na afọ 2007, onye isi ala Tanzania, Jakaya Kikwete malitere nsụgharị Swahili nke akwụkwọ ya A Knight in Africa (Shujaa Katika Afrika Safari Kutoka Bukene) na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Shaaban Robert Secondary School
Ndị ọzọ a ma ama bịara gụnyere
Andy Chukwu (amụrụ ya na ubosi nke iri na ano nke onwa mee na afo 1959) ọ bụ onye nduzi ihe nkiri Naijiria
Ọ malitere ọrụ ya dị ka onye na-eme ihe nkiri

Chukwu duziri ihe nkiri ndị na-eme ihe nkiri / ndị na-ese ihe nkiri Nollywood dị ka Osita Iheme, Chinedu Ikedieze, Dakore Egbuson, Patience Ozokwor, Amaechi Muonagor, Julius Agwu, Pete Edochie, Ali Nuhu, Emeka Ike, Gentle Jack, Ronke Ojo, Sandra Achums, na ndị ọzọ

Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị isi na-ahụ maka ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri nke onye isi ala Naịjirịa Goodluck Jonathan kpọrọ na afo 2013 iji mee emume ncheta afọ iri abuo kemgbe a tọhapụrụ ihe nkiri Naịjiria mbụ na vidiyo ụlọ
Chukwu bu onye Obinagu na obodo Ishiagu nke mpaghara Gọọmentị Obodo Ivo nke Ebonyi Steeti
Ọrụ ime ihe nkiri Chukwu malitere mgbe ọ na-egosi ihe inkiri na-atu egwu ndi Nollywood bụ Karishika na afo 1996
Mgbe ọ pụtasiri na ihe nkiri ole na ole dị ka onye na-eme ihe nkiri dịka Issakaba na Witches
Ọ si ime ihe nkiri na ngwụcha afọ iri itolu gàwa, gafare gaa na iduzi ihe nkiri na afọ puku abuo gàwa
O nwere ihe karịrị ihe nkiri iri na abụọ n'okpuru eriri ya ma na ime ihe nkiri ma ikike iduzi
Mgbe ụfọdụ ọ na esonye na-eme ihe nkiri na nke ọ na-eduzi, na-arụ obere ọrụ nkwado
Ọ bụ onye nduzi nke ihe nkiri na-atọ ọchị nke Naijiria nke a na-enyocha nke ọma bụ Maazị Ibu nke John Okafor mere dị ka onye isi ihe ngosi
Taa, a maara John Okafor nke ọma site na aha ọzara na ihe nkiri ahu karịa aha gọọmentị ya n'ezie
Chukwu sonyeere gọọmentị nke Ebonyi State na Lagos State maka mmemme nnweta nkà a na-akpọ Street to Skills
Ebumnuche ya bụ iji nyere ụmụaka na ndị ntorobịa aka ịkwụsị ịzụ ahịa n'okporo ámá, ma muta nkà ha nwere ike iji na-nweta ihe ha ga-eji di ndu
Chukwu kwuputara na ọ na-arụ ọrụ na ihe nkiri iji mee ka a mara oria akporo Vesicovaginal fistula (VVF) na nsogbu ndị na-arịa ya na-agabiga
O kwere nkwa ime ihe nkiri ahụ dị ka uzọ ọgesi tinye aka nke onyinye ya na ọrụ anụ ụlọ nke nwanyị mbụ nke Ebonyi State, Josephine Elechi

Anele Mdoda (amụrụ na Mee 19, na afọ 1984) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na telivishọn na South Afrika, onye na-egosi ihe ngosi na onye edemede

A mụrụ ya ma zụlite ya na Mthatha, Eastern Cape, Mdoda nwetara akara ugo mmụta na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na mmekọrịta mba ụwa na Mahadum Pretoria, ọrụ ya malitere mgbe ọ dị afọ 20 na afọ 2004 dị ka onye DJ redio
A mụrụ Anele Mdoda na Mee 19, na afọ 1984, na Mthatha, Eastern Cape
Her Thembisa Mdoda (b
1982) bụ onye telivishọn
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, ọ debanyere aha na Mahadum Pretoria Degree na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na mmekọrịta mba ụwa
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Highveld FM mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na afọ 2007
N'afọ sochirinụ, mgbe ọ hapụsịrị Highveld FM ma rụọ ọrụ na 5FM
N'otu afọ ahụ, ọ sonyeere na oge nke ise nke asọmpi Strictly Come Dancing
A mara Mdoda ọkwa onye ọka ikpe Miss South Africa na afọ 2012, n'otu afọ ahụ ọ ghọrọ onye ọka ikpe nke asọmpi Clash of the Choirs
Na ọnwa Septemba afọ 2021, a mara ọkwa ya dị ka onye ọbịa Miss South Afrila ya na Nico Panagio
N'oge niile ọ na-arụ ọrụ, Mdoda enwetala ọtụtụ otuto na mpaghara na mba ụwa
N'afọ 2012, a kpọrọ ya Rising Star of the Year site na Media Magazine
Na 27th Annual Nickelodeon's Kids Choice Awards, ọ meriri Top South African Radio DJ
Anele meriri Best talk Show na afo 2017 Golden Horn Awards
O nwetakwara mmeri Best Breakfast Show Host na South African Radio Awards afọ 2021

Angèle Diabang Brener bụ odee, onye nduzi na onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri si Senegal
A mụrụ Angèle Diabang Brener na Dakar n'afọ 1979

Ọzụzụ ya na agụmakwụkwọ ya na ime ihe nkiri mere na Dakar na Média Centre de Dakar, mgbe e mesịrị na ụlọ akwụkwọ ihe nkiri nke steeti France La Fémis na Paris, o mesịrị gaa na Filmakademie Baden-Württemberg a ma ama na Germany
Ọ malitere ọrụ ya dị ka onye nchịkọta ihe nkiri wee na 2005 ọ duziri ihe nkiri mbụ ya, ihe ngosi banyere ụkpụrụ ịma mma maka ụmụ nwanyị Senegal nke akpọrọ 'Mon beau sourire'
Ọ na-elekọta ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe Karoninka nke a na-ekwu na ọ nwere ihe karịrị ihe nkiri iri na abụọ
Angèle Etoundi Essamba bụ onye Cameroon na-ese foto bi ma na-arụ ọrụ na Amsterdam
A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ya na oji na ọcha, foto mmadụ, nke na-elekwasịkarị anya na nwanyị Afrịka dị ka isiokwu
Essamba bụ otu n'ime ndị na-ese foto nwanyị Africa kachasị mma na nke kachasị mma nke ọgbọ ya, onye nwere ihe karịrị ihe ngosi 200 gburugburu ụwa, na ihe karịrị akwụkwọ 50 na akwụkwọ akụkọ na magazin
O kwuru na 'Foto bụ ihe dị m mkpa, mkpa ọ dị ikwupụta na ikwurịta okwu
Ọ bụrụhaala na mkpa ga-adị, m ga-emepụta
A mụrụ Angèle Etoundi Essaamba na Douala, Cameroon na 1962, ma too na Yaounde n’ámá nna nna ya
N'ajụjụ ọnụ ya na Femi Akomolafe, ọ chetara ibi na nnukwu obodo nke ụmụnne nne, ụmụnne nna, ụmụnne, ụmụnne nne na nna, ụmụ nwanne nne, 'na onye ọ bụla bi n'otu zuru oke na-enweghị ọgụ na mgba'
Mgbe ọ dị afọ 9-10, ya na nna ya kwagara Paris, ebe ọ biri site n'inweta agụmakwụkwọ ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya
Mgbe ahụ, site na 1982, ọ lụrụ di, wee kwaga Amsterdam (Netherlands) ebe ọ malitere ịmụ foto na ụlọ akwụkwọ Nederlandse Fotovak (Dutch School for Professional Photography)
Essamba mechara gaa Lyceum na Paris, ebe ọ gụrụ nkà ihe ọmụma, ịgba egwu, na ise foto
Ọ laghachiri Cameroon ọzọ mgbe afọ iri na itoolu gasiri nke ihe ọ kpọrọ 'self-chosen exile' na mkparịta ụka ya na Femi Akomolafe
O soro DUTA, ma ọ bụ Douala Urban Touch of Arts, nke na-enye ndị na-ese ihe nkiri Central Africa na Douala ohere ịkekọrịta ọrụ ha

Mmetụta mmekọrịta ọha na eze nke Essamba banyere ma Europe ma Africa mere ka o mepụta Foundation Essamba Home na 2009, ebe ọ na-eduzi ụmụ agbọghọ nọ n'okporo ụzọ na Cameroon iwulite ùgwù onwe ha, na-enye ha nkuzi, ma na-akụzi nkà iji nyere ụmụ agbọghọ nọ na Cameroon aka imeziwanye ọnọdụ ndụ ha ma mepụta ọrụ aka nke onwe ha
Foto Essamba na-elekwasị anya na ụmụ nwanyị Afrịka, na imebi echiche nwoke na nwanyị
Ọ na-arụ ọrụ iji kpalie mkparịta ụka n'etiti omenala na ndị mmadụ, ma na-enye ya uru na olu
Ọ bụghị naanị na ọ bụ oge a na-emetụta nkà ya, kamakwa site n’agbụrụ Africa ya n'omenala mba ya dị iche iche
Na-adabere na ahụmịhe onwe ya, akụkọ ihe mere eme, ọdịnala, echiche na mmetụta gburugburu ebe obibi, foto Essamba jikọtara usoro na mmetụta siri ike
Ọzọkwa, ọ na-agbagha ókèala dị n'etiti foto, nkọwa mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, akwụkwọ akụkọ na foto nke ọma, ka ọ na-egosipụta ọhụụ mara mma ya nke ahụ ojii, nwanyị
Ihe ngosi mbụ ya bụ na 1985 na Gallerie Art Collective na Amsterdam
Usoro foto ya nke nwere àgwà ọcha na àgwà ojii nke afọ 1995, White Line, nwetara Prix Spécial Afrique na Festival des Trois Continents, Nantes na 1996

O gosipụtara ọrụ ya n'ọtụtụ ihe ngosi na Africa, Asia, Europe, Latin America, United Arab Emirates na United States gụnyere Bienal de La Habana (1994), Venice Biennale (1994), Johannesburg Biennale (1995), Festival of the Three Continents (1996)
Kemgbe oge ngosi izizi ya na Amsterdam na 1985, egosila ọrụ Essamba n'ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ, n’ebe ndị a na-egosi ngwá ahịa
Ebe ndị a gụnyere Venice, Havana, Dakar, Johannesburg, na Bamako, yana ihe omume gburugburu Africa, Europe, United States, Cuba, Mexico, na China
N'oge na-adịbeghị anya, o meela ihe ngosi nke ọrụ ya Daughters of a Life na Munich, na Museum Fünf Kontinente na 2018
Angèle Makombo-Eboum bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Congo (Democratic Republic of Congo)
Ọ bụ onye isi otu Ligue des Démocrates Congolais [fr] ('League of Congolese Democrats')
Nadié anọwo na-arịa ọrịa kansa afọ atọ tupu ọnwụ ya
N'afọ 2018, a rịọrọ enyemaka n'ụdị ezumike nká gọọmentị n'ihu ọha site n'aka Minista Ọdịbendị nke Ivorian Maurice Bandama
Angélique ma ọ bụ Anzhelika Abachkina (amụrụ na 26 Jenụwarị 2000) bụ onye Russia-French na-agba egwu ice
Ọ na-agba ọsọ ugbu a na Pavel Drozd maka Russia
Ya na onye ya na ya na-agba egwu, Louis Thauron, nọchitere anya France na asọmpi World Junior Championship anọ, na-agwụcha n'ime mmadụ iri kachasị elu n'afọ atọ (2015-2017)

Abachkina lara ezumike nká n'ọnwa Ọktoba afọ 2018 mgbe Fédération Française des Sports de Glace ekweghi ahapụ ya ka ya na Drozd na-agba ọsọ, mana ọ lara ezumike nka na Mee 2021 mgbe a tọhapụrụ ya maka Figure Skating Federation nke Russia
A mụrụ Angélique Abachkina (nke akara mkpọpụta ya bụ /ˈɑːbɑʃkiːnɑː/, n'asụsụ Russia Анжелика Абашкина) na 26 Jenụwarị 2000 na Krasnoyarsk, Russia
Ya na ezinụlọ ya rutere France mgbe ọ dị ọnwa asatọ
Abachkina malitere ịmụ ịnya sket n'afọ 2006
Ya na Louis Thauron sonyeere n'afọ 2012
Mmadụ abụọ ahụ malitere na usoro ISU Junior Grand Prix na 2013, na-enweta ọnọdụ nke asatọ na Estonia na nke iri na Poland
N'afọ 2014, a kpọrọ ha aha na ndị otu French maka World Junior Championships na Sofia, Bulgaria
Abachkina/Thauron nọ n'ọnọdụ nke iri na itoolu na ịgba egwu dị mkpirikpi, nke iri na ise na ịgba egwu n'efu, na nke iri na asatọ n'ozuzu
Muriel Zazoui, Romain Haguenauer, Olivier Schoenfelder, na Diana Ribas zụrụ ha na Lyon, France, n'oge 2013 - 14
Abachkina/Thauron gbanwere ndị nkuzi tupu oge 2014 2015, wee sonyere Igor Shpilband na Fabian Bourzat na Novi, Michigan
Ha nọ n'ọnọdụ nke asaa na ihe omume JGP ha nke afọ 2014
N'ịbụ ndị nọ n'ọnọdụ nke asatọ na ịgba egwú dị mkpirikpi na nke asaa na n'efu, ha mechara nke asatọ n'ozuzu na 2015 World Junior Championships na Tallinn, Estonia
N'asọmpi na usoro JGP nke afọ 2015, Abachkina / Thauron meriri ọlaọcha na Riga, Latvia, wee bụrụ nke anọ na Zagreb, Croatia
Ha mechara n'ọnọdụ nke asaa na 2016 World Junior Championships na Debrecen, Hungary
Na usoro JGP nke afọ 2016, e nyere Abachkina / Thauron ọla edo na Saint-Gervais-les-Bains, France, na ọla nchara na Yokohama, Japan

N'ọnwa Julaị afọ 2018, Alexander Zhulin malitere ịzụ ndị mmekọ ọhụrụ nke bụ Angelique Abachkina na Pavel Drozd nke Russia, mana ndị na-agba ọsọ kewara mgbe ha matara na ndị otu France agaghị ahapụ ya ka ọ sọọ mpi maka Russia
N'abalị iri abụọ n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 2018, o kpebiri ịla ezumike nká n'asọmpi ịgba ọsọ
O mechara ghara ịla ezumike nká na 2021 mgbe otu French Federation kpebiri imezu arịrịọ ya ịlaghachi Russia, o megharịrị mmekọrịta ya na Drozd, nke Zhulin zụrụ
GP Grand Prix; CS Challenger Series; JGP Junior Grand Prix
Angélique Delahaye (amụrụ na 22 Febụwarị 1963) bụ onye ọrụ ugbo na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke France

Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke Fédération nationale des producteurs de légumes (English National Federation of Vegetable Producers) site na 2001 ruo 2012, na onye otu ndị nduzi nke Féderación nationale des syndicats d'exploitants agricoles (English) Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye otu European Parliament site na 2014 ruo 2019, ọ bụkwa onye isi obodo nke Saint-Martin-le-Beau site na 2014 rue 2020
A mụrụ Delahaye na Lyon ma too na Soisy-sur-Seine
Ọ malitere ọrụ ugbo ya n'afọ 1989, ya na di ya Thierry na-elekọta ugbo akwụkwọ nri na Saint-Martin-le-Beau, Touraine

N'afọ 1991, ọ sonyeere ndị nduzi nke Fédération nationale des producteurs de légumes (FNPL) (English National Federation of Vegetable Producers), alaka nke Féderación nationale des syndicats d'exploitants agricoles (FNSEA) (Engish National Federation for Agricultural Holders' Unions)
Ọ ghọrọ onye isi oche nke FNPL, ya mere ọ bụ onye otu ndị nduzi nke FNSEA, n'afọ 2001, na-ejide ọkwa ahụ ruo n'afọ 2012

Kemgbe afọ 2013 ọ bụkwa onye isi oche nke Solaal (Association Solidarité des producteurs agricoles et agroalimentaires) (English Solidarity association of agricultural and agro-food producers), ma nata ọkwa nke Knight na Officer of the Legion of Honour maka ọrụ ya, ebe e buliri ya n'ọkwa onye isi na July 2021
Delahaye banyere na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na 2010, nke Hervé Novelli kwadoro, onye ya na ya rụkọrọ ọrụ mgbe ọ bụ odeakwụkwọ nke steeti maka azụmahịa
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye kansụl mpaghara maka Centre-Val de Loire na ntuli aka mpaghara France nke afọ 2010, ma mesịa gbaa arụkwaghịm n'ọkwa ya na FNSEA
Na Machị 2014, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye isi obodo nke Saint-Martin-le-Beau n'isi nke ndị UMP
N'ọnwa Mee afọ 2014, a họpụtara Delahaye ka ọ bụrụ onye omeiwu Europe, site na nkwado nke Bruno Le Maire na Jean-François Copé bụ ndị mere mkpọsa maka Brice Hortefeux ka ọ bụrụ ya onye ibe ya
Na Jenụwarị 2020, Delahaye kwupụtara na ọ ga-agba ọsọ maka oge nke abụọ dị ka onye isi obodo nke Saint-Martin-le-Beau
Alain Schnel meriri ya na ntuli aka mbụ na Machị, na-enweta 3903% nke votu

Mmetụta egwu ya gụnyere Afropop, Caribbean zouk, Congolese rumba, jazz, gospel, na ụdị Latin; yana arụsị nwata ya Bella Bellow, James Brown, Nina Simone, Aretha Franklin, Celia Cruz, Jimi Hendrix, Miriam Makeba na Carlos Santana

O dekọrọ 'Summertime' nke George Gershwin, Boléro nke Ravel, 'Voodoo Child' nke Jimi Hendrix na 'Gimme Shelter' nke Rolling Stones, ya na Dave Matthews na Dave Matthews Band, Kelly Price, Alicia Keys, Branford Marsalis, Ziggy Marley, Philip Glass, Peter Gabriel, Bono, Yo-Yo Ma, Carlos Santana, John Legend, Herbie Hancock, Josh Groban, Dr John, Kronos Quartet, Yemi Alade, Cassandra Wilson, Burna Boy, Sting, Mr Eazi na onye egwu pop star Indonesia bụ Anggun
Egwu Kidjo gụnyere 'Agolo', 'We We', 'Adouma', 'Wombo Lombo', 'Afirika', 'Batonga', na nsụgharị ya nke 'Malaika'
Abọm ya bụ Logozo nọ n'ọkwa nke iri atọ na asaa na ndepụta Greatest Dance Albums of All Time nke Vice magazine's Thump website chịkọtara
Kidjo maara nke ọma n'asụsụ ise Fon, French, Yorùbá, Gen (Mina), na Bekee
Ọ na-abụ abụ n'ime ha niile, o nwekwara asụsụ nke ya, nke gụnyere okwu ndị na-abụ aha egwu dịka 'Batonga'
'Malaika' bụ abụ a na-agụ n'asụsụ Swahili
Kidjo na-ejikarị usoro olu Zilin omenala Benin na ụda olu
Angel Unigwe (amuru Angel Onyinyechi Unigwe; June 27, 2006) bu onye omere, ihe nlere anya, na onye ihe ngosi nke gosiputara na mgbasa ozi onyonyo a ma ama
Unigwe bụ nwa nke abụọ nke ụmụ ise
Ụmụnne ya; Princess, Buchi, Amanda na Sharon apụtala n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri na mgbasa ozi
Unigwe sitere na obodo Uruala dị na Ideato North nke Imo steeti, steeti dị na ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ Nigeria

N'ịbụ onye nne ya webatara na ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri, Unigwe malitere dị ka onye na-eme ihe nkiri na-eme ihe ngosi mbụ ya na 2015 ka ọ malitechara ọrụ na 'Alison's Stand,' usoro ihe nkiri telivishọn a ma ama nke Nigeria; ma kemgbe ahụ ọ na-aga n'ihu na-eme ka obi di ndị na-ekiri ihe nkiri' mma
Onye mgbasa ozi Unigwe bụ onye nta akụkọ Naijiria Obaji Appet
Unigwe arụọla ọtụtụ ọrụ kachasị n'ihe na-erughị ihe nkiri 30 emepụtara na Nigeria, ụlọ ọrụ kwuru na ọ bụ nke abụọ kachasị n'ụwa na-esote Bollywood

Ụfọdụ ihe nkiri Unigwe gosipụtara na ya gụnyere Woeman’, ‘Everything in Between’ series, ‘Middle of nowhere,’ ‘Light in the Dark,’ ‘Three Thieves,’ ‘Ajoche,’ ‘King of boys,’ ‘Code Wilo,’ ‘Mute,’ ‘Bereaved Pains of Aliyah,’ ‘My Siblings and I,’ ‘Zuriel's Diary,’ ‘City Crimes,’ ‘Bobo A Rats Tale,’ ‘Nigerian trade,’ ‘Ten years Married Mirage,’ ‘Freedah,’ n'etiti ndị ọzọ

N'afọ 2018, Unigwe gbara n'ime Light in The Dark, ihe nkiri nke Ekene Som Mekwunye mepụtara ma duzie ya bụ nke ewepụtara na Jenụwarị 25 n'afọ sochirinụ gosipụtara Joke Silva, Rita Dominic, Kalu Ikeagwu, Ngozi Nwosu, Saidi Balogun, Kiki Omeili, Nonso Odogwu, Big Mickey na Prince Unigwe n'etiti ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ
N'afọ 2019, Unigwe gosiputara dị ka Fuwe na 'Three thieves', nke ndị atọ Sammy Egbemawei, Abba Makama, na Africa Ukoh dere
Na 2021 Unigwe gbara n'usoro ihe onyonyo a na-akpọ 'Olive,' ewepụtara na Mee 2021 nke Yemi Morafa duziri wee bụrụ Esse Akwawa na Chidinma Igbokweuche mebere ya

Unigwe enweela ọtụtụ nhọpụta wee nweta ọtụtụ ihe nrite gụnyere onye na-eme ihe nkiri nke afọ 2019 na Intellects Giant Award; Carted home Best Young/Actor Omee na-ekwe nkwa na October 27, 2019, na 2019 mbipụta nke Africa Movie Academy Awards (AMAA); Nwata na-eme ihe nkiri kachasị mma na ihe nkiri na 2021 Best of Nollywood (BON) ihe nrite bu maka ọrụ ya na 'Strain';
Angela 'Angel' Wainaina (1983 - 28 Jenụwarị 2009) bụ onye Kenya na-eme ihe nkiri, onye na-egosi redio na onye na-eti egwu
A mụrụ Wainaina n'afọ 1983 na Kawangware, nke dị na Nairobi, Kenya
O sonyeere otu klọb ihe nkiri na Kambui High School
Ọ bụ onye nke abụọ na asọmpi Miss Kenya n'afọ 2005
Ọ bụ onye na-ede uri na onye na-eti egwu n'okpuru ala
O mere Sergeant Maria na ihe ngosi telivishọn a ma ama 'Cobra Squad'
N'abalị 15 ọnwa Jenụwarị afọ 2007, ọ malitere ịrụ ọrụ na Ghetto Radio, dịka nwanyị mbụ MC nke Kenya
Ihe ngosi ya 'Chanuka Dada' bụ ihe a ma ama, ma a maara ya nke ọma maka nkwado mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya
E nyere ya ihe nrite mgbasa ozi nke Young Women African Summit
Wainaina nwụrụ na 28 Jenụwarị afọ 2009 na ọkụ ụlọ ahịa Nakumatt
Emere olili ya na Holy Family Cathedral na Nairobi
Angela Atede (amụrụ n'abalị asatọ nke onwa Febụwarị n'afọ 1972) bụ nwaafọ Nigeria na-eme egwuregwu, onye na asọkarị mpi na 100 metres hurdles
Ihe mmeta ya kachasị mma bụ 1272 sekọnd, nke o nwetara n'afọ 1998

Angela Benton (amụrụ (1981-05-22 ) ) bụ nwanyị ọchụnta ego America
Benton chọpụtara NewME (enwetara), mmalite mmalite mmalite maka ndị pere mpe n'ụwa niile na n'afọ pụkụ abụọ na ịrị na otú
Ọ bụ onye ọsụ ụzọ dịgasi iche iche yana otu n'ime ndị Africa-America kacha mkpa na ụlọ ọrụ tekinuzu
O nyerela ụlọ ọrụ teknologi ndị pere mpe aka iweta ihe karịrị nde $iri anọ na asaa na ego itinye ego

Benton enwetala ọtụtụ nkwanye ugwu maka ọrụ ya, gụnyere nnabata dị ka otu n'ime Goldman Sachs 'Puku Kasị ndị ọchụnta ego na-akpali akpali, ndị inyom na-enwe mmetụta nke ụlọ ọrụ ngwa ngwa na teknologi, na Business Insiders' iri abụo na ise Kachasị emetụta ndị Africa-America na teknologi
E gosila Benton n'ọtụtụ mgbasa ozi mba na mba ụwa gụnyere usoro ihe nkiri CNN nwetara nturu ugo Soledad O'Brien Black na America Ala nkwa ọhụrụ Silicon Valley , MSNBC, Bloomberg, Inc
Forbes, Good Morning America , na Wall Street Journal ebe ọ bụ onye na-ede edemede maka mbipụta 125th nke akwụkwọ akụkọ na 'Ọdịnihu nke azụmahịa'
Benton weputara Black Web 20 n'August 2007
A na-ekwu na ewepụtara saịtị ahụ n'ihi obi nkoropụ ya ịchọta ozi gbasara ihe ndị ojii na-eme na tekinuzu ma site na azụmaahịa / mmalite yana echiche ụlọ ọrụ
Saịtị ahụ na-enweta ngwa ngwa n'etiti ndị Black digerati na ndị nkuchi oge mbụ, na-enye ha ebe a ga-anụ ma gosipụta ya
Markus Robinson, onye mmekọ na saịtị ahụ na COO ya ruo 2010, bụ isi ihe na-eto eto n'ime saịtị ahụ

N'oge mmalite nke Black Web 20 Benton jere ozi dị ka onye nchịkọta akụkọ na onye edemede maka saịtị ahụ, yana Robinson, ma jiri ikpo okwu gosipụta ma kparịta isi isiokwu na Black Culture, nkà na ụzụ, na ebe abụọ ahụ jikọtara
Ha abụọ na-akatọkarị ngwaahịa na atụmatụ dijitalụ nke azụmahịa mgbasa ozi nke Africa-American na amụma amụma n'ọgbọ egwuregwu, n'ihi nka ha na-aghọ ngwa ngwa ndị ọkachamara na-eduga na mbara igwe
Na onwa Junu n'afọ pụkụ abụọ na iri na otù Benton weputara otu mbụ osooso NewME na Silicon Valley

Ndị isi ndị sonyere na mmemme ahụ dị ka ndị ndụmọdụ, ndị na-ekwu okwu, ma ọ bụ ndị nkwado gụnyere ụfọdụ ndị ọkachamara nke ụlọ ọrụ teknụzụ; Mitch Kapor, Ben Horowitz, Vivek Wadhwa, Google, Twitter, Andreessen Horowitz, Facebook et al
Ihe omume a bụ nnukwu ọrụ maka ịbụ ihe na-akpali makwa na-akwalite mkparịta ụka gbasara ụdị dị iche iche na ụlọ ọrụ teknologi maka ma agbụrụ pere mpe na ụmụ nwanyị
Ụfọdụ ndị okenye nke NewME gara n'ihu ịghọ onye isi ego n'onwe ha na Kapor Capital, Andreessen Horowitz, na TEDco
N'okpuru nduzi ya, ụlọ ọrụ ahụ nyeere ọtụtụ narị ụlọ ọrụ pere mpe aka ibuli ihe karịrị nde $47 na ego ego achụmnta ego
Benton rere NewME na Disemba n'afọ pụkụ abụọ na iri na asatọ
E gosipụtara klas mmeghe nke NewME Accelerator na nkeji anọ nke CNN nke Black na America nke onye nta akụkọ na-emeri emeri Soledad O'Brien kọrọ
E gosipụtara Benton dị ka otu n'ime isiokwu ndị bụ isi na akwụkwọ akụkọ ahụ

Akwụkwọ akụkọ ahụ, onye lekwasịrị anya na ịkọ akụkọ banyere ndị sonyere 8 NewME Accelerator na-aga na Silicon Valley iji rụọ ọrụ na mmalite ha, kpalitere NewME Accelerator na ọkwa mba wee kpalite arụmụka ụlọ ọrụ kpụ ọkụ n'ọnụ na enweghị ndị pere mpe na teknụzụ
Na elu nke arụmụka tech maven Michael Arrington, mara maka anya agba okwu, ghọrọ a lekwasịrị anya maka pụta adịghị mma na isiokwu
Benton tọrọ ntọala Streamlytics, gburugburu data ọgbọ na-abịa nke na-enye usoro ziri ezi, data nke mmadụ kwadoro, n'afọ pụkụ abụọ na iri na asato iji kwalite nchịkọta data
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ bụ onye ndu ahịa maka ụdị data na-apụta, nke ejirila data obodo emepụtara, nke na-etinye data nwe n'aka ndị na-azụ ahịa na-emepụta ya
Streamlytics nwere a kapịrị ọnụ na-elekwasị anya na-enye data nke ọma na-egosipụta nke ọma ojiji nke ndị na agba na-enye ego nkwụghachi ụgwọ maka ndị ọrụ na-ahọrọ ịkọrọ ha data
Ndị na-etinye ego nke ụlọ ọrụ ahụ gụnyere Issa Rae na The Savannah College of Art and Design
Angela Benton bụ onye lanarịrị ọrịa ara ma na-akwado ahụike na ịdị mma dịka ọ metụtara ịzụ ahịa
O dere REVIVAL na 2017 mgbe nyochachara ọrịa kansa ya

Benton gara Malawi n'afọ pụkụ abụọ na iri na asaa iji kwado obodo ndị dị n'ime obodo nwere ọkụ eletrik site na obere ego na mmekorita ya na Kuyere !, Ọrụ a raara nye inye ọkụ eletrik maka ezinụlọ ndị kasị daa ogbenye na Africa
Ntinye ego ya kwadoro obodo iri na Malawi
O mepụtara usoro ihe nkiri nke akpọrọ, Venture, n'oge ya ebe ahụ
Angela Davis Johnson bụ onye America na-ese ihe, ónyé na-ese foto mgbasa ozi, na ónyé na-eme ihe nkírí
Ọ bi na Atlanta, Georgia ugbu a
Ọ bụ nne ụmụ abụọ
Ọrụ ya na-agba gbụrụ-gbúrụ njirimara na-agbanwe agbanwe nke ndị Africa America n'akụkọ ihe méré eme, ọkachasị ụmụ nwanyị Africa America

Ọrụ Davis Johnson egosila n'ọtụtụ ihe ngosi gụnyere Delta Exhibition na Arkansas Arts Center na Little Rock, Arkansas, Texarkana Regional Arts Center na Texarkana, Texas, na Baton Rouge Center for Contemporary Art na Baton rouge, Louisiana
Enwere ike ịhụ ihe osise ya na gallery na nchịkọta onwe onye na United States
A mụrụ Angela Davis Johnson na Orlando, Florida
Ya na ezinụlọ ya mechara kwaga Virginia, ébé ọ gàrà Governor's School for the Arts, ụlọ akwụkwọ magnet na Norfolk, Virginia
Mmasị Davis Johnson nwere na nka malitere mgbe ọ dị obérè
Ọ bụ nne ya, onye laghachiri n'ụlọ akwụkwọ maka imepụta ejiji mgbe Angela dị afọ 4 ma ga-ekerịta ihe ọ mụtara na Angela na ụmụnne ya
Mgbè Angela dị afọ iri na anọ, a chụpụrụ ya na nne ya na ụmụnne ya atọ n'ụlọ ha dị na Norfolk wee kwaga Lambrook, Arkansas
N'agbanyeghị na ọ dara ogbenye, nne ya gbara Angela na ụmụnne ya ume ka ha makụọ ma nyochaa ihe okike ha site n'ịbụ abụ, ịgụ, na whittling, ma zụta ihe osise
Ónyé na-ese ihe n'onwe ya, Davis Johnson na-enyocha 'njikọ ụwa, njirimara na ihe omume akụkọ ihe mere eme site na akara onwe onye' n'ọrụ ya

Ọrụ Davis Johnson na-ekwu màkà ọtụtụ nsogbu na-eche ụmụ nwanyị ojii ihu gụnyere mmerụ ahụ, ime ihe ike n'ụlọ, ịda ogbenye, gentrification, ime ihe nkírí nke gọọmentị kwadoro, ịgbachi ñkịtị nke ụmụ nwanyị ojii, na nchụpụ
Davis Johnson bụ ónyé ọhụrụ na-ese ihe na Fountainhead, otu Miami, Florida nka
Ebe obibi ya malitere na June 2022 ya na ndị omenkà abụọ ọzọ, Natalie Ball na Shizu Saldamando, a na-akpọkwa ya 'Oge màkà Gị BIPOC Mothers'
Davis Johnson bụ Nné naanị ya nwèrè ụmụ abụọ

Angela Ekaette bụ onye na-agba egwu ballet Naijiria kacha mara amara maka ịkwado ụdị UK nke Wheel of Fortune maka usoro mbụ ya na 1988 na ndị ọkachamara atọ a ma ama tupu Carol Smillie dochie ya
N'oge ahụ, ọ pụtakwara na Bazaar, bụrụkwa onye ndụmọdụ maka ihe ngosi 4Learning 'Equal Voice'
Angela Flournoy bụ onye edemede America
Akwụkwọ akụkọ izizi ya bụ The Turner House (2015) meriri First Novelist Award ma depụta ya maka National Book Award for Fiction, depụta ya na PEN / Robert W
Bingham Prize for Debut Fiction, họpụtara ya maka NAACP Image Award, ma kpọọ ya New York Times Notable Book of 2015
E depụtakwara ya na National Book Awards ' 5 n'okpuru 35 ndepụta, nke onye nkuzi ya ZZ Packer họpụtara
A zụlitere Flournoy na Southern California
Nne ya si Los Angeles na nna ya si Detroit
Flournoy gara Iowa Writer's Workshop na Mahadum nke Southern California
Ọ malitere ịmepụta akwụkwọ akụkọ mbụ ya, The Turner House mgbe ọ na-aga Iowa Workshop, ebe ọ na-agakarị Detroit ileta ezinụlọ nna ya
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, Flournoy kụziri edemede maka Mahadum Iowa, Mahadum Trinity Washington, na Ọbá Akwụkwọ Ọha DC
O bipụtara The Turner House na 2015
The New York Times kpọrọ ya 'akwụkwọ akụkọ mbụ na-adọrọ mmasị ma na-eto eto nke ukwuu
nke e mesiri obi ike na nke a na-echefu echefu'

BuzzFeed kọwara Flournoy dị ka 'onye edemede mbụ a na-eto eto na America,' na-ekwu maka ọtụtụ onyinye na nsọpụrụ ya, yana ahịa siri ike nke Turner House 'Dị ka Bookscan si kwuo, nke na-agbaso ihe dị ka 70% nke ahịa akwụkwọ US, akwụkwọ ya ereela ihe karịrị 15,000 na mpempe akwụkwọ na mkpuchi siri ike ka ọ dị na Eprel ; ihe ọ bụla karịrị 10,000 ka a na-ewere dị elu maka akụkọ ifo'
N'afọ 2020, e mere ndokwa ka ọ gaa njem ọgụgụ nke Ngalaba Na-akwado na Germany
Flournoy kagburu na obere oge n'etiti esemokwu ya na Iran ma bipụta nkwupụta na The New Yorker
Flournoy na-ekwu na nghọta ya banyere mmepe agwa sitere na Zora Neale Hurston Mules and Men
Angela Johnson (amụrụ ya na Juun 18, 1961) bụ onye America na-ede akwụkwọ ụmụaka na abụ, nwere ihe karịrị akwụkwọ iri anọ maka otuto ya kemgbe ọ malitere ọrụ edemede ya n'afọ 1989
Akwụkwọ foto ụmụ ya bụ akụkọ dị mfe ma na-ede abụ banyere ezinụlọ ndị Afrịka na Amerịka, ọbụbụenyi, na ahụmịhe nwata dị ka ịkwaga
Akwụkwọ ya maka ụmụaka ndị okenye na-adabere na isiokwu ndị yiri ya mana ọ na-enyocha nsogbu ndị miri emi dị ka afọ ime afọ iri na ụma na ịgba alụkwaghịm
Ihe odide ya bụ ihe ezi uche dị na ya na ọgwụgwọ dị nro, dị mma, na olileanya
Ọtụtụ n'ime akwụkwọ Johnson nwere njikọ na akụkọ ihe mere eme nke Alabama na obodo Alabama
A mụrụ Johnson na Tuskegee, Alabama, ma tolite na Windham, Ohio, ya na nwanne ya nwoke na nne na nna ya
Ọ malitere ide ihe na klas nke anọ mgbe nne ya nyere ya akwụkwọ akụkọ maka Krismas
N'ịbụ onye nne na nna ya gbara ume ide ihe, n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị, Johnson dere abụ ọ kpọrọ 'punk' nke ndị otu akwụkwọ ụlọ akwụkwọ ya anabataghị
Ọ na-ekwu na nke a kpaliri edemede ya kama ịkụda ya mmụọ
N'oge ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Johnson chọrọ ịbụ onye nkụzi ma ọ bụ onye ọka iwu
Ọ gara Mahadum Kent State mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndrị ma gụọ agụmakwụkwọ pụrụ iche, ọ bụ ezie na ọ hapụrụ tupu ọ nweta akara ugo mmụta ya iji lekwasị anya na edemede ya
Mgbe ọ hapụsịrị mahadum, Johnson rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-elekọta nwa ma onye edemede Cynthia Rylant were ya n'ọrụ bụ onye nyochara ọrụ Johnson ma zigara ya onye nkwusa nke ya
Onye na-ebipụta Rylant kpọtụrụ Johnson na-ekwu na ọ ga-achọ ibipụta akụkọ ahụ ọ kesara dị ka akwụkwọ foto
Johnson kwuru na njikọ ya na Rylant nyere ya 'nkwụsị' nke malitere ọrụ ya
Johnson malitere ọrụ ya na-ebipụta akwụkwọ foto n'afọ 1989
N'afọ 1993, ọ gbasara n'akwụkwọ maka ndị na-eto eto, na-ebipụta ihe oderede be 'Toning the Sweep'
Johnson na-aga n'ihu na-ede akwụkwọ n'etiti ọgbọ nke na-adịghị ahụkebe maka ndị edemede taa
Johnson na-akọwa ọrụ ya dị ka 'onye a na-eduzi agwa' ma na-ekwu na ọ na-agbasi mbọ ike na nhazi nke atụmatụ karịa mmepe nke ndị na-eme ihe nkiri
Ọ na-ekwu na ihe odide ya na-adabere mgbe ụfọdụ na ndị ọ zutere na akụkọ ha na ya kesara
Dị ka Johnson si kwuo, ndị bịara abịa na-akọkarị akụkọ ya
Otu agadi nwanyị nọ na bọs gwara ya banyere nwoke ọ hụrụ n'anya mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na ụma
Agha mere ka ha dị iche mana ha nọgidere na-akpọtụrụ ma nwanyị ahụ nwere atụmatụ ịhụ ya ọzọ
Nke a ghọrọ ihe mkpali maka ihe odide ya Sweet na Curtis na Sweet, Hereafter
Johnson na-ekwukwa banyere edemede ya 'Enwetụbeghị m izi ihe, ịkụziri onye ọ bụla okwu
Naanị ihe m chọrọ ịkọ akụkọ dị mma
' Jonathan Hunt, onye isi oche nke kọmitii Margaret Edwards Award nke afọ 2018 toro edemede Johnson maka ọrụ ya na-enweghị oge, nke na-enweghị isi, na nke mara mma yana nnukwu mmasị ya
Onye edemede akwụkwọ ụmụaka ibe ya bụ Jacqueline Woodson na-akọwa ụdị edemede Johnson dị ka ihe ezi uche dị na ya, na-etinye aka, na nke a na-enweta
Ọ na-ekwu 'ị nwere ike ịkọ site n'ịgụ ọrụ ya na ọ na-ewe oge ya na akụkọ ahụ ma na-eche banyere ndị nọọ na ihe edemede
Ọ na-agakarị nzukọ ma ọ bụ na-eme nleta klas, Johnson na-ezere anya ọha na eze
O nweghị mgbasa ozi ọha na eze, ọ bụ ezie na o nwere ebe nrụọrụ weebụ
Ọ bụ ezie na ọ belatara, Johnson na-eme nkwado ịnọgide na-ede akwụkwọ
Johnson enwetala ihe nrite maka akwụkwọ foto na akwụkwọ akụkọ
O ritere Ezra Jack Keats ihe nrite maka odee ọhụrụ maka Tell Me a Story, Mama n'afọ 1991
O ritela Coretta Scott King Award ugboro atọ, maka Toning the Sweep n'afọ 1994, Heaven n'afọ 1999, na The First Part Last n'afọ 2004
(Ọ bụ onye na-esote ugboro abụọ maka When I Am Old With You n'afọ 1990 na The Other Side, Shorter Poems n'afọ 1998O ritere Michael L

Printz Award site n'aka American Library Association n'afọ 2004, na-aghọta The First Part Last dị ka 'akwụkwọ kachasị mma nke afọ e dere maka ndị nọ n'afọ iri na ụma, dabere kpamkpam na uru edemede ya'
N'afọ 2003, Johnson natara MacArthur Genius Grant
N'afọ 2018, e nyere Johnson onyinye Margaret Edwards maka 'onyinye ya dị mkpa na nke na-adịgide adịgide na akwụkwọ ndị na-eto eto'
N'afọ 2013, Vermont College of Fine Arts na Barry Goldblatt Literary (òtù na-arụ ọrụ iji kwalite ọrụ nke ụmụaka na ndị na-eto eto na-ede akwụkwọ) kwupụtara ịmepụta agụmakwụkwọ aha ya bụ Johnson
Mmụta ahụ na-enye onyinye puku dollar ise ruo ụmụ akwụkwọ abụọ na-acha ọcha na-aga MFA na edemede maka ụmụaka na ndị na-eto eto
Goldblatt họọrọ ịkpọ aha agụmakwụkwọ ahụ iji sọpụrụ onye ahịa mbụ ya bụ Angela Johnson
Na Mahadum Kent State, e nyere Johnson nzere doctorate n'afọ 2007 ma nata Ihe nrite Akwụkwọ nke Virginia Hamilton na 2013
O nwetara ihe nrite Harper Lee nke afọ 2021
