Anthea Ramolobeng bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Africa bụ onye bụ ọnye omeiwu (MP) maka African National Congress
An anthelion (n'ọtụtụ anthelia, site na njedebe Grik ανθηλιος, 'n'ihu anyanwụ') bụ ihe ọhụụ na-adịghị ahụkebe nké ezinụlọ halo
Ọ na-apụta na gbụrụ-gbúrụ parhelic nké chéré ihu na Anyanwụ dị ka ntụpọ na-acha ọcha, ọ bụghị dị ka sundog, ma nwee ike ịgafe ya site na arcs abụọ dị ka X
A na-arụ ụka banyéré otú e si emepụta anthelia

Walter Tape, n'etiti ndị ọzọ, ekwuola na ha abụghị haloes dị íchè íchè, kama ọ bụ naanị ébé haloes dịgasị iche iche nke kristal ice dị ka ogidi na-adaba na gbụrụ-gbúrụ parhelic iji mepụta ntụpọ na-egbuke egbuke
Ọ bụrụ na echiche a ziri ezi, anthelia ga-apụta naanị na haloes ndị ọzọ a
Otú ọ dị, anthelia na-apụta na-enweghị haloes crystal ndị ọzọ, ya mèrè ndị ọkà mmụta sayensị emeela nkọwa ndị ọzọ
Prọfesọ Dutch SW
Visser tụrụ aro na ha na-emepụta site na ngosipụta ọkụ abụọ dị n'èzí na prisms quadrangular, ébé Robert Greenler tụrụ aro ngosipụta abụọ dị n'ime na kristal ndị dị ka kọlụm na-emepụta ihe omume ahụ

Ọ bụ ezie na ebe anthelion na-adịkarị obere na haloes, na ngosipụta dị mgbagwoju ányà ọ na-egosipụta ihe ọhụụ dị ichè ichè a na-adịghị ahụkebe Flanking the anthelion on the parhelic circle is two 120 ° parhelia (and two Liljequist parhelia) caused by plate crystals
A na-emepụta oghere ndị aghụghọ na ndị na-agbasa agbasa n'otu oghere ogidi ma mepụta ọdịdị ankh nké na-agafe anthelion
Wegener arcs na-agafe igwe mgbé ụfọdụ iji gbakọta na anthelion
Anthonia Adenike Adeniji (amuru na Septemba 25, 1971) bu nwa akwukwo Naijiria
Ọ bụ prọfesọ na-akpakọrịta nke mmekọrịta ụlọ ọrụ na njikwa akụrụngwa mmadụ na ngalaba njikwa azụmaahịa na Mahadum nke Covenant University
A mụrụ Adeniji na Septemba 25, 1971 na Ota, Ogun
Ọ gụchara BSc
na nchịkwa azụmahịa na ọkwa nke abụọ dị elu na 1995 na Mahadum Olabisi Onabanjo
O nwetara nzere Post Graduate Diploma in Financial Management (PGDFM) na 1997 na Mahadum Obafemi Awolowo ebe o mezuru MBA na 2000
Na 2001, ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Nigerian Institute of Management
Ọ gụchara PhD
na mmekọrita ụlọ ọrụ na njikwa akụrụngwa mmadụ na 2011 na Mahadum Covenant University

Site na 2010 ruo 2016, Adeniji bụ onye isi, mmemme agụmakwụkwọ, mmekọrịta ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe na njikwa ọrụ mmadụ otu n'ime usoro ọmụmụ atọ a na-enye na Ngalaba Management Business, College of Business and Social Sciences na Covenant University
Ọ bụ onye ọrụ nyocha ule na ngalaba njikwa azụmaahịa site na 2014 ruo 2016 mgbe ọ ghọrọ onye nhazi PG nke mmụta ogologo ndụ n'otu ngalaba ahụ
Adeniji bụ osote prọfesọ nke mmekọrịta ụlọ ọrụ na njikwa akụrụngwa mmadụ na ngalaba njikwa azụmaahịa na Mahadum Covenant University

Ọ na-akụzi nkuzi na njikwa ụgwọ ọrụ na nkwụghachi ụgwọ, mbanye na nhọrọ, mmekọrịta ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe, ndozi esemokwu, nnabata na nhọrọ, nkụzi n'ịntanetị, nkwekọrịta mkpokọta, na ezumike nka na nchịkwa ezumike nka
Ọ na-elekọta ụmụ akwụkwọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'ọkwa doctoral na master's
Adeniji bụ onye otu Nigeria Institute of Management (AMNIM), Chartered Institute of Administration, na Chartered Institute of Personnel Management (MCIP)
Adeniji na-enyocha njikwa akụrụngwa mmadụ, nkwekọrịta mkpokọta, mmekọrịta ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe, njikwa ụgwọ ọrụ ụlọ ọrụ, otu ndị ọrụ na ndị ọrụ, ọzụzụ na mmepe, na atụmatụ akụrụngwa mmadụ
Adeniji bụ onye nyocha nwere akwụkwọ iri atọ na isii na Scopus, ihe iri asatọ na itoolu nke o kwuru na h-index dị ise
Ọ na-eme nyocha ndị ọgbọ maka Wiley Journal of Public Affairs na maka SAGE Open
Adeniji ebipụtala akwụkwọ akụkọ, ọtụtụ n'ime ha na-edepụta aha na Scopus
Odeela akwụkwọ gbasara njikwa ọrụ mmadụ
Anthonia Kehinde Fatunsin bụ onye Naịjirịa na-eme ihe banyere ihe ngwupụta ochie
A na-ahụta ya dịka nwanyị mbụ na-amụ banyere ihe mgbe ochie na Naịjirịa, bụrụkwa nwanyị mbụ chịrị Naịjirịa National Museum, Ibadan
Ọrụ ya bụ nke gbadoro ukwu karịa n'ụdị akpụmakpụ yoruba, ọkachasị ndị obodo Owo
N’afọ 1981, Fatunsin bidoro ngwupụta n'ala Igbo’laja na nke Ijebu-Owo dị n’ime obodo Owo ịmata ihe a maara dịka Owo terracotta
Babasehinde Ademuleya si Mahadum Obafemi Awolowo kwuru na nyocha ya bụ nke ugboro abụọ a na-eme ngwupụta na obodo ahụ ka Ekpo Eyo bịachara na 1976
Otú ọ dị, a na-ahụ Fatunsin ịbụ onye mbụ na-enye nkọwa zuru ezu banyere njirimara nke ihe ọkpụkpụ
Fatunshin edegola banyere oru ndi mgbe ochie na ulo ihe mgbe ochie nke Naijiria na otu o si metuta ihe nketa omenala n’ala a
A nabatala ya dị ka onye ọsụ ụzọ nke echiche na nkọwa ihe mgbe ochie na Africa
Anthonia Ifeyinwa Achike bụ onye Naijiria na-ahụ maka akụ na ụba ugbo
Ọ bụ ọkà mmụta nke Ngalaba akụ na ụba na ọrụ ugbo na Mahadum Naịjirịa, Nsukka
A họpụtara Anthony O
Agbo ka ọ bụrụ Sịnetọ maka mpaghara Ebonyi North nke Ebonyi Steeti, Naịjiria, na-amalite ọrụ na abali iri abụọ na iteolu n'me onwa ise na afọ puku abụọ na asaa (29/5/2007)
Ọ bụ onye otu People's Democratic Party (PDP)
Agbo gụrụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum Steeti Ebonyi na Mahadụm nke Naijiria, Nsukka, gụsịrị akwụkwọ na afo otu puku, nari iteolu na iri asatọ na asatọ (1988)
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye omebe iwu nke Enugu State (tupu e guzobe steeti Ebonyi site na akụkụ nke Enugu), a họpụtakwara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye Ọkà okwu

O mechara bụrụ Kọmishọna nke Ego site n'afọ otu puku, nari iteolu na iri iteolu na iteolu rue na - afọ puku abuo na atọ (1999 - 2003) nakwa Kọmishọna na Ọrụ Ọha site n'afọ puku abụọ na atọ rue n'afọ puku abụọ na ise (2003 - 2005) maka Ebonyi Steeti
Ewezuga ọrụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ya, Agbo bụkwa onye na-ede uri nke bipụtara ọrụ ya n'ọtụtụ akwụkwọ akụkọ ma bụrụ onye na-akwado akwụkwọ Naijiria

Mgbe ọ nọsịrị n'oche ya na Sịnetị n'ime onwa ise n'afọ puku abụọ na asaa (May 2007) a họpụtara Agbo na kọmitii na National Identity Card & Population, Housing, Federal Capital Territory na Drugs Narcotics Anti Corruption
N'ọnwa anọ na-afọ puku abụọ na asatọ (April 2008), a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ osote onyeisi oche nke kọmitii na-enyocha nchịkwa Mallam Nasir el-Rufai nke FCT

N'ime nyocha nke ndị Sịnetị na ọnwa ise n'afọ puku abụọ na iteolu (May, 2009), Ụbọchị e kwuru na ọ kwadoro ụgwọ na Nigerian Congress Medal of Honour Award, National Cooperative Society Federation na Nigerian Unified Filed Institute, ma kwadokwa ma ọ bụ soro kwado ọtụtụ mmegharị
Ọ na-arụsi ọrụ ike na ọrụ plenary na kọmitii
Agbo arịọla maka nguzobe Ministrị maka ndị nwere nkwarụ

N'ajụjụ ọnụ a gbara ya n'ọnwa atọ, n'afo puku abụọ na iteolu (March 2009), na-ekwu maka Naịjirịa n'ozuzu ya na Abuja FCT karịsịa, o kwuru na mmemme iji gbanwee aha Naịjirị agaghị arụ ọrụ ruo mgbe ebe ahụ bụ ebe mara mma ileta, nke nwere ezigbo akụrụngwa, gburugburu ebe dị ọcha na nchekwa
Ndepụta ndị si Ebonyi Steeti
Anthony Baffoe (amụrụ na 25 Mee 1965) bụ onye njikwa azụmaahịa bọọlụ Ghana na onye bụbu onye ọkpụkpọ bụ onye bụ osote odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke Confederation of African Football ugbu a
Ọ gbara bọọlụ dị ka onye na-agbachitere ma nọchite anya ndị otu mba Ghana
Dị ka nwa nke onye nnọchi anya mba Ghana, Baffoe tolitere na nso isi obodo West Germany nke Bonn ma mee onwe ya aha na 1980s na Bundesliga, na-aghọ ezigbo ndị mmadụ kachasị amasị 1
FC Köln na Fortuna Düsseldorf
A mụrụ Baffoe na Bad Godesberg, Bonn, West Germany
N'ịbụ onye na-eme njem dị ukwuu, ọ na-egwuri egwu maka klọb dị na kọntinent anọ dị iche iche
Ọ nọrọ ọtụtụ n'ime ọrụ ya na Bundesliga na 2
Bundesliga, malite na 1983 na 1
FC Köln na 18 afọ tupu ịkwaga n'ókè iji sonye n'akụkụ French FC Metz ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ afọ iri ka e mesịrị
Baffoe bụ otu n'ime onye ọkpụkpọ ojii mbụ ama ama pụtara na Bundesliga
Mgbe egwuregwu elu German 74 gachara maka Köln na Fortuna Düsseldorf naanị ọ gbara maka klọb asaa ọzọ, gụnyere mgbanaka na Hong Kong na Caracas
Baffoe bụ onye Ghana mbụ si mba ọzọ na-agba bọọlụ maka ndị otu mba Ghana
E meriri ya ugboro iri abụọ na ise maka Black Stars, ọkachasị na 1992 na 1994 African Cup of Nations
Anthony Barboza (amụrụ n'afọ 1944 na New Bedford, Massachusetts) bụ onye na-ese foto, ọkọ akụkọ ihe mere eme, onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye edemede

Site na mgbọrọgwụ sitere na Cape Verde, na ọrụ nke malitere na nka azụmahịa ihe karịrị afọ iri anọ gara aga, nkà Barboza na ọrụ ya na-aga nke ọma nyeere ya aka ịgafe ma chụsoo mmasị ya na nka dị mma ebe ọ na-aga n'ihu na-enye aka na nka Amerịka

Barboza nwere ọtụtụ ọrụ ọdịnala na nke ọhụrụ sitere n'ike mmụọ nsọ nke echiche ndị Afrịka-Amerịka, nke egosila na ụlọ ngosi ọha na eze na nke onwe, na nnukwu ụlọ ngosi ihe mgbe ochie na ụlọ akwụkwọ agụmakwụkwọ n'ụwa niile
A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ foto ya nke ndị egwu jazz site n'oge afọ 1970s - '80s
Ọtụtụ n'ime ọrụ ndị a dị n'akwụkwọ ya Black Borders, nke e bipụtara n'afọ 1980 site na enyemaka sitere na National Endowment for the Arts
N'otu edemede e bipụtara n'afọ 1984 na The City Sun, o kwuru, sị, 'Mgbe m na-ese foto, ana m ese foto nke otú onye ahụ si eche m; otú m si eche banyere onye ahụ, ọ bụghị otú ha si ele ya anya
Achọpụtara m na iji mee ka ihe osise ahụ rụọ ọrụ, ha ga-eme njikọ uche yana nke mmetụta uche
Mgbe ha na-eme nke ahụ, amaara m na enwere m ya'
Ọtụtụ n'ime foto ya na-enweta mmetụta ya site na iji ọkụ na onyinyo mee ihe nke ọma, ịchịkwa ihe ndabere, ịtụle mgbanwe na ọsọ ọsọ, ihe mejupụtara, na ọtụtụ usoro na usoro ndị ọzọ na iwu ya
Ihe ngosi ihe osise foto ya kachasị ọhụrụ, Black Dreams / White Sheets, agagharịla mba ụwa ma gosipụta ya na nke mbụ ya na New York City na Bill Hodges Gallery n'ọnwa Nọvemba na Disemba n'afọ 2010

Barboza na-eleba anya n'ọrụ na ahụmịhe nke ndị Afrịka bi na mba ọzọ n'akụkọ ihe mere eme nakwa n'oge a gbasara agbụrụ, mmekọahụ, okike, ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, na nsogbu mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na ọha na eze na ọdịbendị Amerịka

Barboza bịara New York City ozugbo ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị n'afọ 1963 mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na itoolu iji mụọ foto na Hugh Bell, onye na-ese foto ejiji Black nke ghọrọ onye nduzi ya ma nye Barboza ohere ịrụ ọrụ n'efu iji nweta ohere inweta ahụmịhe n'ọhịa

Tupu nke ahụ, ọ zutere Adger Cowans, onye ọzọ n'ime ndị ojii na-ese foto azụmahịa ole na ole nke oge ahụ, onye ga-ewebata Barboza na otu ndị ojii ọkachamara na-ese ihe bụ ndị otu The Kamoinge Workshop
Ọ bụ Roy De Carava duziri otu a na mbụ ma mepụta ya iji kwalite mkparịta ụka siri ike banyere foto n'oge a ka na-akpa ókè megide ndị na-ese foto Afrịka-Amerịka ma na-ewepụ ha na foto ọkachamara
Ha bụ ndị ọkachamara jikọtara aka iji kwado ma nyere aka kwalite ọrụ ibe ha site n'inye nkọwa na nkatọ otu, yana site n'ịmepụta ihe ngosi ọnụ
Barboza na-aga n'ihu na omenala a dị ka onye isi oche ugbu a nke ihe a maara ugbu a dị ka Kamoinge, Inc
ma na-agagide na-akwado ndị Black ndị ọzọ ọkachamara na ndị na-achọ ise foto n'ọrụ ha
N'afọ 1965, e debara aha Barboza n'ime ndị agha mmiri wee bụrụ onye na-ese foto oge niile maka akwụkwọ akụkọ Jacksonville, Florida The Gosport
Ọ bụ n'ebe ahụ ka ọ zụlitere ọrụ ya wee malite ọrụ ya na ihe ngosi otu onye na Pensacola Art Museum na Emily Lowe Gallery na Mahadum Miami
Anthony Michael Bourdain (Juun 25, 1956 – Juun 8, 2018) bụ onye isi nri America na onye telivishọn
Chief Anthony Eromosele Enahoro (22 Julaị na afọ 1923 na 15 Disemba, na afọ 2010) bụ otu n'ime ndị na-emegide ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya na Naijiria
A mụrụ ya dị ka nwa mbụ n'ime ụmụ iri na Uromi, Edo State nke Naịjirịa ugbu a
Nne na nna ya bụ Anastasius Okotako Enahoro (1900-1968) na Fidelia Victoria Inibokun née Ogbidi Okojie (1906-1969)
Enahoro nwere ọrụ dị ogologo ma dị iche na mgbasa ozi, ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, ọrụ gọọmentị na òtù na-akwado ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya

Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Government Schoo, Uromi, Government School, Owo and King's College, Lagos, Enahoro ghọrọ onye nchịkọta akụkọ nke akwụkwọ akụkọ Nnamdi Azikiwe, Southern Nigerian Defender, Ibadan, na afọ 1944 mgbe ọ dị afọ 21, si otú a bụrụ onye nchịkọta akụkọ kacha nta na Naịjirịa
O mechara bụrụ onye nchịkọta akụkọ nke Zik's Comet, Kano, 1945-49, osote onye nchịkọta akụkọ na West African Pilot, Lagos, na onye isi nchịkọta akụkọ nke Morning Star site na afọ 1950 ruo afọ 1953
N'afọ 1953, Enahoro ghọrọ onye mbụ na-ebugharị mmegharị maka nnwere onwe Naịjirịa? nke e mesịrị nye ya n'afọ 1960, mgbe ọtụtụ ihe ndọghachi azụ na mmeri na ndị omeiwu
Ndị ọkà mmụta na ọtụtụ ndị Naijiria ewerela Enahoro dị ka 'Nna nke steeti Naijiria'
Otú ọ dị, arịrịọ ya maka nnwere onwe Naịjirịa nwere ihe ndọghachi azụ na ndị omeiwu n'ọtụtụ oge na ndị otu ndị omeiwu ugwu na-eme ngagharị iwe n'ihi arịrịọ ahụ

N'agbanyeghị mmeri e meriri na ndị omeiwu, a malitere otu mmegharị a ma ama n'ihi mmegharị a na nrụgide a na-arịwanye elu ugbu a megide ọchịchị ndị na-achị ala ma enwere ọgba aghara maka nnwere onwe nke Naịjirịa, ma ọ bụ ma ọ dịkarịa ala, ọchịchị onwe onye
Akintola gbalịrị ịlaghachi na mmegharị maka nnwere onwe Naịjirịa na afọ 1957 ọ bụ ezie na ndị omeiwu kwadoro mmegharị ya, ndị ọchịchị Britain ekwenyeghị na ya, ya mere ọ dara
N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1958, Remi Fani-Kayode laghachiri n'ihe Enahoro mere ma ndị omeiwu gafere ihe ahụ ọzọ mana ndị Britain anabataghị ụbọchị ya
Arịrịọ Fani-Kayode kpọrọ ka e nye Naịjirịa nnwere onwe n'ụbọchị nke abụọ n'ọnwa Eprel n'afọ 1960
N'ịkwalite arịrịọ Enahoro na-eme ugboro ugboro, Sir Tafawa Balewa tụụrụ ndị omeiwu aro ọzọ na 1959, a gafere ya
N'ihi nrụgide na-aga n'ihu, gọvanọ nke ọchịchị ahụ kwupụtara mkpebi nke gọọmentị Britain inye nnwere onwe na 1960
Naịjirịa nwetara nnwere onwe n'ụbọchị mbụ n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 1960
A mụrụ Anthony Enahoro dị ka nwa mbụ n'ime ụmụ iri n'obodo Onewa, Uromi, na steeti Edo nke Naịjirịa ugbu a

Ụfọdụ n'ime ụmụnne ya gụnyere Ambassador Edward, onye nta akụkọ a ma ama Peter ('Peter Pan'), Onye Ọkachamara Henry, onye a ma ama Mike Enahoro, onye mgbasa ozi maka Nigerian Television Authority (NTA), Ben, Dan, Bess, Chris, na Emmanuel
Nne na nna ya bụ Esan bụ Anastasius Asuelinmen 'Okotako' Enahoro (nwụrụ n'afọ 1968) na Fidelia Inibokun née Ogbidi Okojie (nwụrụ na 1969)
[citation needed] Enahoro nwere ogologo oge na ọrụ pụrụ iche na ndị nta akụkọ, ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, ọrụ gọọmentị na òtù na-akwado ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya

Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Government School Uromi, Government School Owo na King's College, Lagos, Enahoro ghọrọ onye nchịkọta akụkọ nke akwụkwọ akụkọ Nnamdi Azikiwe, Southern Nigerian Defender, Ibadan, na afọ 1944 mgbe ọ dị afọ 21

Dị ka nwa akwụkwọ n'oge ahụ na Kings College, Enahoro sonyere na ọgụ nnwere onwe Naijiria megide ọchịchị ndị ọchịchị na mbido afọ 1940, nke dugara na nnupụisi ụmụ akwụkwọ na kọleji dị na Lagos ebe ọ bụ onye ndú ụmụ akwụkwọ
Ọ bụ onye a ma ama na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị n'oge mgbanwe ngwa ngwa

Gọọmentị na-achị mba ahụ tụrụ ya mkpọrọ ugboro abụọ maka ịgba ọchịchị mgba okpuru, maka edemede na-akwa onye bụbu gọvanọ emo, na maka okwu a na-ekwu na ọ na-akpali ndị agha Naijiria na-eje ozi na ndị agha Britain
Ndị Britain kara ya akara dị ka onye ọkụ ọkụ, mana ọbụlagodi na a tụrụ ya mkpọrọ nke ugboro atọ, ọ malitere ịtụle ọnọdụ ya
N'afọ 1950, ya na Arthur Prest guzobere Mid-West Party
Enahoro amalitelarị Mid-West Press ma bipụta akwụkwọ akụkọ Naijiria site na 1950 ruo 1953
Mid-West Party ghọrọ akụkụ nke Action Group na 1951
Enahoro bụ onye nnọchiteanya na ọtụtụ nzukọ iwu kwadoro nke dugara na nnwere onwe nke Naịjirịa na afọ 1960
N'oge nsogbu Naijiria nke sochiri nnupụisi nke afọ 1966, Enahoro bụ onye ndú nke ndị nnọchi anya Mid-West nke oge ahụ na Ad Hoc Constitutional Conference na Lagos
O mechara bụrụ Federal Commissioner (Minister) maka ozi na ọrụ n'okpuru General Yakubu Gowon Military Government, 1967ī74; Federal Commissioner for Special Duties, afo 1975
O mechara bụrụ onye otu National Party of Nigeria, NPN, 1978-83
Ọ bụ onye isi oche, World Festival of Negro Arts and Culture, afọ 1972 -75
Enahoro bụ onye isi oche nke National Democratic Coalition (NADECO), otu na-akwado ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya nke lụrụ onye ọchịchị aka ike Sani Abacha ọgụ ruo ọnwụ Abacha

E nyere Enahoro nsọpụrụ mba nke Commander, Order of the Federal Republic, CFR, na afọ 1982, ọ bụkwa onyeisi oche nke Movement for National Reformation, MNR, yana Pro-National Conference Organisation (PRONACO)
Mahadum Benin nyere ya DSC nsọpụrụ n'afọ 1972
Akwụkwọ ya gụnyere akwụkwọ Fugitive Offender
N'oge nsogbu nke afọ 1962 na mpaghara ọdịda anyanwụ ochie, e jidere ya na ndị ọzọ so na Action Group

N'ịbụ onye a na-ebo ebubo ịgba ọchịchị mgba okpuru n'oge Awolowo na-ebo ya ebubo, Enahoro gbagara Ghana na United Kingdom na afọ 1963, Naịjirịa rịọrọ ka a nyefee Enahoro n'okpuru Iwu Ndị Mmebi Iwu nke 1881, na-egbochi itinye akwụkwọ maka mgbaba ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Na mbido afọ 1963, onye ndu ọhụrụ nke otu Labour, Harold Wilson, chọpụtara ihere nke njide na ịtụ Enahoro mkpọrọ kpatara
Ndị ọrụ gara n'ihu na mwakpo ahụ na House of Commons, na nkwado nke ụfọdụ ndị Tories, nke iwe mgbasa ozi kwadoro
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị Naijiria a ma ama na Britain
Ọ bụ 'onye omempụ na-agba ọsọ' nke kpalitere ọtụtụ ụbọchị arụmụka na House of Commons na afọ 1963 ka ọ na-alụ ọgụ megide extradition

'Ihe gbasara Enahoro' ghọrọ okwu gbasara ikike mmadụ na ọchịchọ gọọmentị na-enweghị obi ụtọ ka ọ ghara ịkpasu Naịjirịa iwe, ma tinye praịm minista Tory, Harold Macmillan, na odeakwụkwọ ụlọ ya, Henry Brooke, n'ọnọdụ siri ike
A tọhapụrụ ya na UK ma tụọ ya mkpọrọ maka ịgba ọchịchị mgba okpuru
N'afọ 1966, Gọọmentị Ndị Agha tọhapụrụ ya
Enahoro si n'egwuregwu
Ọ na-egwu golf ma soro cricket n'ụzọ siri ike
Ọ gara nke ọma n'egwuregwu na King's College ma bụrụ onye a na-eto na ọ bụ onye Naijiria mbụ nwetara ndị otu klọb golf na Naijiria
O jisiri ike mee ka nkwarụ ya daa n'otu ọnụ ọgụgụ n'oge ogologo ọrụ golf ya
Ọ bụkwa onye na-akpali iwebata FESTAC na Naịjirịa n'afọ ndị afọ 1970, n'oge ahụ Muhammad Ali na Pele gara mba ahụ iji nweta otuto zuru oke
Ụmụ ya niile mere nke ọma n'egwuregwu n'oge ha nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ na mahadum, na-egwu bọọlụ, Rugby, Golf na Tennis
Kenneth na afọ (1953-2017) na Eugene bụ ndị na-egwu golf na ndị guzobere Saturday Society na Benin Golf Club
Annabella na-eme Pilates na Gabriel bụ onye na-agba ịnyịnya ígwè
N'afọ 1953, Anthony Enahoro malitere mmegharị ọchịchị onwe onye na Western House of Assembly, nke mechara duga na nnwere onwe Naịjirịa na 1 Ọktoba, na afọ 1960
Enahoro hapụrụ nwunye ya Helen (née Ediae) afọ (1933-2012), ụmụ ha ise, ọtụtụ ụmụ ụmụ na ụmụ ụmụ
Anthony Grooms, onye sitere na Louisa, Virginia, edeela ọtụtụ akwụkwọ ma nweta ọtụtụ onyinye maka ihe odide ya
Grooms bụ prọfesọ ugbu a na Mahadum Kennesaw State, dị nso na Atlanta, Georgia, ma na-akụzi edemede okike na ọmụmụ Bekee ndị ọzọ
A mụrụ Anthony na Jenụwarị 15, 1955, ma too na Louisa, Virginia
Ọ bụ nwa mbụ n'ime ụmụ isii n'ezinụlọ ya ndị Africa America, nke nwekwara ndị American na ndị Europe
Nne na nna ya, Robert E
Grooms na Dellaphine Scott, kwalitere agụmakwụkwọ, ya mere Grooms ghọrọ akụkụ nke atụmatụ nnwere onwe ịhọrọ
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ ọha na eze na-acha ọcha n'afọ 1967 nke nwere njikọta nkebi, na ahụmịhe ya n'ebe ahụ enweela mmetụta dị ukwuu n'ihe odide ya
N'ịbụ onye gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'afọ 1978 na College of William and Mary na Williamsburg, Virginia, Anthony Grooms nwetara nzere Bachelor nke nka na ihe nkiri na okwu
Ọ gbasiri mbọ ike maka agụmakwụkwọ dị elu ma gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'afọ 1984 na Mahadum George Mason na nzere Masta ona nka mma na Bekee
Ọ kụziri na ụlọ akwụkwọ dị iche iche Mahadum Clark State, Mahadum Georgia, Mahadim Cape Coast na Ghana, West Africa, na Mahadum Kennesaw State
Grooms abụwo onye edemede mgbe niile, mana ọ dịghị mgbe ọ weere onwe ya dị ka otu ruo mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ
Ọ kwagara Atlanta, Georgia, n'afọ 1988 mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na ụlọ akwụkwọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ wee lụọ Pamela B
Jackson
N'Atlanta, ọ chọtara òtù na-ahụ maka ihe ndị ruuru mmadụ n'afọ ndị 1960 dị ka ihe ndabere maka edemede ya
Grooms bụzi onye nkuzi na-akụzi edemede okike, yana ọmụmụ Bekee na akwụkwọ ndị ọzọ, na Mahadum Kennesaw State na mpụga Atlanta, Georgia

Grooms enwetala ọtụtụ onyinye maka ihe odide ya Lillian Smith Prize for Fiction (ugboro abụọ), Sokolov Scholarship nke Bread Loaf Writers' Conference, Lamar lectureship nke Wesleyan College, naMmekọrịta Ọchịchị Arts site na Onyinye mba maka nka
N'afọ 2006, ụlọ ọrụ Georgia Center of the Book họọrọ abụọ n'ime akwụkwọ ndị e bipụtara, Ice Poems na Trouble No More, maka Ndepụta Akwụkwọ nke iri abuo na ise Ndị Georgia niile kwesịrị ịgụ

Anthony Grooms bụ onye dere akwụkwọ ndị e bipụtara na-ekpuchi isiokwu dịgasị iche iche, mana akwụkwọ ya a ma ama, Bombingham, bụ akwụkwọ akụkọ na-ekwu maka nsogbu ndị chere ihu n'oge mmegharị ikike obodo n'afọ

Maazị Grooms dekwara banyere mmekọrịta ya na Pat Conroy na nke The World Is Wider Than the Water It Holdsń pp 24810252, Our Prince of Scribes, nke Nicole Seitz na Jonathan Haupt dezigharịrị, mahadum nke Georgia Press, 2018
Anthony Idiata (amuru Jenuarị 5, 1975) bu onye elu jumper Naijiria
Ọ na-ejide ndekọ ime ụlọ nke Africa na elu elu na 232 mita, ọ nwetara na February 2000 na Patras

Anthony Leiserowitz bụ onye na-ahụ maka ọdịdị ala mmadụ na Mahadum Yale nke na-amụ echiche ọha na eze banyere mgbanwe ihu igwe
Ọ enyochala echiche ndị dị na United States, ebe ndị mmadụ na-amachaghị maka mgbanwe ihu igwe karịa na mba ndị ọzọ
Na US, imata ozi gbasara mgbanwe ihu igwe na-emetụta mmetụta mmetụta, onyonyo, mkpakọrịta na ụkpụrụ

Okwu ihu ọha ha na-egosipụta enweghị nghọta nke sayensị metụtara mgbanwe ihu igwe na amachaghị nke nwere ike ịzaghachi ya nke ọmaAnthony Leiserowitz bụ onye na-ahụ maka ọdịdị ala mmadụ na Mahadum Yale nke na-amụ echiche ọha na eze banyere mgbanwe ihu igwe
Ọ enyochala echiche ndị dị na United States, ebe ndị mmadụ na-amachaghị maka mgbanwe ihu igwe karịa na mba ndị ọzọ
Na US, imata ozi gbasara mgbanwe ihu igwe na-emetụta mmetụta mmetụta, onyonyo, mkpakọrịta na ụkpụrụ

Okwu ihu ọha ha na-egosipụta enweghị nghọta nke sayensị metụtara mgbanwe ihu igwe na amachaghị nke nwere ike ịzaghachi ya nke ọmaAnthony Leiserowitz bụ onye na-ahụ maka ọdịdị ala mmadụ na Mahadum Yale nke na-amụ echiche ọha na eze banyere mgbanwe ihu igwe
Ọ enyochala echiche ndị dị na United States, ebe ndị mmadụ na-amachaghị maka mgbanwe ihu igwe karịa na mba ndị ọzọ
Na US, imata ozi gbasara mgbanwe ihu igwe na-emetụta mmetụta mmetụta, onyonyo, mkpakọrịta na ụkpụrụ
Okwu ihu ọha ha na-egosipụta enweghị nghọta nke sayensị metụtara mgbanwe ihu igwe na amachaghị nke nwere ike ịzaghachi ya nke ọma
Mgbe ụfọdụ a na-akpọ ya Tony Leiserowitz, ọ tolitere n'ugbo dị na Michigan
Nne na nna ya bụ ndị na-ese ihe
Ọ nwetara akara ugo mmụta na Mahadum Michigan State na 1990 wee kwaga Colorado, na-achọ ịrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-agba ọsọ ski
Mgbe ọ nọ n'ebe ahụ, ọ malitere inwe mmasị na mgbanwe ihu igwe wee gaa Mahadum Oregon iji mụọ n'okpuru Paul Slovic, ọkachamara na nghọta ihe ize ndụ
N'afọ 2003, Leiserowitz nwetara PhD
ya na ọdịdị ala mmadụ
Ọ sonyeere ngalaba Yale na 2007
ọ malitere imekọ ihe ọnụ Edward Maibach rụkọọ ọrụ na 2008 iji mụọ echiche ndị mmadụ banyere mgbanwe ihu igwe

Ka ọ na-erule n'afọ 2018, ọ nwere nhọpụta dị ka onye isi nchọpụta sayensị na Yale School of Forestry and Environmental Studies ma bụrụ onye nduzi nke Yale Project on Climate Change Communication, onye isi nchoputa na Center for Research on Environmental Decisions na Mahadum Columbia, na onye nchọpụta sayensi na Decision Research
Ọ bụ onye natara
N'afọ 2021, Leiserowitz kwupụtara ịmepụta ihe nkiri, Meltdown, nke na-edekọ njem ọ gara Greenland
E mere ihe nkiri ahụ n'oge njem ya iji mụọ mmetụta nke mgbanwe ihu igwe na Greenland
O nwere mmeghachi omume ya na ahụmịhe ahụ na nkwupụta ya banyere mgbanwe ihu igwe, nke ọ na-amụ kemgbe ọtụtụ iri afọ

Anthony Nwagbara (amụrụ n'ụbọchị iri na anọ nke ọnwa Ọgọst afọ 1987) bụ onye egwuregwu bọọlụ Naịjirịa, onye na-agbara Argentino de Merlo na Argentine Metropolitan C Division
Amụrụ Nwagbara na Enugu, isi obodo Enugu Steeti, Nigeria
Argentino de Merlo bịanyere ya aka n'afọ 2008
Anthony Obiagboso Enukeme // (￼gee ntị) (21 Jenụarị 1944 - 9 June 2020) bụ onye ọchụnta ego Naijiria nke si Anambra Steeti, ndịda-ọwụwa anyanwụ Naijiria
Ọ bụ onye nchoputa, onyeisi oche na onye isi nchịkwa nke Tonimas Nigeria Limited, ụlọ ọrụ na-emepụta ihe na ịzụ ahịa
Ọ bụ Papal Knights nke St
Gregory nnata, na onye otu Knights of St
John International (KSJI)
Ọ bụkwa onye otu Board of Trustees nke otu ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị APGA na Naijiria

Anthony Obiagboso Enukeme mụrụ na 21 Jenuarị 1944 site na Ezinụlọ Enukeme nke Obiuno Umudioka Neni dị n'okpuru ọchịchị Anaocha nke steeti Anambra, n'akụkụ okporo ụzọ Akwaeze site n'ahịa Nkwo dị n'obodo Igbo Ukwu
Ọ bụụrụ nanị otu nwa nwoke, nweekwa otu nwanne nwanyị
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ praịmarị, ọ gara ọzụzụ Igbo Apprentice Scheme afọ iri na ise dị ka onye na-eje ozi n'ụlọ ọrụ mmanụ ụgbọala n'oturkpo, Benue steeti na n'ahịa Aba Ngwa dị n'Abia steeti
N'afọ 1975, ọ malitere njem mmụta n'ihu nke mere ka ọ gụchaa ma sekọndịrị na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Public Administration n'afọ 1985
O wee nweta nzere Masters na International Affairs and Diplomacy, ha abụọ na mahadum Abia State University, Uturu, Abia State
Enyere ya akara ugo mmụta Honorary Doctorate na Business Administration site na Chukwuemeka Odumegwu Ojukwu University
Chief Enukeme hibere Tonimas Nigeria Limited na 1981 wee weba ya dika ulo oru nwere oke na 1982

Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na-ere ahịa ma na-ekesa ngwaahịa mmanụ ala a nụchara anụcha, na-arụpụta akwa mkpuchi aluminum na ntu O mechara gbanwee gaa na ile ọbịa, imepụta rọba, ugbo tank, ibugharị , na azụmaahịa mbupu
Chief Enukeme lụrụ Iyom Mary Uzoaku Enukeme (Iyom Mmiliaku) n'ụzọ obi ụtọ ma gọzie alụmdi na nwunye ahụ ma nwee ụmụ isii
Ọ nwụrụ na 9 June 2020 mgbe ọ rịasịrị ọrịa dị mkpirikpi nke bụ n'ihi enweghị ike ịga njem maka nyocha ahụike oge niile nke mkpọchi metụtara COVID19 na Naịjirịa kpatara
Chief Enukeme wuru Saint James' Catholic Church na Neni gụnyere rectory, chapel, ụlọ ụka, ọgba nke Blessed Virgin Mary ma nyefee ya na Awka Diocese nke Chọọchị Katọlik maka ebe ofufe
E mere emume ncheta iji sọpụrụ ya na chọọchị ahụ mgbe ọ nwụsịrị
O wukwara St
Agatha Catholic Church, Umuarakpa, Aba
Anthony Oluwakayode Oseyemi (amuru 17 Jenuarị 1977) bu onye omere nke Britain–South Africa sitere na agbụrụ Naijiria nke etolite na Johannesburg, South Africa
AỌrụ ya kacha mara amara gụnyere ndị na fim na usoro telivishọn Five Fingers maka Marseilles, The Congo Murders, na Isidingo, n'etiti ndị ọzọ
Ọ bụkwa onye ode akwụkwọ, onye na-agụ egwu na onye na-emepụta ihe, na mgbakwunye na ọrụ ime ihe nkiri ya
A mụrụ ya na 17th nke Jenụwarị 1977 na United Kingdom site na nne Nigeria na nna Britain
Mgbe e mesịrị, ọ kwagara South Africa ịrụ ọrụ
Ọ gara Mahadum North London, ebe ọ nwetara akara ugo mmụta BA ya na Performing Arts
Na United Kingdom, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na postgraduate
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, ọ laghachiri South Africa ma guzobe onwe ya n'ebe ahụ
Onye so na Lewisham Youth Theatre, ọ malitere n'ọgba ahịa azụmahịa
Mgbe ahụ, dị ka akụkụ nke London International Festival of Theatre, o nyere usoro ihe omume dị mkpa n'akụkụ osimiri
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ na Project Phakama na Tricycle Theatre na Albany Theatre
Ka ọ nọ na-eche ntugharị ogbo ya, ọ gbara n'ime egwuregwu The Amen Corner, nke James Baldwin duziri
Tụkwasị na nke ahụ, ọ rụpụtara ihe nkiri Performance with Multimedia Production, nke o nwekwara ọrụ nkwado
Erite na telivishọn ya gụnyere ngosi ndị ọbịa na Is Harry On The Boat? na-abịa, ha abụọ na-agbasa na Channel 4
Ọ pụtakwara dị ka kpakpando ọbịa na usoro ihe nkiri ahụ bụ Harry On The Boat? site na 2002 ruo 2003, na n'usoro ihe nkiri ahụ Harry nọ n'ụgbọ mmiri? site na 2003 ruo 2005
Mgbe ọ gụchara akara ugo mmụta ya n'ịrụ ọrụ nka, ọ gara n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ ndu n'ọtụtụ usoro telivishọn, gụnyere Jacobs Cross, Room 9, Traffick, na Isidingo
Ọ pụtakwara na usoro telivishọn dị ka Wild at Heart, The Runaway, Strike Back, na Akwụkwọ nke Negroes, n'etiti ọrụ ndị ọzọ
N'afọ 2012, ọ pụtara n'ihe nkiri usoro anthology etv Mzansi Love Ekasi Style, nke ọ rụrụ ọrụ Ekasi

Congo rụrụ ọrụ ndu na Michael Matthews '2017 South African Western thriller film Five Fingers for Marseille (nke a makwaara dị ka 'Mkpịsị aka ise maka Marseille') dị ka agwa 'Congo' Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, a na-enyocha ya na ngalaba Discovery nke 2017 Toronto International Film Festival, ebe ọ nwetara otuto site n'aka ndị nkatọ
Ka ọ dị ugbu a, ọ pụtara na ihe nkiri ịhụnanya Hectors Search for Happiness na ihe nkiri American ozugbo na vidiyo SEAL Team 8 Behind Enemy Lines, ewepụtara ha abụọ na 2012f
Na mgbakwunye na ime ihe nkiri, o dekwara usoro ihe onyonyo South Africa Tempy Pushas, nke a na-agbasa na SABC 1 n'oge ahụ
O wee dee serial Room 9, nke a họpụtara ya maka ihe nrite ihe nkiri South Africa na Television na 2014, yana ịpụta na ya dị ka onye na-edu ndú
Anthony Ramos bụ ónyé America na-ese vidio, ónyé na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-ese ihe
A mụrụ ya na 1944 na Providence, Rhode Island, ma biri na South nke France
Tupu ọ nata MFA
site na California Institute of the Arts ọ gụrụ ihe osise na Mahadum Southern Illinois
Ọ bụ ónyé na-enyere Allan Kaprow aka na gụsịrị akwụkwọ
Onye jụrụ n'ihi akọ na uche, a tụrụ Ramos mkpọrọ ọnwa iri na asatọ màkà izere draft
Na mbido ọrụ ya, ọ natara National Endowment for the Arts Visual Arts Fellowship, Rockefeller Foundation Fellowsship, na Aspen Fellowships site na Aspen Institute
N'ime afọ 1970 na 1980, Ramos gàrà Europe, Africa, China na Middle East
O dèrè njedebe nke ọchịchị Portugal na Cape Verde na Guinea-Bissau
Ọ nọ na Tehran n'oge nsogbu ndị e jidere n'Iran n'afọ 1980
E gosipụtara ọrụ vidio nke Ramos na
Anthony Ramos kụziri na Rhode Island School of Design, Mahadum New York, na Mahadum California na San Diego, n'etiti ndị ọzọ
Kemgbe ngwụcha afọ 1980 ọ na-arụ ọrụ na eserese
Ọtụtụ ebe mbà ụwa gosipụtara ọrụ ya, n'etiti ha American Jazz Museum na Bruce R
Watkins Cultural Center, Kansas City; Biennale de Dakar, Senegal
Anthony Sabuneti (a mụrụ n'afọ 1974) bụ onye Zimbabwe na-akpụ ihe
Ọ bụ nwa afọ Harare, Sabuneti bụ nwa ikpeazụ n'ime ụmụ isii; nne ya bụ ọkpụite, ọrụ ya metụtakwara ya nke ukwuu
Ọ malitere ọrụ ya mgbe ọ dị afọ asaa, na-eme ihe eji egwuri egwu waya maka ire ụmụaka ndị ọzọ
Ihe ndị a ka o gosipụtara na Ụlọ Nzukọ Obodo
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndri ya na Harare
Sabuneti na ụfọdụ ndị enyi ya guzobere Gota Tochisuma Atelier na 1987; ọ ka na-arụ ọrụ na otu ahụ
O gosipụtala ihe ngosi na National Gallery of Zimbabwe, na ihe ngosi otu na mba ụwa, gụnyere na US
Echiche megidere ndị Fulani bụ iro a na-akpa ndị Fulani na Naijiria yana ịkpa oke a na-eme ha n’ihi ya
Ndị Fulani bụ agbụrụ ndị na-akwagharị akwagharị nke gbasasịrị n'ọtụtụ mba ọdịda anyanwụ Afrịka
Ndị Fulani nwere pacent 6 n'ọgụgụ nke ndị Naijiria
E bola ndi Fulani ebubo na ha na-akwado otu ndị Islam na-eyi ọha egwu dịka Boko Haram n'agbanyeghị na ha na-enwekwa mwakpo ndị oyi ọha egwu ahụ
Ebubo ndị a etinyela ndị otu dị iche iche na Naịjirịa dịka ndi otu Igbo nationalistnke Indigenous People of Biafra, obi siri ike ị ịgbasa okwu megidere gbasara ndị Fulani
Esemokwu nke ndị Herder – ọrụ ugbo na Naịjirịa bụ ọtụtụ usoro esemokwu dị n'etiti ndị Fulani na-achị ehi na ndị ọrụ ugbo na-abụghị Fulani maka ala, nke na-ebute ọgbaghara mgbe ụfọdụ
Ị ma akaa ebe ọ metụtara ndị Fulani na-achị ehi emeela ka a kọsiwa akụkọ na-emejọ ndị Fulani na Naịjirịa ike site na ndị ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị na ụlọ ọrụ akụkọ
Na nzaghachi maka esemokwu a, ụfọdụ steeti dị na Naịjirịa atụpụtala ma ọ bụ wepụta iwu ka akwụsị ndị Fulani na-achị ehi ibubata ehi ha maka ịta nri
E boro iwu ndị a ebubo dịka ịkpa ókè megide ndị Fulani nke na-edozighị nsogbu ahụ

Otu nkwado ndị Fulani Tabital Pulaaku International e bola onye omebe iwu Adamawa bụ Binos Dauda Yaroe ebubo okwu ịkpọasị mgbe ọ tara ndị Fulani na-achị ehi ụta na ha jiri ngwa ọgụ Naijiria a tọọrọ mmadu
Ọgbaghara nke ndị Fulani na-achị ehi na ndị ọrụ ugbo ebutela igbu ọchụ sitere agbụrụ megide ndị Fulani
Na 1 Febuwarị 2018, mmadụ asaa ndị Fulani nọ na Gboko, Benue State, Naijiria ka eboro ebubo na ha mere ihe ọjọọ, nke na ndị mmadụ iwe ji tọọrọ ha n'ụgbọ ala njem ọha were kugbue ha
Ka a wakpochara obodo ndị Berom na-akọ ugbo na Plateau Steeti na 23-24 June 2018, ndị ntorobịa Berom na Plateau Steeti gbochiri okporo ụzọ ma gbuchapụ ndi mmadụ ndị a na-enyo enyo na ha bụ ndị Fulani
Ndị ìgwè mmadụ ndi iwe nọ na Edo Steeti gburu mmadụ ise bụ ndị eboro na ha bụ ndị Fulani na-achị ehi nị nke bu egbe

Ndị isi na mpaghara ndịda na Middle Belt nke Nigeria ekwupụtala mmegide megide atụmatụ sitere n'aka gọọmentị etiti ka e guzobe ụlọ ọrụ redio na-asụ Fulani, na-ekwu na ọ ga-akwalite mgbasa ozi gbasara igbu ndị mmadụ na-abụghị Fulani, na-atụnyere mgbuchapụ Rwandan
N'afọ 2016, n'ịzaghachi na nrigoro nke ọgbaghara nke ndị Fulani na-achị ehi, hashtag #fulaniherdsmen wuru n'etiti ndi mgbasa ozi ọha nke Naijiria, ma kpalie okwu mgbochi Fulani
Mgbasa ozi ịntanetịna akụkọ adịgboroja gosiri ndị Fulani na-achị ehi dịka ndị ogbu mmadụ na-ịṅụ ọbara na-agụ agụ ma ọ bụ ndị na-eyi ọha egwu, akpalitere echiche megidere ndị Fulani
Bishọp Katọlik Naịjirịa bụ Matthew Hassan Kukah a kpọla oku ka akwụsị 'okwu ịkpọasị' na ịntanetị megidere ndị Fulani na-achị ehi
Echiche megidere Igbo (nke a makwaara dị ka Igbophobia ) na-ezo aka n'egwu ndị Igbo nọ na Naijiria bụ ndị na-agbasokarị akụkụ ndịda-ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Nigeria na akụkụ ndịda-ndịda kwa

N'ime afọ mmalite nke nnwere onwe nke Naijiria, ana ahu ndi ndị Igbo dika agbụrụ na-akwadoghị nke ọma nwere ọgaranya na ohere dị iche iche nke mpaghara n'ihi na ndị ọchịchị na-achị obodo na-eji ndị Igbo aru ọrụ n'ime Naijiria colonial site n'aka ndị ọchịchị na ọha na eze
ngalaba na mpaghara na mba niile
Nke a kpasuru ndị Igbo iwe

Nke a ka njọ site n'ọchịchị obere oge nke Ọchịagha Johnson Aguiyi-Ironsi, onye ọchịchị ndị agha ya bụ ndị Igbo ma kpochapuru mpaghara etiti; Nke a mere ka e gbuo ya na mwepu ọchịchị nke ndị Hausa / Fulani so na ya mere

Osotekwara ogbugbu egburu puku kwuru puku ndi Igbo na pogrom na mpaghara ugwu, nke chupuru nde umu Igbo n'ala nna ha di na East Nigeria ; mmekọrịta agbụrụ na-akawanye njọ ngwa ngwa, e wepụtakwara mba dị iche iche nke Biafra na 1967, nke butere agha Biafra
Onodu Mmegide ndị Igbo nke1966 bụ usoro ogbugbu e gburu ndị Igbo na ndị ọzọ sitere na ndịda Naijiria bi na ugwu Naijiria malite na Mee 1966 wee rute ọnụ ọgụgụ kasị elu mgbe 29 Septemba 1966 gasịrị

N'ime oge a ka ndị Hausa-Fulani na ndị agha Hausa-Fulani na ndị nkịtị gbagburu ndị obodo Igbo 30,000-50,000 bụ ndị chọrọ ịbọ ọbọ maka ịchị ọchịchị Naijiria nke 1966, nke ndị Majors isii na Captain atọ nke Ndida Nigeria kpụrụ, wee gbuo ya, nke kpatara onwu ndị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Naijiria mmadu iri na otu na ndị agha ndị Hausa, Fulani, Itsekiri na ndị Yoruba
Ihe ndị a mere ka ndị Naijiria gbagha ọchịchị wee kewapụ mpaghara ọwụwa anyanwụ Naịjịrịa na nkwuputa mba Biafra nke mere n'ikpeazụ bute agha Naijiria na Biafra
Ụfọdụ ndị ode akwụkwọ kọwara ogbugbu 1966 mere na ndịda Naijiria dị ka mkpọnwụ nke ụfọdụ ndị ode akwụkwọ na-akọwakwa ya n'ụzọ dị iche iche dị ka ọgbaghara, pogroms ma ọ bụ mgbukpọ
Republic of Biafra bụ steeti na-akwado nkewa na ọwụwa anyanwụ Naịjirịa nke dị site na 30 Mee 1967 ruo Jenụwarị 1970
O nwetara aha ya site na Bight of Biafra, Atlantic bay n'ebe ndịda ya
Ndị bi na ya bụkarị ndị Igbo bụ ndị duziri nkewa ahụ n'ihi esemokwu akụ na ụba, agbụrụ, ọdịbendị na okpukpe n'etiti ndị dị iche iche nke Naịjirịa
Agbụrụ ndị ọzọ mejupụtara mba ahụ bụ Efik, Ibibio, Annang, Ejagham, Eket, Ibeno na Ijaw, tinyere ndị ọzọ
Antinea Airlines bụ ụlọ ọrụ ụgbọ elu na-ebu ndị njem na ibu nke dị na Algiers Houari Boumedienne Airport, n'obodo Algeria nke e mepere na Jun 1999
E jikọtara ụlọ ọrụ ụgbọelu ahụ na nke Khalifa n'afọ 2001, ụlọ ọrụ ahụ kwụsịrị ịrụ ọrụ n'afọ 2003
Antirhea radiata bụ ụdị osisi dị na ezinụlọ Rubiaceae
A na-ahụ ya na Cuba, Dominican Republic, na Haiti
Ọ na-eyi egwu site na ọnwụ ebe obibi

Antjie Krog (amụrụ 23 Ọktoba afo 1952) bụ onye odee na agụmakwụkwọ South Africa, nke a kacha mara amara maka uri Afrikaans, akụkọ ya na Commission Truth and Reconciliation Commission, na akwụkwọ afo 1998 ya Country of My Skull
Na afo 2004, o sonyeere ngalaba nka nke Mahadum Western Cape dị ka Prọfesọ pụrụ iche
A mụrụ Krog n'ime ezinụlọ ndị odee Afrikaner, ma bụrụ ada nke onye na-ede uri Afrịka, Dot Serfontein
O tolitere na ugbo na Kroonstad, Orange Free State
Ọrụ agụmagụ ya malitere na afo 1970 mgbe, n'ogo nke afọ apartheid John Vorster, o dere uri mgbochi ịkpa ókè agbụrụ akpọrọ 'My mooi Land' ('Obodo m mara mma') maka akwụkwọ akụkọ ụlọ akwụkwọ ya
The uri meghere na ahịrị, ' Kyk, ek bou vir my 'n land / waar 'n vel niks tel nie ' ('M na-ewu onwe m obodo ebe akpụkpọ anụ adịghị mkpa')
Ọ kpalitere ọgba aghara n'ime obodo ndị na-asụ Afrịka na-achọghị mgbanwe na a kọkwara ya na mgbasa ozi mba
E bipụtara mpịakọta mbụ nke Krog, Dogter van Jefta (' Ada Jephta '), obere oge ka e mesịrị, ebe Krog ka dị nanị iri na asaa
Ronnie Kasrils tụgharịrị 'My mooi Land' wee bipụta ya na mbipụta Jenụwarị afo 1971 nke Secheba, mbipụta gọọmentị nke African National Congress (ANC) na London
A kọrọ na stalwart ANC Ahmed Kathrada gụrụ abụ ahụ n'olu dara ụda mgbe a tọhapụrụ ya na Robben Island
Krog nwere BA (Hons) sitere na Mahadum Orange Free State (1976), MA na Afrikaans sitere na Mahadum Pretoria (1983), na diplọma nkuzi sitere na Mahadum South Africa
Afo 1980s Onye na-ede uri na onye na-eme ihe ike
N'afọ 1980 na mmalite afo 1990, ya na di ya na ụmụntakịrị nọ na Kroonstad, Krog kụziri na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ojii na kọleji ndị nkuzi
Na Kroonstad, ọ nọ na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị - ịga nzukọ na ngagharị iwe ANC - wee tinye aka na Congress of South African Writers, tọrọ ntọala na afo 1987
Akpọrọ ya ka ọ gụọ uri na nnọkọ 'free Mandela ' n'ime obodo Maokeng
Ihe omume ya na-emegide ịkpa ókè agbụrụ n'oge a, na iro ha kpalitere n'etiti ndị ọcha na-achọghị mgbanwe, bụ isiokwu nke ọrụ mbụ ya, Relaas van 'n moord (1995; 'Account of a Murder')
Afo 1990s Onye nta akụkọ na TRC
N'afọ 1993, Krog ghọrọ onye nchịkọta akụkọ nke akwụkwọ akụkọ Africaans current-affairs, Die Suid-Afrikaan ('The South Africa')
Site na 1995 ruo 2000, ọ bụ onye nta akụkọ redio na South Africa Broadcasting Corporation (SABC)

Ọ duru ndị otu redio bụ ndị kpuchiri Truth and Reconciliation Commission (TRC) site na afo 1996 ruo afo 1998, na akụkọ ya n'oge a ghọrọ ihe ndabere nke ọrụ prose ya nke abụọ, Country of My Skull (1998)
Krog kọrọ n'okpuru aha nwunye ya, Antjie Samuel
Afo 2000s-ugbu a Onye edemede, agụmakwụkwọ na ọgụgụ isi ọha
N'ime afọ iri abụọ gara aga, Krog ebipụtala mpịakọta atọ nke abụ ọhụrụ, akwụkwọ prose anọ na akwụkwọ edemede, na ọtụtụ nsụgharị, gụnyere abụọ sitere na asụsụ ụmụ amaala Afrika
Krog sụgharịkwara akụkọ ndụ Nelson Mandela, Long Walk to Freedom, ka ọ bụrụ Afrikaans
Ọ na-asụgharị mgbe niile site na Dutch gaa na Afrikaans ka ọ na-ede ihe
N'ịgbaso mbipụta nke Mba nke okpokoro isi m, Krog nyere usoro nkuzi gbasara TRC na Europe na United Steeti
N'oge na-adịbeghị anya, ọ kuziri nkuzi na ntụgharị asụsụ na Mahadum Columbia University for Comparative Literature and Society
Ọ bụ onye ode akwụkwọ na Dutch Foundation for Literature na mbido afo 2019, na Mahadum Ghent na afo 2020, yana na Mahadum Leiden n'oge mgbụsị akwụkwọ afo 2021
Kemgbe afo 2004, ọ bụbu Prọfesọ pụrụ iche na Mahadum Western Cape na onye otu nyocha na Center for Multilingualism and Diversities Research, ọ na-ebipụta akwụkwọ nkatọ mgbe niile
Krog lụrụ onye na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ John Samuel
O nwere ụmụ anọ - Andries, Susan, Philip, na Willem - na ọtụtụ ụmụ ụmụ
Krog bipụtara akwụkwọ mbụ nke amaokwu, Dogter van Jefta ('Daughta nke Jephta'), na afo 1970
Kemgbe ahụ o bipụtala ọtụtụ mpịakọta ọzọ
Egwu ya na-abụkarị akụkọ ndụ onwe ya, gụnyere ntụgharị uche na ịhụnanya na ọrụ ndị na-ese ihe, na kemgbe afo 1980 na-ekwukarị gbasara ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị agbụrụ na okike
Krog kwuru na nchịkọta nke isii ya, Jerusalemgangers (1985), bụ onye mbụ nwere 'ntọala ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị zuru oke' Ọ na-edekarị n'amaokwu efu
A na-eto abụ Krog nke ọma na South Afrika
Ọ nwetala ihe nrite Hertzog abụọ na ọtụtụ onyinye mba ndị ọzọ
N'ịtụle Kleur kom nooit alleen nie (2000), Leon de Kock dere, sị, 'Ọ na-akpaghasị ikike, ma mmekọahụ na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
ọ jụrụ ịkwụsị ịgbalị ikwu olu nke ala' Na JM Coetzee 's novel Diary of a Bad Year, onye isi agwa na-ekwu ihe ndị a nke Krog
Isiokwu ya bụ nnukwu ahụmahụ akụkọ ihe mere eme na South Africa nke ndụ ya
Ike ya dị ka onye na-ede uri etoola n'ịzaghachi ihe ịma aka ahụ, na-ajụ ịbụ onye a na-anụ ọkụ n'obi
Ezi ezi obi kwadoro site na nnukwu ọgụgụ isi nwanyị, na ahụmihe na-agbawa obi ị nweta
Ọ dịghị onye ọ bụla nọ n'Australia na-ede ihe n'ụdị ọkụ na-acha ọcha
Ihe omume Antjie Krog na-amasị m dị ka onye Russia
Na South Africa, dị ka ọ dị na Russia, ndụ nwere ike ịdị njọ; ma lee ka mmụọ obi ike si amali ịza!
Asụgharịla abụ ya n'asụsụ Bekee, Dutch, French na ọtụtụ asụsụ ndị ọzọ
E bipụtara ya na bekee na Down to My Last Skin (2000), nke oge a Krog enwetalarị ọtụtụ ihe nrite akwụkwọ edemede South Africa ama ama
A maara ya nke ọma maka akwụkwọ ya Country of Skull (1998), nke dabere na ahụmahụ ya na-akọ na TRC
Ọ nwere ihe dị iche iche nke memoir na akwụkwọ akụkọ, ma emesịa mee ihe nkiri na 2004 ihe nkiri nke Samuel L
Jackson na Juliette Binoche
A Change of Tongue (2003), Krog's second work of prose in English, na-atụgharị uche na ọganihu e nwetara - ma na South Africa ma na ndụ Krog - ebe ọ bụ na ntuli aka mbụ nke onye kwuo uche ya na 1994
Ngwakọta akụkọ ifo, uri, na akụkọ n'oge gara aga, ọ na-eji akụkọ nke ndị ọzọ wee detuo mgba maka njirimara, eziokwu na nzọpụta
Aha akwụkwọ ahụ nwere nkọwa ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na nke nzuzo mbelata ọrụ Afrikaans na okwu ọha na-egosipụta na mgbapụ nke ya na Bekee dị ka asụsụ asụsụ nke ọrụ ya
N'ịkọwa nzukọ ndị ya na Mandela nwere mgbe ọ na-asụgharị akwụkwọ akụkọ ndụ ya n'asụsụ Afrikaans, ọ na-atụgharị uche na mmekọrịta ya na asụsụ Afrikaans, bụ nke na-ejikọta ya na Apartheid
Ịrịọ ịbụ onye ojii (2009) nwere ụdị yiri ya na ihe gbasara isiokwu yiri nke Krog na mbụ prose na bekee, onye mbipụta ya na-akpọsa ya dị ka nke atọ na trilogy na-akwadoghị
E nwere ewu a Inyocha akaebe eziokwu Commission nke Notrose Nobomvu Konile (2009) bụ ọrụ nke agụmakwụkwọ na-abụghị akụkọ ifo, jikọtara ya na Nosisi Mpolweni na Kopano Ratele

Akwụkwọ a na-agbaso mgbalị ndị edemede na-eme iji mee ka echiche nke ahụmahụ nke otu nwanyị na-alụbeghị di, onye akaebe TRC banyere ọnwụ nwa ya nwoke, nke e nyere na Xhosa, dị ka ihe dị ịtụnanya na nke na-apụghị ịghọta aghọta ndị na-ege ntị na nkọwa Bekee
A na-emetụta prose Krog site na ederede JM Coetzee na Njabulo Ndebele, yana ọrụ dị iche iche a sụgharịrị site na asụsụ ụmụ amaala Africa, bụ ndị ọnụ na-ekwu 'azọpụta [ya] ndụ'

Ihe odide ndị Africa nyere m ohere ịnweta echiche ụwa nke m na-ebi ndụ na ndụ m niile, ma amaghị m nke ọma (oke omimi ya, omimi na ịma mma), ebe Coetzee nyere m ngwá ọrụ iji mee nkọwa ndị bara uru na ya
Naanị egwu egwu Krog, Waarom bụ dié wat voor toyi-toyi altyd so vet? ('Gịnị mere ndị toyi-toyi n'ihu ji na-abụ abụ mgbe niile?') Emere na 1999, na-emeghe na Aardklop Arts Festival
Ọ bụ Marthanus Basson duziri egwuregwu a
N'okwu Krog, egwuregwu ahụ bụ maka 'mbọ nke agbụrụ abụọ iji banye na mkparịta ụka'
Nsụgharị nke Krog's Afrikaans nke Mamma Medea nke Tom Lanoye bụ nke emere na South Africa na 2002, bụkwakwa n'okpuru ntụzịaka Basson
'n Ander tongval, nsụgharị Afrikaans nke akwụkwọ ya A Change of Tongue, bụ Saartjie Botha kwadoro maka ihe nkiri ahụ ma mee na 2008 n'okpuru nduzi nke Jaco Bouwer
Na 2006, onye na-ede uri Stephen Watson, bụ onye isi nke ngalaba Bekee na Mahadum Cape Town, boro Krog ebubo plagiarism

N'ịbụ onye na-ede na nyocha akwụkwọ akụkọ a na-akpọ New Contrast, o kwuru na mba nke nkà m jiri ahịrịokwu sitere na edemede Ted Hughes nke 1976, 'Ụgha na Mmụta' Watson kwukwara na echiche nke Die sterre sê 'tsau', nhọrọ 2004 nke uri ụmụ amaala haziri na nke Krog sụgharịrị, agbapụla ya na nchịkọta yiri nke ahụ o bipụtara na 1991
Krog gọnarị ebubo ahụ, na-ekwu na ya amabeghị ihe edemede Hughes ruo mgbe o bipụtachara Mba nke Okpokoro M, na o kwupụtakwara isi mmalite ya na Die sterre sê 'tsau'

Munirat Antoinette Lecky (amụrụ (1989-12-12 ) ), nke a ma ama dị ka Anto Lecky, bụ onye Naijiria-American ọchụnta ego, Onye mgbasa ozi, onye mmụta, Ọnye enyemaka
A maara ya nke ọma maka ịpụta dị ka onye ọgbọ mmeri tupu ndị mmeri ikpeazụ na Big Brother Naija (ọgbọ ato) nke ihe ngosi n'ezie na afo 2018
Lecky bụ nke atọ n'ime ụmụaka ise (ụmụ agbọghọ anọ 4 na otu nwoke 1), amụrụ ya na Newark, New Jersey nye nne na nna ndị Edo State
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ Elementrị nke Charles J
Waters dị na Jersey City, New Jersey site na ụlọ akwụkwọ ọta akara ruo ọkwa nke abụọ, mgbe a nabatara ya na mmemme maka ụmụaka ndị nwere onyinye na ihe puru iche na Whitney M
Young J

Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Master of Business Administration na Master of Sport Business Management site na mmemme nzere abụọ na DeVos Sports Business Management Program na Mahadum Central Florida

Tupu ịbanye na ihe nkiri Big Brother Naija, Anto bụ onye isi ọrụ maka Continental Basketball League, egwuregwu bọọlụ basketball nke mbụ nkeonwe na Africa ebe ọ na-ahụ maka njikwa kwa ụbọchị nke otu egwuregwu, ma ọrụ ụlọ na ọrụ egwuregwu
Kemgbe ọpụpụ na ihe nkiri Big Brother Naija, ọ bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri, onye nnabata ndi ọbịa/onye ngosi, ihe nlere, ọkà okwu ọha, onye ode akwụkwọ, na onye na-emetụta ika na onye nnọchi anya
N'August 2021, ọ malitere usoro mmụta site na NGO ya, The Live Wire Project, iji kwalite agụmakwụkwọ ụmụ nwanyị, na ibelata ọnụego nke ime ihe ike dabere na nwoke na nwanyị na ịzụ ahịa mmekọ
na steeti Edo

Anto bụ onye nwe ụlọ ọrụ atọ; mmekorita ya na Taries Hairbuilder nke a na-akpọ Anto Lecky na Taries Hair Builder luxury haircare line, Room 22 Agency, ụlọ ọrụ atụmatụ okike, na O' Compatriots Lifestyle, ihe ngosi na inye onyinye
Ọ bụkwa onye nduzi nke The Live Wire Project, uwe enyemaka ya
Ọ na-ejekwa ozi dịka onye isi ihe okike nke Mahadum Africa nke Benin na Cotonou, Benin Republic
N'afọ 2016, e nyere ya onyinye nturu ugo ndị Naijiria maka ọkaibe na egwuregwu
Na 2018, ọ natara BTDT Hub Education Advocacy Award na Miss Tertiary Institution Pageant South-South Onye Nrita nke kwesịrị nkwayere Ùgwù
Na 2018, e nyere ya nzere Doctorate na nchịkwa azụmahịa sitere na Mahadum ISCOM, Benin Republic
Antoinette Batumubwira (amụrụ n'afọ 1956, na Ngozi, Burundi) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ndị Burundi
Ọ bụ Minista na-ahụ maka ihe gbasara mba ofesi nke Burundi site n'afọ 2005 ruo afọ 2009
Ọ lụrụ onye bụbu minista mba ọzọ bụ Jean-Marie Ngendahayo
Na ngwụcha afọ 2007, a kpọrọ Batumubwira aha dị ka onye ga-anọchianya Alpha Oumar Konaré dị ka Onye isi oche nke Commission of the African Union na ntuli aka maka ọkwa ahụ na mbido afọ 2008

Gọọmentị gbalịrị inweta nkwado nke mba ndị ọzọ dị n'Afrịka maka nnọchite anya ya, mba ndị dị na Great Lakes nke Afrịka kwere nkwa na ha ga-akwado ya; Otú ọ dị, gọọmentị mechara wepụ nnọchite ya ma kwado Jean Ping nke Gabon
Antoinette Montaigne bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nwere ụmụ amaala France na Central Africa
Ọ bụ onye ọka iwu gbasiri ụkwụ ike na ihe gbasara ikike ụmụ aka
ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye kansụl obodo na mpụga Paris na France
N'afọ 2014, a kpọrọ Montaigne ka ọ gaa Central African Republic ka ọ bụrụ Minista nke nkwukọrịta, Civics,mkparitaúka nakwa onye mkpezi na mkpedo na gọọmentị etiti
Ọ nọgidere n'ebe ahụ mgbe ọ hapụrụ gọọmentị ma na-elekọta ugbu a Central African Peace Academy
Antoinette Montaigne bụ onye ọka iwu na-ahụ maka ikike ụmụaka na ụmụakan,alụ agha O nwere nzere doctorate na iwu mpụ ụmụaka na Mahadum Panthéon-Assas nke Paris ma na-arụ ọrụ iwu na France

Montaigne biri na Bussy-Saint-Georges, Seine-et-Marne, site na afọ 2001 ruo afọ 2014Site na Machị 2008 ruo 2014 ọ bụ onye kansụl obodo Union for a Popular Movement na-ejide ọfịs maka iwu na mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na imekọ ihe ọnụ
Onye isi obodo Bussy-Saint-Georges kọwara ya dị ka 'nwanyi na-alụ ọgụ ma nwee obi ike'
Montaigne bụ onye isi oche nke Council of Central Africans Abroad ma guzobe òtù abụọ iji kwado ụmụ amaala ụ gbọinyinya na mba ofesi, Zagaro Montaigne na DIPE Coaching and Consulting
N'ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 2013, ọ tụrụ aro ka kansụl ahụ mee mkpebi maka ịdị n'otu na ndị agha obodo nke Central African Republic (2012-2014)
Montaigne bụ ezigbo enyị onyeisiaka na central Afrịka republican afọ 2014 ruo afọ 2016(CAR) Catherine Samba-Panza
Na mbido afọ 2014, praịm minista na-anọchi anya, André Nzapayeké, kpọrọ ya ka ọ laghachi na CAR iji were nhọpụta dị ka Minista nke nkwukọrịta, obodo, mkparịta ụka, na nkwekọrịta mba na gọọmentị ya
Montaigne nabatara ma si Paris gaa Bangui, isi obodo CAR, na 28 Jenụwarị - ọ ka bụ onye kansụl obodo n'oge ahụ
N'abalị iri atọ n'ọnwa Machị afọ 2014, ọ bịanyere aka n'akwụkwọ mkpesa nye ndị niile nọ na Central Africa ka ha tinye ngwá agha ha ma banye na mkparịta ụka
Iji gosipụta mmụọ nke imekọ ihe ọnụ, Montaigne gara ekpere na ụlọ alakụba dị na mpaghara ndị Alakụba nke Bangui
Ọ gara Ivory Coast n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 2016 iji mụta banyere ihe nlereanya ha nke ime udo mgbe Agha Obodo nke Abụọ nke Ivory Coast gasịrị
Montaigne hapụrụ ọkwa minista ya na ngwụcha Ọktọba, mana ọ nọgidere dị ka onye ndụmọdụ onye isi ala
O kwuru maka ọrụ ụmụ nwanyị na enye ọha obodo na mgbakõ Kansụl Gabon na France na Gabonese Embassy, Paris na Mee 2016
Montaign bụzi onye isi nke CAR Peace Academy
Antoinette Pienaar (a mụrụ ya n'afọ 1961)
Ọ bụ onye omere, onye na-agụ egwú na onye edemede nke mba South Africa
Otu n'ime ụmụnne nwanyị ise, a mụrụ Antoinette Pienaar na Beaufort West, tolitere na Carnavon, o wee mụọ ihe nkiri na Mahadum Stellenbosch na Mahadum Cape Town

Ọ malitere ọrụ ime ihe nkiri na ihe nkiri Shakespeare ma mechaa tụgharịa n'ịbụ abụ, ide na ịkọ akụkọ, na-eme ikwa-emo ya dị nro na National Arts Festivals nke Grahamstown, Oudshoorn na ụlọ ihe nkiri South Africa ndị ọzọ
Dị ka onye na-akọ akụkọ, a maara ya nke ọma maka akụkọ ya nke ndị dike Africa mere eme dị ka Krotoa nke Cape
Kemgbe afọ 2001 ọ na-amụ n'aka Oom Johannes Willemse (onye Griqua Shaman) na ebe ezumike miri emi nke Karoo
A na-egosikwa ya na 'Van Nature', ihe ntinye oge niile na ihe nkiri nri ụtụtụ Afrikaans Dagbreek

Asụgharị site na Afrikaans 'Iwu ahịhịa' Nkebi ahịrịokwu ahụ na-egwuri egwu na ndị Afrịka ochie na-ekwu na mkpuru osisi bụ ọgwụgwọ okike maka ọrịa ọ bụla' Ebe ọ bụ na 2003, Pienaar na Oom (nwanne) Johannes Willemse (a Griqua Shaman na njedebe 1990s bụ ndị na-eme ihe ngosi n'ehihie Amore Bekkers (Tjailatyd) na National Afrikaans Radio Station (Radio Sonder Grense, (RSG))) ma na-aza ajụjụ ndị na-ege ntị kwa izu site n'ebe dị n'ime obi Great Karoo nke South Africa
Pienaar nwetara otuto dị ukwuu na mpaghara Afrikaans ekele maka mbọ Amore Bekker na RSG na mmemme a
Akwụkwọ Pienaars Kruidjie roer my / The Griqua's Apprentice na usoro ọgwụgwọ ndị mmadụ sitere na obodo Griqua na Afrikaner (Boer) ka ebipụtara site n'enyemaka nke RSG
N'okwu nke ya, mbipụta nke The Griqua's Apprentice bụ 'nzọụkwụ mbụ n'ichekwa ihe nketa ahịhịa Karoo maka South Africa na ụwa'
Mgbe ọ nwesịrị ọrịa ịba ụbụrụ na njem na Mali dị na West Africa na 2001, ike gwụrụ ya nke ukwuu, o wee kpebie ịnọ na Theefontein (ugbo nke nwa nwanne ya nke abụọ Jacques Pienaar)
Ọ na-ekwu na Karoo na ahịhịa ya gwọọ ya

Antoinette Uys (amụrụ na 2 Machị 1976) bụ onye egwuregwu badminton si South Africa
Ọ bụ onye nrite ọla edo abụọ na 2002 African Championship na 2003 All-Africa Games
Uys sọrọ mpi na badminton na 2004 Summer Olympics na ngwakọta abụọ ya na onye otu ya bụ Chris Dednam
Ha meriri Tsai Chia-Hsin na Cheng Wen-Hsing nke Chinese Taipei na agba nke 32

Anton Hammerl (ụbọchị irí na abụọ n'ọnwa Disemba n'afọ 1969 rụọ úbọchị isé n'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2011) bụ onye nta akụkọ na-ese foto nke ndị agha na-akwado Muammar Gaddafi gbagburu ma gbuo ya na mpụga Brega ógè ọ na-akọ akụkọ agha obodo Libya n'ubochí isé n'ọnwa Epral 2011
Ógè ọ nwụsịrị, ọchịchị Gaddafi mere ka ezinụlọ Hammerl kwere na ọ dị ndụ ma nwee nchebe, mana e jidere ya na Libya
Ezinụlọ ya nụrụ màkà ọnwụ ya na n'ubochí irí na itoolu n'ọnwa Mee ógè a tọhapụrụ otu ndị nta akụkọ na Hammerl mgbe e gburu ya
Hammerl bụ otu n'ime ndị nta akụkọ ise e gburu n'oge agha obodo
[ntinye zuru ezu dị mkpa] A chọtabeghị ozu ya
[ntị zuru ezu dị mma]
A mụrụ Anton Lazarus Hammerl na Johannesburg, South Africa n'ubochí irí na abụọ n'ọnwa Disemba n'afọ 1969 na Ludwig nakwa Freda Hammerl
Hammerl gara King Edward VII Primary na Roosevelt High School
Ógè ọmụmụ foto ya kwụsịrị na mmalite afọ 1990, ọ bịdọrọ ọrụ ya na foto journalism
Hammerl rụkwara ọrụ na Angola na ndị agha South African Defence Force
Ógè ọ rụchara ọrụ mba, ọ debanyere aha na Pretoria Technikon iji mụọ foto
N'afọ 2003, Hammerl lụrụ Penny Sukhraj
Ha nwere ụmụ abụọ
Hammerl bụkwa nna nwa nwanyị site na mmekọrịta gara aga
Hammerl bụ nwa amaala abụọ nke Austria nakwa South Africa
N'ime afọ 1992, Hammerl bịdọrọ ịrụ ọrụ dị ka freelance photojournalist n'ụlọ ọrụ The Star, ébé ono wéré hukwa onye ụlọ ọrụ ya ná ónyé nkụzi ya bu, Ken Oosterbroek
Onye South Africa, Oosterbroek bụ onye otu Bang-Bang Club
Mgbe arụ ọrụ na The Star, Hammerl bidoro nweere onwe ya n'ụlọ ọrụ Associated Press, ekpuchi South Africa ochichi onye kwuo uche na njedebe nke apartheid
N'afọ 1995, Hammerl, mgbe ọ na-aga n'ihu n'ọrụ ya na The Star, malitere ịrụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi na-ese foto maka akwụkwọ akụkọ South Africa nwere onwe ya Saturday Star na Sunday Independent
N'afọ 2001, ọ ghọrọ onye nchịkọta foto na onye isi na-ese foto na Saturday Star Site na 2006 ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ na 2011, Hammerl laghachiri ịbụ onye na-ese foto n'efu na London
Dị ka akụkọ mgbasa ozi si kwuo, n'ụtụtụ nke 5 Eprel 2011, ndị agha Libya wakporo ndị nta akụkọ atọ ndị ọzọ nọ n'akụkụ Hammerl ma gbaa ha égbè n'ebe ọzara dịpụrụ adịpụ na mpụga Brega

Ndị a gụnyere ndị America abụọ James Foley, onye nta akụkọ na-arụ ọrụ n'onwe ya na onye na-enye onyinye mgbe niile na Global Post, na Clare Morgana Gillis, onye ntaakụkọ na-arụkọ ọrụ n'efu (Atlantic Monthly, The Christian Science Monitor, USA Today), yana onye na-ese foto Spanish Manu Brabo
Mgbe ịgba égbè malitere, Foley na Gillis nụrụ ka Hammerl tie mkpu, 'Nkwado!' E gburu Hammerl ma ndị nta akụkọ atọ ndị ọzọ bụ ndị ndị ndị agha na-akwado Gaddafi kụrụ ihe ma were ha dịka ndị mkpọrọ ha
Foley kwuru, sị 'Ozugbo m hụrụ Anton ka ọ tọgbọ n'ebe ahụ nwụrụ anwụ, ọ dị ka ihe niile agbanweela
Ụwa dum agbanweela
Amaghị m na enwere m mmetụta ụfọdụ n'ime ihe ndị ahụ
' Gillis kwuru, sị, 'Anyị niile lere ya anya ka anyị na-eburu anyị, ahụkwara m ya ka ọ na-edina n'ime ọdọ ọbara
Mgbe ahụ, a kpọbara anyị n'ụgbọala ahụ ma tụba isi anyị
Anyị enweghị ike ịhụ ihe ọ bụla mere ya mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị
' Mgbe mwakpo ahụ e gburu Hammerl gasịrị, ndị ọchịchị Libya nyere ezinụlọ Hammerl ozi ụgha maka ihe dị ka ụbọchị 45 na Hammerl ka dị ndụ
Tupu Hammerl amalite njem ya, e gbuola ndị nta akụkọ abụọ mgbe ha na-akọ akụkọ agha obodo Libya
E gburu ma Ali Hassan al-Jaber ma Mohammed Nabbous na Benghazi n'ọnwa Machị
Ka ọ dị ugbu a, ihu, ọ bụ ezie na ọ na-agba mmiri, agafeela n'ebe ọdịda anyanwụ
O si London gaa Libya na 28 Machị iji kpuchie nnupụisi megide ọchịchị Colonel Muammar Gaddafi
Dị ka ezinụlọ ya si kwuo, Hammerl gwara ha okwu ikpeazụ n'ụbọchị anọ n'ọnwa Eprel ma gwa ha na ya na otu ndị nta akụkọ ga-akwọ ụgbọala gaa n'ime ime obodo dị anya site na isi ụlọ ọrụ ha na Benghazi
Na 8 Septemba, ndị enyi Hammerl, ezinụlọ na ndị ọrụ ibe ya laghachiri na St Bride's Church, Fleet Street, maka ozi ncheta ya na London
Ezinụlọ ahụ na-aga n'ihu na mgbalị ha ịchọta ozu Hammerl
N'ụbọchị mbụ Nọvemba, Sukhraj degaara ndị Libya akwụkwọ ozi 'Ndị Libya anyị hụrụ n'anya ka anyị na-akpọ gị ka ọ bụrụ obi anyị, anya anyị na ntị anyị na-achọ ebe ozu Anton dị
Ngalaba South Africa nke Mmekọrịta Mba Nile na Nkwado meghere ọrụ ya na Libya, na-elekwasị anya n'ịchọta Hammerl
Gọọmentị South Africa malitere iso Austria rụọ ọrụ, na-anwa iweghachite ozu ahụ maka olili ozu kwesịrị ekwesị, nke chọrọ mgbalị mmekọrịta mba na mba nke metụtara akụkụ abụọ nke esemokwu Libya

N'abalị isii Disemba n'afọ 2011, onye minista na-ahụ maka mmekọrịta mba ụwa na imekọ ihe ọnụ, boro ya ebubo na gọọmentị South Africa ekpugheghị ihe ndị o mere n'oge Hammerl na-apụ n'anya ma ọ bụ otu o si gosipụta ọnọdụ ya
[ntinye zuru ezu dị mkpa] Ngalaba na-ahụ Maka mmekọrịta mba ụwa kwuru na agha ahụ mere ka ọnọdụ ahụ sie ike
Penny Sukhraj guzobere otu na-enweghị uru, ka ha wee nwee ike ịgbasa okwu banyere ọpụpụ ya
Anyị na-enye nwunye ya Penny Sukhraj ọmịiko obi

' Mixael de Kock, osote onyeisi oche nke Johannesburg Press Club, kwusiri ike na a ga-echebe ndị nta akụkọ n'ebe agha na esemokwu, ma ọ bụrụ na ha anọgide na-edekọ usoro ọgụ ma kpughee mmebi iwu mba ụwa dịka ndị nta akụkọ kpuchiri agha obodo Libya mere
Anton Kannemeyer (amụrụ n'afọ 1967) bụ onye na-ese ihe ọchị na South Africa, onye na-eji aha Joe Dog eme ihe mgbe ụfọdụ
Kannemeyer akụziwo na Mahadum Pretoria, Technikon Witwatersrand, ọ bụkwa onye nkuzi dị elu na Mahadim Stellenbosch
A mụrụ Anton Kannemeyer na Cape Town
Ọ gụrụ ihe osise na eserese n'ụlọ akwụkwọ Stellenbosch, ma nweta nzere Master of Arts na ihe osise mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ
Ya na Conrad Botes, ha guzobere magazin Bitterkomix na 1992 ma bụrụ ndị a na-asọpụrụ maka nguzo ya na ọchị ọjọọ
A katọrọ ya maka iji 'ihe oyiyi mkparị, nke ịkpa ókè agbụrụ'
Kannemeyer n'onwe ya kwuru na ọ na-enweta 'ọtụtụ akwụkwọ ịkpọasị site n'aka ndị ọcha Afrikaners'
Ọrụ ya na-agbagha onyinyo siri ike nke ndị Afrikaners na-akwalite n'okpuru ịkpa ókè agbụrụ, ma gosipụta ndị Afrikaners nwere mmekọahụ na-adịghị mma ma na-emebi ndị Afrikaans ha
A na-ekwu maka Xenophobia, akụkụ nke 'Alphabet of Democracy' ya, na-egosi Ernesto Nhamwavane, onye Mozambik kwagara mba ọzọ nke a gbara ọkụ na Johannesburg n'afọ 2008
Ụfọdụ n'ime ọrụ Kannemeyer na-ekwu maka nsogbu nke mmekọrịta agbụrụ na ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya, site n'iji ụdị egwuregwu Hergéz, ya bụ, site na Tintin na Congo
Na 'Pappa in Afrika', Tintin ghọrọ onye ọcha Afrịka, nke e gosipụtara ma ọ bụ dị ka onye ọcha na-emegide onwe ya ma ọ bụ dịka onye ọcha na-ahụ maka ịkpa ókè agbụrụ n'Afrịka
N'ime ihe ọchị a, ndị ọcha dị elu, ndị gụrụ akwụkwọ na ndị mepere emepe, ndị isi ojii bụ ndị obi ọjọọ na ndị nzuzu
Na 'Peekaboo', nnukwu ọrụ acrylic, onye ọcha Afrịka na-awụli elu na egwu ka onye isi ojii na-ewepụ isi ya n'ime ọhịa na-eti mkpu 'peekaboo!' na-adịghị emerụ ahụ

A kọwaala ihe nkiri a na-akpọ 'The Liberals' dị ka mwakpo megide egwu ndị ọcha, nkwenye na izi ezi ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị otu ìgwè ndị isi ojii a na-amaghị aha ha (ndị yiri golliwogs) na-achọ idina nwanyị ọcha n'ike, onye na-akpọ ndị mwakpo ya 'ndị ikom nwere nsogbu n'akụkọ ihe mere eme'

Anton van Wouw (úbọchị iri abụọ na asaa n'ọnwa Disemba n'afọ 1862 rụọ úbọchị irí atọ n'ọnwa Julaị afọ 1945) bụ onye Dutch amụrụ na South Africa na-akpụ ihe a na-ewere dị ka nna nke ihe ọkpụkpụ South Africa
Van Wouw kpebiri ịkwaga obodo na-emepe emepe nke Pretoria ógè ọ dị afọ iri abụọ na asatọ ma chere afọ iri iji nweta ọrụ izizi ya
Nke a sitere n'aka onye na-ahụ n'ihe gbasara ego Sammy Marks iji mepụta nnukwu ihe oyiyi nke Paul Kruger, nke guzo na Church Square
N'oge ọ nọrọ n'ọzara, ọ zụlitere nnukwu mmasị n'ihe banyere mba Boer
Nke a metụtakwara mmepe nka ya nke ukwuu
Ọ chọpụtara na mgba na olileanya nke ndị a na nkwa a gosipụtara na ọrụ ya
Ụfọdụ n'ime ọrụ ya, ọ bụ ezie na ọ na-anọchite anya ya, na-ejide isi ihe siri ike na mmetụta uche nke ndị ọ na-achị
Otu n'ime ọrụ ya kachasị ama bụ ọnụ ọgụgụ nke nwanyị eji mee ihe na Women's Monument dị nso na Bloemfontein
Ya na onye na-atụpụta ụkpụrụ ụlọ Frans Soff rụkọrọ ọrụ na nke a

Ọ bụkwa ya na-ahụ maka ihe banyere ọnụ ọgụgụ na-enweghị ihe ịga nke ọma nke nwanyị tinyere na Voortrekker Monument dị nso na Pretoria, ihe oyiyi dị ike nke General Christiaan de Wet na ihe oyiyi nke Louis Botha na Durban
O gosikwara ụmụ amaala na n'etiti ntakịrị ihe ọkpụkpụ ndị a, enwere ike ịchọta ọtụtụ n'ime ọrụ ya kachasị mma
Ha adịchaghị mma karịa ọrụ ya buru ibu ma na-adọrọ mmasị n'ọdịdị ihu ha doro anya na ndụ
Nwanyị na Ụmụaka, emechara n'afọ 1938
Ihe oyiyi ọla nchara a na-asọpụrụ ọrụ ụmụ nwanyị Voortrekker rụrụ na Great Trek bụ ọrụ ikpeazụ nke van Wouw
Ihe ọkpụkpụ ahụ dị na ntọala Voortrekker Monument na Pretoria, dị mita 41 n'ogologo ma dị arọ 25 ton
Ọ bụ Renzo Vignali mere ihe nkiri ahụ na Pretoria
Ihe nlereanya n'ihe banyere oyiyi ahụ bụ Cato Roorda ma ọ bụ Isabel Snyman dị ka nwanyị, Betty Wolk dị ka nwa agbọghọ na Joseph Goldstein dị ka nwa nwoke
Ihe oyiyi nke Paul Kruger, 1899, na Church Square, Pretoria
Ihe oyiyi nke Jan Hendrik Hofmeyr, 1916, Church Square, Cape Town
Ihe oyiyi nke Martinus Theunis Steyn, 1928, maka Mahadum nke Free State, kwagara na Museum of the Boer Republics na 2020
Major General Sir Henry Timson Lukin, 1930, Cape Town
Nwanyị na Ụmụaka, 1939, Voortrekker Monument
Antonia Okonma (amụrụ na 24 Julaị 1982) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na Britain//(listen) (help·info) A maara ya nke ọ́ma maka ịrụ ọrụ Darlene Cake na usoro ITV Bad Girls site na 2004-2006
A mụrụ Okonma ma zụlite ya na London
A mụrụ ya n'ezinụlọ Igbo nke Naijirịa
N'afọ 2003, a họpụtara Okonma ka ọ bụrụ Darlene Cake na usoro ihe nkiri ụlọ mkpọrọ ITV Bad Girls, nke mbụ pụtara na usoro nke isii, nke a na-agbasa na 2004
Omume Darlene Cake sitere na Jamaica, nke chọrọ ka Okonma jiri ụda olu Jamaica kwuo okwu
Ọ pụtara na usoro nkẹ isii, nke asaa na nke asatọ, na-eme ka ọ pụta ikpeazụ na nke abụọ ikpeazụ na 2006, mgbe Darlene nwara igbu onwẹ ya site n'itinye onwe ya ọkụ
Ọ bụ ezie na, a na-ahụ ya ka ọ lanarịrị, a maghị ọdịnihu ya ma kọwaghị ya na ihe omume ikpeazụ

Mgbe ngwụcha nke usoro nke isii gasịrị, a na-agbasa ihe pụrụ iche n'azụ ihe nkiri, nke akpọrọ Bad Girls Most Wanted, na ITV2 ma họpụta ndị iri kachasị dịka ndị na-ekiri ya họpụtara; A họpụtara Darlene Cake na nke anọ
N'afọ 2004, Okonma ritere ihe nrite Gathering of Africa's Best (GAB) maka Best Newcomer na ihe nritẹ Screen Nation maka Best Emerging Talent maka ọrụ ya na Bad Girls
N'elu ikpo okwu, Okonma emeela ihe na Royal Court na Riverside Studios
Ọ pụtara na Torn na Arcola Theatre n'akụkụ Brooke Kinsella na Jocelyn Jee Esien
Ọ na-arụ ọrụ ugbu a ṅa mmepụta nke Iya Ile (The First Wife) na Soho Theatre
Okonma esonyewokwa na mmemme TV nke Strictly African Dancing
Ọ rụkwará ọrụ dị ka Tina Turner na Stars in Their Eyes
Na ngwụcha afọ 2007, ọ bụ onye asọmpi na usoro nke abụọ nke Cirque de Celebrité na Sky One
Okonma nwere akará ugó mmụta na Accounting na Finance site na Mahadum London South Bank
Ọ zụrụ na Royal Court's Young People's Theatre ruo afọ abụọ

Antonio 'Tony' Dixon bụ onye America na-ede egwu, onye na-agụ egwu na onye na-emepụta ihe ndekọ, nke a makwaara n'ihe banyere ọrụ ya na ndị na-emepụta ihe abụọ The Underdogs na Eric Dawkins n'okpuru mmepụta moniker The Pentagon
Dixon bidoro ọrụ ide egwu na mmepụta ya dị ka onye otu na mmepụta duo The Underdogs
Tinyere Harvey Mason Jr

na Damon Thomas na nchịkọta sara mbara, nke gụnyere Tank, Eric Dawkins na Steve Russell, o mepụtara ọtụtụ egwu, gụnyere Omarion's 'O' (2004), 'Naked' (2005), na Monica's 'Sideline Ho' (2007), na-eje ozi dị ka onye na-egwu egwu na onye nhazi na egwu

Na njédébé afọ 2000, Dixon na Dawkins guzobere ndị otu mmepụta The Pentagon Ọpụpụ site na ụda R&B nke ọrụ ya gara aga, ha abụọ na ụfọdụ ndị na-ese ihe na ụda, ọkachasị na ụdị pop na ozioma, gụnyere Kristinia DeBarge na Justin Bieber

N'ịgbaso mmekorita ha na abọm Babyface nke afọ 2005 Grown & Sexy tinyere The Underdogs, Babyface gwara Dixon ka ya na ya rụọ ọrụ na abọm 4 nke Beyonce nke afọ 2011 nke ha mepụtara otu 'Best Thing I Never Had'
N'afọ 2018, Dixon mepụtara na Toni Braxton nke itoolu
album studio Sex & Cigarettes (2018)
Egwu ya bụ 'Long as I Live', nke Dixon mepụtara, ghọrọ asatọ ya na Adult R&B Songs ma nweta nhọpụta abụọ maka Best R&B Performance na Best R&B Song na 61st Annual Grammy Awards
Miguel Antonio Matos (amụrụ na Septemba 1, 1983), nke a maara dịka Antonio Fresco, bụ ónyé American DJ, onye na-emepụta ihe ndekọ na ónyé redio
Ọ bụ ónyé Afro-Latino nke Dominican na Puerto Rican
Fresco bụ ónyé bụbu ónyé redio na DJ maka ụlọ ọrụ redio kachasị elu, 979 The Beat na Dallas, Texas
N'oge ọ na-arụ ọrụ na redio, Antonio agbaala ọtụtụ ndị ama ama dịka ndị na-eti egwu Nelly, Bo
ajụjụ ọnụB, na onye bụbu otu ụmụ nwanyị, OMG Girlz
Mgbè ọ bi na Dallas, na ikuku, o jiri aha M-Squared mee ihe

N'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2011, Fresco mepụtara ma kwado cypher a na-akpọ M-Squared Presents The Understanding DFW Cypher nke gosipụtara onwé ya na onye omenkà egwu isii, gụnyere B-Hamp, site na mpaghara Dallas Fort Worth
E gosipụtara vidiyo egwu nke ónyé na-ede akwụkwọ na mbipụta mpaghara Dallas, D Magazine N'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2014, Dallas Weekly họpụtara ya dịka Best DJ
Fresco sonyeere ónyé na-agụ egwu Jonn Hart na onye na-emepụta Clayton William iji wepụta egwu egwu a na-akpọ Blow It
Blow A tọhapụrụ ya ọzọ n'okpuru aha ónyé na-ese ihe Hella Louud (otu nke Hart na William mejupụtara) na-egosi Antonio Fresco
A mụrụ Miguel Antonio Matos na Septemba 1, 1983 na Silver Spring, Maryland
A zụlitere ya na Baltimore, Maryland, site n'aka nné ya, ónyé bụ onye Puerto Rican si New York
Antonio Janigro (21 Jenụwarị 1918 1 Mee 1989) bụ onye Ịtali na-akpọ violin na onye nduzi
A mụrụ ya na Milan, ọ malitere ịmụ piano mgbe ọ dị afọ isii na cello mgbe ọ dị asatọ
Na mbụ, ọ bụ Giovanni Berti kụziiri ya, Janigro debanyere aha na Verdi Conservatory nke Milan, ebe Gilberto Crepax kụziiri ya
Ka ọ na-erule afọ 1934, Janigro nọ na-amụ ihe n'okpuru Diran Alexanian na Pablo Casals na École Normale na Paris
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ na 1934 wee malite ịrụ ọrụ n'onwe ya na Dinu Lipatti, Paul Badura-Skoda na Alfredo Rossi
N'ụzọ dị mwute, ezumike oge na Yugoslavia hapụrụ Janigro n'ime mba ahụ n'oge Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ
Ọ ghọrọ prọfesọ nke cello na chamber music na Zagreb Conservatory, ebe mmetụta ya mepụtara egwu cello nke oge a na Yugoslavia
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka akụkụ nke Maček-Šulek-Janigro Trio
Na ngwụcha agha ahụ, Janigro gara South America na Far East dị ka onye na-egwu egwu
N'afọ 1949, ọ malitere ọrụ6 ya dị ka onye nduzi
N'afọ 1959, ọ bụ onye na-agụ egwu Fritz Reiner, ya na Milton Preves na John Weicher, na ndekọ a ma ama nke Chicago Symphony Orchestra nke Strauss's
Onye nkuzi nwere onyinye pụrụ iche, Janigro kụziiri ọtụtụ ndị na-eme violin gburugburu ụwa
Ọtụtụ n'ime ha gụrụ akwụkwọ na Staatliche Hochschule für Musik und Darstellende Kunst Stuttgart na Mozarteum Salzburg

N'etiti ụmụ akwụkwọ ya bụ Julius Berger, Mario Brunello, Thomas Demenga, Michael Flaksman , Michael Groß, Antonio Meneses, Andrej Petrac, Mario de Secondi, Giovanni Sollima, Gustavo Tavares, Enrico Dindo na Christoph Theinert

janigro was a highly regarded conductor who led a symphony orchestra for Radio Zagreb and guest conducted throughout Europethe chamber orchestra I Solisti di Zagreb na 1954 ma Janigro duziri ya ruo mgbe ọ hapụrụ òtù ahụ na 1968
Antonio Rüdiger (amụrụ na 3 Machị 1993) bụ onye Germany na-agba bọọlụ nke na-agba ọsọ dị ka onye na-agbachitere La Liga klọb Real Madrid na ndị otu mba Germany
Rüdiger malitere ọrụ ya na VfB Stuttgart, na-anọchite anya ndị ha na 3
Liga na ndị otu mbụ na Bundesliga
N'afọ 2015 ọ sonyeere Roma, na mbụ na mgbazinye ego na otu afọ ka e mesịrị maka ego € 9 nde
Chelsea bịanyere aka na ya na 2017 maka atụmatụ £ 27 nde, ebe ọ meriri iko FA na oge mbụ ya, UEFA Njikọ nke Europe sochiri ya na oge nke abụọ ya, na UEFA Njikọ Njikọ na 2021
N'afọ 2022, Rüdiger bịanyere aka na Real Madrid, ndị mmeri Europe
O mere nke mbụ ya na mba Germany na Mee 2014
A manyere ya ịhapụ UEFA Euro 2016 n'ihi mmerụ ahụ o merụrụ na mbido oge ahụ mana ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị otu meriri 2017 FIFA Confederations Cup
Ọ nọgidere n'ọnọdụ ya na ndị otu maka 2018 World Cup, ma mesịa sonye na UEFA Euro 2020
N'abalị iri abụọ na atọ n'ọnwa Julaị n'afọ 2011, Rüdiger mere nke mbụ ya maka VfB Stuttgart II na 3
Liga megide Arminia Bielefeld

N'ikpeazụ na 29 Jenụwarị 2012, Rüdiger mere nke mbụ ya na Bundesliga maka ndị otu mbụ nke VfB Stuttgart na egwuregwu ọkachamara n'ụlọ megide Borussia Mönchengladbach, Raphael Holzhauser nọchiri ya na nkeji nke 79 nke mmeri 3ń0
N'afọ sochirinụ na 19 Eprel 2013, Rüdiger gbatịkwuru nkwekọrịta ya na Stuttgart ruo June 2017
N'ụbọchị nke anọ n'ọnwa Mee, ọ natara kaadị uhie na nkeji nke iri asaa na anọ nke mmeri ha meriri Greuther Fürth n'ụlọ
N'ụbọchị mbụ n'ọnwa Juun, Rüdiger gbara bọọlụ na ngwụcha nke DFB Pokal n'egwuregwu e meriri Bayern Munich
Ọ gwụchara oge nke abụọ ya na otu mbụ ya na 24 ọdịdị, tinyere 4 ọdịdị na 2 ihe mgbaru ọsọ na otu idobere
N'abalị iri abụọ n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 2013, a chụpụrụ Rüdiger na kaadị uhie na nkeji nke iri asatọ na anọ nke egwuregwu 3 na Hamburger SV
Rüdiger mechiri oge 2013 na 14 na 35 pụtara na 2 goolu
Rüdiger mechiri oge na-esote na naanị iri abụọ na otu enyemaka n'ihi mmerụ ahụ dị iche iche
N'abalị iri na itoolu n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 2015, ụlọ ọrụ Serie A Roma bịanyere Rüdiger aka na mgbazinye ego site na Stuttgart maka € 4 nde
Klọb ahụ kwekọrịtara na ego mbufe € 9 nde na njedebe nke nkwekọrịta otu afọ
N'abalị iri na abụọ n'ọnwa Septemba, o mere nke mbụ ya na mmeri Frosinone
N'abalị itoolu n'ọnwa Jenụwarị n'afọ 2016, ọ gbara goolu mbụ ya maka Roma na nkeji nke anọ nke egwuregwu n'ụlọ ya na Milan
Ọ gwụchara mgbazinye oge ya na Roma na 37 pụtara na 2 goolu
Na 30 Mee, Roma bịanyere aka na Rüdiger maka € 9 nde + € 05m bonus na nkwekọrịta afọ anọ

N'abalị iri abụọ na atọ n'ọnwa Febụwarị n'afọ 2017, dịka onye nọchiri Kostas Manolas na nkeji nke iri anọ na isii nke mmeri Villarreal meriri n'ụlọ ya na agba nke iri atọ na abụọ nke UEFA Europa League, a chụpụrụ ya na kaadị odo abụọ na nkeji nke asatọ na otu
N'abalị iri atọ n'ọnwa Eprel, a chụpụrụ ya na kaadị uhie na nkeji nke iri itoolu na atọ na Derby della Capitale megide Lazio na mmeri n'ụlọ
Rüdiger mechiri oge nke abụọ ya na Roma na 35 pụtara na anọ nyere aka
Na 9 Julaị 2017, Rüdiger sonyeere Chelsea saịtị na Roma maka ego mbụ a kọrọ na ọ bụ £ 29 nde na nkwekọrịta afọ ise
E nyere ya uwe elu nke ọnụọgụ 2

O mere nke mbụ ya n'ụbọchị nke isii n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ dị ka onye nọchiri Marcos Alonso na nkeji nke iri asaa na itoolu na mmeri anọ na penalties na Arsenal na 2017 FA Ọta obodo O mere Njikọ Njikọ mbụ ya ụbọchị isii ka e mesịrị na mmeri 3 na 2 megide Burnley na Stamford Bridge
Ọ gbara goolu mbụ ya maka Chelsea na agba nke iri na isii nke iko EFL na mmeri 2 na Everton, na goolu mbụ ọ gbara na league bụ naanị otu n'ime mmeri ụlọ ya na Swansea City na 29 Nọvemba 2017
N'abalị iri abụọ n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 2018, Rüdiger gbara goolu mbụ ya n'oge ahụ, na-emeghe goolu ahụ n'egwuregwu 2 na 2 n'ụlọ megide Manchester United
N'abalị iri abụọ na abụọ n'ọnwa Disemba n'afọ 2019, Rüdiger mere mkpesa banyere mmetọ agbụrụ megide ya n'oge egwuregwu megide Tottenham Hotspur, nke nwetara mgbasa ozi zuru oke
Ọ kpaliri oku maka ọrụ gọọmentị na ịkpa ókè agbụrụ na bọọlụ
Otú ọ dị, ọ dịghị ihe akaebe nke mmetọ agbụrụ megide Rüdiger ka achọtara mgbe nyocha ndị uwe ojii na ndị uwe ojii mechara chụpụ ikpe ahụ
N'egwuregwu 100 ya na klọb, ọ gbara goolu abụọ nke Chelsea, Mason Ugwu nyere aka n'ịgba Leicester City na King Power Stadium na 1 Febụwarị 2020
N'abalị iri abụọ na itoolu n'ọnwa Mee n'afọ 2021, Rüdiger meriri UEFA asọmpi egwuregwu nke mbụ ya mgbe Chelsea meriri Manchester City na ngwụcha na Estádio do Dragão

N'abalị iri na abụọ n'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2022, ọ gbara goolu mbụ ya na asọmpi egwuregwu na mmeri 3 na 2 na Real Madrid na nkeji iri na ise nke oge 2021; Otú ọ dị, e wepụrụ Chelsea na asọmpi ahụ site na ịla 5 na ngụkọta
Na 20 Mee, Rüdiger mara ọkwa na ọ ga-ahapụ Chelsea mgbe afọ ise gasịrị
Na 2 June 2022, Real Madrid kwupụtara na Rüdiger bịanyere aka dị ka onye nnọchi anya n'efu maka klọb ahụ, na-ede nkwekọrịta afọ anọ malite na oge 2022223
Na 20 June 2022, a kpughere Rüdiger dị ka onye egwuregwu Real Madrid ọhụrụ
E nyere ya uwe elu nke nọmba 22
N'abalị iri n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ, o mere nke mbụ ya maka klọb ahụ, na-apụta n'elu bench na mmeri 2 na Eintracht Frankfurt na UEFA Super Cup
Goolu mbụ ya bịara na 11 Septemba 2022, na-agba goolu ikpeazụ na mmeri 4 na Mallorca

N'abalị iri na otu n'ọnwa Ọktoba, ọ gbara isi na nkeji nke iri itoolu na ise megide Shakhtar Donetsk na otu egwuregwu Champions League, nke mere ka ndị otu ya nwee ike ịdọrọ 1X1 wee ruo eru maka oge knockout
Ka ọ na-awụli elu maka isi, Rüdiger zutere onye na-edebe goolu Shakhtar Anatoliy Trubin ma nwee ọkpụkpụ n'ihu nke chọrọ eriri 20
Rüdiger ruru eru igwu egwu maka Germany na Sierra Leone, ala nna nne ya ma bụrụ onye otu ọtụtụ ndị otu egwuregwu bọọlụ ndị ntorobịa Germany ruo na ndị otu Germany U21
O mere nke mbụ ya maka ndị otu Germany na 13 Mee 2014 na 0 0 0 draw megide Poland

Ọ bụ ezie na e tinyere ya na mbụ na ndị otu mmadụ iri abụọ na atọ nke mba ya maka UEFA Euro 2016, e mechara chụpụ Rüdiger na asọmpi ahụ n'ihi mmerụ ahụ, mgbe ọ dọwara nkwonkwo cruciate n'ihu n'ikpere aka nri ya n'oge ọzụzụ na 7 June
Rüdiger so na ndị otu mba Germany nke meriri 2017 FIFA Confederations Cup na Russia
Ọ gbara egwuregwu anọ na asọmpi ahụ, gụnyere mmeri 1 na 0 meriri Chile na ngwụcha
N'abalị asatọ n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 2017, o butere goolu mba ụwa mbụ ya na mmeri 5 na-emeri Azerbaijan n'ụlọ na asọmpi iko mba ụwa
A gụnyere Rüdiger na ndị otu 23 ikpeazụ nke Germany maka 2018 FIFA World Cup na 4 June 2018
N'abalị iri abụọ na atọ n'ọnwa Juun, a kpọọrọ ya maka egwuregwu nke abụọ megide Sweden dịka onye na-agbachitere etiti mbụ bụ Mats Hummels merụrụ ahụ, egwuregwu ahụ kwụsịrị mmeri 2 maka Germany
Ụbọchị anọ ka e mesịrị, ọ gbaghị bọọlụ ikpeazụ nke otu ahụ ma South Korea kụrụ ya mgbe e meriri ya n'ụzọ 2
Na 19 Mee 2021, a họpụtara Rüdiger ka ọ bụrụ onye otu UEFA Euro 2020
Ọ gbara nkeji ọ bụla na asọmpi ahụ maka Germany ka England wepụrụ ha na agba nke iri na isii
Dị ka ọ na-abụkarị onye na-agbachitere etiti, Rüdiger bụ onye na-eme ihe dị iche iche, onye nwekwara ike igwu egwu dị ka onye na-azụ azụ n'akụkụ ọ bụla
N'afọ 2015, ESPN kọwara ya dị ka 'onye na-agbachitere ya ogologo, ngwa ngwa ma na-eme egwuregwu nke
na-enwe ahụ iru ala na bọọlụ n'ụkwụ ya', na-ekwukwa ya dị ka 'onye nwere atụmanya na-adọrọ mmasị' onye '
nwere ihe niile dị mkpa iji bụrụ onye na-agba ọsọ n'etiti
Profaịlụ Chelsea ya kọwakwara ya dị ka 'onye na-agba ọsọ siri ike' na 'ọnụnọ na-achịkwa ikuku'
Na mgbakwunye na àgwà anụ ahụ ya siri ike na ụdị egwu egwu, a makwaara ya maka àgwà idu ndú ya na ikike ịgafe
Rüdiger bụ onye Alakụba na-eme ihe
A mụrụ ya na Berlin na nna German, Matthias, na nne Sierra Leone, Lily
Ọ tolitere na agbata obi Berlin nke Neukölln ma bụrụ nwanne Sahr Senesie
Rüdiger ekwuola okwu ugboro ugboro banyere ịkpa ókè agbụrụ n'egwuregwu ahụ, ọkachasị mgbe ọ lụchara Tottenham Hotspur na 24 Febụwarị 2020

N'afọ 2021, o dere edemede maka The Players' Tribune, nke akpọrọ 'Nke a agaghị edozi ịkpa ókè agbụrụ na bọọlụ,' n'isiokwu ahụ, na-atụle ahụmahụ ya na ịkpa ókè ịkpa ókè nwoke n'oge ndụ ya na ọrụ ya, yana ụzọ ndị nwere ike isi lụso ya ọgụ
Ọ lụrụ di ma nwee nwa nwoke na nwa nwanyị

Antonio Summerton (27 Ọgost 1980 - 29 Desemba 2007), bụ onye South Afrika na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-eme telivishọn
A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ya na usoro ihe nkiri a ma ama Egoli Place of Gold na 7de Laan
A mụrụ ya na 27 Ọgọstụ 1980 na South Afrika
Na 29 Disemba 2007, mgbe ọ dị afọ 27, ọ kwụsịrị ịchịkwa mgbe ọ na-agba ọgba tum tum ya na Roodepoort wee kụọ ogwe ọkụ
Ọ nwụrụ n'ebe ahụ
Ọ nụchara ọrụ ya mgbe ọ sonyeere New Afrika Theatre Association
O mechara mụọ ihe nkiri na Mahadum Stellenbosch
Ọrụ mbụ ya a ma ama sitere na usoro Backstage site na 2000 ruo 2002
Mgbe ahụ na 2004, ọ rụrụ ọrụ 'Duncan' na usoro kykNET Villa Rosa
N'otu afọ ahụ, o mere ọrụ ọbịa dị ka 'Rick' na soapie 7de Laan
Ọ pụtakwara na ihe nkiri mba ụwa Human Cargo na Red Dust
Mgbe ahụ ọ sonyeere ihe nkiri Lullaby na Starship Troopers
Site n'afọ 2006 ruo n'afọ 2007, ọ bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri Binnelanders, ebe ọ na-arụ ọrụ 'Brendan George'
Asụsụ Anuak ma ọ bụ Asụsụ Anywa bụ asụsụ Luo nke sitere na alaka ọdịda anyanwụ Nilotic nke ezinụlọ asụsụ Nilotic
A na-asụ ya karịsịa n'akụkụ ọdịda anyanwụ nke Etiopia nakwa na mba South Sudan site n'aka ndị Anuak
Aha ndị ọzọ enwekwara ike ikpo asụsụ a gụnyere Anyuak, Anywa, Yambo, Jambo, Yembo, Bar, Asusu Burjin, Asụsụ Miroy, Moojanga, Asusu Nuro
Anuak, Päri, na Jur-Luwo mejupụtara ụyọkọ asụsụ
Nkọwa zuru oke nke asụsụ Anuak bụ Reh (1996) Anywa Language Description and Internal Reconstructions, nke gụnyekwara ederede ndị e mebiri emebi
Asusu Anuak bụkwa ihe a ma ama maka enweghị fricatives phonemic
Anuna De Wever Van Der Heyden (amụrụ na 16 June 2001) bụ onye Belgium na-agba mbọ maka ọdịmma ihu igwe ma bụrụ otu n'ime ndị isi na ụlọ akwụkwọ maka mgbanwe ihu igwe na Belgium
A mụrụ De Wever na Mortsel, Belgium
Ya na Kyra Gantois na Adélaïde Charlier, De Wever ghọrọ otu n'ime ndị isi na ụlọ akwụkwọ maka mgbanwe ihu igwe na Belgium
N'ihi ya, site na Febụwarị ruo Mee 2019 ha nwere kọlụm kwa izu na magazin HUMO

Mgbe ọgbaghara ụlọ akwụkwọ na Belgium gasịrị, a manyere onye isi ala Flemish maka gburugburu ebe obibi Joke Schauvliege ịgba arụkwaghịm mgbe o kwuru na ndị ọrụ nchekwa Belgium nwere ozi na-egosi na ọgbaghara ihu igwe bụ òtù ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Esemokwu onwe onye dugara na nkewa n'ime òtù ndị ntorobịa Belgian maka ihu igwe, na ọpụpụ nke onye guzobere Kyra Gantois n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ 2019
De Wever pụtara na mmemme egwu Pukkelpop nke 2019 na-anwa itinye ndị na-ege ntị ka ha mara nsogbu ihu igwe

Ọkpụkpọ a kpasuru ụfọdụ ndị na-aga ememme iwe bụ ndị na-enye ìgwè ha nsogbu, na-atụ ha karama mmiri, wee soro ha laghachi n'ogige ha, na-eyi egwu ọnwụ ma bibie ụlọikwuu ha, na'amanye ndị nche itinye aka
N'ihi na ndị mwakpo ahụ na-ebu ụdị ọkọlọtọ nke Flanders nke ndị otu aka nri nke Flemish Movement kwadoro, ndị na-ahazi ya machibidoro ọkọlọtọ dị otú ahụ na ihe omume ahụ, na-anapụ ịrị abụọ

N'ọnwa Ọktoba 2019, De Wever so n'ime ndị na-eto eto na-eme ihe gbasara ihu igwe iji banye na Regina Maris maka njem carbon dị ala gafere Atlantic na 2019 United Nations Climate Change Conference na Santiago, Chile
N'ọnwa Febụwarị 2020, mgbe ha si South America lọta, ha gara ọzụzụ na GreensãoEuropean Free Alliance na European Parliament, n'aghọghị onye otu ahụ
De Wever na-akọwa onwe ya dị ka nwoke na nwanyị na-abụghị nke abụọ ma jiri nnọchiaha ya/ha

A katọrọ ya maka ịkpọ Gert Verhulst 'nwoke ọcha ochie', nke kpaliri nzaghachi site n'aka odeakwụkwọ Belgian State, Asylum and Immigration Sammy Mahdi onye kwuru, sị 'Anyị nwere ike ịkwụsị ibelata echiche mmadụ na afọ, ụcha akpụkpọ ahụ, mmasị mmekọahụ na okike?'
