Arno Greeff (a mụrụ na 14 Machị 1995) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na South Africa
Na telivishọn, a maara ya maka ọrụ ya na Getroud zutere rugby Die Sepie (2016X), usoro Netflix Blood & Water (2020X), oge nke 2 nke Legacy (2021X), na Recipes for Love and Murder (2022)
Greeff si Johannesburg
Na mbụ n'egwuregwu, ọ chọpụtara ihe nkiri site n'ụlọ akwụkwọ mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na isii
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Helpmekaar Kollege n'afọ 2013
Greeff mere ihe nkiri mbụ ya na ihe nkiri Verraaiers nke afọ 2012
N'afọ mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, Greeff mere ihe nkiri telivishọn mbụ ya na ihe nkiri sinap opera Binnelanders dịka Krige Vos, onye ọ ga-eme ugboro ugboro maka oge abụọ

O gosipụtara na ihe nkiri surfing nke afọ 2015 Die Pro Greeff nwetara ọrụ mbụ ya dịka Thomas 'Tommie' Bekker n'afọ 2016 soapie revival nke usoro egwuregwu kykNET Getroud zutere rugby site na Deon Opperman
Ọ hapụrụ ncha ahụ n'afọ 2018
Greeff gosipụtara ụdị okenye nke Texan n'ihu Marguerite van Eeden dịka onye isi nke Vaselinetjie n'afọ 2017
Greeff pụtara n'akụkụ van Eeden ọzọ na ihe nkiri 2020 Vergeet my nie
O nwere ọrụ nkwado na miniseries Tydelik Terminaal nke afọ 2019
Ka ọ na-erule afọ 2020, Greeff na-apụta dịka Chris Ackerman na ihe omimi ụmụaka nke asụsụ Bekee nke Netflix Blood & Water
Arnold Abbey Mensah (amụrụ n'ụbọchị iri abụọ na anọ n'ọnwa Nọvemba n'afọ 2001) bụ onye Ghana na-agba bọọlụ nke na-agba dị ka onye na-agbachitere ndị otu Accra Great Olympics nke Ghana Premier League
A mụrụ ya na Mamprobi na mpaghara Greater Accra nke Ghana, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Ghana, legon, ebe ọ gụrụ Dental Laboratory Science ma gbaa bọọlụ n'otu egwuregwu bọọlụ ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ

Abbey-Mensah bụ nwa amaala Mamprobi, ógbè dịpụrụ adịpụ nke Accra na Greater Accra Region nke Ghana nke a maara maka ịmepụta ndị egwuregwu nwere nkà gụnyere onye bụbu onyeisi ndị otu mba Ghana Stephen Appiah, Peter Ofori-Quaye na onye bụbu onye mmeri ịkụ ọkpọ ụwa Azumah Nelson
Ọ gara Mahadum nke Ghana, ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na nzere Bachelor of Science na Dental Laboratory Science
Abbey-Mensah gbara bọọlụ na Mahadum Ghana (UG) mgbe ọ na-agụ akwụkwọ na mahadum maka nzere ya
Klọb Accra Great Olympics nke dị na Teshie nyochara ya ma chọpụta ya n'oge egwuregwu Ghana Universities Sports Association (GUSA) nke UG kwadoro na Jenụwarị 2020
N'oge egwuregwu ahụ, ọ pụtara na egwiuregwu atọ wee nye otu goolu nakwa otu enyemaka
Abbey-Mensah n'ọnwa Ọktoba 2020, tụpụ 2020 China Premier League, ọ bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta afọ atọ na Accra Great Olympics
A kpọrọ aha ya na ndepụta ndị otu klọb maka oge ahụ
O mere mpụta nke mbụ ya n'egwuregwu mbụ nke oge ahụ, na-egwu nkeji ịrị itoolu zuru ezu ebe ha nwere otu goolu megide Medeama SC ndị nwetakwara otu goolu
N'abalị iri abụọ n'ọnwa Nọvemba 2020, ụbọchị egwuregwu nke abụọ, ọ gbara nkeji iri itoolu zuru ezu iji nyere egwuregwu Olimpik aka imeri Legon Cities FC
Arnold J
Kemp bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe nke na-arụ ọrụ na eserese, mbipụta, ihe ọkpụkpụ, na uri
Kemp nwetara BA / BFA site na Mahadum Tufts na School of the Museum of Fine Arts Boston, na MFA site na Маhadum Stanford
Site na 1991 rụọ 2005, Kemp bìrì ma rụọ ọrụ na San Francisco, CA, ebe ọ gosipụtara ọrụ n'onwe ya ma bụrụ ónyé nlekọta na Yerba Buena Center for the Arts
N'oge na-adịbeghị anya, ọ bụ ónyé isi oche nke MFA na Visual Studies na Pacific Northwest College of Art PNCA na Portland, Oregon
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka ónyé ísí oche na-ese ihe na Printmaking & onye nkuzi na School of the Arts, Virginia Commonwealth University
Ugbu a ọ bụ Dean nke ọmụmụ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na School of the Art Institute of Chicago na Prọfesọ nke Painting and Drawing
N'afọ 2001, o gosipụtara ọrụ mbụ ya na New York na Studio Museum's Freestyle Exhibition
A tụlere ihe ngosi 'Freestyle' n'ihe gbasara ihe osise post-black, ógè ebe ndị na-ese ihe ojii chere ihu ma hapụ akara nke ịbụ ndị na-eme ihe nkírí 'black'
N'afọ 2022 Kemp gosipụtara ọrụ ọhụrụ na M
LeBlanc Gallery na Neubauer Collegium na Chicago, IL
Màkà ihe ngosi abụọ ahụ, ọrụ ahụ gàrà n'ihu na isiokwu nke masking na ojiji nke aluminum foil

Ọrụ ndị dị mkpa nke Kemp dị na nchịkọta nke Metropolitan Museum of Art, The Studio Museum na Harlem, The Berkeley Art Museum, The Portland Art Museum, Tacoma Art Museum, Fine Arts Collection na Mahadum California, Davis, [aha achọrọ] na Frances Lehman Loeb Art Center na Vassar College
N'afọ 2012, e nyèrè Kemp Fellowship site na John Simon Guggenheim Memorial Foundation
Kemp enwetala ònyínyé site na Joan Mitchell Foundation, Pollock-Krasner Foundation, Artadia, Art Matters, na Printed Matter, Inc
Arnold Vosloo (a mụrụ na 16 June 1962) bụ onye South Africa na onye America na-eme ihe nkiri
A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ dịka Imhotep na The Mummy na The Mumry Returns, Colonel Coetzee na Blood Diamond, Pik van Cleef na Hard Target, Dr
Peyton Westlake na Darkman II na Darkman III, Zartan na GI
Joe The Rise of Cobra na ihe na-eso ya, onye na-agba égbè Jacob Broadsky na usoro TV Bones na onye na-eyi ọha egwu Habib Marwan n'oge oge nke anọ nke 24
Onye Afrikaner nke ndị nna nna Dutch na German, a mụrụ Vosloo n'ezinụlọ na-eme ihe nkiri na Pretoria, nne na nna ya bụ ndị na-eme egwuregwu
Nna ya na-arụ ọrụ na-eme ihe nkiri na Alberton
O nwere otu nwanne nwanyị
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndrị na ọrụ agha (nke o si na ya nweta nkwụsị ahụike), ọ gara ọmụmụ ihe nkiri na Pretoria Technikon

Vosloo malitere ọrụ ime ihe nkiri ya na ihe nkiri South Africa ebe ọ meriri ọtụtụ Dalro Awards maka arụmọrụ ya na ihe egwuregwu ndị dịka Don Juan, Hamlet, na Môre is 'n Lang Dag (Tomorrow is a Long Day) ma ọ ghọrọ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na Pretoria's State Theatre
O mekwara ihe nkiri na Torch Song Trilogy ma merie ihe nrite ọzọ maka ihe ngosi TV, Meisie van Suid-Wes (Nwa agbọghọ si South West)

N'afọ 1984, ọ gara n'ihu na ihe nkiri ebe ọ gara n'ihu na-eme ihe nkiri Dalro Award na ihe nkiri dịka Boetie gaan Border toe (Boetie goes to the border, a comedy about the Border War) na-eme ya na onye na-eme egwuregwu South Africa Frank Opperman, na Circles in a Forest (dabere n'akwụkwọ Kringe in 'n Bos nke Dalene Matthee dere) n'afọ 1990
Vosloo sokwa mee ihe nkiri 'Boetie', Boetie op maneuvers (Boetie on maneuvers) n'afọ 1986
Ihe ọzọ bụ German atọ Morenga (1985), Saturday Night at the Palace (dabere na egwuregwu Paul Slabolepszy banyere ịkpa ókè agbụrụ na South Africa), Skeleton Coast (1987) na The Rutanga Tapes (1990)
Mgbe o rutere na US, Vosloo laghachiri n'ụlọ ihe nkiri ebe ọ pụtara na Born in the RSA
na Chicago's Northlight Theatre na NY's Circle in the Square Uptown's short-lived production of Salomé (1992) ya na Al Pacino

O mechara pụta na ihe nkiri abụọ na-enweghị ihe ịga nke ọma na ihe nkiri afọ 1990 Darkman, Darkman II The Return of Durant (1994) na Darkman III Die Darkman Die (1996), na-ejupụta akpụkpọ ụkwụ Liam Neeson dịka onye isi Darkman
A makwaara ya maka igosipụta ndị ajọ mmadụ dịka na ihe nkiri John Woo Hard Target (1993), nke Jean-Claude Van Damme gosipụtara
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ aha nke ihe nkiri afọ 1999 The Mummy (nke Brendan Fraser na-eme), yana ihe na-eso ya n'afọ 2001, The Mummy Returns
N'ime ihe nkiri abụọ ahụ, ọ na-eme Imhotep, nnukwu onye nchụàjà Ijipt oge ochie
Vosloo mekwara François Molay, onye isi ọjọọ ahụ, na ihe nkiri 2003 Agent Cody Banks
N'afọ 1988, Vosloo ghọrọ nwa amaala United States mgbe ọ lụsịrị onye otu ya nke Act of Piracy na Skeleton Coast Nancy Mulford; ha gbara alụkwaghịm afọ atọ ka e mesịrị
N'abalị iri na isii n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 1998, ọ lụrụ Silvia Ahí, onye isi ahịa nke Mexico na America
Vosloo na Ahí bụ ndị na-ekwuchitere International Fund for Animal Welfare, IFAW
N'ajụjụ ọnụ ya na Charlie Rose, Vosloo kwuru na ọ dịka onye America na-eme ihe nkiri Billy Zane
Dịka Vosloo si kwuo, mgbe ndị mmadụ bịara jụọ ya ma ọ bụrụ na ọ bụ 'nwoke nọ na Titanic', ọ zara 'n'ezie, n'ezie!' dịka ihe ọchị
Arnold Zweig (10 Nọvemba 1887 -26 Nọvember 1968) bụ onye edemede German, onye na-ahụ maka udo na onye na-akwado ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya
A maara ya nke ọma maka usoro isii ya na Agha Ụwa Mbụ
A mụrụ Zweig na Glogau, Prussian Silesia (Głogów ugbu a, Poland), nwa nwoke nke onye Juu na-agba ịnyịnya

(Ọ bụghị onye ikwu Stefan Zweig) Mgbe ọ gachara ụlọ akwụkwọ mmega ahụ na Kattowitz (Katowice), ọ mụrụ ihe ọmụmụ dị ukwuu na akụkọ ihe mere eme, nkà ihe ọmụma na akwụkwọ na ọtụtụ mahadum dị na mahadum dị iche iche
Nkà ihe ọmụma Friedrich Nietzsche nwere mmetụta karịsịa n'ebe ọ nọ
Akwụkwọ edemede mbụ ya, Novellen um Claudia (1913) na Ritualmord in Ungarn, mere ka ọ bụrụ onye a ma ama
Zweig wepụtara onwe ya maka ndị agha Germany na Agha Ụwa Mbụ ma hụ ọrụ dịka onye nkịtị na France, Hungary na Serbia
Ọ nọ na Western Front n'oge Judenzählung (ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị Juu) na-achịkwa ndị agha Germany

N'ịbụ onye ahụmahụ ahụ wụrụ akpata oyi n'ahụ, o degaara Martin Buber akwụkwọ ozi ya nke dị na 15 Febụwarị 1917, sị 'Judenzählung bụ ngosipụta nke mwute a na-anụtụbeghị maka mmehie Germany na ihe mgbu anyị
Ọ bụrụ na enweghị mmegide ndị Juu n'ime ndị agha, oku a na-apụghị ịnagide ga-abụ ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ dị mfe
' Ọ malitere ịtụgharị echiche ya banyere agha ahụ wee hụ agha ahụ dịka nke na-eme ka ndị Juu megide ndị Juu
O mechara kọwaa ahụmahụ ya na akụkọ mkpirikpi Judenzählung vor Verdun
Agha ahụ gbanwere Zweig site na onye Prussian hụrụ mba n'anya gaa na onye na-eme udo
Upwards of 11 million
Ndi Aro ma obu ndi Aros bu mpaghara ndi Igbo nke sitere na alaeze Arochukwu di na steeti Abia nke ugbu a, Naijiria
Enwekwara ike ịchọta Aros n'ihe dịka ógbè 250 ndị ọzọ kachasị na mpaghara ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Nigeria na n'akụkụ ya
Edebere ndi Aros taa dika ndi igbo ma obu ndi Cross River n’ihi ebe ha si, omenaala ha, na olu ha di iche iche
Chi ha bụ Chukwu Abiama bụ isi sekpụ ntị na mbido Aro Confederacy dịka ndi nwere ikikere na mpaghara Niger Delta na Ọwụwa Anyanwụ Naịjirịa n'ime narị afọ 18 na 19
Tupu ndị Igbo amalite ibata na mpaghara Aro na narị afọ nke iri na asaa, ndi Ibibio si na Benue na ebe plateau ma tọ-ntọala wee hiwe steeti dịka Obong Okon Ita na Ibom ọdịda anyanwụ nke Cross River
Mbugharị ndị Igbo nke Eze Agwu na Nnachi duuru wee banye na mpaghara Aro malitere n’etiti narị afọ nke iri na asaa
Ndị Igbo a na-akwaga mba ọzọ jikọtara ha na ndị nwe obodo Ibibio
Agha Aro-Ibibio na mbugharị nke Akpa si ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Cross River, guzobere mba ahụ n'oge ntụgharị nke narị afọ 17 na nke 18
Mmekọrịta ndị Igbo na nke Akpa, meriri ma chikọta ndị Ibibio mbụ ka ha lụchara agha ogologo afọ
Ka ọ dị ugbu a, mmanụ nkwụ na ahia ohu ewuru ewu na mba ọzọ
Ka ọ na-erule n’etiti narị afọ nke iri na asatọ, e nwere ọtụtụ mbugharị nke ndị ọchụnta ego Aro rutere n’etiti ala Igbo na mpaghara ndị debere ya

Mbugharị a, mmetụta chi ha bụ Chukwu Abiama site n'aka ndị ụkọchukwu, na ike ndị agha ha site na njikọ aka na ọtụtụ agbata obi Igbo na ọwụwa anyanwụ Cross River (ọkachasị Ohafia, Abam, Abiriba, Nkporo, Afikpo, Ekoi, wdg) mebere ngwa ngwa
Aro Confederacy dị ka ikike akụ na ụba mpaghara
Agbanyeghị, ọda mba nke ndị Europe, ọkachasị ndị Britain na- achị Britain na- atụ egwu ikike akụ na ụba Aro na njedebe nke narị afọ nke 19
Esemokwu mechara duga ọgbụgba ọbara, na agha Anglo-Aro mere site na 1901 ruo 1902
Ndi Aro Confederacy jisiri obi ike ma mesịa merie ha
Nke a nyeere ndị Briten aka weghaara ndị ọzọ nke ghọrọ East Nigeria
Ndị Arọ nwere ọdịnala bara ụba
Otu ihe bụ ọha mmadụ bụ Ekpe bụ obodo dị nsọ nke sitere na ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Cross River
Ndi otu okpukperechi na ndi ikpe na-ekpe kariri ndi Aro
Ojiji e ji ede edemede, Nsibidi gbadoro ụkwụ na ndị otu nzuzo dị ka Ekpe
Uli, usoro ederede ọzọ, mere nke ọma n'ụdị ahụ
Ihe ọzọkwa bụ ụlọ nsọ Chukwu Abiama, bụ nke ndị ụkọchukwu Aro malitere
Ha metere ndị agbata obi na ndị ha na ha jikọrọ aka tupu mwakpo Britain na mbibi nke ụlọ nsọ Chukwu Abiama na ụkọchukwu nke Aro
Omume masiri nke Ekeleke dị mkpa n’obodo Aro
Site na Aros na odida anyanwu Niger Delta, mechara gbasaa na mpaghara Oguta
A makwaara ha maka iyi akwa 'George' a ma ama
Egwuru egwu ndi agha Ikperikpe ama ama nke oma n’etiti ndi agha n’oge gboo ma ka na-aga n’ihu
Aro Ekwulobia
Arochukwu bụ ama ukwu no na Afrịka ala ana-kpo Naigeria
Mádu jùrù ya nke 24,445, ihë ndi ọchíchí Naigeria si na afọr 2012
Asụsụ Aroid ma ọ bụ Asụsụ Ari-Banna (nke bụbu South Omotic ma ọ bụ Somotic) nwekwara ike ịbụ nke ezinụlọ Afro-Asiatic ma na-asụ na Ethiopia
Nchịkọta nke South Omotic (nke a na-akpọkwa Aroid) bụkwa nke a na-arụrịta ụka nke ukwuu ma ọ nwere ike ịbụ ezinụlọ asụsụ dị iche
A na-ewe Karo mgbe ụfọdụ dị ka olumba nke Hamer, mana Glottolog weere ya dị ka asụsụ dị iche nke na-achịkọta ha abụọ n'ezinụlọ Hamer-Karo
Zaborski (1986) na Lamberti (1993) wekwara South Omotic dị ka alaka dị iche nke Cushitic, na-akpọ ya West Cushittic
Bender (2000, 2003) na-ekwu na South Omotic dị nnọọ iche na asụsụ ndị ọzọ nke Afroasiatic, ma na-atụ aro na ọ nwere ike ịnwe njikọ na Nilo-Saharan, dị ka Surmic na Nilotic
N'izo aka na okwu yiri Surmic na asụsụ Nilo-Sahara ndị ọzọ na-abụghị nke Nile, Yigezu (2013) na-ekwu na Aroid (aka
South Omotic) nwere 'Nilo-Saharan mmalite' ma bụrụkwa ndị ọzọ 'Omotic' asụsụ nwere mmetụta siri ike
Usoro ụdaume Proto-Aroid dịkwa ka nke asụsụ Surmic na Nilotic (Yigezu 2006, 2013)
Glottolog 40 amaghị na South Omotic bụ nke otu n'ime ezinụlọ ndị a na-ese okwu, na otu asụsụ Omotic (nke na-ejikọta asụsụ North na South Omoic) ka na-ese ụka
N'ihi nke a, a na-ewere ya ugbu a dị ka ezinụlọ dị iche
N'okpuru ebe a bụ nrụzigharị nke Proto-Aroid site na Yigezu (2013)
Aron Mehzion (Asmara, 1970) bụ onye Eritrean na-ese ihe na nwa amaala Germany
Ọ bi ma na-arụ ọrụ na Düsseldorf
Mehzion hapụrụ obodo ya mgbe ọ dị afọ ise, mgbe nna ya nwụsịrị
Ya na nne ya, onye na-emepụta ihe nlereanya, na ụmụnne ya atọ, gbagara Germany site na Sudan, Egypt na Italy
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Geschwister-Scholl-Gymnasium na Düsseldorf, ọ gụrụ awkward na Kunstakademie Düsseldorf site na AFỌ 1993 ruo na AFỌ 2000
Ọ bụ nwa akwụkwọ nke Michael Buthe, Jannis Kounellis na Gerhard Merz
Ebe ọ bụ na ọ pụghị ibi ndụ na nka naanị ya, n'afọ 2002 ọ meghere ụlọ mmanya mbụ ya, nke a na-akpọ 'Baron', na 'Barockschlösschen' na Ehrenhof na Düsseldorf (Haus Ehrenhof 3)
O meghere ụlọ mmanya ahụ site na ihe ngosi akpọrọ 'hellgruen' (akwụkwọ ndụ akwụkwọ ndụ), na-eme ka ọ bụrụ 'ebe obibi maka ndị na-ese ihe'

Mgbe a gbazitere ụlọ mmanya ahụ na otu EON maka kọntaktị, Ulrike Groos, onye nduzi nke Kunsthalle Düsseldorf n'oge ahụ, na Rita Kersting, onye nduze nke Kunstverein maka Rhineland na Westphalia n'oge a, nyere ya ụlọ ọzọ na Kunsthalle Lüsseldorf

Site na mmekorita nke ụmụ akwụkwọ nke Academy Stefano Brivio na Detlef Weinrich, na nke enyi onye na-ese ihe Andreas Gursky onye nyere oche ojii dị ka oche, na 2004 o guzobere Lounge Salon des Amateurs
Ogige ahụ emeela, site na 'Approximation Festival' nke ya na Volker Bertelmann malitere na AFỌ 2005, n'ime klọb abalị a ma ama maka ihe nkiri egwu eletrọniki na improvisation ọhụrụ
Dị ka onye na-ese ihe, Mehzion na-ekwu maka 'ajụjụ anụ ahụ na mgbakọ na mwepụ nke mirror symmetry, na-eburu n'uche echiche na oghere anọ'
O nwere mmasị karịsịa na akụkụ oge nke ihe, nke ọ na-achụso na mmetụta na mmetụta na ntinye tebụl
Arondizuogu (Aro-ndizuogu) bụ obodo nke ndị Igbo bi, ndị Aro na steeti Imo nke Naịjirịa
E kwenyere na obodo Arondizuogu sina Arochukwu nke dị na steeti Abia ugbu were kwaga ebe obibi habi ugbu a n'ofe gọọmentị ime obodo atọ dị na steet Imo
Ndị a gụnyere Okigwe, Ideato North na Onuimo Local Governments, ọ bụ ezie na e nwere ndị ọzọ sitere na agburu Aro na gọọmentị ime obodo ndị ọzọ na Imo State
Arondizuogu bụ otu obodo buru ibu nke nwere mpaghara kachasị ukwuu n'ala e nwetara n'obodo Umualaoma (nke bụbu Isiokpu)
Ụfọdụ kwenyere na e nwetara ala a site na agha na ogbugbu nke ndị si Umualaoma
Arondizuogu dị na Imo Steeti nke Naịjirịa
Otu onye isi ndị nwere ike nke obodo ahụ (Isokpu) nke aha ya bụ Ezerioha Udensi nke Obiokwara, Obinihu, Umualaoma(Isuokpu) kwụsịrị ọtụtụ n'ime agha ndị ahụ
Ezerioha mechara hazie nkwekọrịta udo ma ọ bụ onyinye ala site n'obodo nta na obodo dị iche iche dị nso na Arondizuogu mgbe ọ chọpụtara na ndị Arondizuugu enweghị ike ịlaghachi na Aro Chukwu
Obodo Arondizuogu gbasara n'ime mpaghara gọọmentị atọ Ideato North, Okigwe na Onuimo dị ka obodo nta dị iche iche dị ebe a nwetara ala site na ụzọ yiri nke ahụ
Mazi Izuogu Mgbokpo na ụmụnne ya (Iheme) ji ike guzobe Arondizuogu n'etiti narị afọ nke iri na anọ
Izuogu Mgbokpo bụ onye ahịa ohu nke si Arochukwu bịa Awka na-achọ ndị ohu
Enyi ya si Umualaoma na-ebukarị ya ebe ọ na-ehi ụra mgbe ọ na-achọ ndị ohu na ngwongwo ya (ndị ohu)
Ụfọdụ n'ime ndị ohu nke Izuogu nọgidere na-enwe aha ahụ ọbụna mgbe a tọhapụrụ ha n'agbụ
Izuogu Mgbokpo nwere ụmụ atọ na ụmụnne atọ
Ụmụ ya bụ Uche (Ndi Uche onye nne ya si Isiekenesii), Awa (Ndiawa) na Amazu (Ndiamazu)
Mgbe ụmụnne ahụ bụ Imoko (Ndi-imoko), Njoku (Ndi-Njoku) na Akame (Ndi-akaeme)
Ndị ọzọ bụ ndị Aborigine dị ka Ogbuonyeoma, Amankwu, Ekwuru Iheme, n'onwe ya, bụ Onye isi Ohu ya ma o si Isi-Akpu Nise, na Awka

Iheme na nna ya ukwu Izuogu jiri ngwá agha niile ha nwere, gụnyere ndị ohu, juju, égbè na ngwá ọrụ ndị ọzọ iji chekwaa ndị ohu ha resịrị ndị ahịa ohu Europe, ndị Arondizuogu na-akpọ onwe ha 'Izuogu na Iheme'
Na mbido narị afọ nke 19 centuri Mazi Okoli Idozuka bụ onye si Isi-Akpu Nise kwaga Arondizuogu
Dị ka nnukwu onye agha ohu, ọ gbasaa ókèala Arondizuogu
O mechara gbanwee aha ya ka ọ bụrụ Okoro Idozuka, nke yiri aha mbụ ya
Ọ bụ ọgaranya na-enweghị obi ebere na onye na-enweghị akọ na uche dị ka Izuogu Mgbokpo mana ọ bụkwa nnukwu onye ndú
Nwankwo Okoro bụ nwa mbụ nke Okoro Idozuka
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri abụọ na otu, ọ sonyeere nna ya n'ahịa ohu
* Site n'ịchịkọta ndị ohu na ndị agha a dọọrọ n'agha, o nwere ike iwulite nnukwu ezinụlọ
Mgbe ndị Britain bịara, ha mere ya onye isi iwu n'ihi na ha kwenyere na ọ nwere ike imeri onye ọ bụla ma nakọta ụtụ isi ha chọrọ nke ukwuu site na ha
Ruo taa, Arondizuogu bụ nnukwu ógbè Aro na ala nke ndị mbịarambịa na-ebi n'ala bara ọgaranya

Ụfọdụ ebe ndị na-adọrọ mmasị na Arondizuogu gụnyere Mazi Mbonu Ojike Cottage (Ụlọ nke 'Boycott eze' nke Naịjirịa nwụrụ anwụ), Mazi Mbono Ojike na Ndiakeme Uno; Uno Ogologo (ụlọ nchebe e wuru na 1887 maka izochi ụmụaka n'oge ahia ohu); The Stone Palace (ụlọ dị elu nke e ji nkume rụọ nke Chief Green Mbadiwe nwụrụ anwụ, onye mbụ nwere nde mmadụ n'Ebe n'Eshia maka nna ya, Umoma Nkuala Ochwoie (Nkwo ochie)

Mbadiwe Odum na Ndianiche Uno; Ngeze Pita (iyi a ma ama na Ndiakeme Uno); Ogbuti Ezumezu (ọnụ ụlọ ndị ọbịa pụrụ iche nke Ikeji music maestro Pericoma Okoye na Ndiogbuonyeoma Ofe Imo); LN Motel Plaza, Home Diamond Hotel (mmekọrịta ndị ọbịa na Ndiawa); National High School, Arondiogu (ụlọ akwụkwọ pioneer model school nke Mazi Nwosu Ekele Igwiloh na ndị obodo jikọrọ aka were ruo, were guzobe ya na 1951 na Ndiakeme Uno; Iheme Memorial Secondary School(second model school ndị obodo jikọrọ aka ọnụ were ruo ya, bịa guzobe ya na arọ 1951 na Ndianiche Uno; Palace of the People (legendary country home nke onye ọmebe iwu bụ Dr
Mbadiwe at Ndianiche Uno nke late Prime Minister Albano Tafawa Balewa guzoro na afo 1965); Upiti(Expansive rice fields di na Akeme Ohiauchu);
Obi Omenuko ebe obibi Igwegbe Odum (Omenuko), onye isi ejiji na akwụkwọ egwuregwu nke Pita Nwana (natural spring at Ndiawa)
Obi Ezerioha dina Obiokwara, Obinihu (Agbualla) Umualaoma ebe ha nwere nkwekọrịta
Obi Ezerioha na Obiokwara, Obinihu (Agbualla) Umualaoma ebe nkwekọrịta maka
Ndi izuogu bi n'ọtụtụ mpaghara gọọmentị ime obodo na Imo Steeti

Ọ bụ ezie na ha nwere ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ otu olumba na otu ndị Igbos na steeti Anambra, ma e wezụga Ndi Uche (ụmụ nwa mbụ nke Izuogu) nke ka na-ejigide asụsụ dịtụ iche ka ha bi n'ókè iji chebe ndị ọzọ nọ n'ezinụlọ ahụ
Asụsụ ha na-emetụta ndị agbata obi ha
Ọ dị ịrịba ama na Arondizuogu bụ naanị obodo bi n'ógbè gọọmentị ime obodo atọ ma e wezụga Mbaise
Gọọmentị ime obodo ha bi gụnyere Okigwe, Ideato North na Onuimo
Arondizuogu nwere obodo nta iri abụọ
E guzobere ya na 1948, nke bụ mgbakọ na-eme kwa afọ na njedebe nke afọ nke ndị sitere na Arondizuogu bi na Naịjirịa na Diaspora
Ọ bụ ụbọchị e wepụtara iji mee emume ihe ndị a rụzuru, nyochaa ihe ịma aka, ma mee ka ọkọlọtọ nke ịhụ mba n'anya na-efe efe na obodo

Maka ọdịbendị ndị na-ahụ n'anya nke Arondizuogu, ụbọchị ahụ bụ nlọghachi pụrụ iche kwa afọ nke ha na-eme ememe ya na nkwanye ùgwù dị ukwuu nke a pụrụ iji tụnyere naanị emume Ikeji ha na-ewu ewu nke a na-akpọ ememe kacha ukwuu nke ihe nkpuchi na masquerades n'Africa
Emume ọdịnala Ikeji nke Arondizuogu na Imo Steeti bụ emume a ma ama nke na-eweta ndị na-asụ asụsụ Igbo gburugburu ụwa ọnụ
Mmalite ya malitere n'ihe karịrị narị afọ ise ma a na-eto ya dị ka nnukwu emume ọdịbendị pan-Igbo nwere ihe nketa siri ike, nkwenye mba ụwa ma ọtụtụ puku mmadụ na-ahụ ya kwa afọ
O nwere ike ịbụ nnukwu emume ọdịnala na Igboland
N'oge a, afọ ọ bụla na-agafe agafe enweela mmụba n'ịdị ukwuu, ngosipụta, ịgba egwu, ọkaibe na ntinye aka niile nke ndị Arondizuogu na ndị enyi
A na-eji ngosipụta dị iche iche dị iche iche mara ememme ahụ dị ka Ogionu, Mgbadike, Nwaaburuja na Ozoebune; na-agagharị n'ụzọ dị ùgwù gafee ahịa ahịa iji nwee mmasị n'ihu ọha
Isi nke emume a, nke so n'ememe ọdịnala kachasị mma nke ndị Arondizuogu, bụ ime emume owuwe ihe ubi nke yam mbụ
Ọ na-arụ ọrụ iji jikọta ma kwalite mmekọrịta n'etiti ndị Aro na-agbasa n'ofe steeti niile na-asụ asụsụ Igbo na akụkụ nke steeti Cross River
Ọ na-arịọ ndị niile na-asụ asụsụ Igbo ma n'ụlọ ma na Diaspora
Ikeji bụ emume ụbọchị anọ nke nkwụghachi ụgwọ, ekele na oriri nke a na-eme kwa afọ na Machị ma ọ bụ Eprel
A na-agụnye ya na kalenda Igbo, ụbọchị anọ ndị a kwekọrọ na otu izu Igbo nke ụbọchị ahịa anọ (Eke, Oye / Orie, Afo na Nkwo)
Nke ọ bụla n'ime ụbọchị ndị a nwere ihe pụrụ iche ma na-anọchite anya otu n'ime ọtụtụ akụkụ nke Ikeji bụ emume a ma ama maka oriri dị egwu, masquerades na-adọrọ mmasị, ụda na-akụ, na arụmọrụ mara mma
Ngwá egwú ọdịnala a na-eji eso masquerades bụ ekwe (ụbọ akwara osisi) nke nha dị iche iche, ogene (gọngọ ígwè), mgbịrịgba, maracas na oja (ụbọbọ akwara)
Onye na-afụ ụfụ bụ ihe dị mkpa na ememme ikeji
Ọ na-eji nkà na-ekwurịta okwu na masquerades - na-akpa abụ ndị nwere obi ụtọ ma na-agwakọta ozi esoteric n'ime ụda na-egbu egbu nke ịgbà
Akụkụ ọzọ na-adọrọ mmasị nke ikeji bụ raconteur a maara dị ka ima mbem - akụkọ e chepụtara echepụta nke e ji ụda egwu mee nke ọ bụ naanị ndị malitere nwere ike ịghọta ma ọ bụ ghọta mgbe ụfọdụ

Mkpa onye na-afụ ụfụfụ n'oge ememme Ikeji dị oke mkpa, n'ihi na ọ na-agwa ihe zoro ezo site n'anya nkịtị gaa na masquerades, jikọtara ya na abụ, nzọụkwụ na mmegharị ahụ, na-agwakọta ozi esoteric n'ime ụda na-egbu egbu nke ịgbà na mmasị nke ìgwè mmadụ
N'oge emume Ikeji, n'ụbọchị ikpeazụ, a na-ejikarị ebule ejikọta ya na osisi n'ọma ahịa a ma ama na otu eriri

A na-atụ anya na onye nwere nchebe kachasị ike site na juju ọ bụla nke ụdị ọ bụla ga-agagharị na-agafe ebule n'etiti mgbalị siri ike na juju sitere n'aka ndị ọzọ iji kụtuo ya, merụọ ya ma ọ bụ gbuo ya
Naanị ndị nwere obi ike nwere ike isonye, ebe ndị na-enweghị obi ike ga-ezere ma ọ bụ nọrọ n'etiti ìgwè mmadụ dị ka ndị na-ekiri
Naanị ndị nwere obi ike nwere ike iguzo n'ihu ìgwè mmadụ ahụ, otu n'otu ma bịaruo osisi ahụ nso iji wepụ ebule ahụ
Otú ọ dị, onye ọ bụla na-asọ mpi ga-abụ ndị agha karịrị oke nke isiokwu a iji kọwaa, iji gbochie ya iru ebule ahụ
Ọ bụrụ na e merie ya, ọ ga-alaghachi azụ na mmalite ya

Ruo n'ikpeazụ, onye kachasị ike n'etiti masquerades na-ekere òkè na asọmpi maka ememme nke afọ ahụ, mgbe o meriri ihe niile, ga-eru ebule ahụ ma tọhapụ ya ma were ya, na aka dị egwu site n'aka ndị na-ekiri ya
Nke a ga-esochi nleta ndị ikwu ibe ya n'ụlọ ya na nri na mmanya maka ibuli ọnọdụ obodo ya elu
Kwa afọ a na-eji nke a eme ihe iji cheta onye nọ na Arondizuogu na obodo ndị gbara ya gburugburu nwere ike juju ma ọ bụ voodoo kachasị ike nke Pericoma Okoye meriri ọtụtụ n'ime asọmpi ndị a
Arondizuogu Patriotic Union (APU) bụ òtù nche anwụ nke obodo Arondizuog niile dị na Naịjirịa na Diaspora
E guzobere ya na 1932 na Aba, APU bụ otu n'ime ndị mbụ na ndị na-adịgide adịgide nke mmepe obodo nke otu agbụrụ Igbo guzobere na Naijiria
Ndị na-eto eto nke Arondizuogu bụ ndị tọrọ ntọala APU hapụrụ ụlọ ha na nke mbụ ya na 1920s na mmalite 1930s iji chọọ ndụ ka mma n'ime obodo ndị na-apụta na Naịjirịa
Ha chọtara onwe ha na mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya, akụ na ụba na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị dị iche na ndụ ha maara n'ụlọ
N'ịjụ ịbụ ndị a na-akpachi anya ma ọ bụ ndị a na'ebe ọzọ, ha nọgidere na-enwe mmetụta ịhụnanya miri emi maka obodo ha na ya tolitere

Ha gbakọtara na Aba n'October 8, 1932, iji chịkọta echiche banyere otu esi ebute ndị na-esote mmepe nke oge a nke ha gbara gburugburu n'obodo ahụ (dị ka okporo ụzọ sara mbara, ụlọ akwụkwọ, ụlọ ọgwụ, post ọfịs, mmiri a na-ebugharị ebugharị, ọkụ eletrik, ụlọ ikpe, wdg) na obodo ha
Okoronkwo Chikezie (2005) 'Nzọụkwụ ụkwụ nke enyí A dossier on Arodizuogu' Janefred mbipụta Owerri, Nigeria Okoronkyo Chikezie (2016)'Ndị Aro nke Arondizuogu' Centre Publishers Lagos, Nigeria
(The Political Attorney) onye bụbu odeakwụkwọ nke (UBA- South Africa Chapter) United Brothers of Arondizuogu - South Africa(Nwa nke Late Chief Boniface O
Nwafor), (AKA)Mazi Bob
Ǹkà bu ihe fútárá mgbe ha mà úmá dosèrè ihe na nke gi bànyà na úche màdu kọ métú ya óbị
Ímé ya di ihe iche iche màdu ne me, ne ké, na ihe ha na púfùta na óbị, di kà ábu, ndemende, onyo-na-ga, nsèrè, íhé ha kpụrụ ukpú, na òtite
Ha na jú ihe bụ ǹkà na ílúnílú nke ọmúmú-mmā (nke ndi bekee na kpọ aesthetics)
Art Sims (amụrụ n'afọ 1954) bụ onye Africa-America na-ese ihe osise na onye nduzi nka amụrụ na Detroit, Michigan n'afọ 1954
A maara Sims nke ọma maka ihe ngosi ya maka ihe nkiri ndị Africa America, gụnyere Do the Right Thing (1998) na The Color Purple (1985)
Ọ bụ onye isi na onye guzobere 11 24 Design Advertising na Los Angeles
N'oge niile ọ na-arụ ọrụ, Sims etinyela aka n'ịkwalite na ime ka nka na ọdịbendị ndị Africa America pụta ìhè
Sims gara ụlọakwụkwọ Cass Technical High School na Detroit wee nata agụmakwụkwọ iji gaa Mahadum Michigan State site na 1971 ruo 1975
Mgbe ọ ka nọ na kọleji, Sims were ọnọdụ dị ka onye nduzi nka na Columbia Records na Los Angeles, ebe o mepụtara usoro mkpuchi abọm
Ọ gara n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ na Los Angeles dị ka onye nduzi nka na EMI ruo afọ anọ
Sims wee malite ụlọ ọrụ ya 11 24 Design Advertising na 1981
N'etiti ihe osise mkpuchi abọm ọ mepụtara bụ
Sims esorowo ndị na-eme ihe nkiri dịka Steven Spielberg, Jon Kilik, George Lucas, John Singleton, na Spike Lee rụọ ọrụ
O mepụtara ihe ngosi maka The Color Purple (1985), Clockers (1995), Do the Right Thing (1989), Dreamgirls (2006), Girl 6 (1996), A Huey P

Newton Story (2001), Jungle Fever (1991), (2009), Love and Basketball (2000), Mo Better Blues (1990), The Secret Life of Bees (2004), Brooklyn Crookes (2009), The Secret Panthetes (2009), Brooklyn's Finest (2009) na Black Panther (2018)
Art Stewart bụ ónyé America na-emepụta ihe ndekọ, ónyé injinia ọdịyo, na ónyé na-ede egwu nke rụrụ ọrụ na ọtụtụ ndekọ Motown
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Blue album nke Diana Ross, na ndekọ nke Teena Marie, gụnyere Wild and Peaceful album ya, nke e wepụtara na 1979
Ya na Marvin Gaye, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na album Let's Get It On na egwu Gaye 'Got to Give It Up'
Ya na Rick James rụkwara ọrụ na abọm izizi ya na Motown Come Get It!, na abọmpi nke abụọ ya na Motowns, Bustin 'Out of L Seven
Stewart bụ ónyé injinia na-arụ ọrụ màkà Motown Records ma soro Marvin Gaye na Diana Ross rụọ ọrụ
Ọrụ ya dị ka ónyé na-emepụta ihe na-apụta na Motown Grammy Rhythm & Blues Performances Of The 1960s & 1970s dị iche iche artists compilation album
Ọ bụkwa ónyé na-ede egwu ma dee egwu maka otu Platypus, nke pụtara na album Cherry, nke e wepụtara na Casablanca Records na 1980
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na ngwakọta nke album Has Arrived màkà The Whole Darn Family, otu nke gosipụtara Tyrone Thomas
N'afọ 1977, a họpụtara ya dị ka nke 45 na ndepụta nke 100 ndị na-emepụta pop site na magazin Billboard na mbipụta Disemba 1977
Arthello Beck Jr
(Ubochí irí na asaá n'ọnwa Julaị, 1941 rụo ụbọchị ịse n'ọnwa Novemba, 2004) bụ onye America na-ese ihe
Ọ na-ese ihe nkírí nke ebe ọ gara, na-eji ihe dịgasị iche iche, gụnyere mmanụ, mmiri, na icheku ọkụ
A mụrụ Beck na Dallas, Texas, ma gaa Lincoln High School, ebe ọ natara naanị ọzụzụ nka ya
Mgbè nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ rụrụ ọrụ maka United States Postal Service, yana ọrụ ndị ọzọ dị iche iche tupu ọ ghọọ ónyé na-ese ihe

O nwèrè ike ịbụ na a maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ya site na 1960s na-emetụta Civil Rights Movement, ọ bụ ezie na Beck na-egosipụtakarị isiokwu ndị ọzọ, gụnyere ụmụaka, okpukpe, na mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya, ọkachasị na ndị Afrịka-Amerịka na mpaghara ndịda United States

Ónyé bi ogologo ógè na Oak Cliff, Beck bụ onye kwenyesiri ike na mmegharị ndị isi, ma guzobe Arthello Beck Gallery, nke ghọrọ ihe dị n'etiti ebe nka nke mpaghara Dallas na 1970s na 80s, ma bụrụkwa ihe enyemaka màkà ọrụ nke ọtụtụ ndị omenkà ojii
Beck bụ ónyé otu National Conference of Artists na Southwest Alliance of African American Artists, ọ bụkwa otu n'ime ndị guzobere Southwest Black Artists Guild
Ihe osise ya na ihe osise ya so n'ime ndị a họọrọ màkà itinye ya na ihe ngosi njem nke ónyé na-eme egwuregwu Grant Hill nke ndị na-ese ihe Africa-America

Hill, onye malitere ịnakọta ihe osise na-eṅomi nna ya, Calvin Hill, kpọtụrụ ihe osise Beck bụ Confrontation (1969) aha dị ka mmetụta, na-ekwu, 'M tolitere na ihe osise a, dịka nna m na-ejikọta ya n'ihi na ọ na-egosipụta ọgụ akụkọ ihe méré eme nke nwoke ojii, ya mere m'
N'afọ 2007, a haziri mkpọsa mpaghara iji gbanwee aha South Dallas Cultural Center iji sọpụrụ Beck
Ọ bụ ezie na ihe karịrị mmadụ narị asatọ na iri ise bi na ya bịanyere aka n'akwụkwọ mkpesa, Kansụl Ọbọdọ ahụ ji otu olu jụ aro ahụ, na-ahọrọ inye aha ya na gallery dị n'etiti

Mkpebi ahụ zutere esemokwu n'akụkụ abụọ ahụ, ebe ndị na-akwado ya chere na gallery dị n'ime ụlọ ahụ abụghị nsọpụrụ zuru oke, ebe ndị ọzọ kwuru na aha etiti ahụ ugbu a na-eweta nsọpụrụ na mpaghara ọbọdọ nke a na-akatọkarị nakwa na ọtụtụ n'ime ndị bịanyere aka na mkpesa ahụ bi na mpụga mpaghara South Dallas
Hemocoel, oghere dị n'ime arthropod, na-anabata akụkụ ahụ dị n'ime ya, site na nke haemolymph ya - ihe atụ nke ọbara - na-ekesa; o nwere usoro ọbara nke mepere emepe
Dị ka mpụta ha, akụkụ ahụ dị n'ime nke arthropods na-ewukarị akụkụ nke akụkụ ugboro ugboro
Sistemu ahụ ụjọ ha “dị ka steepụ”, yana eriri akwara ventral jikọtara ọnụ na-aga n'akụkụ niile ma na-etolite ganglia jikọtara ọnụ n'akụkụ nke ọ bụla
A na-etolite isi ha site na ngwakọta nke ọnụọgụ dị iche iche nke akụkụ, na ụbụrụ ha na-etolite site na ngwakọta nke ganglia nke akụkụ ndị a ma gbachie esophagus gburugburu
Usoro iku ume na excretory nke arthropods dịgasị iche, dabere na gburugburu ebe obibi ha dị ka subphylum nke ha nwere
Atụmatụ nke ọnụọgụ ụdị arthropod dịgasị n'etiti 1,170,000 na 5 ruo nde 10 yana ihe karịrị pasentị 80 nke ụdị anụmanụ dị ndụ ama ama
Ọnụ ọgụgụ nke ụdị na-anọgide siri ike ịchọpụta
Nke a bụ n'ihi echiche ngụkọta ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị a tụrụ anya na mpaghara ndị ọzọ iji gbalite site na ọnụọgụ n'ebe ndị akọwapụtara n'ụwa niile
Nnyocha e mere na 1992 mere atụmatụ na e nwere ụdị anụmanụ na osisi 500,000 na Costa Rica nanị, nke 365,000 n'ime ha bụ arthropods

Arthur William Blaxall (15 Mee 1891 5 Disemba 1970) bụ onye ụkọchukwu Anglican nke South Africa nke biri ma rụọ ọrụ na South Africa maka ihe ka ukwuu n'oge ndụ ya nke a maara karịsịa maka ozi ya n'etiti ndị ìsì na ndị ntị chiri
A mụrụ Arthur William Blaxall na Britain n'ụbọchị 15 Mee 1891
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Agha Ụwa Mbụ dị ka onye na-ahụ maka ahụike, rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye ozi ala ọzọ maka ndị ntị chiri na Birmingham wee gaa South Africa n'afọ 1923, ya na nwunye ya Florence
O guzobere ụlọ ọrụ Ezenzeleni maka ndị ìsì na Roodepoort n'afọ 1939
N'afọ 1954, o guzobere ụlọ akwụkwọ Arthur Blaxall maka ndị ìsì, mana a manyere ya ịgbanwe aha ya mgbe a chụgara ya n'ihi mmegide ya na gọọmentị National Party n'afọ 1964
Arthur Dial (amụrụ n'afọ 1930) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe na ónyé na-ese ọkpụkpụ bi ma na-arụ ọrụ na Bessemer, Alabama
Ọ bụ akụkụ nke ezinụlọ Dial nke ndị na-ese ihe, nke gụnyere nwanne ya nwoke nke okenye, Thornton Dial, na ụmụ nwanne ya, Thorntón Dial Jr, Richard Dial, Na Ronald Lockett
A mụrụ Arthur Dial na nwanne ya nwoke nke okenye Thornton 'Buck' Dial na Emelle, Alabama na Sumter County, Alabama
Ọ bụ nné nné ha zụlitere ha ruo mgbè Arthur gbara afọ asaá
Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, nwanne nnè ha, Lillian Bell, zụlitere ha na Bessemer, Alabama, ebe Dial ka bi taa
Dial ruru klas nke atọ tupu ọ hapụ ụlọ akwụkwọ iji sonye n'ọrụ
Ọrụ mbụ ya bụ n'ebe a na-awa osisi, ọtụtụ ọrụ na Water Works, Jefferson County, na ụlọ ọrụ Pullman Standard boxcar sochiri ya tupu ọ banye n'ọrụ na US Pipe
Dial nọgidere na US Pipe (nke a maara dị ka 'Pipe Shop') ruo afọ iri atọ na asaá rụo mgbè a manyere ya ịla ezumike nká mgbè ọ dị afọ iri isii na abụọ n'ihi nsogbụ akpa ume metụtara ọrụ
Ọ bụ ezie na Arthur Dial sere ihe mgbè ọ bụ nwatakịrị, ọ malitere itinye ego nke ukwuu n'ime ihe osise mgbè ọ toro
Ọ choro ụzọ isi wepụ ikuku na decompress Mgbè ọtụtụ ụbọchị na-arụ ọrụ na gburugburu ebe dị elu nke US
Pipe foundry wee chọta ebe mgbaba n'ịkọ ubi, ịkụ azụ, na ime nka
Ọ malitere iji ihe ndị a tụfuru site na foundry dị ka ọkpọkọ mkpofu
ígwè, na ihe ndị ọzọ iji mepụta ndị mmadụ, anụmanụ, na ihe oyiyi okpukpe
Ụlọ ọrụ ya bụ ụlọ nkwakọba ihe dị n'akụkụ ụlọ ya, nke ọ kpọrọ, 'ụlọ ya dị ányá site n'ụlọ'
'N'ime ụlọ mposi, echiche m na-aghọ ihe
Ụlọ nkwakọba ihe ahụ bụ ụlọ m dịpụrụ adịpụ n'ụlọ
Enwetara m spinners na tackle box m maka igbu azụ, ngwá ọrụ m niile màkà ịkọ ubi, nri ọkụkọ m niile, ọgwụ maka ọkụkọ, na bọọdụ m, ágbá na ihe ndị maka ime nka
Enwetara m ọtụtụ ihe n'ebe ahụ
Ebe m na-anọ bụ mpako na ọṅụ m
Dial mepụtara ihe osise na ihe osise ndị dị mkpirikpi n'otu oge n'ime akụkọ sara mbárá ọ chọrọ ịkọ

Ọ na-eji ógè ndị a, dị ka Iv na-eru màkà mkpụrụ osisi a machibidoro iwu ma ọ bụ 'George Wallace na-egbochi ọnụ ụzọ nke Mahadum Alabama na Montgomery,' iji mee ka oge akụkọ ihe mere eme ma ọ bụ akụkọ ọdịnala nke oke esemokwu pụta ìhè
Ihe Dial lekwasịrị ányá n'ihe nkiri nke esemokwu na akụkọ ihe mere eme nke ihe a kpọrọ mmadụ n'ezie ma ọ bụ nke e chepụtara echepụta sitere na nyocha ya nke ndụ ndịda na narị afọ nke 20
Ọ kọwara akụkọ ya dị ka 'ihe ndekọ nke ihe gafere'
E dekọrọ ọrụ Dial na ihe ngosi ndị a
Ọrụ Dial dị ugbu a na nchịkọta na-adịgide adịgide nke ebe ngosi ihe mgbè ochie ndị a

Arthur Elliott (afọ 1870, New York City rụọ úbọchị irí abụọ n'ọnwa Nọvemba n'afọ 1938, Cape Town), bụ onye na-ese foto South Africa onye dekọtara ihe owuwu na ndụ kwa ụbọchị nke Cape Elliott weghaara ihe osise 10,000 nke ihe owuwu Cape Dutch, na-eke ndekọ eserese na-enweghị atụ nke ụlọ mmalite narị afọ nke 20 na Cape
A mụrụ Elliott na New York City n'afọ 1870
Ọ ghọrọ nwa mgbei ógè ọ dị afọ iri na abụọ ma biri na England na India tupu ọ rute South Africa mgbe ọ dị iri atọ
Ọ nwalere aka ya n'ọrụ dị iche iche dị ka onye na-ese ihe nkiri na onye njikwa mmepụta na Luscombe Searelle Acting Company na Johannesburg
Elliott nwụrụ na Cape Town n'ọnwa Nọvemba ụbọchị iri atọ n'afọ 1948
Elliott mechiri na Cape Town dị ka onye gbara ọsọ ndụ agha n'afọ 1900 wee gaa foto, nke ghọrọ ihe na-atọ ụtọ na ndụ
A na-echeta ụlọ ya na Cape Town site na ihe ncheta na 134 Long Street
O nwere ọtụtụ ihe ngosi dị mkpa na Cape Town ; n'afọ 1910, 1913 (ya na katalọgụ nke Theal na FK
Kendall chịkọtara na Cape architecture), n'afọ 1926 (ya na mmeghe nke Sir George Cory, ọkọ akụkọ ihe mere eme), ọzọ n'afọ 1930, nke WR
Morrison haziri
Ihe ngosi ikpeazụ ya, n'afọ 1938, akpọrọ 'The Cape, Quant and Beautiful' ma gụnye ndepụta nke Victor de Kockin dezigharịrị
Ihe ndị a mere ka ọ bụrụ onye a ma ama ma mee ka o nwee ike ịkpata ihe ọ ga-eri site na ire akwụkwọ
Elliott yiri ka o kpebisiri ike idekọ ihe niile o nwere ike màkà ụlọ ọrụ ugbo ochie, ụlọ na okporo ámá ndị na-apụ n'anya ngwa ngwa na nrụgide na-arịwanye elu iji melite

N'oge ndụ ya, e bipụtara naanị akwụkwọ nke ọtụtụ n'ime ihe oyiyi ya maka iji ụlọ akwụkwọ mee ihe, mana n'afọ 1969 o dere nhọrọ nke ihe oyiyi ya kachasị mma, na-egosi ugbo na ụlọ akụkọ ihe mere eme, yana mmeghe na nkọwa nke Hans Fransen
Tupu ọnwụ ya, Elliott nyere gọọmentị ime obodo foto ya maka puku Euro ise; a jụrụ onyinye ahụ
Ógèọ nwụsịrị, Gọọmentị nwetara nchịkọta ya ma nye ya na Cape Archives
A gbakwunyere foto 1,000 ọzọ site na nchịkọta nke WR
Morrison mgbe e mesịrị
Nchịkọta Elliott, dị ka a na-akpọ ihe oyiyi ya, ndị edemede ejirila ya mee ihe nke ukwuu na-ede banyere akụkụ niile nke ụlọ Cape ochie
Arthur Eze bụ onye ọchụnta ego Naijiria bụ onye isi oche nke Atlas Oranto Petroleum, nnukwu ụlọ ọrụ kachasị ụlọ ọrụ ndị ọzọ bụ nke onwe na enyocha ma na emepụta mmanụ ọkụ na ala Naijiria
A mụrụ Arthur Eze na ndịda-ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Naijiria, na ubochi nke ịrị abuo na asaa Nọvemba, n'afọ Otu puku, narị iteghete na iri ano na asato
[citation needed] Nwanne ya nwoke nke okenye Igwe Robert Eze, bụ eze Ukpo, obodo dị na Dunukofia
N'afọ Otu puku, narị iteghete na iri asaa, Eze gụsịrị akwụkwọ na ulo akwụkwọ St
Augustin Sekondarị skulu nke di na Nkwere, Imo Steeti
Arthur Fata (a mụrụ n'afọ 1963) bụ onye Zimbabwe na-akpụ ihe
A mụrụ ya na Salisbury (nke bụ Harare ugbu a), Fata gụrụ maka ezigbo nka na Workshop School nke National Gallery of Zimbabwe
N'ebe a, ọ mụtara iji eserese, mbipụta, na akwa
N'ụzọ a na-adịghị ahụkebe maka onye na-ese ihe na Zimbabwe, o mechara nọrọ oge wee na-amụ ihe na England, Portugal, na Bulgaria
Ejirila ọrụ ya tụnyere nke Dominic Benhura, onye ya na ya nwere mmasị na ọrụ mgbasa ozi
Arthur R
Flowers, Jr
(amụrụ n'afọ 1950) bụ onye America na-ede akwụkwọ akụkọ, onye na-ede ihe ncheta, na onye na-eme ihe nkiri
A maara ọrụ ya maka ilekwasị anya na ahụmịhe ndị Africa na America, ọkachasị akụkọ ọdịnala, egwu blues, na mmụọ hoodoo
Nwa afọ Memphis, Tennessee, Flowers lụrụ agha na Agha Vietnam tupu ọ malite ọrụ edemede ya na New York City, ebe ọ bụ onye isi nchịkwa nke Harlem Writers Guild
Ọ bụ onye otu ngalaba nke Mahadum Syracuse kemgbe afọ 1996
Flowers bi na Syracuse, New York
Flowers bụ nwa Arthur R
Flowers, Sr, dọkịta na onye na-egwu bọọlụ nke mba, na Eloise Flowers، onye nọọsụ na onye nkuzi
A mụrụ ya na Memphis, Tennessee, ebe ọ mikpuru onwe ya n'ime òtù American Civil Rights site na nwata
N'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị, ọ zụlitere aha ọma maka ọgụgụ isi, nweta aha njirimara 'Mr
Brain', na maka oke egwu, nweta aha 'Bullet' n'ihi mgbọ o yi n'olu
N'afọ 1968, ọ gara okwu ikpeazụ nke Martin Luther King Jr
, wee duzie klas ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya na ngagharị iwe mgbe e gbusịrị Eze
Dị ka Flowers si kwuo, 'anyị boro ndị uwe ojii ebubo ma banye n'ụdị ọgba aghara niile'
Flowers sonyeere ndị agha US ma zigara ya Vietnam dị ka akụkụ nke mbọ agha America n'ebe ahụ
Na Vietnam, esemokwu ya na ndị isi mere ka ọ gaa n'ụlọ ikpe agha n'oge atọ dị iche iche
Ọ kọwara òkè ya n'agha dị ka enyemaka ịgbanwe echiche ya banyere akụkọ ihe mere eme
Mgbe o si Vietnam lọta, Flowers kwagara New York City
O debanyere aha na John Oliver Killens, onye bụ onye nwere mmetụta na Black Arts Movement
Flowers bịara were Killens dị ka onye nduzi ya
Ọ sonyeere Harlem Writers Guild, otu ndị edemede Africa-America nke Killens guzobere
Site na ndị otu ya, Flowers matara ndị edemede ndị ọzọ a ma ama n'oge ahụ, gụnyere Terry McMillan
Flowers mechara bụrụ onye isi nchịkwa nke Harlem Writers Guild
Mgbe e mesịrị, Flowers bụ onye guzobere, ya na Doris Jean Austin na ndị ọzọ, nke New Renaissance Writers Guild, otu na-enweghị uru nke dị na New York City
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi nchịkwa ya
N'afọ 1986, e bipụtara akwụkwọ akụkọ mbụ nke Flowers
A na-akpọ ya De Mojo Blues, ọ na-eso ndị agha Africa America atọ, mgbe a chụpụrụ ha n'ọrụ ha na Agha Vietnam, na-anwa ime mgbanwe na ndụ ndị nkịtị na United States
N'ikwu na a 'depụtara akwụkwọ akụkọ ahụ nke ọma mgbe ụfọdụ', Publishers Weekly kwupụtara na ọ bụ 'akwụkwọ akụkọ mbụ sitere n'ezi obi na nke nwere ọgụgụ isi nke onye edemede na-ekwe nkwa'
N'ide na Essence, Paula Giddings kpọrọ ya 'ile anya na-akpali akpali n'ime ụwa mmetụta uche' nke ndị edemede ya
N'oge mbipụta ahụ, Flowers lụsoro ọgwụ ọjọọ riri ahụ na enweghị ebe obibi ọgụ
O kwuru na izute akwụkwọ okpukpe na ngwụcha afọ 1980 nyeere ya aka ịgbanwe ndụ ya
N'afọ 1993, akwụkwọ akụkọ nke abụọ nke Flowers, Another Good Loving Blues, pụtara
Ọ na-akọwa mmekọrịta ịhụnanya dị n'etiti onye na-eme hoodoo na onye na-agụ egwú blues ka ha na-esi Arkansas gaa Tennessee n'oge a maara dị ka Great Migration
Publishers Weekly kwupụtara na ọ bụ 'mgbalị siri ike' nke a gwara na 'olu na-ada ụda'
N'ide akwụkwọ na The New York Times, Fran Handman kpọrọ ya 'akwụkwọ akụkọ mara mma, nke na-akpali akpali' nke nwere 'ihe mgbu nke nghọta na-egbu mgbu'
N'afọ 1996, Flowers sonyeere ngalaba nke Mahadum Syracuse, na-akụzi na Ngalaba nke English's Creative Writing Program
Kemgbe ọ sonyeere ngalaba ahụ, o mepụtara akwụkwọ ncheta, Mojo Rising (2001), ọrụ gbasara mmụọ hoodoo, The Hoodoo Book of Flowers (2019), na ọrụ atọ maka ndị na-eto eto na-agụ akwụkwọ
Na mgbakwunye, o bipụtara ihe ndị sitere na akwụkwọ akụkọ nke atọ na-aga n'ihu
Ihe odide Flowers bụ nke a na-ahụ site na lyricism na-adabere na blues na njikọta nke olumba na African-American Vernacular English
Ọrụ ya na-emeghe site na ịkpọku onwe onye, na-eme ka mmasị ya na omenala ịkọ akụkọ ọnụ na mmụọ hoodoo pụta ìhè
Arịrịọ ndị a, site n'ịmata Flowers n'onwe ya dị ka onye na-akọ akụkọ ya, na-egosikwa mmasị ya na usoro akụkọ ifo
Flowers akpọwo ụzọ o si eme ihe n'ọrụ ya 'akwụkwọ hoodoo'
Dị ka onye na-eme ihe nkiri, Flowers emeela ihe ọ kpọrọ 'omume dabeere na blues nke gbanwere n'ime arụmọrụ griotic' nke dabere na usoro ịkọ akụkọ ọdịnala nke Africa
Ndị ọkà mmụta lekwasịrị anya na akwụkwọ akụkọ Flowers na nchegbu ha gbasara asụsụ, ọdịnala ọdịbendị, na ọrụ mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya

Onye ọkà mmụta Keith Gilyard ekwuola na Flowers, na De Mojo Blues, na-egosi na 'uru nke nkà asụsụ' dị mkpa maka mmepe nke ọdịbendị ndị Africa America, na-agbasa isiokwu nke na-agafe ọtụtụ akụkọ ifo ndị Africa America

A na-eji nkà asụsụ eme ihe iji chekwaa ma kwalite obodo ndị Africa America nke nwere nchegbu dị mkpa nke Flowers na ọganihu dabere na nchekwa nke akụkọ ihe mere eme na ọdịnala, dịka ọkà mmụta Patricia Schroeder kwuru

Schroeder na-ezo aka na Another Good Loving Blues dị ka ihe atụ nke mmasị Flowers na njikọ na akụkọ ihe mere eme na obodo, ma site na echiche ya banyere ihe odide ya ma site na nhazi akwụkwọ akụkọ ahụ, nke ọ na-eji tụnyere abụ oku na nzaghachi ọdịnala
N'otu aka ahụ, onye ọkà mmụta Kameelah Martin enyochaala ebumnuche Flowers, na Another Good Loving Blues, iji jikọta ma mee ka ọdịnala ọdịnala ọdịbendị Africa America dị mkpa hoodoo na blues

Nchegbu Flowers nwere maka ọdịnala na obodo na-emesi nchegbu ya siri ike maka ọrụ ọha na eze ike, nchegbu nke ebumnuche ya, dị ka Gilyard si kwuo, 'mepụta akụkọ ifo nke oge a site na ọdịbendị ndị Africa America' na ịgbanwe akụkọ, ọdịnala, na ebe dị mkpa maka obodo ndị Africa America n'ime ihe Deborah Smith Pollard kpọrọ 'Okporo ala ndị Africa na America'
Site n'itinye omenala na ebe ndị a na mkpa ime mmụọ, ọrụ Flowers na-emesi mkpa ọ dị ichekwa na ịzụlite ha site na itinye aka na mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Flowers kwuru na mmetụta nke John Oliver Killens na ọrụ ya
O kwukwara banyere mmetụta na ọrụ ya nke ọdịnala akụkọ akụkọ ọdịnala nke Afrịka
Ndị ọkà mmụta na ndị nkatọ ekwuola na mmetụta Zora Neale Hurston na Ishmael Reed, n'etiti ndị ọzọ, nwere n'ọrụ ya
Flowers enwetala nsọpụrụ ndị a maka ọrụ ya
E meela ka ọrụ Flowers bụrụ akụkọ ihe mere eme na Breaking Ice Anthology of Contemporary African-American Fiction na Gumbo Anthology nke African American Writing, n'etiti akụkọ ihe mere anya ndị ọzọ
Ọ bụ prọfesọ nleta ma ọ bụ ọkà okwu n'ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ
Tụkwasị na nke a, ọ bụ onye ọkà okwu a kpọrọ òkù na mmemme edemede, gụnyere Jaipur Literature Festival na India, Indian Summer Festival na Canada, na Memphis Literary Arts Festival
Flowers bụ onye ndụmọdụ maka ihe nkiri Spike Lee nke 2020 banyere ndị agha Vietnam, Da 5 Bloods
E were ya n'ọrụ mgbe Lee zutere akwụkwọ akụkọ mbụ nke Flowers, De Mojo Blues
Arthur G
Gish (August 15, 1939 , July 28, 2010) bụ onye America na-eme udo, onye nkwusa, onye edemede na ọkà okwu ihu ọha
A maara ya nke ọma maka mmegide ya na ọtụtụ esemokwu, site na Agha Vietnam ruo Agha Iraq
A mụrụ Art Gish na afọ 1939 ma zụlite ya na Lancaster County, Pennsylvania
Ọ hapụrụ ugbo ezinụlọ ya mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na ụma ma kwupụta onwe ya dị ka onye jụrụ n'ihi akọ na uche
Gish sonyeere Brethren Volunteer Service, nke bụ akụkụ nke Church of the Brethren, ma rụọ ọrụ na Europe site na 1958 ruo 1960
N'ime afọ 1960, Gish mere mkpesa maka Agha Vietnam ma kwado Civil Rights Movement
Mgbe e bipụtara akwụkwọ ya The New Left and Christian Radicalism na afọ 1970, onye nchịkọta akụkọ nke Athens Messenger gbara Gish ajụjụ ọnụ

N'ajụjụ ọnụ a, ọ kọwara mmekọrịta ya na ọdịbendị Protestant mbụ nke ofufe na enweghị nkwenye 'Na-arụ ọrụ na ngagharị iwe,' Gish kwuru, 'Atara m ịhụ na ndị Brethren na ndị Anabaptist mbụ abụghị ndị na-agbaso omenala
Ha bụ ndị na-eme ihe ike n'oge ha
Ndị Brethren mbụ ghọtara na Onye Kraịst dị iche na ụwa, na Onye Kraịst na-eguzo megide ụwa ma na-alụso ụwa ọgụ
Ịnọ n'udo na Chineke pụtara na mmadụ na ụwa na-alụ ọgụ
Ọtụtụ n'ime ọrụ Gish kemgbe afọ 1995 lekwasịrị anya na Middle East, a na-ejikwa ya site na mme mme Church of the Brethren's Christian Peacemaker Team
Onye na-enweghị isi na nke pụrụ iche, Gish nọrọ ọtụtụ oge ya na mba ofesi na-arụ ọrụ na Hebron ma ọ bụ At-tuwani na West Bank
Foto 2003 nke Associated Press gosipụtara Gish ka ọ na-eguzo n'ihu tankị Israel na Hebron
Gish na nwunye ya, onye na-eme ngagharị iwe Peggy Gish, megidere Agha Iraq nke afọ 2003
Art na Peggy Gish bụ ihe ngosi nke omume udo na Athens, Ohio, nke hụrụ ha na ọtụtụ ndị otu obodo na-arụkọ ọrụ ọnụ, gụnyere ndị otu ngalaba nke Mahadum Ohio
Art Gish megidere ntaramahụhụ ọnwụ ma gaa nche na Ụlọikpe Athens mgbe ọ bụla a na-egbu ndị ọchịchị
Gish na nwunye ya biri n'ugbo na Amesville, Ohio, nso Athens, ebe ha na-eto ma na-ere ihe ndị sitere na anụmanụ na ngwaahịa ndị ọzọ metụtara ya
E gburu Arthur Gish n'ugbo ya na Athens County, Ohio, na July 28, 2010, mgbe traktọ ya tụgharịrị ma gbaa ọkụ
Gish dị afọ iri asaa ma nwunye ya, Peggy Gish, onye nọ na Iraq n'oge ihe mberede ahụ, hapụrụ ya
Art na Peggy Gish bụ isiokwu nke obere ihe ngosi 2010 Old Radicals, nke gosipụtara na Hot Docs Canadian International Documentary Festival dị ka akụkụ nke International Documentary Challenge
N'afọ 2012, a gbatịkwuru ihe nkiri ahụ iji tinye akụkọ ọnwụ Art na akụkọ nke ndị ọzọ meworo agadi atọ
A na-akpọkwa ihe ngosi nke nkeji iri anọ na ise Old Radicals
Arthur Goldreich (25 Disemba 1929 - 24 Mee 2011) bụ onye South Africa na Israel na-ese ihe na onye a ma ama gbasara mmegide ịkpa ókè agbụrụ na mba a mụrụ ya na nkatọ nke ụdị Zionism na-eme na Israel
A mụrụ Goldreich na Pietersburg, South Africa, ma biri na Palestine, ebe o sonyere n'agha Arab-Israel 1948 dị ka onye otu Palmach, ngalaba ndị agha nke Haganah
Ka oge na-aga, ọ ghọrọ onye isi a ma ama na Bezalel Academy na Jerusalem
N'afọ 1966, ọ ghọrọ onye isi nke Ngalaba Na-ahụ Maka Ụlọ Ọrụ na Mpaghara, nke o nyere aka gbanwee ka ọ bụrụ ụlọ ọrụ a ma ama na mba ụwa maka mmepụta ihe
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri atọ na atọ, Goldreich alaghachila South Africa ebe ọ ghọrọ otu n'ime ndị na-ese ihe na-aga nke ọma na mba ahụ

N'afọ 1955, ọ nwetara ihe nrite South Africa's Best Young Painter Award maka eserese ya na oji na ọcha, mana nye gọọmentị Praịm Minista Hendrik Verwoerd, ọ bụ onye a na-enyo enyo na ọrụ nzuzo nke ndị na-emegide ịkpa ókè agbụrụ

Goldreich na Harold Wolpe, onye ọka iwu, jiri ego nke South African Communist Party zụta Liliesleaf Farm na Rivonia maka iji ya dị ka ebe nzukọ nzuzo site maka ndị isi nke African National Congress (ANC) a machibidoro iwu na ngalaba ya, Umkhonto we Sizwe
Goldreich na Wolpe nyekwara aka ịchọta ebe mmebi maka Umkhonto we Sizwe, aka agha nke ANC, ma dee usoro ịdọ aka ná ntị maka ndị agha nnupụisi
N'afọ 1963, ndị uwe ojii wakporo Liliesleaf Farm, nke dugara n'ijide ọtụtụ ndị isi ANC, nke gụnyere Goldreich
E jidere Wolpe n'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe mwakpo ahụ gasịrị ebe Goldreich jidere ya n'ụlọ mkpọrọ Marshall Square n'obodo ahụ
Ha abụọ zutere Moosa Moolla na Abdulhay Jassat, ndị otu Natal Indian Congress, jikọtara ya na African National Congress
E jidere Moola na Jassat n'ụlọ mkpọrọ naanị ha, ebe a tara ha ahụhụ (e kwenyere na ha bụ ndị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị mbụ a tara ahụhụ n'ụlọ ikpe South Africa)

N'ikpeazụ, ndị ikom anọ ahụ, ndi na-arụkọ ọrụ ọnụ site n'enyemaka nke onye na-elekọta ụlọ mkpọrọ, gbapụrụ n'ụzọ gara nke ọma n'aka ndị mkpọrọ, kewara n'èzí ụlọ mkpọrọ (na Goldreich na-eme ka ọ bụrụ onye ụkọchukwu)
Wolpe na Goldreich nọrọ ọtụtụ ụbọchị na-ezo n'ime na gburugburu Johannesburg iji zere ijide ha

N'ikpeazụ, a chụgara ha Swaziland, ma si ebe ahụ buru ha gaa Botswana, ka na-eme ka ha bụrụ ndị ụkọchukwu iji zere ịbụ ndị ndị ọchịchị ndị Britain nwere ike ịkwado South Africa (n'oge a Swaziland enweghị onwe ya)
Dị ka The Guardian si kwuo, ka ọ na-erule n'ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 2006, Goldreich bi n'obodo Herzliya
'E nwere oge mgbe o kwenyere na steeti ndị Juu na-eto eto nwere ike inye ihe nlereanya nke ụzọ ka mma maka mba a mụrụ ya
Dị ka ọ dị, Goldreich na-ahụ Israel dị ka mba dị nso na ọchịchị ndị ọcha ọ lụsoro ọgụ na South Africa nke oge a dị ka onye na-enye ihe nlereanya
Gọọmentị Israel, ka ọ na-ekwu, mesịrị gosipụta mmasị n'ókèala karịa udo, yana n'ụzọ Zionism gbanwere

Goldreich na-ekwu maka 'bantustanism anyị na-ahụ site na iwu nke obibi na nkewa', 'ajọ' ịkpa ókè agbụrụ n'etiti ndị Israel ruo n'ókè nke ndị minista na-akwado iwepụ ndị Arab n'ike, na 'obi ọjọọ na obi ọjọọ nke ihe a na-enye ndị mmadụ nke mpaghara Palestine'

'Ị hụghị ya dị ka ihe jọgburu onwe ya na ndị a na steeti a, nke malitere naanị n'ihi mmeri nke fascism na Nazism na Europe, na n'ọgụ ahụ nde ndị Juu isii ji ndụ ha kwụọ ụgwọ n'ihi na ha bụ ndị Juu, ọ bụghị ihe ihere na n'ebe a enwere ndị nwere ike ikwu ihe ndị a ma mee ihe ndị a?' ka ọ jụrụ
Arthur Agwuncha Nwankwo bụ onye edemede Naijiria, onye na-akwado ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya, kancelo nke EMU, na onye bụbu osote onyeisi oche nke Njikọ ọchịchị onye kwuọ ụche ya nke mba (Naijiria)
Dị ka kancelo nke Njikọ ikike nke ọwụwa anyanwụ(EMU), Nwankwo kwadoro nloghachi na ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya n'oge ndị agha na-achị n'okpuru General Sani Abacha
E jidere ya na ubọchị nke atọ n'ọnwa Jun n'afo1998 ma tọhapụ ya mgbe Abacha nwụrụ na mberede n'otu ọnwa ahụ
N'afọ 2003, ọ gbara ọsọ maka onye isi ala n'enweghị ịga nke ọma n'okpuru ọkọlọtọ nke òtù ikike ndị mmadu, nwere onwe ya, otu e guzobere site na EMU
A mụrụ Nwankwo na Ajalli, Anambra Steeti
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum ọwụwa anyanwụ Mennonite n'afọ 1966 wee gaa n'ihu na Mahadim Duquesne ebe ọ nwetara nzere masta
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, ọ rụụrụ Gulf Oil ọrụ nwa oge dị ka onye ndụmọdụ
Na mbido Agha Obodo, ọ laghachiri Naijiria ebe ọ sonyeere ndị ọrụ nke ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi nke Biafra ebe ọ na-edekwa akwụkwọ akụkọ kwa izu

Na mbido afọ 1970, Nwankwo malitere inweta nkwanye ùgwù n'ime ndị na-ede akwụkwọ dị ka otu nime ìgwè ndị na-eto eto na-ede edemede mgbe Agha Obodo gasịrị sị Ndịda Ọwụwa Anyanwụ Naịjirịa bụ ndị dere banyere ahụmịhe ha n'oge Agha ahụ
Tupu njedebe nke Agha Obodo Naijiria, o so dee akwụkwọ, Biafra Ime nke mba', na-ndekọ ọrụ Igbo na Naijiria
Nwankwo dekwara Nigeria Ihe ịma aka n'ihu nke Biafra

Ọ malitere ọrụ n'ibipụta mgbe agha ahụ kwụsịrị mgbe ya na Samuel Ifejika, onye so dee Biafra 'The Making of a Nation' guzobere, Nwamife ndi na-ebiputa, ma na-enweta nkwado na nkwado nke ndị edemede dịka Flora Nwapa na Chinua Achebe
Nwamife bipụtara akwụkwọ mbụ ya n'afo1971, nchịkọta akụkọ nke ndị edemede Igbo dị iche iche dere
N'afọ 1977, ya na nwanne ya nwoke guzobere Ụlọ ọrụ mbipụta akụkụ anọ na-ebipụta akwụkwọ dịka Naijria 'Ọtụtụ ijeri ndị e zuuru'
Nwankwo si na mbipụta, banye n'ime ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị n'afọ 1979, mgbe ọ zorọ ọchịchị na-enweghị ihe ịga nke ọma dị ka onye na-azọ ọkwa gọvanọ otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị mgbapụta mmadụ na Anambra State
O mechara bụrụ onye nkatọ nke ọchịchị Jim Nwobodo na-ede akwụkwọ abụọ ebe ọ na-ebo Nwobodo ebubo na ọ na-emebi iwu
Tupu mbido Ripublik nke Atọ, Nwankwo malitere okwu ihu ọha site na mbipụta nke Ịkwanyere ugwu, ụdị ọchịchị ọhụrụ maka Naịjirịa ka osi mmetụta mmekorịta mmadu

Ịkwanyere ugwu, a pọtmanteu nke ndị nkịtị, ndị agha na ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya bụ maka usoro ọchịchị nke ga-eme ka ọganihu mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na uto akụ na ụba na ịdị n'otu n'etiti ọha na eze

Echiche dị n'ime edemede ahụ gụnyere nnabata na itinye ụkpụrụ ọganihu mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya nke ndị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ndị nkịtị zụlitere dị ka ịhazi ọtụtụ mmadụ n'ime ndị agha na itinye omume ọma nke ndị ọchịchị ndị agha gara aga n'ime ndụ ndị nkịtị, iji nweta nguzozi nke na-eme ka ọha na eze kwụsie ike
Nsonye Nwankwo na Ripublik nke Atọ dị obere
Nwankwo ghọrọ kancelo nke Eastern Mandate Union n'afọ1994 ma duru nzukọ ahụ mee ka ọ gbanwee ma ịlaghachi na ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya mgbe General Sani Abacha wepụrụ ọchịchị
Ọrụ ya n'oge a dọtara anya gọọmentị ebe ọnọ, ndi jidere ya
N'afọ 1997, ọ duru EMU ka ya NADECO mekọọ ma jikọọ aka wee bụrụkwa osote onyeisi oche ya
Ọ nwụrụ na ubọchị mbu nke ọnwa Febuari n'afo 2020
Arthur P
Bedou (Amụrụ n'ọnwa Julaị afọ 1882 - rụọ ọnwa Julaị 2, afọ 1966) bụ onye Afrịka-Amerịka na-ese foto nke bi na New Orleans
Bedou bụ, ruo oge ụfọdụ, onye na-ese foto nke Booker T
Washington, ma dekọọ afọ iri ikpeazụ nke ndụ Washington
O dekwara ndụ ụlọ akwụkwọ na Mahadum Xavier nke Louisiana, Tuskegee Institute, na ndụ obodo nke New Orleans, ọkachasị ndị isi ojii bi n'obodo ahụ
A mụrụ Arthur Paul Bedou na New Orleans, Louisiana, n'afọ 1882, otu n'ime ụmụ ise nke Armand Bedou na Marie Celeste Coustaut
Ezinụlọ ya dara ogbenye ma ọ gụrụ obere akwụkwọ; dị ka onye na-ese foto, ọ bụ onye na-amụta ihe n'onwe ya
Bedou rụrụ ọrụ nwa oge dị ka onye odeakwụkwọ, mana ka ọ na-erule afọ 1899, ọ na-ese foto, ọrụ ya malitekwara n'ụzọ siri ike mgbe foto o sere nke chi jiri n'ehihie n'afọ 1900 nwetara ọkwa zuru oke
N'afọ 1903, Bedou dere otu nzukọ na Tuskegee Institute na olile anya inweta ihe ngosi maka ọrụ ya
Booker T
Washington hụrụ ụfọdụ n'ime foto ya wee kpọọ Bedou ka ọ soro ya dị ka onye na-ese foto nke onwe ya, na-ahọrọ Bedou karịa ndị ọzọ dị ka C
Battey n'akụkụ ụfọdụ maka ikike ya ịmepụta foto dị egwu nke ihe omume na-eme
E sere ọtụtụ n'ime foto ndị Bedou nke Washington n'etiti afọ 1908 na afọ 1915, afọ Washington nwụrụ
N'etiti ọrụ ndị ọzọ, ọ sonyeere Washington na njem oge okpomọkụ ya na ebumnuche nke ịmepụta abọm nke njem ọ bụla
Iji gbakwunye ego a na-ejighị n'aka ọ na-enweta site na njem ndị a, o nwere ụfọdụ n'ime foto ndị o weere na postcard, kaadị Krismas, na kalenda
Ọnọdụ ya mere ka o nwekwuo ọrụ iji see foto ndị ama ama ma ndị ojii ma ndị ọcha, gụnyere George Washington Carver, Theodore Roosevelt, Andrew Carnegie, na Julius Rosenwald
Site na njikọ ya na Washington, onye bụ onye isi ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ, a kpọrọ Bedou ka ọ bụrụ onye na-ese foto nke Tuskegee Institute
Otú ọ dị, n'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe Washington nwụsịrị, Battey nọchiri ya dị ka onye na-ese foto ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ, onye ndị isi ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ nwere mmasị n'oge ahụ maka ihe dị iche iche

Kọleji na ụlọ akwụkwọ ndị ọzọ ndị isi ojii dị ka Mahadum Fisk chọkwara ka ha dee ndụ na ụlọ akwụkwọ ha, yana òtù ndị ọkachamara dị ka National Negro Business League, National Medical Association, na National Baptist Convention
Arthur Rose Sr
(Ubochí irí abụọ na isii n'ọnwa Mée, 1921 rụo ụbọchị irí na atọ n'ọnwa Febụwarị, 1995) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe, ónyé na-ese ọkpụkpụ, na prọfesọ
E gosipụtara ya n'ọtụtụ akwụkwọ na ihe ngosi ọha na eze na United States
Rose bụ ónyé Africa America
A mụrụ Arthur Rose Sr
na Charleston, South Carolina na úbọchị irí abụọ na isii n'ọnwa Mée, 1921
N'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 1942, ọ debanyere aha na ndị agha mmiri, na-eje ozi ruo na úbọchị isii n'ọnwa Disemba, 1945, mgbè a chụrụ ya n'ụzọ nkwanye ùgwù
Rose gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Claflin na 1950, na-aghọ nwa akwụkwọ nke abụọ n'akụkọ ihe méré eme nke ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ iji nweta nzèrè na nka
N'ịchọ ịga n'ihu na agụmakwụkwọ ya, Rose gàrà Mahadum New York ma mụọ n'okpuru ọtụtụ ndị omenkà a ma ama, gụnyere Hale Woodruff, nweta nzèrè masta ya na 1952
N'afọ 1952, Rose laghachiri Claflin, nyere aka guzobe Ngalaba nka nke ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ, ma jee ozi dị ka ónyé isi oche ya ruo n'afọ 1976
N'afọ 1977, ọ gafere na Voorhees College, wee bụrụ ónyé na-ese ihe n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ, na-aga n'ihu na-akụzi ruo n'afọ 1991
Ọtụtụ ụmụ akwụkwọ nọ n'okpuru nkuzi ya dara ogbenye
Ọ bụghị naanị na Rose ga-akpọ ha n'ụlọ ya màkà nri, kamakwa ọ ga-enye ha ihe osise
Ọtụtụ n'ime ụmụ akwụkwọ ya ga-aga n'ihu na nka na ọrụ nkuzi nke ha
Otu n'ime ha, Leo Twiggs, ga-enyere aka guzobe mmemme nka na ebe ngosi nka na South Carolina State College
E guzobere ebe ngosi nka n'aha ya na Claflin
O nwere ụmụ anọ Patricia A
Rose (nwụrụ anwụ), Arthur Rose Jr, Bernard H
Rose, na Marcia L
Rose
Arthur Si-Bita (1948-2016) bụ onye nduzi ihe nkiri Cameroon
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị ọsụ ụzọ nke ihe nkiri Cameroun
Ọgụgụ isi (AI) bụ ọgụgụ isi nke igwe gosipụtara, na-emegide ọgụgụ isi sitere n'okike nke anụmanụ na ụmụ mmadụ gosipụtara

A kọwawo nchọpụta AI dị ka ngalaba ọmụmụ nke ndị ọrụ nwere ọgụgụ isi, nke na-ezo aka na usoro ọ bụla nke na-aghọta gburugburu ya ma na-eme ihe ndị na-eme ka ohere ya nwee ike iru ihe mgbaru ọsọ ya[lower-alpha 1]
Arto Tchakmakchian (Armenian, 26 June 1933 - 1 October 2019) bụ onye Canada-Armenia na-ese ihe na onye na-ese onyinyo
Ọ bu onye otu Royal Canadian Academy of Arts
Ọ bụ onye Armenia nyere onyinye Order of Honor n'afọ 2015
Nna Arto (Harutyun) Tchakmakchian bụ onye nwe ụlọ ahịa akwụkwọ na enyi Vahan Malezian
A mụrụ Arto na Cairo, Egypt na 1933 ma ọ gụọ akwụkwọ na Nubarian National College na Heliopolis, mgbe ahụ na 1946 ezinụlọ ya laghachiri Yerevan
Ọ malitere ọmụmụ nka ya mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na ise na ụlọ akwụkwọ nka nke Panos Terlemezian
N'afọ 1962, o ritere ihe nrite mbụ na International Contemporary Ceramics Exhibition na Prague maka ihe ọkpụkpụ ya bụ Reclining Figure
O nwetara ihe nrite mbụ maka ihe o dere 'Ihe ncheta ndị nwụrụ na Hiroshima na asọmpi nke Kọmitii Udo nke Moscow haziri
USSR nyere obodo Hiroshima ọrụ ahụ na 1964
N'afọ 1969, ọ natara ihe nrite ọla edo nke Armenian Youth Union maka ọrụ ya Nne na Arno Babajanyan nke State Tretiakov Gallery zụrụ na Moscow
N'otu afọ ahụ, Tchakmakchian pụtara na ihe nkiri Mikhail Vartanov nke akpọrọ The Color of Armenian Land ya na Sergei Parajanov (nke a tụrụ mkpọrọ na 1973) na Minas Avetisyan (nke e gburu na 1975)
Kemgbe afọ 1964 onye nkuzi Artem Alikhanian ghọrọ otu n'ime ndị isi na-akwado nka Tchakmaktchian
N'afọ 1972, Joseph Brodsky mgbe ọ nọ na Yerevan, gara ụlọ ọrụ ya
N'afọ 1984, Tchakmaktchian meriri ihe nrite mbụ na asọmpi Wilfrid Pelletier na Montreal maka bust ya nke aha asọmpi ahụ
A na-egosipụta ọrụ ahụ na-adịgide adịgide n'ụlọ nzukọ nke Place des Arts na Montreal
E gosikwara ọrụ ya na ebe ngosi ihe mgbe ochie ama na mba ụwa, ọkachasị na Louvre Museum
E mere ihe ngosi a ma ama na isi ụlọ ọrụ UNESCO na Paris na 2010
Ihe nrite na nkwanye ugwu nke Arto Tchakmakchian gụnyere
Sphinx Armenia (Arus), Yerevan, 1963
Ihe oyiyi nke Gomidas Vartabed, Detroit, MI
Arundhati Bhattacharya bụ onye ọrụ na ụlọ akụ India lara ezumike nka na onye bụ onye isi oche nke State Bank of India
Ọ bụ nwanyị mbụ ga-abụ onye isi oche nke State Bank of India
Na afọ 2016, e depụtara ya dị ka nwanyị otu n'ime nwanyị iri abụo na ise kachasị ike n'ụwa site na Forbes
Ọ bụ naanị ya bụ onye ndu ụlọ ọrụ India nke edepụtara na ndepụta ndị ndu ụwa kachasị ukwu nke Fortune na 26
Na afọ 2018, ajụjụ ọnụ ya akpọrọ 'Arundhati Bhattacharya Ime SBI's First Women Chairperson' ka ebipụtara na Harvard Business Review Ascend Archived
A mụrụ Bhattacharya na ezinụlọ Bengali n'obodo Kolkata
Ọnọdụ nwata ya bu na Bokaro Steel City
Nna ya, Prodyut Kumar Mukherjee rụrụ ọrụ na Bokaro Steel Plant
Nna ya, Kalyani Mukherjee bụ onye ndụmọdụ homeopathy na Bokaro
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na St
Xavier's School, Bokaro
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ Bekee na Calcutta's Lady Brabourne College wee gụọ kwa na Mahadum Jadavpur
Di ya, Pritimoy Bhattacharya onye ọkachamaraIIT Kharagpur
N'afọ 2016, Forbes kpọrọ ya nwanyị nke iri abụọ na ise kachasị ike n'ụwa, nke bụ oge mbụ ọ nọ na ndepụta ahụ
N'otu afọ ahụ, a họọrọ ya n'etiti FP Top 100 Global Thinkers site na akwụkwọ akụkọ Foreign Policy Akpọrọ ya aha nwanyị nke anọ kachasị ike na Asia Pacific site na Fortune
Na 2017, akwụkwọ akụkọ India Today họọrọ ya na 19th n'ime ndị India 50 kachasị ike na ndepụta 2017

Oruru mgbe ekwesiri inye ya ezumike na onwa nke iri na afo 2016, mana enyere ya ndọtị ruo onwa nke iri na afọ 2017, ebido ya ebubo maka njikọta esemokwu nke ụlọ akụ ndị otu SBI ise na Bharatiya Mahila Bank, n'ihi nnukwu akụ na-adịghị arụ ọrụ (GNPAs) na-arị elu na pasent 73 ; ọchịchị dị ugbu a na-akwado njem ahụ site na Ụlọ Ọrụ Banks Board, bụ onye kwadoro mgbatị ya
Na afọ 2018 a kpọrọ ya onye ndu azụmaahịa nke afọ na onyinye nrite Asia
Arundhati Bhattacharya esonyela dị ka onye isi ndị ọzọ, 'onye nduzi nọọrọ onwe ya' nke Reliance Industries maka afọ ise malitere 17 October 2018
N'afọ 2020, ewere ya dị ka onye isi oche na onye isi maka ngalaba nke Salesforce India, nnukwu ụwa na CRM
Ọ bụkwa onye isi ugbu a nke SWIFT India, akụkụ nke netwọk ịkwụ ụgwọ zuru ụwa ọnụ
Bhattacharya weputara arụkwaghịm ya dị ka onye ntụzi aka nke CRISIL (ụlọ ọrụ nyocha zuru ụwa ọnụ na-enye ọkwa, nyocha na ihe egwu na ọrụ ndụmọdụ amụma) dị irè na abalị iri na ise na onwa nke ano
Ahụrụ ya ka ona eso ndị ogu iwu ahịa na India dị ka onye isi oche na onye isi ala na abalị iri abuo na onwa nke anọ dị ka ihe kpatara arụkwaghịm ahụ
Bhattacharya ga-akọ akụkọ nye Ulrik Nehammer, Onye isi njikwa APAC
Ugbu a, ọ na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi na-abụghị onye isi na 'Reliance Industries Limited'
Ọ na-ejekwa ozi dị ka onye isi oche nke ndi ana akpo 'Board of Governors of Indian Institute of Management, Sambalpur'
Amụrụ ya ma zụlite ya na Bhilai, ma mụọ na ngalaba 9 ụlọ akwụkwọ

Suzanna Arundhati Roy (a mụrụ na 24 Nọvemba 1961) bụ onye edemede India nke a maara nke ọma maka akwụkwọ akụkọ ya The God of Small Things (1997), nke meriri Man Booker Prize for Fiction n'afọ 1997 wee bụrụ akwụkwọ kacha ere ahịa site n'aka onye edemede Indian na-abụghị onye mba ọzọ
Ọ bụkwa onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na-etinye aka na ikike mmadụ na ihe gbasara gburugburu ebe obibi

A mụrụ Arundhati Roy na Shillong, Meghalaya, India, n'aka Mary Roy, onye Malayali Jacobite Syrian Christian na-ahụ maka ikike ụmụ nwanyị si Kerala na Rajib Roy, onye njikwa ubi tii Hindu Bengali si Calcutta
Mgbe ọ dị afọ abụọ, ndị mụrụ ya gbara alụkwaghịm wee soro nne ya na nwanne ya nwoke laghachi Kerala
Ruo oge ụfọdụ, ezinụlọ ahụ na nna nna Roy biri na Ooty, Tamil Nadu
Mgbe ọ dị afọ ise, ezinụlọ ahụ laghachiri Kerala, ebe nne ya malitere ụlọ akwụkwọ
Roy gara ụlọ akwụkwọ na Corpus Christi, Kottayam, ụlọ akwụkwọ Lawrence, Lovedale, na Nilgiris, Tamil Nadu sochiri ya
Mgbe ahụ, ọ gụrụ ihe owuwu na School of Planning and Architecture, Delhi, ebe ọ zutere onye na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ Gerard da Cunha
Ha lụrụ n'afọ 1978 ma biri na Delhi, na Goa, tupu ha kewaa ma gbaa alụkwaghịm n'afọ 1982
Roy laghachiri Delhi, ebe ọ nwetara ọkwa na National Institute of Urban Affairs
N'afọ 1984, ọ zutere onye na-eme ihe nkiri n'onwe ya bụ Pradip Krishen, onye nyere ya ọrụ dịka onye na-azụ ewu na ihe nkiri ya Massey Sahib
Ha mechara lụọ n'otu afọ ahụ

Ha jikọrọ aka na usoro telivishọn banyere nnwere onwe India na ihe nkiri abụọ, Annie na Electric Moon N'ịbụ onye ụwa ihe nkiri ahụ enweghị mmasị na ya, Roy nwalere ngalaba dị iche iche, gụnyere ịgba ọsọ klas aerobics
Roy na Krishen bi iche ugbu a mana ha ka lụrụ di na nwunye
Ọ bịara nwee ego site na ihe ịga nke ọma nke akwụkwọ akụkọ ya The God of Small Things, nke e bipụtara n'afọa 1997
Roy bụ nwa nwanne nne nke onye mgbasa ozi ama ama Prannoy Roy, onye isi nke otu mgbasa ozi telivishọn India NDTV
Ọ bi na Delhi
Arunma Oteh, OON (Nke ọkwa ana akpọ Officer nke Order Niger), bụ onye nke na edekọ ego ma bụrụ kwa onye osote ọchichi nke ụlọ akụ nke mba nịịle nke ana akpọ World Bank
Nwa ada nke biara bụrụ onye isi nke ụlọ ọrụ nke obodo Naijiriya nke ana akpọ Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) na ọnwa mbụ nke afọ 2010
Na ọkwa nkea, ọhụrụ maka ihe gbasara usoro nke nduzi ihe gbasara ahia ego na akụ na ụba nke obodo Naijiriya ma tinyere ụlọ ọrụ nke ana akpọ Nigerian Stock Exchange
Na ọnwa asaa nke afọ 2015, mgbe ọrụ ya na SEC kwụsiri, nwa ada nkea biara nwete ọrụ ozọ ka onye nke na edekọ ego ma bụrụ kwa onye osote ọchichi nke ụlọ akụ nke mba nịịle
N'October 2022, FSD Africa, ụlọ ọrụ mmepe lekwasịrị anya na ahịa ego n'Africa, kwuputara na ọ họpụtala Arunma Oteh na ndị isi ụlọ ọrụ ya
Arunma Oteh bụ nwere ikikere nke diri onye obodo Naijiriya na Britain
Na obodo Naijiriya, osi na Steetị nke Abia
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum nke ana akpọ University of Nigeria Nsukka, ebe onwere asa mbodo nke ka si elu nke bekee na akpọ First Class Honors Degree na agụmagụ nke ihe gbasara Komputa Sayensi
Omere bia gaa na ụlọ akwụkwọ nke ana akpọ Harvard Business School ebe oritere asambodo nke abụọ na agụmagụ Business Administration
Oteh so na ndi deziri akwụkwọ nke akpọrọ African Voices African Visions

Oteh arụọla ọrụ na ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ ndi di ka Harvard Institute for International Development na Centre Point Investments Limited nke di na obodo Naijiriya na usoro ihe gbasara ighazi akụ na ụba, nkwalite ihe, nkuzi na ichọpụta ihe
Na afọ 1992, Oteh biara rụwa ọrụ na African Development Bank (AfDB)

Oteh bụrụ onye isi nke na ahụ maka idozi akụ na ụba na azụmahia ego site na afọ 1993 ruo na 1997, bia bụrụ onye isi oche nke usoro na ahu maka nghazi akụ na ụba na ire ahia site na afọ 1997 ruo na 2001 tupu eme ya onye na edobe ego nke ụlọ akụ ma na ahụ maka ihe gbasara ikọ ego na aku na ụba nke mba ụwa Emere Oteh onye osote isi oche nke ụlọ ọrụ ADB na ọnwa atọ nke afọ 2006 ebe ọna ahụ anya maka ihe gbasara asụsụ, ngwa ọrụ na azụmazụ, iwere mmadụ na ọru, igbasa ozi na nkara di iche iche
Onye isi ọchichi obodo Naijiriya nke ana akpọ Umaru Yar'Adua biara họpụta Nwa Ada Oteh ka onye isi nke ndi ụlọ ọrụ Securities & Exchange Commission na ọnwa asaa nke afọ 2009
Arunma Oteh biara bụrụzie onye isi ụlọ ọrụ nke na ọnwa mbu nke afọ 2010, mgbe ndi ome iwu biara si ya chiri ha na ihu
Na ụbọchi iri na asatọ nke ọnwa asaa di na afọ 2012, Oteh bidokwara rụwa ọrụ ozọ na ụlọ ọrụ SEC mgbe ndi PricewaterhouseCooper biara maa ya ikpe amaghim na ebubo oshi ego eboro ya
Oteh rụchara ọkwa ọrụ nke afọ ise ka onye isi ụlọ ọrụ SEC na ọnwa mbụ nke afọ 2015
Na ọnwa asaa nke afọ 2015, Jim Yong Kim, onye isi ụlọ ọrụ nke ndi World Bank nyere nwa ada Arunma Oteh ọkwa pụru iche ka osote onye isi na onye nke na edekọ ego na ụlọ ọrụ ha

Na afọ 2011 Oteh ritere nrite nke Officer of the Order of the Niger (OON) maka ọtụtụ nkwalite na ntinye nke otinyere na ihe gbasara mbulite nke obodo na imezi ihe gbasara akụ na ụba nke obodo Naijiriya
Na afọ 2011 oritekwara nrite nke oyibo na akpọ 'Distinction In Public Service' nke ndi otu Commonwealth Business Council/African Business nyere ya
Na afọ 2014, Oteh ritere ihe nrite pụrụ iche ka Nwanyi Azụmahia nke mpanyere West Africa nke ndi otu CNBC Africa All Africa Business Leaders Awards (AABLA) nyere ya
Arwa Abouon (1982-2020) bụ onye na-ese foto na Libya na Canada
A mụrụ Abouon na Tripoli, Libya na 1982 ma bụrụkwa onye Amazigh
Ya na ezinụlọ ya kwagara Canada n'afọ 1983 na nzaghachi maka iwebata ụmụ okorobịa site na ọchịchị Muammar Gaddafi
Nna ya, Mustafa Muhammad Abouon (1940), tụrụ egwu maka nchekwa nke ụmụ ya
Abouon gụrụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum Concordia dị na Montreal, Quebec, ebe ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ nka wee nweta nzere bachelọ nke nka mara mma, n'afọ 2007
Ọrụ ya na-adabere n'ahụmahụ ya dị ka nwanyị Alakụba bi na mpaghara ọdịda anyanwụ ma ọ na-ejikarị omenala ọdịnala Alakụba, uwe na ihe oyiyi n'akụkụ akara nke ọdịbendị ọdịda anyanwụ
Ọ na-akọwa na ebumnuche nke ọrụ ya 'bụ ịkpụpụta ekele dị mma maka ọdịbendị Alakụba site n'ịgbanwe uche site na okwu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị gaa na ememe abụ nke ntọala okwukwe
E gosipụtara ọrụ Abouon na mba ụwa na ebe ngosi dị na Canada, United States, Europe, Asia, na Middle East
Diptych ya Mirror Mirror, Allah Allah meriri ihe nrite nke abụọ na ememe nke ịrị abụọ na isii nke Alexandra Biennale for Mediterranean Countries Award na 2014
Onye na-enyocha nka bụ Valerie Behiery kwuru na mpempe akwụkwọ ahụ, nke na-egosi ngosipụta nke Abouon yi uwe mkpuchi na-enweghị, na-enye nkọwa na 'ịdị mfe na ọchị'
Ọ nwụrụ na Montreal na June 9, 2020
Aryan Kaganof (amụrụ n'afọ 1964 dị ka Ian Kerkhof) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na South Africa, onye na-ede akwụkwọ akụkọ, onye na-ede uri na onye na-ese ihe
N'afọ 1999 ọ gbanwere aha ya ka ọ bụrụzie Aryan Kaganof
Mama, ma ọ bụ Kantana, bụ asụsụ Bantu a na-asụ na Naijiria
Ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị ọkà okwu amabeghị
E bipụtara ọnụ ọgụgụ nke 20,000 na 1973
N'afọ 2011, a sịrị na 'Kantana' (ma eleghị anya otu asụsụ) nwere ndị na-asụ asụsụ 2,000-3,000, ndị kakarịsịrị afọ 25Ngụkọta akụkụ nke obodo agbụrụ na ngụkọ 2006 bụ 6,000–9,000
Àtụ Mbam languages
African Junior Swimming Championship bụ asọmpi Afrịka na egwuregwu nke igwu mmiri
Ọ bụ African Swimming Confederation (CANA) na-ahazi ya ma na-eme ya ugboro abụọ
Afọ ndị na-asọmpi Na 2019 bụ ụdị abụọ afọ ndị na- asọmpi bụ maka ụmụ nwoke na ụmụ nwanyị 13 ruo 14 na 15 ruo 16
Site na 2021 afọ ndị na-asọmpi bụ maka ụmụ nwanyị 14 ruo 17 na maka ụmụ nwoke 15 ruo 18
E mere mbipụta kachasị ọhụrụ nke asọmpi ahụ na Septemba 2019 na Tunis, Tunisia

Asụsụ Ìgbò bụ asụsụ nke ana-asụ n'ala Igbò nile gbaa gburugburu
Ọ bụkwa nke ndị nwe ya ruru ihe dị ka mmadụ di ndè ịrị abuo n'isi
Ọtụtụ n'ime ndị a bụkwa ndị Igbo, ebe ndị ọzọ n'ime ha bụ ndị ọbịa n'ala Igbo
Abịa n'asụsụ Igbo, e nwere ọtụtụ ire dị iche-iche nke mere ka ọ na-ebute nghọta he n'ime asụsụ a
Nke a kpara kwara eji we họpụta ihe akpọrọ Ìgbò Ízugbé
Ìgbò Ízugbé bụkwa nchọpụta nke ejiri asaa n'anya were họpụta ire nke ndị Owere sitere na Ímo steeti, ire nke ndị Awka nke sitere na Anambara steeti nakwa ire nke ndị Umuahia nke sitere na Abịa steeti
Ọ bụkwa nke a bụ asụsụ Ìgbò etiti nke a akwa ede n'akwụkwọ
A bịa na edemede nke asụsụ Igbo, e nwechara nnọọ ihe ndị di cha iche site ka ndị bekee si ede nke ha
A bịa na mkpụrụokwu nke kọ́nzonantị, e nwere ndị gbara mkpụrụ edemede abụọ
Ihe iji wee maa atụ bụ , ch, gb, gw, kp, kw, nw, nakwa ndị ọzọ
Asụsụ Igbo abụrụ wo nnọọ asụsụ mụbara n'ụwa niile nke bụzi na eji ya agbasa nta akụkọ ma nedekwa ya ede
Abia n'ala Igbo, eji asụsụ Igbo agọ̀ ọjị ma nekpekwa ekpere na ọgbakọ ndị ọdụ n'ala

Asụru asụ Tapioca (dị ka sago pudding) bụ pudding na-atọ ụtọ nke e ji tapioca na mmiri ara ehi ma ọ bụ mmiri ara ehi mee
A na-ejikwa mmiri ara akị bekee mee ihe n'ọnọdụ ebe a na-ahọrọ ụtọ ma ọ bụ n'ebe ọ bụ ihe a na-ejikarị esi nri
A na-eme ya n'ọtụtụ ọdịbendị n'ụdị dịgasị iche iche, a pụkwara imepụta ya n'ụzọ dịgasị mma
Ọdịdị ya na-adị site na dị gịrịgịrị (runny), ruo n'ịdị arọ, ruo n'ịbụ nke siri ike iji fork rie
Enwere ike ime pudding site na iji tapioca mee ihe n'ụdị dịgasị iche iche flakes, nri siri ike, osisi, na pearls
Ọtụtụ ngwakọta azụmahịa dịkwa
Ụmụ akwụkwọ ndị Britain na-akpọkarị nri frog spawn, n'ihi ọdịdị ya
The Guardian kọwara ya dị ka 'pudding ụlọ akwụkwọ kachasị asị na Britain', nke nwere aha dịka anya azụ, frogspawn na pudding eyeball
Otú ọ dị, ọ na-alọghachi na narị afọ nke 21 na ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ Michelin-starred na ebe ndị na-adịchaghị elu
N'ebe ndịda India, a na-eme ụdị pudding a maara dị ka jawhuarusee payasam nke e ji nkume pel tapioca mee n'oge ememme
Tapioca pudding bụ otu n'ime efere ndị isi ndị agha Rhode Island riri maka ememe ha nke anọ nke July n'oge nnọchibido nke Petersburg
Izere bụ asụsụ na-aga n'ihu nke asụsụ Plateau na Naịjirịa
Dị ka Blench si kwuo (2008), ọ bụ asụsụ anọ, ọ bụ ezie na Ethnologue anaghị eme ka ọdịiche dị na-etiti NW na NE Izere
A na-asụ ụdị Cen na Ganang naanị 2000 nke ọ bụla
Cen agbakwunyere prefixes nke Berom na consonant alternation na isi Izere
Blench (2019) edepụtago asụsụ Izere ndị a
Ndepụta ụdaume Izere gụnyere ụdaume 29 na ụdaume asaa ma na-eme ka ụdaolu atọ dị iche; ụda olu abụọ ọzọ na-apụta naani obere oge, na okwu ndị a gbazitere na n'ihi onomatopoeia
A na-egosi ụdaume nke Izere na tebụlu na-esonụ
A na-egosi ụdaume nke Izere na tebụl na-esonụ
E nwere ọkwa atọ (L, M & H) na abụọ contour tonemes (LM & HL) na Izere; abụọ ikpeazụ a na-ahụ naanị na okwu mgbazinye na onomatopoeia
Asụsụ Jagham, Ejagham, nke a makwaara dị ka Ekoi, bụ asụsụ Ekoid nke Naijiria na Cameroon nke ndị Ekoi na-asụ
E- na Ejagham na-anọchite anya prefix klass maka 'asụsụ', yiri Bantu ki- na KiSwahili
Ndị Ekoi bụ otu n'ime ọtụtụ ndị na-eji ideographs Nsibidi, ma nwee ike ịbụ ndị meputara ha
Ọ bụ John R
Watters na Kathie Watters mepụtara mkpụrụedemede Jagham na 1981
Ekoi nwere asụsụ dị iche iche
A na-ekewa olumba nke Ejagham n'ime ìgwè ndị dị n'Ebe Ọdịda Anyanwụ na nke Ọwụwa Anyanwụ
Blench (2019) depụtakwara Ekin no ọnọdụ olumba Ejagham
Ekoi nwere klass aha ndị a, edepụtara ebe a na ndị Bantu ha

Watters (1981) na-ekwu na e nwere ole na ole karịa na Bantu n'ihi njikọta (klass 4 n'ime 3, 7 n'ime 6, wdg), ọ bụ ezie na Blench na-ekwu ete enweghị ihe mere ị ga-eji chee na asụsụ ndị nna nna nwere ọtụtụ aha dị ka proto-Bantu
('N' na-anọchite anya homorganic nasal
'j' bụ 'y')

Aja bụ asụsụ Central Sudanese nke a na-asụ na mpaghara ndịda South Sudan nke Bahr el Ghazal na n'akụkụ ókèala South Sudanese na Central Afrika Republic
Ọ bụ ezie na ndị Aja bụ ndị agbụrụ Kresh, asụsụ ha anaghị aghọta asụsụ Kresh ndị ọzọ
Ọ bụ n'ụzọ dị ukwuu Banda na okwu, ọ bụ ezie na ọ ka bụ Kresh na nhazi

Aka, nke a makwaara dị ka Yaka ma ọ bụ Beka, bụ asụsụ Bantu a na-asụ na Central Afrika Republic na Republic of kongo, n'akụkụ Osimiri Ubangi nke kewara mba abụọ ahụ
Ndị Aka na-asụ asụsụ Aka, ndị pygmy nwere njikọ chiri anya na ndị na-asụrụ Ubangian Baka nke Cameroon, Kongo na Gabọn
N'ozuzu, a maara ndị a dị ka ndị Mbenga (Bambenga) ma ọ bụ kwa nụ Binga (Babinga), nke ikpeazụ bụ mkparị
Ndi a ma ama, Aka na asu asụsụ Baka na-ekekorita okwu, karịsịa gbasara akụ na ụba ọhịa pụrụ iche, dị ka okwu maka osisi ndị a na-eri eri, osisi ọgwụ na nchịkọta mmanụ aṅụ

Nke a so na pasent iri atọ (30%) nke Aka nke na-abụghị Bantu na pasent iri atọ (30%) nke Baka nke na-adịghị Ubangian ma bụrụ ihe fọdụrụ n'asụsụ ndị nna nna Western Pygmy (Mbenga ma ọ bụ 'Baaka') nke na-apụ n'anya
Otú ọ dị, ọ ga-ekwe omume na Aka gbanwere gaa Bantu site n'asụsụ Ubangian metụtara Baka, n'ọnọdụ ahụ, ọnọdụ ahụ na-ebelata na otu agbụrụ na-anabata n'oké ọhịa na okwu pụrụ iche
Enweghị ihe akaebe maka njikọ asụsụ sara mbara na nke ọ bụla n'ime ndị Pygmy ndị ọzọ
Ndị Aka na-akpọ onwe ha Mraka n'otu na Beka n'ọtụtụ
Ndịa na asụ asụsụ ha na-iji mkpụrụedemede dị iche iche Mò-Áka, Moyaka, Bayaka, Yaga, Bayaga, Gbayaka, Biaka, Beká, Yakwa, Yakpa, Yakpwa, Nyoyaka
A maara Aka ọdịda anyanwụ dị ka Benzele (Mbenzélé, Babenzélé, Bambenzele, Ba-Benjelle), mara kwa Aka ọwụwa anyanwụ dị ka Sese (Basese)
Ndị a nwere ike ịbụ ire okwu dị iche iche; Nzari nwere ike ịbụ ọzọ
Pygmies nke ugwu Gabọn kpọrọ Mikaya na Luma doro anya na ha bụ Aka ma ọ bụ na-asụ asụsụ nke ya na Aka nwere oyiri

Amba (nke a na-akpọkwa Bulebule, Hamba, Humu, Kihumu, Ku-Amba, Kuamba, Lubulebule, Lwamba, Ruwenzori Kibira, nakwa Rwamba) bụ asụsụ ndị Amba na-asụ n'akụkụ ụfọdụ nke Uganda nakwa Democratic Republic of Congo
Ndị Amba na-akpọ ya Kwamba ma makwara ya dị ka Kihumu dị na Democratic Republic nke dị na Congo

Olumba ndị a gụnyere Kyanzi (Kihyanzi) nakwa Suwa (Kusuwa)

Anyin, nke a makwaara dị ka Agni, maọbu Agny, na Anyi, bụ asụsụ Niger-Congo nke a na-asụkarị na Côte d'Ivoire na Ghana
Ọ bụ asụsụ Kwa nke alaka Central Tano, na-emepụta asụsụ na-aga n'ihu na Baoulé, ma nwekwaa njikọ chiri anya na Nzema na Sehwi
Asụsụ ya, nke kewara n'ebe ugwu na etiti, gụnyere Sannvin, Abé, Ano, Bona, Bini, na Barabo na mpaghara ugwu na Ndenye na Juablin na mpaghara etiti
Na Côte d'Ivoire, e nwere ihe dịka nde mmadụ
tu ihe iri anọ na ise O1
na-asụ asụsụ Anyin, yana pụkụ iri ndị na-asụrụ asụsụ nke abụọ; na Ghana, e nwereihe dịka ndị na-ekwu okwu 66,400
Anyin nwere ụda abụọ, elu na etiti; ụda abụọ, nke dị na elu na ala; na otu ụda na-anọpụ iche
A na-ekewa ụdaolu n'ụzọ orthographic naanị iji mee ka a mata ọdịiche dị n'etiti obere abụọ na nhazi asụsụ, ma ọ bụ mgbe ụdaume abụọ yiri ibe ha nwerekwa ụda dị iche iche ha na-eme cf
Apro, nke a makwaara dị ka Aproumu, bụ asụsụ ndị Aizi nakwa nke Ébrié Lagoon na Ivory Coast na-asụ
Ozugbo e weere na ọ bụ asụsụ Kru dị ka asụsụ abụọ ndị ọzọ nke Aizi, nyocha ndị ọzọ gosiri na ọ bụkwa ya
Argobba bụ asụsụ Semitic nke ndị Argobba na-asụ n'ebe ugwu ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Addis Ababa
Ọ bụ nke South Ethiopic languages subgroup tinyere Amharic na Gurage languages
N'ide akwụkwọ n'etiti afọ 1960, Edward Ullendorff kwuru na ọ 'na-apụ n'anya ngwa ngwa maka Amharic, ọ bụkwa naanị ndị agadi ole na ole ka nwere ike ikwu ya
' Mana Taa, ọtụtụ ndị Argobba nọ na mpaghara Harari na-agbanwe n'asụsụ Oromo
A na-asụ asụsụ ahụ n'ọtụtụ akpa ma nwee ọ dịkarịa ala ọdịiche mpaghara anọ (asụsụ) na Harar (nke na-adịghịzi adị), Aliyu Amba, Shewa Robit na Shonke
Asoa, nke a makwaara dị ka Asua, Asuae, Asuati, ma ọ bụ Aka, bụ asụsụ Central Sudan nke ndị Mbuti Pygmies na-asụ nke a makwaara dị ka Asia
Ọ nwere njikọ chiri anya na asụsụ Mangbetu, ndị Asua na ndị Mangbetu n'ebi na mmekọrịta, n'etiti ndị ọzọ
Ọ bụ naanị asụsụ Pygmy pụrụ iche n'ebe ọwụwa anyanwụ
A na-asụ Asua n'ọhịa ndị dị n'ebe ugwu nke Osimiri Aruwimi, n'etiti Osimiri Nepoko na isi mmiri nke Osimiri Rubi
