Asbestos (/æsˈbɛstəs, æzˈ-, -tɒs/ ass-BEST-əs, az-, -⁠oss) bụ mineral silicate fibrous na emekarị
Enwere ụdị isii, nke niile mejupụtara kristal fibrous ogologo na nke dị gịrịgịrị, eriri ọ bụla mejupụtara ọtụtụ 'fibrils' microscopic nke enwere ike ịhapụ ikuku site na abrasion na usoro ndị ọzọ
iku ume nke eriri asbestos nwere ike ibute ọnọdụ ngụgụ dị egwu dị iche iche, gụnyere mesothelioma, asbestosis, na ọrịa kansa akpa ume
N'ihi mmetụta ahụike ndị a, a na ewere asbestos dị ka nnukwu ihe egwu ahụike na nchekwa

Ọmụmụ ihe mgbe ochie achọpụtala ihe àmà nke asbestos na eji ihe dị ka n'oge Nkume Age iji mee ka ite seramiiki sie ike, ma ngwuputa ihe dị ukwuu malitere na njedebe nke narị afọ nke 19 mgbe ndị na emepụta ihe na ndị na ewu ụlọ malitere iji asbestos maka ihe anụ ahụ na achọsi ike

Asbestos bụ ihe mkpuchi ọkụ na ọkụ eletrik mara mma, yana ọkụ na eguzogide ya nke ukwuu, yabụ n'ime narị afọ nke 20, a na ejikarị ya eme ihe n'ụwa niile dị ka ihe eji ewu ụlọ, ruo mgbe a nabatara mmetụta ọjọọ ya na ahụike mmadụ n'ọtụtụ ebe
Afọ 1970
A na eche na ọtụtụ ụlọ ọgbara ọhụrụ e wuru tupu afọ 1980 nwere asbestos
Eji asbestos maka ihe owuwu na mkpuchi ọkụ emewo iwu megidere iwu n'ọtụtụ mba
N'agbanyeghị nke a, ọ dịkarịa ala, a na eche na mmadụ 100,000 na anwụ kwa afọ site na ọrịa ndị metụtara ikpughe asbestos
N'otu akụkụ, nke a bụ n'ihi na ọtụtụ ụlọ ochie ka nwere asbestos; na mgbakwunye, nsonaazụ nke ikpughe nwere ike were ọtụtụ iri afọ ibili
Ọrịa ndị a na ahụkarị na ejikọta ya na mkpughe asbestos na adịghị ala ala bụ asbestosis (ụfụ nke ngụgụ n'ihi iku ume asbestos) na mesothelioma (ụdị ọrịa kansa)

Ọtụtụ mba ndị ka na emepe emepe ka na akwado iji asbestos dị ka ihe owuwu ụlọ, na ngwuputa asbestos na aga n'ihu, ebe onye na emepụta ihe kacha elu, Russia, nwere atụmatụ mmepụta nke 790,000 tonne na 2020
Okwu ahụ bụ 'asbestos', nke mbụ e ji mee ihe na 1600s, n'ikpeazụ na enweta site na Greek oge ochie ἄσβεστος, nke pụtara 'enweghị ike imenyụ' ma ọ bụ 'enweghị ike imenyụ emenyụ'
Aha ahụ na egosipụta iji ihe ahụ eme ihe maka wicks nke na agaghị ere ọkụ
A nabatara ya n'asụsụ Bekee site na Old French abestos, nke n'aka nke ya nwetara okwu sitere na Grik site na Latin, ma na Grik mbụ, ọ na ezo aka na ngwa ngwa
Akwụkwọ ọkọwa okwu Oxford kwuru na ọ bụ Pliny ji mee ihe n’ụzọ na ezighị ezi maka asbestos, bụ́ onye mere ka echiche na ezighị ezi gbasaa
A na akpọ asbestos n'asụsụ Grik dị ka amiantos, nke pụtara 'emerughị ihe', n'ihi na ọ dịghị akara mgbe a tụbara ya n'ime ọkụ
Nke a bụ isi mmalite maka okwu asbestos n'ọtụtụ asụsụ, dị ka Portuguese amianto na French amiante
A na akpọkwa ya 'amiant' na Bekee na mmalite narị afọ nke 15, mana 'asbestos' nọchiri ojiji a
A na akpọ okwu a /æsˈbɛstəs/ ma ọ bụ /æsˈbɛstɒs

Ndị mmadụ ejirila asbestos kemgbe ọtụtụ puku afọ mepụta ihe na agbanwe agbanwe nke na eguzogide ọkụ, gụnyere akwa akwa, ma, n'oge a, ụlọ ọrụ malitere ịmepụta ngwa ahịa nke nwere asbestos n'ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ
Taa, ndị mmadụ na amata ihe ize ndụ ahụike nke asbestos nwere; Amachibidoro iji asbestos kpam kpam na mba 55 ma na achịkwa nke ọma n'ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ

Asbestos na eji ụbọchị azụ ma ọ dịkarịa ala afọ 4,500, mgbe ndị bi na mpaghara ọdọ mmiri Juojärvi dị na East Finland wusiri ite ụrọ na arịa esi nri na asbestos mineral anthophyllite (lee Asbestos ceramic)
Otu n'ime nkọwa mbụ nke ihe nwere ike ịbụ asbestos dị na Theophrastus, On Stones, site na gburugburu 300 BC, ọ bụ ezie na a jụrụ ajụjụ a njirimara

Na Grik nke oge a na nke oge ochie, aha a na akpọkarị maka ihe a maara n'asụsụ bekee dị ka 'asbestos' bụ amiantos ('adịghị emerụ emerụ', 'dị ọcha'), nke emegharịrị na French dị ka amiante na n'ime Spanish na Portuguese dị ka amianto
N'asụsụ Grik ọgbara ọhụrụ, okwu a bụ ἀσβεστος ma ọ bụ ασβέστης na eguzo mgbe niile na naanị maka lime
Okwu asbestos bụ nke onye Rom na ahụ maka ihe okike si n'aka Pliny the Elder dere na narị afọ mbụ Natural History na ojiji o ji okwu asbestinon, nke pụtara 'enweghị ike imenyụ'
Ọ bụ ezie na a na ekwukarị na Pliny ma ọ bụ nwa nwanne ya Pliny nke Nta na amata mmetụta dị njọ nke asbestos na ụmụ mmadụ, nyocha nke isi mmalite na egosi na ọ nweghị nkwado maka nkwupụta ọ bụla
Athanasius na Alexandria, Egypt n'ihe dị ka 318 AD dere, sị, 'Akụkụ nke ọkụ ga ere ọkụ
Ya mere, ka e were ya na e nwere ihe dị ka asbestos India bụ nke a na ekwu na ọ bụ, nke na atụghị egwu na a ga ere ya ọkụ, kama kama nke ahụ
gosipụtara enweghị ike nke ọkụ ahụ site n'igosi na ya enweghị ike ire ere
Ọ bụrụ na onye ọ bụla nwere obi abụọ na nke a bụ eziokwu, naanị ihe ọ ga eme bụ itinye onwe ya n'ihe a na ekwu ma metụ ọkụ ahụ aka'
Ndị Peshia bara ọgaranya tụrụ ndị ọbịa n’anya site n’ihi ákwà ọcha site n’ikpughe ya n’ọkụ
Dịka ọmụmaatụ, dịka Tabari siri kwuo, otu n'ime ihe na achọsi ike nke Khosrow II Parviz, nnukwu eze Sassanian (r
590-628), bụ akwa akwa (Persian منديل) nke ọ na ehichapụ nanị site n'ịtụba ya n'ọkụ
Ekwenyere na ọ bụ asbestos a na ebubata n'okpukpu Hindu Kush mere akwa dị otú ahụ
Dị ka Biruni si kwuo n’akwụkwọ ya bụ́ Gems, a na akpọ ákwà ọ bụla e ji asbestos (Persian آذرشست, āzarshost) mee shostakeh (Persian شستكه)

Ụfọdụ ndị Peshia kwenyere na eriri ahụ bụ ajị anụ nke a na akpọ samandar (Persian سمندر), nke bi n'ọkụ wee nwụọ mgbe a kpughepụrụ ya na mmiri; Nke a bụ ebe nkwenye mbụ sitere na salamander nwere ike ịnagide ọkụ
Charlemagne, Eze Ukwu Rom Dị Nsọ nke mbụ (800–814), ka ekwuru na o nwere ákwà tebụl e ji asbestos mee
Marco Polo na akọ na egosila ya, n'ebe ọ na-akpọ Ghinghin talas, 'ezigbo akwara nke a na esi na ya mee ákwà nke anyị na akpọ salamander, nke a na apụghị ire ọkụ ma ọ bụrụ na a tụba ya n'ime ọkụ'

Ụfọdụ ndị ọkà mmụta ihe ochie kweere na ndị oge ochie na eji asbestos, bụ́ ebe ha na akpọ ozu ndị eze ha ọkụ iji chekwaa ntụ ha, nakwa ka a ghara ịgwakọta ntụ ya na osisi ma ọ bụ ihe ndị ọzọ na ere ọkụ nke a na ejikarị eme ozu ozu
Ndị ọzọ na ekwu na ndị oge ochie na eji asbestos eme wicks na adịgide adịgide maka ili ma ọ bụ oriọna ndị ọzọ
Ihe atụ ama ama bụ oriọna ọla edo asbestos lychnis, nke onye na ese ihe Callimachus mere maka Erechtheion
Na narị afọ ndị na adịbeghị anya, e ji asbestos mee ihe n'ezie
Ụlọ ọrụ asbestos buru ibu malitere n'etiti narị afọ nke 19
Mgbalị mbụ n'imepụta akwụkwọ asbestos na akwa na Italy malitere n'afọ ndị 1850 mana enweghị ihe ịga nke ọma n'ịmepụta ahịa maka ngwaahịa ndị dị otú ahụ
E gosipụtara ụdị asbestos nke Canada na London na 1862, e hiwere ụlọ ọrụ mbụ na England na Scotland iji jiri akụ a mee ihe
A na eji asbestos eme ihe na mbụ n'ichepụta yarn, onye ọrụ mmepụta ihe German bụ Louis Wertheim nakweere usoro a n'ụlọ ọrụ ya na Germany
Na 1871, e hiwere Patent Asbestos Manufacturing Company na Glasgow, na n'ime iri afọ ndị sochirinụ, mpaghara Clydebank ghọrọ ebe etiti maka ụlọ ọrụ na amalite
Ngwuputa ihe ngwuputa ihe malitere na Thetford hills, Quebec, site na 1870s
Sir William Edmond Logan bụ onye mbụ hụrụ nnukwu ego nke chrysotile n'ugwu n'ike ya dị ka onye isi nyocha Geological Survey nke Canada
E gosipụtara ihe atụ nke mineral ndị si n'ebe ahụ na London ma kpalite mmasị dị ukwuu
Na mmeghe nke Quebec Central Railway na 1876, ndị ọchụnta ego na egwupụta akụ dịka Andrew Stuart Johnson guzobere ụlọ ọrụ asbestos na mpaghara ahụ
Mpụta 50 ton nke ogbunigwe na 1878 ruru ihe karịrị tọn 10,000 na 1890 site na nnabata nke teknụzụ igwe na mmepụta gbasaa
Ruo ogologo oge, ogbunigwe asbestos kasị ukwuu n'ụwa bụ ogbunigwe Jeffrey nke dị n'obodo Asbestos, Quebec

Mmepụta Asbestos malitere na Urals nke Alaeze Ukwu Russia na 1880s, yana mpaghara Alpine nke Northern Italy na nguzobe na Turin nke Italo English Pure Asbestos Company na 1876, n'agbanyeghị na n'oge na adịghị anya nke a swamped site na nnukwu mmepụta ọkwa sitere na Canada
ogbunigwe
Ngwuputa eweputara na South Africa site na 1893 n'okpuru ikike nke onye ọchụnta ego Britain Francis Oates, onye isi ụlọ ọrụ De Beers
Ọ bụ na South Africa ka mmepụta nke amosite malitere na 1910

Ụlọ ọrụ asbestos nke United States malitere mmalite na 1858 mgbe a na egwupụta fibrous anthophyllite maka iji ya mee ihe dị ka ihe mkpuchi asbestos site n'aka Johns Company, onye bu ya ụzọ Johns Manville ugbu a, n'ebe a na agbari agbawa
na Ward's Hill na Staten Island, New York
Mmepụta US malitere nke ọma na 1899 site na nchọpụta nnukwu ego na Belvidere Mountain

Ojiji nke asbestos bịara na agbasawanye na njedebe nke narị afọ nke 19 mgbe ngwa ya dị iche iche gụnyere ihe mkpuchi ọkụ, ihe, brik, ọkpọkọ na simenti ọkụ, okpomọkụ, ọkụ, na gaskets na eguzogide acid, mkpuchi ọkpọkọ, mkpuchi ụlọ
, mgbidi akọrọ na adịghị ọkụ, ala ala, mkpuchi ụlọ, arịa ụlọ ahịhịa, na ngwakọta nkwonkwo nkụ
Na 2011, a kọrọ na ihe karịrị 50% nke ụlọ UK ka nwere asbestos, n'agbanyeghị mmachibido iwu nke ngwaahịa asbestos afọ ole na ole gara aga

Na Japan, karịsịa mgbe Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ gasịrị, a na eji asbestos na emepụta ammonium sulfate maka nzube nke mmepụta osikapa, fesa n'elu ụlọ, ọkpụkpụ ígwè, na mgbidi nke ụgbọ okporo ígwè na ụlọ (n'oge 1960), ma jiri ya rụọ ọrụ ike
ihe kpatara ya
Mmepụta nke asbestos na Japan ruru ọnụ ọgụgụ kasị elu na 1974 wee gafere na mgbada ruo ihe dị ka 1990 mgbe mmepụta malitere ibelata nke ukwuu
Montague Murray kwuru mmetụta na adịghị mma nke asbestos
Ọnwụ mbụ e dekọrọ gbasara asbestos bụ na 1906
Na mmalite 1900s, ndị nchọpụta malitere ịhụ ọnụ ọgụgụ buru ibu nke ọnwụ n'oge na nsogbu ngụgụ na obodo asbestos mining

Ọ bụ Murray mere ọmụmụ ihe mbụ dị otú ahụ na Charing Cross Hospital, London, na 1900, bụ́ nke nnyocha e mere n’afọ nwụsịrị, chọpụtara akara asbestos n’akpa ume nke otu nwa okorobịa nwụrụ n’ihi fibrosis akpa ume mgbe ọ rụsịrị ọrụ afọ 14 na akwa asbestos
ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe
Adelaide Anderson, Onye Na enyocha Ụlọ Ọrụ Na Britain, tinyere asbestos ná ndepụta nke ihe ndị na emerụ ahụ ụlọ ọrụ na 1902
E mere nchọpụta yiri nke ahụ na France na 1906 na Ịtali na 1908
N'ihi akwụkwọ Cooke, nzuko omeiwu nyere ọrụ nyocha banyere mmetụta nke uzuzu asbestos site n'aka E
Merewether, Onye nyocha ahụike nke ụlọ ọrụ, na CW
Price, onye nyocha ụlọ ọrụ na onye ọsụ ụzọ nke nlekota na njikwa uzuzu
Akuko ha na esote, Ihe Omume nke Fibrosis Pulmonary & Mmetụta Ndị Ọzọ Pulmonary na Asbestos Workers, ka e gosipụtara n'ụlọ omeiwu na 24 March 1930
O kwubiri na mmepe nke asbestosis bụ ihe na enweghị mgbagha jikọtara ya na ogologo oge inhalation nke asbestos ájá, na gụnyere ọmụmụ ahụike mbụ nke ahụike
Ndị ọrụ asbestos, nke chọpụtara na 66% nke ndị na arụrụ ọrụ ruo afọ 20 ma ọ bụ karịa na ata ahụhụ site na asbestosis
Iwu ndị a na achịkwa ikuku ikuku ma mee ka asbestosis bụrụ ọrịa na enweghị ngọpụ nke metụtara ọrụ
Okwu ahụ mesothelioma bụ nke mbụ e ji mee ihe na akwụkwọ ahụike na 1931; Nkwekọrịta ya na asbestos bụ nke mbụ achọpụtara oge ụfọdụ na 1940s
Iwu yiri nke ahụ sochiri na US
ihe dị ka afọ iri ka e mesịrị
Ihe dị ka 100,000 ndị mmadụ na United States anwụọla, ma ọ bụ na arịa ọrịa na egbu egbu, site na mkpughe asbestos metụtara iwu ụgbọ mmiri
Na mpaghara okporo ụzọ Hampton, ebe a na ewu ụgbọ mmiri, ihe omume mesothelioma ji okpukpu asaa karịa ọnụego mba
A na eji ọtụtụ puku tọn asbestos mee ihe n'ụgbọ mmiri Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ kpuchiri ọkpọkọ, ọkụ ọkụ, injin uzuoku, na turbines
Enwere ihe dị ka nde 43 ndị ọrụ ụgbọ mmiri na United States n'oge agha; maka ndị ọrụ 1,000 ọ bụla, ihe dị ka mmadụ 14 nwụrụ n'ihi mesothelioma na ọnụ ọgụgụ amaghị ama nwụrụ n'ihi asbestosis
A katọrọ gọọmentị United States na ụlọ ọrụ asbestos maka emeghị ngwa ngwa iji gwa ọha na eze ihe egwu yana ibelata mgbasa ozi ọha
N'ọgwụgwụ 1970s, akwụkwọ ụlọikpe gosipụtara na ndị ọrụ ụlọ ọrụ asbestos maara banyere ihe ize ndụ asbestos kemgbe 1930 wee zoo ha n'ihu ọha
N'Australia, a na eji asbestos eme ihe n'ọtụtụ ebe n'ihe owuwu na ụlọ ọrụ ndị ọzọ n'etiti 1946 na 1980
Site na 1970s, e nwere nchegbu na arịwanye elu banyere ihe ize ndụ nke asbestos, e wepụrụ iji ya mee ihe, na egwupụta akụ na akwụsị na 1983
Iji asbestos eme ihe bụ
ewepụrụ na 1989 wee machibido ya kpam kpam na Disemba 2003
Ihe ize ndụ nke asbestos bụzi nke amara nke ọma na Australia, enwerekwa enyemaka na nkwado maka ndị na arịa asbestosis ma ọ bụ mesothelioma
Mineral serpentine nwere mpempe akwụkwọ ma ọ bụ ihe nhazi
Chrysotile (nke a na akpọkarị asbestos ọcha) bụ naanị ịnweta asbestos n'ime otu agwọ
Na United States, chrysotile bụ ụdị asbestos a na ejikarị eme ihe
Dị ka US Environmental Protection Agency (EPA) Asbestos Building Inspectors Manual si kwuo, chrysotile bụ ihe dịka 95% nke asbestos dị na ụlọ ndị dị na United States
Chrysotile na adịkarị na ngwaahịa na ihe dị iche iche, gụnyere
Na European Union na Australia, amachibidoro ya dị ka ihe ize ndụ ahụike ma anaghịzi eji ya eme ihe
Amphiboles gụnyere amosite (aja aja asbestos) na crocidolite (acha anụnụ anụnụ asbestos) na ejibu na ọtụtụ ngwaahịa ruo mmalite 1980s
Tremolite asbestos mejupụtara ihe na emerụ emerụ nke ọtụtụ ma ọ bụrụ na ọ bụghị ihe niile chrysotile na emekarị
A machibidoro iji ụdị asbestos niile na otu amphibole iwu n'ọtụtụ ebe ọdịda anyanwụ ụwa n'etiti afọ 1980, yana na Japan ka ọ na erule 1995
Ụfọdụ ngwaahịa ndị gụnyere amphibole ụdị asbestos gụnyere ihe ndị a
Onye na emepụta sịga Lorillard ( ga nke Kent) jiri crocidolite asbestos na nzacha 'Micronite' ya site na 1952 ruo 1956
Ọ bụ ezie na a na ejikarị eriri asbestos chrysotile eme ihe na breeki ụgbọala, akpụkpọ ụkwụ, na diski clutch, ihe ndị na emerụ emerụ nke amphiboles nọ

Kemgbe ihe dị ka n'etiti 1990s, a na emepụta paịlị breeki, ọhụrụ ma ọ bụ dochie anya kama iji akwa seramiiki, carbon, metallic, na aramid fiber (Twaron ma ọ bụ Kevlar otu ihe a na eji na akwa mkpuchi mgbo)
Ejiri asbestos mee snow ekeresimesi arụrụ arụ, nke a maara dị ka ìgwè atụrụ

A na-eji ya mee ihe dị ka mmetụta na fim gụnyere Ọkachamara nke Oz na ihe ngosi windo ụlọ ahịa, a na erekwa ya maka iji ya n'ụlọ ndị mmadụ n'okpuru aha ndị gụnyere 'Ọcha ọcha', 'Snow Drift' na 'White Magic'
Amachibidoro iji asbestos eme ihe owuwu ọhụrụ maka ahụike na nchekwa n'ọtụtụ mba ma ọ bụ mpaghara mepere emepe, gụnyere European Union, United Kingdom, Australia, Hong Kong, Japan, na New Zealand
Ihe dị ịrịba ama bụ United States, ebe a na-aga n'ihu na eji asbestos eme ihe dị ka pipụ simenti asbestos

Ụlọ ikpe Circuit nke ise gbochiri EPA ka ọ machibido asbestos na 1991 n'ihi na nchọpụta EPA gosiri na mmachibido iwu ahụ ga efu n'etiti US $ 450 na 800 nde ebe ọ bụ naanị na azọpụta ndụ 200 n'ime oge 13 afọ, yana na EPA enyeghị ihe akaebe zuru oke maka ya
nchekwa nke ngwaahịa ọzọ
Ruo n'etiti 1980s, a na eji obere asbestos na acha ọcha mee ihe na Artex, ihe eji achọ mma, Otú ọ dị, ụfọdụ n'ime ndị na ebubata ụdị ụdị Artex ka na agbakwunye asbestos ọcha ruo 1999
Tupu mmachibido iwu ahụ, a na eji asbestos eme ihe na ụlọ ọrụ ihe owuwu n'ọtụtụ puku ihe
A na ewere ụfọdụ dị ka ihe dị ize ndụ karịa ndị ọzọ n'ihi oke asbestos na ọdịdị dị nro nke ihe ahụ
A na eche na mkpuchi fesa, mkpuchi ọkpọkọ, na Asbestos Insulating Board (AIB) bụ ihe kachasị dị ize ndụ n'ihi nnukwu ọdịnaya asbestos na ọdịdị na adịghị mma
Ọtụtụ ụlọ ochie ndị e wuru tupu ngwụcha afọ 1990 nwere asbestos
Na United States, enwere opekata mpe maka nyocha asbestos dịka ọkọlọtọ ASTM E 2356 18 kọwara

Na UK, Health and Safety Executive enyela ntụzịaka a na akpọ HSG264 na akọwa etu ekwesịrị isi mechaa nyocha ọ bụ ezie na enwere ike iji ụzọ ndị ọzọ ma ọ bụrụ na ha nwere ike igosi na ha erutela iwu site n'ụzọ ndị ọzọ
EPA na agụnye ụfọdụ, ma ọ bụghị ihe niile, ụlọ ọrụ asbestos merụrụ na ndepụta Superfund National Priorities List (NPL)
Nrụzigharị na ịkwatu ụlọ ndị asbestos merụrụ bụ n'okpuru Iwu EPA NESHAP na OSHA
Asbestos abụghị ihe kpuchiri ekpuchi n'okpuru nchebe onye zụrụ ahịa CERCLA
Na UK, njikwa nke Asbestos Regulations 2006 kpuchiri mwepụ na mkpofu asbestos na ihe ndị nwere ya
oriri asbestos ruru ọnụ ọgụgụ kasị elu nke tọn 804,000 na 1973; Ọchịchọ asbestos ụwa kacha elu na 1977, ebe mba 25 na emepụta ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ nde metric ton 48 kwa afọ
N'ụlọ ochie (dịka ndị e wuru tupu 1999 na UK, tupu amachibido asbestos ọcha), asbestos ka nwere ike ịdị na mpaghara ụfọdụ
Ịmara ebe asbestos nọ na ebelata ohere nke ịkpasu asbestos
Mwepụ ihe ndị na ewu ụlọ asbestos nwekwara ike wepụ ihe nchebe ọkụ ha na enye, ya mere a na achọ ihe nchebe ọkụ maka nchebe ọkụ kwesịrị ekwesị nke asbestos nyere na mbụ
Mba ụfọdụ, dị ka India, Indonesia, China, Russia, na Brazil, anọgidewo na eji asbestos eme ihe n'ebe nile
Ihe kachasị ewu ewu bụ akwa asbestos ciment ma ọ bụ 'A/C sheets' maka mkpuchi ụlọ na akụkụ akụkụ
Ọtụtụ nde ụlọ, ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe, ụlọ akwụkwọ ma ọ bụ ụlọ mposi, na ebe nchekwa ka na eji asbestos eme ihe
Ịcha mpempe akwụkwọ ndị a ka ha nha na mkpọpu oghere iji nweta bolts 'J' iji nyere aka dobe mpempe akwụkwọ ahụ na nhazi ụlọ na eme na saịtị
Enwebeghị nnukwu mgbanwe na mmepụta na ojiji nke akwụkwọ A/C na mba ndị ka na emepe emepe na esochi mmachi zuru ebe niile na mba ndị mepere emepe
Ka Ụlọ Ọrụ Azụmahịa Ụwa nke New York City dara na esochi mwakpo Septemba 11, Lower Manhattan bụ ihe mkpuchi na ngwakọta nke irighiri ihe ụlọ na ihe ndị na ere ọkụ

Ngwakọta dị mgbagwoju anya a mere ka a na enwe nchegbu na ọtụtụ puku ndị bi na ndị ọrụ nọ n'ógbè ahụ ga enweta ihe ize ndụ ndị a ma ama na ikuku na uzuzu, dị ka asbestos, lead, fibers glass, na kọmpụta a kpụrụ akpụ
A na eche na a tọhapụrụ ihe karịrị tọn 1,000 asbestos n'ikuku ka e bibiri ụlọ ndị ahụ
A na eche na ikuru ngwakọta nke asbestos na ihe ndị ọzọ na egbu egbu na ejikọta ọnụ ọgụgụ ọnwụ na enweghị atụ sitere na ọrịa kansa nke ndị ọrụ ọrụ mberede kemgbe ọdachi ahụ
A na eche na puku kwuru puku ndị ọzọ nọ n'ihe ize ndụ nke ịmalite ịrịa ọrịa kansa n'ihi mkpughe a na ndị nwụrụ ugbu a bụ naanị 'ọnụ nke iceberg

Na Mee 2002, ka EPA, ụlọ ọrụ gọọmenti etiti ndị ọzọ, New York City, na steeti New York, na eduzi ọtụtụ mkpocha, nchịkọta uzuzu na nlekota ikuku, n'èzí, New York City rịọrọ enyemaka gọọmenti etiti iji hichaa na nwalee ebe obibi n'ime ụlọ
gburugburu ebe World Trade Center maka ikuku asbestos
Vermiculite bụ hydrated laminar magnesium aluminom iron silicate nke yiri mica
Enwere ike iji ya maka ọtụtụ ngwa ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe ma jiri ya mee ihe dị ka mkpuchi
A na eji obere asbestos metọọ ụfọdụ nkwụnye ego nke vermiculite

Otu ogbunigwe vermiculite nke WR Grace na ụlọ ọrụ dị na Libby na arụ, Montana kpugheere ndị ọrụ na ndị bi n'ime obodo n'ihe egwu site n'ịgbapụta vermiculite merutere na asbestos, nke na abụkarị richterite, winchite, actinolite ma ọ bụ tremolite
A na eji Vermiculite emeru asbestos sitere na ogbunigwe Libby dị ka ihe mkpuchi n'ụlọ obibi na nke azụmahịa site na Canada na United States
Grace na ụlọ ọrụ vermiculite rụrụ arụ na ere ahịa dị ka Zonolite mana ejirikwa ya na ngwaahịa ndị a na efesa dị ka Monokote
Na 1999, EPA malitere mbọ mkpocha na Libby ma ugbu a mpaghara ahụ bụ ebe mkpocha Superfund
EPA ekpebiela na a na ahapụ asbestos na emerụ ahụ site na ogbunigwe ahụ yana site na mmemme ndị ọzọ na akpaghasị ala na mpaghara ahụ
Enwere ike ime Talc mgbe ụfọdụ site na asbestos n'ihi ịdị nso nke asbestos ore (na emekarị tremolite) na nkwụnye ego talc n'okpuru ala
Ka ọ na erule 1973, iwu gọọmenti etiti US chọrọ ka ngwaahịa talc niile ghara asbestos, ma taa enwere njikwa mma na mmepụta nke ngwaahịa talc
Ikewapụta talc ịchọ mma ọkwa (dịka talcum ntụ ntụ) sitere na ọkwa ọkwa ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe (nke a na ejikarị na ngwaahịa esemokwu) ewepụla okwu a maka ndị na azụ ahịa

N'afọ 2000, ule n'ụlọ nyocha nyocha nke asbestos gbaara agbaze hụrụ ụdị tremolite nke amphibole asbestos nke a na ahụbu n'ụdị atọ n'ime asatọ a ma ama nke crayons ụmụaka bụ nke sitere na talc Crayola, Prang, na RoseArt

Na Crayola crayons, ule ahụ chọpụtara ọkwa asbestos gburugburu 005% na Carnation Pink na 286% na Orchid; na Prang crayons, nso nso sitere na 03% na Periwinkle ruo 054% na Yellow; na Rose Art crayons, o sitere na 003% na Brown ruo 120% na oroma
N'ozuzu, ụdị crayons 32 dị iche iche sitere na ụdị ndị a nwere ihe karịrị ọnụọgụ asbestos, yana asatọ ndị ọzọ nwere ọnụọgụ ọnụọgụ

Ụlọ ọrụ Art na Creative Materials Institute, otu ndị na azụ ahịa nke nwalere nchekwa nke crayons n'aha ndị na eme ya, na ekwusi ike na nsonaazụ ule ahụ aghaghị ịbụ na ezighi ezi, n'agbanyeghị na ha mechara kwuo na ha anaghị anwale asbestos

Na May 2000, Crayola kwuru na nyocha nke Richard Lee, onye nyocha akụrụngwa nke anabatala akaebe ya n'aha ụlọ ọrụ asbestos n'ụlọ ikpe ihe karịrị ugboro 250, chọpụtara na crayons nwalere adịghị mma maka asbestos
N'agbanyeghị nke ahụ, na June 2000 Binney & Smith, onye na emepụta Crayola, na ndị ọzọ na emepụta kwetara ịkwụsị iji talc na ngwaahịa ha, ma gbanwee usoro ngwaahịa ha na United States

Ụlọ ọrụ na egwupụta akụ RT Vanderbilt Co nke Gouverneur, New York, bụ onye nyere ndị na-emepụta crayon talc, na ekwu na 'n'ókè anyị maara na nkwenye anyị' ọ dịtụbeghị mgbe ọ bụla ọrịa asbestos metụtara n'etiti ndị ọrụ ụlọ ọrụ ahụ
Otú ọ dị, akụkọ mgbasa ozi na ekwu na United States Mine Safety and Health Administration (MSHA) achọpụtala asbestos na talc anọ a nwalere na 2000
Onye enyemaka odeakwụkwọ maka nchekwa na ahụike m mechara degara onye nta akụkọ ozi, na ekwu na 'N'ezie, abbreviation
ND (anaghị achọpụta) na akụkọ ụlọ nyocha na egosi na ọ nweghị eriri asbestos achọtara n'ụdị nlele ahụ

Ọtụtụ ọmụmụ sitere na ndị na ahụ maka ịnweta mineral, ndị ọkà mmụta ihe ndị na ahụ maka mkpụrụ ndụ na ndị na egbu egbu n'etiti 1970 na 2000 achọpụtaghị ihe atụ nke asbestos na ngwaahịa talc ma ọ bụ ihe mgbaàmà nke ikpughe asbestos n'etiti ndị ọrụ na arụ ọrụ na talc, mana ọrụ ndị na adịbeghị anya ajụla nkwubi okwu ndị a na akwado 'otu' asbestos
ihe ize ndụ

Na 12 Julaị 2018, ndị juri Missouri nyere Johnson & Johnson iwu ka ha kwụọ nde $ 469 ijeri nye ụmụ nwanyị 22 boro ebubo ngwaahịa talc nke ụlọ ọrụ ahụ, gụnyere ntụ ntụ nwa ya, nwere asbestos wee mee ka ha nwee ọrịa kansa ovarian
EPA kọwapụtara ụdị ịnweta isii dị ka 'asbestos' gụnyere ndị nọ na klas agwọ na ndị nọ na klaasị amphibole
A maara ụdị ịnweta asbestos isii dị ka carcinogens mmadụ
Ihe ndị a na-ahụ anya bụ nke ọ bụla mejupụtara ọtụtụ nde 'fibrils' microscopic nke enwere ike ịhapụ site na abrasion na usoro ndị ọzọ
Eriri klas serpentine na akpụ akpụ
Chrysotile, CAS No
12001 29 5, bụ naanị asbestos nke a na ekewa dị ka eriri serpentine
A na enweta ya site na nkume serpentinite nke na emekarị n'ụwa nile
Usoro kemịkalụ ya nke ọma bụ Mg3(Si2O5)(OH)4
Chrysotile na apụta n'okpuru microscope dị ka eriri ọcha
A na eji Chrysotile eme ihe karịa ụdị ọ bụla ọzọ yana ihe dị ka pasent 95 nke asbestos dị na ụlọ dị na America
Chrysotile na agbanwe agbanwe karịa ụdị asbestos nke amphibole ma nwee ike ịgbanye ma kpaa ya ka ọ bụrụ akwa ákwà
Ihe a na ejikarị eme ihe bụ nchara simenti nke asbestos bụ isi maka ụlọ, ụlọ nkwakọba ihe, na ebe a na adọba ụgbọala
A pụkwara ịhụ ya na mpempe akwụkwọ ma ọ bụ ihe e ji ekpuchi elu ụlọ na mgbe ụfọdụ maka mgbidi na ala
Chrysotile abụrụla ihe na emekọ ihe ọnụ na ụfọdụ plasta
Emeela ọtụtụ ihe ndị ọzọ nwere chrysotile gụnyere breeki lining, ihe mgbochi ọkụ n'ime igbe fuse, mkpuchi ọkpọkọ, taịlị ala, shingle obibi, na gaskets maka akụrụngwa okpomọkụ dị elu
Amphibole klaasị eriri dị ka agịga
Amosite, crocidolite, tremolite, anthophyllite na actinolite bụ ndị otu amphibole
Amosite, CAS No

12172 73 5, nke a na akpọkarị asbestos agba aja aja, bụ aha ahia maka amphiboles nke sitere na usoro ngwọta siri ike nke cummingtonite grunerite, nke sitere na South Africa, nke a na akpọkarị acronym maka 'Asbestos Mines of South Africa'
Otu usoro e nyere maka amosite bụ
A na ahụ Amosite n'okpuru microscope dị ka eriri vitreous isi awọ na acha ọcha
A na achọta ya ugboro ugboro dị ka ihe na egbochi ọkụ na ngwaahịa mkpuchi ọkụ, bọọdụ mkpuchi asbestos na taịlị uko ụlọ
Crocidolite, CAS No
12001-28-4, nke a na akpọkarị asbestos na acha anụnụ anụnụ, bụ ụdị fibrous nke amphibole riebeckite, nke a na achọta na ndịda Africa, kamakwa na Australia na Bolivia
Otu usoro e nyere maka crocidolite bụ
A na ahụ Crocidolite n'okpuru microscope dị ka eriri na acha anụnụ anụnụ
Crocidolite na emekarị dị ka eriri friable dị nro
Asbestiform amphibole nwekwara ike ime dị ka eriri friable dị nro mana ụfọdụ ụdị dị ka amosite na adịkarị ogologo
Ụdị asbestos niile bụ fibrillar n'ihi na ha nwere eriri nwere obosara na erughị 1 micrometer na ùkwù nke nnukwu obosara
A na akpọkwa asbestos nwere eriri mara mma dị ka 'amianthus
mineral asbestos, dị ka tremolite asbestos, CAS No

77536-68-6 , ; actinolite asbestos, CAS Nke 77536-66-4, ; na anthophyllite asbestos, CAS Nke 77536-67-5 , ; a na ejikarị eme ihe na ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe mana a ka nwere ike ịhụ ya n'ụdị ihe owuwu na ihe mkpuchi ma jiri ya mee ihe na ngwaahịa ndị ahịa ole na ole
Ihe ndị ọzọ sitere n'okike nke asbestiform, dị ka Richterite, na winchite, agbanyeghị na ahazibeghị ya, ụfọdụ na ekwu na ha adịghị emerụ ahụ karịa tremolite, amosite, ma ọ bụ crocidolite
A na akpọ ha 'asbestiform' kama asbestos

Ọ bụ ezie na US Occupational Safety and Health Administration (OSHA) etinyeghị ha na ọkọlọtọ asbestos, NIOSH na American Thoracic Society akwadoro ha maka ntinye dị ka ihe edoziziri n'ihi na ha nwekwara ike ịdị ize ndụ nye ahụike
Akpụkpọ anụ ugwu' bụ okwu oge ochie maka mgbanwe, mpempe akwụkwọ dị ka usoro okike nke asbestiform mineral nke yiri akpụkpọ anụ
mineral ndị nwere asbestos mara na etolite akpụkpọ anụ ugwu gụnyere actinolite, sepiolite, na tremolite
Na 2017, a na egwupụta asbestos nde 13 n'ụwa niile
Russia bụ ndị kasị emepụta ihe nwere 53% nke ngụkọta ụwa, Kazakhstan (16%) sochiri, China (15%) na Brazil (115%)
Eshia na eri ihe dị ka 70% nke asbestos emepụtara n'ụwa yana China, India na Indonesia bụ ndị kacha azụ ahịa
N'afọ 2009, a na egwupụta ihe dị ka 9% nke asbestos nke ụwa na Canada
N'ọgwụgwụ 2011, ogbunigwe asbestos abụọ fọdụrụ na Canada, nke dị na Quebec, kwụsịrị ọrụ
N’ọnwa Septemba afọ 2012, gọọmenti Quebec kwụsịrị ịrụ ọrụ asbestos
Ọrịa ndị a na ahụkarị na ejikọta na mkpughe asbestos na adịghị ala ala bụ asbestosis (ụfụ nke ngụgụ n'ihi inhalation asbestos) na mesothelioma (cancer jikọtara asbestos)
Mesothelioma bụ ụdị ọrịa kansa na eme ihe ike ma na edugakarị na ndụ nke na erughị ọnwa 12 mgbe nyochachara ya
Amara ụdị asbestos ọ bụla na akpata nsogbu ahụike mmadụ na anụmanụ

A na ewere Amosite na crocidolite dị ka ụdị eriri asbestos dị ize ndụ; Otú ọ dị, chrysotile asbestos emewokwa ka etuto ahụ dị n'ime anụmanụ ma bụrụ ihe a ma ama na akpata asbestosis na mesothelioma na adịghị mma na ụmụ mmadụ, na mesothelioma achọpụtala na ndị mmadụ na arụ ọrụ na chrysotile, ndị òtù ezinụlọ nke ndị ọrụ ekpughere, na ndị bi nso bi nso
ụlọ ọrụ asbestos na mines

N'ime afọ 1980 na ọzọ na 1990s, ụlọ ọrụ asbestos tụrụ aro mgbe ụfọdụ na usoro ịme ciment asbestos nwere ike 'na ewepụ' asbestos, ma ọ bụ site na usoro kemịkal ma ọ bụ site n'ime ka simenti tinye aka na eriri ma gbanwee nha anụ ahụ; Nnyocha ndị sochirinụ gosiri na nke a abụghị eziokwu na simenti asbestos dịlarị ọtụtụ iri afọ, mgbe agbajiri agbaji, na ewepụta eriri asbestos yiri nke a na ahụ n'okike, na enweghị mgbanwe ọ bụla enwere ike ịchọpụta
A na ewere ikpughe na asbestos n'ụdị eriri dị ize ndụ mgbe niile
A na ewere iji, ma ọ bụ ikpughe na ihe ndị a na emegharị emegharị, ma ọ bụ ihe ma ọ bụ ọrụ nwere ike ime ka mwepụta nke eriri asbestos rụrụ arụ, bụ nnukwu ihe ize ndụ
N'ozuzu, ndị mmadụ na arịa ọrịa site na iku ume asbestos na ekpughere mgbe niile n'ọrụ ebe ha na arụ ọrụ ozugbo na ihe ahụ
Ụlọ ọrụ nchekwa na ahụike US (OSHA) nwere ụkpụrụ iji chebe ndị ọrụ pụọ n'ihe ize ndụ nke ikpughe na asbestos n'ebe ọrụ
Oke mkpughe maka asbestos bụ 01 fiber kwa cubic centimita nke ikuku dị ka nkezi oge awa asatọ, yana oke njem nlegharị anya nke 10 asbestos fibers kwa cubic centimita n'ime oge nkeji iri atọ
Gburugburu ụwa, mba na ókèala 66 (gụnyere ndị niile nọ na European Union) amachibidola iji asbestos
Akwụpụrụ maka obere ojiji na ụfọdụ obodo edepụtara; Agbanyeghị, obodo niile edepụtara ga abụrịrị machibidola iji ụdị asbestos niile
A machibidoro iji crocidolite (acha anụnụ anụnụ asbestos) na 1967, ebe ojiji nke amosite (aja aja asbestos) gara n'ihu na ụlọ ọrụ ihe owuwu ruo n'etiti afọ 1980
Emechara machibido ya iwu iwu ụlọ na 1989, n'agbanyeghị na ọ dị na gaskets na breeki lining ruo 31 Disemba 2003, na enweghị ike ibubata, jiri, ma ọ bụ megharịa ya
Asbestos ka na abụ nsogbu n'Australia
Abụọ n'ime ụlọ atọ dị n'Australia wuru n'etiti Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ na mmalite 1980 ka nwere asbestos

Ndị otu na anọchite anya ndị ọrụ e nyere ọrụ imegharị igbe igwe eletrik n'ụlọ kwuru na ndị ọrụ kwesịrị ịjụ ịrụ ọrụ a ruo mgbe enyochala igbe ndị ahụ maka asbestos, onye isi otu Council of Trade Unions (ACTU) kpọkuola gọọmentị ka ha mee ya
chebe ụmụ amaala ya site n'iwepụ obodo asbestos site na 2030
Ndị na-ejikwa ihe asbestos ga enwerịrị ikikere B Klas maka asbestos jikọtara ọnụ yana ikikere A klas maka asbestos friable
E wuru obodo Wittenoom, nke dị n'Ebe Ọdịda Anyanwụ Australia, gburugburu ebe a na egwupụta akụ asbestos (acha anụnụ anụnụ)
Obodo ahụ dum ka na emerụ emerụ ma mebiekwa ya, na enye ndị ọchịchị obodo ohere iwepu ntụnyere aka na Wittenoom na maapụ na akara okporo ụzọ
Dịka nke Disemba 31st 2018, ọ bụ iwu na akwadoghị ibubata, rụpụta, ree, ịzụ ahịa, ma ọ bụ jiri ngwaahịa emere na asbestos
Enwere mwepu maka iji ya na ụlọ ọrụ chloralkali, ndị agha, ụlọ ọrụ nuklia, yana maka mmịpụta magnesium site na nsị nsị asbestos
Nkpughe na ọtụtụ narị ndị ọrụ nwụrụ na Japan n'ime iri afọ ole na ole gara aga n'ihi ọrịa ndị metụtara asbestos kpalitere asịrị n'etiti afọ 2005

Tokyo nwere, na 1971, nyere iwu ka ụlọ ọrụ na ahụ maka asbestos iwu ka ha wụnye ikuku ventilashị na ịlele ahụike mgbe niile; Otú ọ dị, ndị ọchịchị Japan amachibidoghị crocidolite na amosite ruo 1995, na mmachibido iwu zuru oke na nke dị ole na ole na asbestos ka etinyere na 2006, na ewepụ ihe ndị fọdụrụ na March 2012 maka mmachibido iwu zuru oke
N'afọ 1984, amachibidoro ibubata asbestos raw (acha anụnụ anụnụ na aja aja) na New Zealand
N'afọ 2002 ka amachibidokwara ibubata chrysotile (ọcha) asbestos
N'afọ 2015, gọọmentị kwupụtara na a ga amachibido mbubata asbestos kpamkpam na oke oke (nke a na atụ anya na a ga etinye ya na akụkụ ndị na anọchi maka igwe ochie) nke a ga enyocha ya n'otu n'otu
N'ebe ugwu ọdịda anyanwụ nke Nelson, na Ndagwurugwu Takaka Upper, bụ naanị m asbestos na egbute na New Zealand
A na egwupụta Chrysotile dị obere ebe a site na 1908 ruo 1917 mana ọ bụ naanị 100 tọn ka a na asacha wee wepụ ya
Atụmatụ ike ọhụrụ nyere ọrụ aka imeghari ma n'etiti 1940 na 1949, ụlọ ọrụ Hume na egwupụta tọn 40 kwa ọnwa
Nke a gara n'ihu ruo n'afọ 1964, mgbe, n'ihi ogologo ogologo nke eriri ya, njedebe azụmahịa dị ntakịrị manyere ngwungwu ahụ kwụsị
Na Mee 1997, amachibidoro imepụta na iji crocidolite na amosite, nke a na akpọkarị asbestos na acha anụnụ anụnụ na aja aja, na South Korea

Na Jenụwarị 2009, mmachibido iwu zuru oke na ụdị asbestos niile mere mgbe gọọmentị machibidoro nrụpụta, mbubata, ire ere, nchekwa, mbufe ma ọ bụ iji asbestos ma ọ bụ ihe ọ bụla nwere ihe karịrị 01% nke asbestos

N'afọ 2011, Saụt Koria ghọrọ mba nke isii n'ụwa nyere iwu iwu enyemaka mmerụaka nke asbestos, bụ́ nke nyere nwa amaala Korea ọ bụla ikike nlekọta ahụike n'efu oge ndụ yana ego gọọmentị na enweta kwa ọnwa ma ọ bụrụ na a chọpụta ya na ọ nwere ọrịa asbestos
Na United Kingdom, amachibidoro ihe asbestos na acha anụnụ anụnụ na agba aja aja na 1985 ka amachibidoro mbubata, ire, na ijigharị asbestos ọcha na 1999
Njikwa 2012 nke Asbestos Regulations, na emelite na dochie iwu 2006 gara aga, kwuru na ndị nwe ya

nke ụlọ ndị na abụghị nke ụlọ (dịka ọmụmaatụ, ụlọ ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ) nwere 'ọrụ ijikwa' asbestos n'ime ụlọ ahụ site n'ime ka onwe ha mara ọnụnọ ya na ijide n'aka na ihe ahụ adịghị njọ, wepụ ya ma ọ bụrụ na ọ dị mkpa
Ndị na ewe ọrụ, dịka ọmụmaatụ
Ndị ụlọ ọrụ na ewu ụlọ, ndị ndị ọrụ ha nwere ike ịbanye na asbestos ga enyerịrị ndị ọrụ ha ọzụzụ asbestos kwa afọ
United States ka bụ otu n'ime mba ole na ole mepere emepe na amachibidoghị asbestos kpamkpam
Ụfọdụ ndị ọrụ America na osisi chlorine na abịakarị na kọntaktị ahụ, OSHA na ewepụkwa osisi ndị a na nyocha nke enweghị usoro site na Mmemme Nchekwa afọ ofufo

Na 1989 United States Environmental Protection Agency (EPA) nyere Asbestos Ban and Phase out Rule mana na 1991, ndị na akwado ụlọ ọrụ asbestos gbara aka ma kwatuo mmachibido iwu ahụ n'okwu ikpe dị ịrịba ama Corrosion Proof Fittings v
the Environmental Protection Agency
Ọ bụ ezie na ikpe ahụ butere ọtụtụ mmeri dị nta maka iwu asbestos, EPA emechabeghị akwụsị iji asbestos
Mkpebi ahụ hapụrụ ọtụtụ ngwaahịa ndị ahịa ka nwere ike ịnwe ọnụọgụ asbestos n'ụzọ iwu
Agbanyeghị, amachibidoro ụdị isii nke ngwaahịa asbestos nwere akwụkwọ corrugated, rollboard, akwụkwọ azụmahịa, akwụkwọ ọpụrụiche, mmetụta ala ala na ojiji asbestos ọhụrụ ọ bụla
Iwu nke ikuku dị ọcha machibidokwara mkpuchi mkpuchi asbestos na mkpuchi asbestos na ihe ndị dị ka igwe ọkụ na tankị mmiri ọkụ, yana ihe ndị nwere asbestos nwere ihe na efesa
Iwu nchekwa ngwaahịa ndị ahịa machibidoro asbestos n'ime ọkụ ọkụ arụrụ arụ na ogige mgbochi mgbidi
Nlekọta nri na ọgwụ amachibidoro ihe nzacha nwere asbestos n'ichepụta, nhazi, na mbukota ọgwụ
Ebe ọ bụ na 1970, n'ihi ụbara iwu asbestos na Europe na na United States, e nwere nnukwu nnyefe nke ụlọ ọrụ na emepụta asbestos na Mexico

A na eji asbestos n'ọtụtụ ngwaahịa mkpuchi ụlọ, igwe ọkụ ọkụ, ọkpọkọ, breeki, na waya, nke ihe karịrị ụlọ ọrụ Mexico 2,000 mepụtara, ọtụtụ n'ime ha bụ ndị enyemaka ma ọ bụ ndị na arụ ọrụ nke ụlọ ọrụ US, na erekwa na America dum
Na 2000, 58% nke Mexico asbestos nwere mbupụ gara United States, na 40% na mba Central America na Cuba
Otú ọ dị, master plan (maka ihe owuwu ihe mmepe na 2020 na nghazi ka 2030 nke Ministry of Construction na Gọọmenti na January 2014) ka na atụ aro na aga n'ihu na eji chrysotile ruo ogologo oge
Emepụtara ihe mkpuchi fiberglass na 1938 ma ugbu a bụ ụdị ihe mkpuchi a na ejikarị eme ihe
A na akpọkwa nchekwa nke ihe a ajụjụ n'ihi myirịta na nhazi ihe
Otú ọ dị, Ụlọ Ọrụ Mba Nile Maka Nnyocha Ọrịa Cancer wepụrụ fiberglass site na ndepụta nke ọrịa cancer mmadụ nwere ike ime na 2001
Otu akwụkwọ nyocha sayensị sitere na 2011 kwuru na data ọrịa na efe efe adịghị ekwekọ ma kwubie na mkpebi IARC iji weda ikike carcinogenic nke fiberglass dị irè, ọ bụ ezie na nke a bụ eziokwu
Nkwekọrịta nyocha kwadoro ọmụmụ ihe site na Association North America Insulation Manufacturer's Association
N'afọ 1978, Bal Dixit chepụtara akwa fiberglass nke ukwuu, nke a na akpọ Zetex
Uwe a dị ọkụ karịa asbestos mana ọ na enye otu nnukwu, ọkpụrụkpụ, aka, mmetụta, na nguzogide abrasion dị ka asbestos
A na edobe fiberglass ahụ iji kpochapụ ụfọdụ nsogbu ndị na enwe na fiberglass na ebute, dị ka nkwụsị nke na adịghị mma na ike adịghị ike
Na Europe, ajị ịnweta na ajị iko bụ isi ihe mkpuchi n'ime ụlọ
Ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ ndị na emepụta ngwaahịa asbestos ciment bụ ndị e ji eriri asbestos gbasie ike emepụtala ngwaahịa na ejikọta eriri organic
A maara otu ngwaahịa dị otú ahụ dị ka 'Eternit' na 'Everite' ọzọ na ejizi eriri 'Nutec' nke nwere eriri organic, simenti portland na silica
Eriri osisi nke jikọtara ciment bụ ihe ọzọ dochie ya
A na eji eriri nkume eme ihe na gaskets na ihe esemokwu
Ihe ọzọ nwere ike ime bụ polybenzimidazole ma ọ bụ eriri PBI
Fibre Polybenzimidazole bụ eriri sịntetik nwere ebe mgbaze dị elu nke 760 °C (1,400 °F) na-adịghịkwa ere ọkụ
N'ihi nkwụsi ike ọkụ ya na kemịkalụ pụrụiche, ngalaba mgbanyụ ọkụ na ụlọ ọrụ oghere na ejikarị ya
N'ọtụtụ mba mepere emepe, a na ekpochapụ asbestos dị ka ihe mkpofu dị ize ndụ n'ebe a na ekpofu ahịhịa

Nwutu nke ụlọ nwere nnukwu ihe ndị sitere na asbestos na ebute nsogbu pụrụ iche nye ndị na ewu ụlọ na ndị na emepụta ihe onwunwe a na arụkarị ụlọ ndị dị otú ahụ n'otu n'otu n'otu n'otu, ma ọ bụ na ejisi ike wepụ asbestos tupu e nwee ike iji ígwè ma ọ bụ ihe mgbawa mebie ihe owuwu ahụ
pụtara

Otu ihe atụ dị otú ahụ bụ Red Road Flats dị na Glasgow, Scotland bụ ndị ji ọtụtụ bọọdụ ciment asbestos mee ihe maka mgbidi mgbidi ụkpụrụ ahụike na nchekwa nke Britain kwuru na a ga ewepụ ihe asbestos n'ụgbọ ala ndị a na emegharị emegharị ma buru ya gaa ebe a na ekpofu ihe na nke kwesịrị ekwesị
ikike ịnakwere asbestos, site n'ụzọ akwadoro, n'oge ụfọdụ nke ụbọchị
Na United States, EPA na achịkwa mwepụ na mkpofu asbestos nke ọma
Ụlọ ọrụ na ewepụ asbestos ga agbasorịrị ikikere EPA
A na akpọ ụlọ ọrụ ndị a ndị ọrụ nkwekọrịta asbestos nwere ikikere EPA
Oge ọ bụla otu n'ime ndị ọrụ nkwekọrịta asbestos a na arụ ọrụ, onye na ahụ maka ule ga eme nyocha siri ike iji hụ na e wepụrụ asbestos kpamkpam
Enwere ike ibibi asbestos site na ọkụ ọkụ dị oke ọkụ yana usoro ịgbaze plasma
Usoro nke ire ere ọkụ na 1,000–1,250 °C (1,800–2,300 °F) na emepụta ngwakọta nke mkpofu silicon na adịghị ize ndụ, yana na okpomọkụ karịrị 1,250 °C (2,300 °F) ọ na emepụta enyo silicate
Enwere ike iji ọgwụgwọ ikuku microwave mee ihe n'usoro nrụpụta ụlọ ọrụ iji gbanwee asbestos na asbestos nwere ihe mkpofu ka ọ bụrụ taịlị nkume poselin, taịlị mgbidi nwere otu ọkụ, na brik seramiiki
Nchikota oxalic acid na ultrasound zuru oke na emebi eriri asbestos chrysotile

Asbestos Hazard Emergency Response Act (AHERA) bụ iwu US nke chọrọ ka EPA mepụta ụkpụrụ gbásárá ụlọ ọrụ agụmakwụkwọ mpaghara nyochaa ụlọ akwụkwọ màkà ihe owuwu nwéré asbestos, kwadebe atụmatụ njikwa asbestos
A na-etinye AHERA n'ọrụ n'okpuru Iwu Nchịkwa Ihe Na-egbu Mgbasa nke afọ 1986
AHERA chọrọ ka EPA mepụta atụmatụ màkà steeti màkà ikikere ndị na-eme nyocha asbestos na ọrụ mgbazi n'ụlọ akwụkwọ
A na-echebe ndị na-eme mkpesa pụọ na mmegwara site na iwu ahụ

A na-ahụ ya na Cuba

Ọ sọrọ mpi women's 4 × 400 metres relay na 1980 Summer Olympics
Aha Asem (nke a na-akpọkwa Aasem, Assem, Asim Arabic) bụ aha nwoke sitere na Arabic, nke pụtara 'onye nzọpụta, onye nchebe, onye nche, onye nche

Asha-Rose Mtengeti Migiro (amụrụ na 9 Julaị 1956) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na onye nnọchi anya mba Tanzania bụ osote odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke United Nations site na 2007 ruo 2012
A họpụtara ya dị ka onye nnọchi anya pụrụ iche nke odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke United Nations maka HIV / AIDS na Africa na 13 Julaị 2012
A mụrụ ya na Songea na Ruvuma Region, Migiro malitere agụmakwụkwọ ya na Mnazi Mmoja Primary School na 1963
O mechara gaa Korogwe Primary School, Weruweru Secondary School, na, n'ikpeazụ, Korogwe Secondary School
Ọ nwetara LL yaB na LLM si Mahadum Dar es Salaam na PhD ya na 1992 site na Mahadum Konstanz na Germany
Tupu ọ banye na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, ọ bụ onye nkuzi dị elu na Faculty of Law na Mahadum Dar es Salaam (UDSM)
Ọ bụ onye isi nke Ngalaba Iwu na Iwu Nchịkwa site na 1992 ruo 1994 na Ngalaba Iwu Obodo na Iwu Mpụ site na 1994 ruo 1997
Migiro jere ozi dị ka onye otu ngalaba nke Chama Cha Mapinduzi site na 1994 ruo 2000, nakwa dị ka onye so na Regional Executive Council site na 2000 ruo 2005
Site na 2000 ruo 2006, ọ bụ Minista na-ahụ maka mmepe obodo, okike na ihe gbasara ụmụaka

Ọ ghọrọ Minista na-ahụ maka ihe gbasara mba ofesi na imekọ ihe ọnụ mba ụwa na 4 Jenụwarị 2006, mgbe minista na-ekwu maka mba ofesi, Jakaya Kikwete, onye a họpụtara dịka onye isi ala, họpụtara ndị ọrụ ọhụrụ ya
Ọ bụ nwanyị mbụ nọ n'ọkwa ahụ kemgbe nnwere onwe nke United Republic of Tanzania

Mgbe ọ nọ n'ọkwa minista mba ọzọ, Migiro bụ onye isi oche nke nzukọ ndị Minista nke Nzukọ Mba Nile nke Great Lakes Region na Southern African Development Community(SADC) Kọmitii Minista nke Organ on Politics, Defense and Security Cooperation
Ọ haziri enyemaka SADC maka ntuli aka na Democratic Republic of the Congo (DRC), Zambia na Madagascar
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka onye isi oche nke United Nations Security Council n'oge arụmụka ihu ọha ya banyere udo, nchekwa na mmepe na mpaghara Great Lakes
Ka ọ na-eje ozi dị ka minista mba ọzọ, Migiro sonyeere onye bụbu onye isi ala Comoros, Azali Assoumani, n'oge njem nke onye nnọchi anya mba ya ọhụrụ na Tanzania ma nyochaa ụlọ ọgwụ Tanzania
Dị ka ndị ọrụ United States si kwuo, Condoleezza Rice, odeakwụkwọ nke mba America, 'maara ya nke ọma'
Kikwete họpụtara Bernard Membe ka ọ nọchie Migiro dị ka minista mba ọzọ na Jenụwarị 2007
Ban Ki-moon, odeakwụkwọ ukwu ọhụrụ nke United Nations si South Korea, họpụtara Migiro ka ọ bụrụ osote odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke United Nations, na Jenụwarị 5, 2007

Dị ka Ban si kwuo, 'Ọ bụ onye ndú a na-akwanyere ùgwù nke ukwuu nke kwadoro ihe kpatara mba ndị na-emepe emepe kemgbe ọtụtụ afọ' O kwukwara na 'Site n'ọrụ ya pụrụ iche n'akụkụ dị iche iche, o gosipụtara nkà nchịkwa dị ịrịba ama nwere ahụmịhe na nka dị ukwuu na mmekọrịta ọha na eze na akụ na ụba na nsogbu mmepe'
Dị ka The New York Times si kwuo, nke a bụ mmezu nke nkwa ya ịhọrọ nwanyị si n'ụwa na-emepe emepe maka ọkwa osote odeakwụkwọ ukwu
Ụlọ ọrụ UN News Center kwuru na Migiro na Ban rụkọrọ ọrụ ọnụ mgbe ha bụ ndị minista mba ọzọ nke mba ha
A họpụtara ya n'ụzọ iwu kwadoro ma malite ọrụ na 1 Febụwarị 2007

N'oge ya na United Nations, Migiro bụkwa onye so na Commission on Effective Development Cooperation with Africa nke Prime Minister Anders Fogh Rasmussen nke Denmark hiwere wee nwee nzukọ n'etiti Eprel na Ọktoba 2008 Na Septemba 2009, ọ gara Rome wee nwee nzukọ na onye ozi mba ofesi Italy Franco Frattini na Pope Benedict XVI iji kparịta ime ihe ike megide ụmụ nwanyị A kọrọ na ndị nnọchiteanya United Nations na-akwado imecha atụmatụ iji kwụsị ibibi ụmụ nwanyị ibe na mgbukpọ
Migiro jere ozi dị ka osote odeakwụkwọ ukwu ruo June 2012
Mgbe ọ rụchara ọrụ na United Nations, Migiro laghachiri Tanzania ma họpụta ya ka ọ bụrụ minista na ụlọ ọrụ Jakaya Kikwete
O mechara banye n'asọmpi ahụ iji bụrụ onye CCM na ntuli aka onye isi ala nke afọ 2015, mana onye mmeri John Magufuli meriri ya
Onye isi ala Magufuli họpụ tara Migiro dị ka Kọmishọna Ukwu na United Kingdom na Mee 2016
Ọ lụrụ Cleophas Migiro, di na nwunye ahụ nwere ụmụ nwanyị abụọ
Asha Ahmed Abdalla (Somali ; Arabic ) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Somalia
Ọ bụ onye guzobere Transitional Federal Parliament, ọ bụkwa onye omeiwu ochie na-anọchite anya mpaghara ugwu Sanaag
A mụrụ Abdalla na 1958 n'obodo Erigavo, nke dị n'ebe ugwu Sanaag nke Somalia
Ọ nọrọ n'oge ọ bụ nwata na Yemen, wee laghachi Somalia na ngwụcha afọ 1960
Abdalla mechara kwaga United States iji chụsoo agụmakwụkwọ dị elu, gụsịrị akwụkwọ na La Guardia College na New York City
O nwere ụmụ amaala Somalia na America abụọ
N'afọ 2000, Abdalla gara nzukọ udo na Somalia nke e mere na Arta, Djibouti
N'ihi ọrụ dị mkpa ọ rụrụ na mkparịta ụka ahụ, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye omeiwu (MP) na Gọọmentị Mba Transitional (TNG)
A họpụtara Abdalla n'ọkwa ndị minista dị iche iche na TNG
Ndị nke ikpeazụ gụnyere Minista na-ahụ maka ịhapụ ọrụ, ịkwụsị ngwá agha, ịhazigharị na nlekọta ndị nwere nkwarụ, na osote Minista na ọrụ na egwuregwu
N'afọ 2004, Abdalla so na ndị nnọchi anya Somalia 275 gbakọtara iji gụzobe Gọọmentị Federal Transitional (TFG) nke Somalia
N'otu afọ ahụ, ọ gbara ọsọ maka ọkwa onye isi ala Somalia, na-eme ka ọ bụrụ nwanyị mbụ n'akụkọ ihe mere eme nke mba ahụ mere ya
N'ihi obere vootu, e wepụrụ Abdalla na agba nke mbụ nke ntuli aka, nke emere n'oge mkparịta ụka udo
Ọ bụkwa onye otu Transitional Federal Parliament (TFP), ruo mgbe emere emume nke Federal Parliament of Somalia n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2012
Abdalla esonyewo n'ọtụtụ nzukọ gbasara mmepe obodo, iwu ụdo na ọrụ ebere
Dị ka onye isi nke Somali Women Chanter Association, ọ na-agagharị n'ụwa niile iji kwalite nkwụsi ike na nzukọ ọha na eze, ọkachasị nsogbu ụmụ nwanyị
Okwu mkpọsa ya bụ 'Nye Somalia nne na-azụlite', na inye ụmụ nwanyị ike na-anọ n'ọkwa 10 na atụmatụ ya nke iri na abụọ maka mba ahụ
Na mgbakwunye, Abdalla bụ onye gụzobere Community Sustaining Development Organization, atụmatụ e mere iji nyere aka na mgbalị ndị na-eme ka esemokwu dịghachi mma site na ọrụ enyemaka na ọrụ mmepe
N'afọ 2011, Abdalla so n'etiti ọtụtụ ụmụ nwanyị na-eme ihe gbasara ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ahọpụtara isonye na panel nke Nobel Peace Prize multi-national Women's Political Leadership n'ime Udo na ịlụ ọgu
Asha Gigi Roba (amụrụ ya na 15 Ọktoba 1973 na Arsi) o bụ onye Etiopia na-agba ọsọ gbatee ogologo uzo

Obu onye tunyere onwe ya mkpa mkpam na marathon E debere oge kachasị mma ya nke 2 26 05 awa na 2004 na Paris Marathon, ebe ọ gbara onye nke abụọ Ọ nọchitere anya Etiopia na ihe omume na 2004 Summer Olympics na World Championships in Athletics (2003 na 2005)
O meriri Toronto Waterfront Marathon na Florence Marathon
Na mmalite ọrụ ya n'afọ 1990 ọ meriri ihe nrite otu ya na Ethiopia na IAAF World Cross Country Championships na World Road Relay Championships
Mgbe ọ bịarutere nke 32 na nke 28 na 1999 na 2000 World Cross Country events, ọ malitere ịsọ mpi na asọmpi okporo ụzọ na track
O meriri n'ọsọ Phoenix 10K na 1999
Na 2002 African Championships in Athletics ọ bụ onye nke anọ na 10,000 mita ọsọ wee bụrụ onye nke iri na asaa na 2002 IAAF World Half Marathon Championships
N'afọ sochirinụ, o nwere njedebe kachasị mma na ihe omume World Cross Country, na-ewere ọnọdụ nke iri na ogologo ọsọ ụmụ nwanyị dị ka nwanyị Etiopia nke ise iji mechaa bụ ihe dị nso na nrite
Asha Gigi mere nke mbụ ya n'ịgba ọsọ marathon na 2003 na San Diego Marathon, ebe oge ya nke 2 31 39 awa mere ka o nweta ọnọdụ maka ndị otu mba
Na 2003 World Championships in Athletics na Paris ọ gbara onye nke iri na itoolu ma bụrụ onye sonyere Etiopia na-enweta ọlaọcha na asọmpi IAAF World Marathon Cup
N'afọ sochirinụ, ọ bụ onye nke iri na Osaka Ladies Marathon mana o mechara nwee ọganihu na Paris Marathon, setịpụ oge kachasị mma nke 2 26 02 awa iji mechie onye nke abụọ na Salina Kosgei
O nwere nhọrọ Olympic mbụ ya, mana o jisiri ike mechaa marathon na 2004 Athens Olympics
Ọ gbakwara ọsọ na 2004 New York City Marathon, mana ọ bụ naanị ebe iri na atọ ka ogara
Ọ gbara ọsọ na Paris maka afọ nke atọ na-agba ọsọ na 2005 wee bịa nke atọ na oge nke abụọ ya kachasị ọsọ (2 27 41 awa)
Nhọrọ mba ya nke atọ n'usoro hụrụ ka ọ na-enye ọrụ ya kachasị mma n'ọkwa ụwa, ka ọ bịara nke iri na isii na marathon na 2005 World Championships in Athletics na Helsinki
O nwere ọsọ na-adịghị mma na Singapore Marathon na Disemba (2 46 14 awa) mana ọ laghachiri na Paris na 2006 na ọsọ nke 2 32 35 awa maka ọnọdụ nke asaa
Ọ bụ onye nke anọ na Berlin Marathon nke afọ ahụ (2 32 32) ma bụrụ onye ndu na Tokyo Ladies Marathon, mana o nweghi ike igbacha ọsọ ahụ
O dekọrọ ọrụ ya nke atọ n'okpuru 2 30 marathon na Paris na 2007 na oge ya nke 2 29 11 awa wetara ya ọnọdụ nke anọ
Mmeri mbụ ya n'ebe dị anya bịara na Toronto Waterfront Marathon ebe, n'agbanyeghị ọsọ ọsọ ọsọ, ọ gara n'ihu mebie ihe ndekọ ahụ na oge ya 2 33 15 awa

Oge 2008 bụ otu n'ime ihe ịga nke ọma ya ọ gbara ọsọ nke atọ kachasị ọsọ (2 28 24) na Dubai Marathon, na-ewere ọnọdụ nke isii, bụ nke atọ na Hamburg Marathon na elekere ọzọ na-erubeghị afọ 230, mgbe ahụ ọ bụ onye nke abụọ na mgbalị ya na Toronto Waterfront Marathon
O nwetakwara mmeri na Prague Half Marathon
Nanị njem ya na 2009 bụ na Dubai, ebe ọ bịara nke iri na otu n'ozuzu

Mgbe ọ kwụsịrị ịgba ọsọ na 2010, ọ bịara nke isii na Xiamen International Marathon Asha Gigi meriri marathon nke abụọ nke ọrụ ya na 2011 Florence Marathon, na-emeri ndị mmegide niile n'ime oge nke 2 31 36 awa{| Àtụ AchievementTable

Asha Haji Elmi (Somali , Arabic عائشة حاجي علمي) (amụrụ n'afọ 1962) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Somalia na onye na-ahụ maka udo
Ka ọ na-erule n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2012, ọ bụbu onye otu Federal Parliament of Somalia
A mụrụ Elmi na 1962 na Somalia
Ọ si n'ezinụlọ Saleebaan nke Habar Gidir
Maka agụmakwụkwọ ya na post-secondary, Elmi nwetara nzere na akụ na ụba na Mahadum Mba Somalia
O nwekwara Master of Business Administration site na US International University
Elmi lụrụ Abdi Farah Shirdon Saaid, onye ọchụnta ego a ma ama na onye bụbu praịm minista Somalia
N'afọ 2000, Elmi guzobere òtù ụmụ nwanyị nke isii iji kwalite ụmụ nwanyị itinye aka na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Somalia
E mechara họpụta ya ka ọ bụrụ onye omebe iwu Transitional Federal Parliament (TFP) n'abalị iri abụọ na itoolu n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 2004, ma jee ozi ruo n'afọ 2009
Elmi bụkwa onye guzobere Save Somali Women and Children (SSWC), nke e guzobere na 1992 n'oge agha obodo Somalia
Tụkwasị na nke a, a nabatara Asha n'ụwa niile maka ọrụ ya megide ibi úgwù ụmụ nwanyị (FGC) na Somalia na mpaghara ndị ọzọ
Ọ na-agakarị na kọleji na mahadum gburugburu ụwa na-ekwu okwu banyere ọnọdụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị mpaghara na mmetụta nke FGC
N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2012, a họpụtara Elmi dị ka onye omeiwu na Federal Parliament of Somalia
Elmi enwetala ọtụtụ onyinye maka ọrụ udo ya
N'afọ 2008, ọ ghọrọ onye natara Right Livelihood Award 'maka ịga n'ihu na-eduga n'ihe ize ndụ dị ukwuu ụmụ nwanyị na-ekere òkè na usoro udo na ime udo na mba ya agha mebiri'
N'ọnwa Septemba afọ 2009, ọ nọkwa n'etiti mmadụ ise a họpụtara ka e nye ha onyinye Clinton Global Citizen Award
Asha Mwilu bụ onye nta akụkọ Kenya na onye na-eme ihe nkiri
Ọ bụ onye Chevening Scholar na Mahadum maka Creative Arts, Farnham
N'afọ 2016, ọ bụrụ onye mmeri nke CNN Multichoice African Journalist of the year Awards, ma merie na News Impact category nke kachasị ewu ewu na Kọntinent
A mụrụ Mwilu na Kenya
Ọ gụrụ Broadcast Journalism na Mahadum United States International ma nwee nzere Masters of Art in Documentary Practices (Distinction) site na Mahaduma maka Creative Arts

Ọ malitere ọrụ mgbasa ozi ya na June 2010 dị ka Onye isi akụkọ na One FM Kenya wee kwaga Kenya Television Network (KTN) n'etiti Disemba 2011 ruo June 2015, na August 2015, ọ sonyeere KTN News dị ka onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye nta akụkọ onwe ya na n'April 2018, ọ sonye na Citizen TV dị ka onye nchịkọta ọrụ pụrụ iche
Ashanti Obi (a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 14 n'ọnwa Ọktoba afọ 1952) bụ onye Naịjirịa na-eme egwuregwu ị gba ọsọ
Ọ sọrọ mpi n'ọsọ nke women's 4 × 100 metres relay na 1972 Summer Olympics
Ashenafi (Amharic) bụ zi aha Amharic nke Etiopia nke nwere ike izo aka na
'Ashes to Ashes, uzuzu na uzuzu', nkebiokwu si n'akwukwo Anglican Book of Common Prayer service olili
Ashete Bekere Dido[lower-alpha 1] (amụrụ na ụbọsị iri na asaa n'ọnwa Eprel n'afọ 1988) bụ onye Etiopia na-agba ọsọ marathon
N'afọ 2019, o meriri na Berlin Marathon na oge nke 2 20 14
N'afọ 2019, o merikwara Rotterdam Marathon na Rotterdam, Netherlands na oge nke 2 22 55
N'afọ 2016, ọ meriri na České Budějovice Half Marathon nke e mere na Česke Budějovce, Czech Republic na oge nke 1 10 40
N'afọ 2020, ọ mechara n'ọnọdụ nke anọ na asọmpi ụmụ nwanyị na 2020 London Marathon nke emere na London, United Kingdom
N'afọ 2021, o mechara nke atọ na 2021 London Marathon na oge nke 2 18 18

Aha nna Ashhad (Arabic ), bụ nke ana eji mee ihe dị ka nke mbụ na aha nna
Ashifi Gogo guzobere Sproxil n'afọ 2009 iji lụso mmụba nke ọgwụ adịgboroja na Afrịka ọgụ
Gogo nwetara nzere bachelọ nke nka na Whitman College n'afọ 2005, na-enweta nnukwu akwụkwọ abụọ na Mathematics na Physics
O nwetara PhD ya na Injinia na Dartmouth College
Ọ gakwara akwụkwọ mbụ ya na Ghana
Ọ nọ na Kwame Nkrumah University of Science and Technology primary na Junior High School
A kpọrọ Gogo na Fortune's 2005 '40 under 40' ndepụta nke ndị ọchụnta ego kachasị emetụta
Ashipa, onye guzobere usoro ndị eze Lagos ma bụrụ onye na-enweghị okpueze dị ka Oba nke Lagos, onye Obas niile nke Lagos na-agbaso agbụrụ ha, bụ onyeisi agha nke Oba nke Benin
A kwụrụ Ashipa ụgwọ site n'inye ya utu aha onye ịsị agha/Oloriogun
Ọ natakwara ikike nke Oba nke Benin ịchị Lagos
Ụfọdụ akụkọ ihe mere eme nke Benin kọwara Ashipa dị ka nwa ma ọ bụ nwa nwa nke Oba nke Benin
Dị ka ndị Yoruba si kwuo, Ashipa bụ nwoke Awori Yoruba nke nwere utu aha Ashipa nke Isheri
Ashipa natara mma agha na ịgbà eze dị ka ihe nnọchianya nke ikike ya site n'aka Oba nke Benin na njem ya na Lagos
Tụkwasị na nke a, Oba nke Benin zigara otu ndị ọrụ Benin ichekwa ọdịmma Benin na Lagos
Ndị isi ndị a, nke Eletu Odibo duziri, bụ ndị mbụ so na klas Akarigbere nke Lagos White Cap Chiefs
Ashley Nicolle Ross (née Simpson ; amuru Ọktoba 3, 1984), onye a mara dika Ashlee Simpson, bu onye ọbụ abụ America

Nwanne nwanyị nke obere nke onye na-agụ egwú na onye na-eme ihe nkiri Jessica Simpson, ọ malitere ọrụ ya dị ka onye na-agba egwu maka nwanne ya nwanyị wee pụta na mgbasa ozi telivishọn mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na ise
O mechara gbasoo ọrụ dị ka onye na-eme ihe nkiri ma na-arụ ọrụ ugboro ugboro na ihe nkiri ezinụlọ a kpọrọ 7th Heaven
Ọ pụtara na ihe ngosi a kpọrọ Newlyweds Nick and Jessica, nke a na-agbasa na MTV n'etiti 2003 na 2005, nke lekwasịrị anya na nwanne Ashlee nke tọrọ ya bu Jessica na di Jessica mgbe ahụ Nick Lachey
Mgbe ọ na-arụ ọrụ maka usoro egwu mbụ ya, Simpson ghọrọ onye na-eme ihe nkiri nke usoro ihe nkiri na-atụgharị eziokwu, The Ashlee Simpson Show, nke a na-agbasa na MTV n'etiti 2004 na 2005
Dịka nwanne ya nwanyị bu ya ụzọ, Simpson ghọrọ onye ndi mgbasa ozi na-elebara anya

Ihe itunanya na ọganihu ya bịara na mpụta nke egwu mbụ ya, nke ọ kpọrọ ' Pieces of Me ,' nke ewepụtara na 2004, ghọrọ nke so n'egwu ise kachasị elu na United States wee tochie Mainstream Top 40 dabere na redio
Ihe ịga nke ọma nke egwu ya ahụ na ihe ngosi ya nyeere aka ịkwalite usoro egwu nke mbụ ya, Autobiography , nke ewepụtara na 2004, n'elu chaati nke 200
Ọrụ a rere ihe karịrị nde ise n'ụwa niile, na-eme ka ọ bụrụ usoro egwu ya kacha aga nke ọma ruo taa
Simpson mechara buru onye ndu nke ndị na-eme ihe nkiri na fim Undiscovered (2005), nke ghọrọ ihe akatọrọ nke ukwuu na nke na-ereghi nke ọma n'ahịa
Ọdịda nke ihe nkiri ahụ, yana ọtụtụ ihe ngosi nke akatọrọ, butere nyocha na mgbasa ozi
N'agbanyeghị nke ahụ, usoro egwu nke abụọ nke Simpson, I Am Me (2005), weere ọnọdụ n'elu Billboard 200, ghọrọ usoro egwu ya nke abụọ ime ya
Ndekọ a gara n'ihu nata asambodo platinum sitere na Recording Industry Association of America (RIAA)
N'ịgbaso ngosiputa ya dị ka Roxie Hart na mmepụta West End nke Chicago , Simpson kwupụtara na ọ malitere ịrụ ọrụ maka usoro egwu nke atọ ya
Ndekọ a dị iche na ụda pop-rock nke mbọ ya gara aga, na-egosipụta ụda egwu nke egwu na ụda ndị afọ 1980s
E weputara World Bittersweet na 2008, o nwekwara nnabata nakwa nkatọ dị oke egwu, mana ọ hụrụ mbelata ahịa
Mgbalị a ruru nọmba 4 na Billboard 200
N'afọ na-esote, Simpson sonyeere ndị isi ihe nkiri nke Melrose Place revamp, bụ nke e nwetara n'ọmụma na nkatọ dị oke egwu
Mgbe afọ ahụ gasịrị, o mere mpụta mbụ, na-eweghachi ọrụ ya dị ka Roxie Hart na Chicago n'okporo ụzọ
Simpson kwupụtara usoro egwu ya nke anọ n'otu afọ ahụ
Ọ wepụtara otu egwu nke kwuru onwe ya nke ọ kpọrọ 'Bat for a Heart' (2012), n'agbanyeghị na ọ nweghị ihe ịga nke ọma
Simpson mechara kpochapụ usoro egwu ya ahụ wee lekwasị anya na nwa ya
Simpson kwughachiri ọrụ ya dị ka Roxie Hart nke ugboro atọ na mmepụta pụrụ iche nke ụbọchị abụọ na Hollywood Bowl na July 2013 nke Brooke Shields duziri

N'October, Simpson na di ya Evan Ross wepụtara egwu ha agbatịkwuru agbatịkwu 'extended play' (EP) nke Ashlee + Evan site na Access Records, bụ nke a na-akwado site na njem nlegharị anya n'obodo ndị dị n'ofe North America, na ihe ngosi TV ha
A mụrụ Ashley Nicole Simpson na Waco, Texas, na Ọktoba 3, 1984
Ndị mụrụ ya bụ Tina Ann (née Drew) na Joseph Truett 'Joe' Simpson, onye bụbu ọkà n'akparamàgwà mmadụ na onye ozi nke ndi ntorobịa n'ụlọ uka Baptist
O nwere otu nwanne nwanyị tọrọ ya, Jessica Simpson
Ma Ashlee na Jessica gara Prairie Creek Elementary na North Junior High, nke dị na Richardson, Texas, ebe a zụlitere ụmụ agbọghọ ahụ
Mgbe Ashlee dị afọ atọ, ọ malitere ịmụ egwu ballet n'oge gboo
Ọ debanyere aha na School of American Ballet nke di New York City mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na otu, wee bụrụ onye nke ọdụdụ a nabatara na ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ
Ọ bụ ezie na afọ a chọrọ maka ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ bu afọ iri na abụọ wee gbagobe c, nna Simpson kwetara ịgha ụgha banyere afọ ndụ ya
N'ime oge a, Simpson nwere nsogbu iri nri nke a na-akpọghị aha ruo ihe dị ka ọnwa isii, na-emecha nweta ọgwụgwọ n'aka ndị mụrụ ya
Ezinụlọ Simpson kwagara Los Angeles, California, na 1999, ka Jessica gbasoro ọrụ ịbụ abụ
Mgbe Jessica malitere ọrụ ya, Ashlee malitere ịpụta na mgbasa ozi telivishọn
Nna ya, Joe, jere ozi dị ka onye nnọchi anya ya
N'ịgbaso ọganihu azụmahịa nke usoro egwu mbụ nke Jessica bụ Sweet Kisses (1999), Ashlee ghọrọ otu n'ime ndị na-agba egwu na-akwado ya na njem
Na-atụ anya ịchụso ọrụ n'ime ihe nkiri, Simpson nwere obere ọnọdụ dika onye ọbịa na ihe omume nke Malcolm In The Middle
N'afọ sochirinụ, Simpson nwere obere ọrụ dị ka Monique na ihe nkiri ikpa ọchị Rob Schneider nke a kpọrọ The Hot Chick (2002)
Ọ sonyeere oge nke asaa nke ihe nkiri ezinụlọ 7th Heaven dị ka Cecilia Smith, ọrụ ọ gara n'ihu na-egosipụta na oge nke asatọ
Simpson pụtara na mkpokọta nkeji iri anọ dịka Cecilia

N'otu afọ ahụ, Ashlee dekọtara egwu akpọrọ 'Christmas Past, Present, and Future' maka akwụkwọ ezumike nke School's Out! Christmas; E mechara wepụtaghachi egwu a na Redio Disney Jingle Jams na-eso mmetụ egwu Simpson mere
O mechara dekọọ egwu 'Just Let Me Cry' maka ụda egwu nke fim Freaky Friday (2003)
Simpson mechara malite ide na ịdekọ ngosi, na-atụ anya ịchọta I bianye aka n'ụlọọrụ na-emeputa egwu
Ekwenyere ya otu ọnwa ka o weputachara ụda egwu Freaky Friday na Simpson bịanyere aka na Geffen Records iji wepụta usoro egwu mpụta mbụ ya
A mara ọkwa na Jessica Simpson na di ya Nick Lachey ga-esonye na usoro ihe ngosi nke ha na MTV a kpọrọ, Newlyweds Nick and Jessica
Usoro a, nke gosipụtara akụkọ ndụ Jessica na Nick dị ka di na nwunye, ghọrọ omenala pop ma nyere aka dọta uche nke ụmụnne nwanyị Simpson
N'ịgbaso ihe ịga nke ọma nke usoro ahụ, a kwadoro na Ashlee ga-enweta usoro nkwụsịtụ, The Ashlee Simpson Show
N'ịtụ anya ịkwụsị ntụnyere n'etiti ya na nwanne ya nwanyị, Ashlee chọrọ ka usoro a gbado anya na ndekọ nke usoro egwu mbụ ya
N'oge a, Simpson tinyekwara ntutu isi ya na-acha aja aja, mkpebi nke nwetara nlebara anya nke ndi mgbasa ozi

Mgbe ọ na-esonye n'ihe nkiri ahụ, Simpson pụtara na vidiyo egwu nke onye egwu Ryan Cabrera na egwu ya ọ kpọrọ ' On the Way Down ' (2004), na-egosi onwe ya dị ka onye Cabrera nwere mmasị ịhụnanya n'ebe ọ nọ
Di na nwunye ahụ mechara malite mmekọrịta ịhụnanya, na Cabrera nke kpaliri ọtụtụ egwu maka usoro egwu nke Simpson
Simpson chọrọ ka usoro egwu mbụ ya bụrụ egwu pop-rock, ebe ọ na-egeghị egwu pop
Ọrụ ahụ bụ John Shanks mepụtara ya, ebe Simpson dere abụ niile dị na usoro egwu ahụ
Ya na onye na-ede abụ bụ Kara DioGuardi rụkwara ọrụ gbasara ide abụ ahụ, ebe DioGuardi na-anata kredit maka ide egwu n'ime usoro egwu ahụ
Otu n'ime egwu nọọrọ onwe ya n'usoro egwu ahụ, ' Pieces Of Me ', ghọrọ nke nwetara ọganihu ozugbo e mepụtara ya na United States
Egwu ahụ soro n'egwu ise kacha ewu ewu na Hot 100 wee tinye ya na chaati Mainstream Top 40 dabere na ikuku redio pop
'Pieces of Me' nwetara asambodo ọla edo site na Recording Industry Association of America (RIAA), na-enye mbipụta puku narị ise nke egwu ahụ nọọrọ onwe ya nke a na-ere
E wepụtara usoro egwu mbụ ya, Autobiography, na Julaị 20, 2004, na nnabata dị oke egwu agwakọtara ya na nkatọ n'ozuzu ya
Ndekọ a rụrụ n'elu chaatị Billboard 200 na United States, na-ere ihe dị ka puku narị iri atọ na ịrị itoolu na asatọ n'izu mbụ nke mwepụta ya
Ọ bụ ọba mpụta mbụ kacha ere nke otu nwanyị na-agu egwu n'afọ ahụ, na-aga n'ihu na-ere ihe karịrị nde abụọ na pụkụ narị ise na mba United States n'ọnwa Jenụwarị 2005
Ọganihu nke ọba egwu ahụ na otu egwu ya bụ n'ihi mkpughe sitere na usoro ihe onyonyo ya
Album ahụ rere ihe karịrị nde ise n'ụwa niile
Na Ọktoba 23, 2004, Simpson pụtara dị ka onye ọbịa na-agu egwu na emume Saturday Night Live iji kwalite ọba egwu ahụ
O buru ụzọ mee otu 'Pieces of Me', ma kwado ịgụ egwu 'Autobiography' dịka egwu nke abụọ
Ka ọ na-akwado ịgụ egwu nke abụọ, a nụkwara olu na-agu 'Pieces of Me' ọzọ, nke gosiri na Simpson ejirila egbugbere ọnụ mekọrịta egwu nke ikpeazụ ọ gụrụ
Simpson malitere ime egwu ọzọ ozugbo ka ndị otu ya malitere ịkpọ 'Pieces of Me' ọzọ
O wee pụọ na ogbo ahụ ka ndị egwu ya na-aga n'ihu na-akpọ egwu mgbe ọ na-anọchị ya ruo ọtụtụ tịnkọm tịnkọm, tupu ihe ngosi ahụ ebipụ na azụmahịa

N'oge mmechi nke ngosi ahụ, Simpson pụtara n'ebe onye nhazi, Jud Law, wee sị, 'Ọ dị m njọ! Ndị otu m malitere ịkpọ egwu na-ezighi ezi, ma amaghị m ihe m ga-eme, ya mere echere m na m ga-eme mkpọtụ' Arụmọrụ ahụ nwetara nlebara anya mgbasa ozi dị ukwuu ma nwetaghachi nkatọ
Ụbọchị ole na ole ka e mesịrị, Simpson kpọrọ ndị otu usoro vidiyo egwu Total Request Live ma kọwaa na a dụrụ ya ọdụ ka ọ ghara ịbụ abụ ndụ n'ihi ọrịa reflux acid
Simpson kwuru maka ihe merenụ, 'Emere m onwe m onye nzuzu zuru oke'
N'agbanyeghị mgbasa ozi na-adịghị mma gburugburu ihe merenụ, Simpson wepụtara ' Shadow ' dị ka egwu nke abụọ si na Autobiography na United States
Egwu ahụ enwetaghị mweputa na mpaghara Europe
O nweghị ihe ịga nke ọma dika egwu ndi nke bu ya ụzọ, n'agbanyeghị na ọ ruru n'elu nke iri abụọ na chaatị Mainstream Top 40, ghọrọ egwu nke abụọ nke Simpson na chaatị ahụ
Egwu ahụ kwuru n'ụzọ egwu maka echiche ya gbasara ọganiihu nwanne ya nwanyị tọrọ ya
Egwu ahụ nwetara nnabata dị oke egwu, ụfọdụ na-eto ya dị ka ihe pụtara ìhè maka ọba ahụ
E wepụtara ' La La ' dị ka album nke atọ na nke ikpeazụ na Jenụwarị 2005, ọzọkwa o nweghị kwa ike I nweta ọganiihu nke 'Pieces of Me'
N'agbanyeghị ọnụ ọgụgụ dị ala na chaati nke Hot 100, egwu ahụ nwetara asambodo ọla edo sitere na RIAA
Abụ a rụrụ dị ka egwu nọọrọ onwe ya nke abụọ na mpaghara Europe
Simpson na Cabrera kwụsịrị mmekọrịta ha, ọ bụ ezie na ha abụọ nọgidere bụrụ enyi
Na Teen Choice Awards na August 8, 2004, Simpson nwetara ihe nrite 'Song of the Summer' Teen Choice Award maka 'Pieces of Me', yana ihe nrite 'Fresh Face'
O nwetakwara onyinye nturu ugo Billboard maka nwanyị ohuru na-agụ egwu na Disemba, na n'otu onwa ahu, Entertainment Weekly kporo ya otu n'ime Breakout Stars nke 2004

Na Jenụwarị 2005, ụlọ ọrụ asịrị malitere ịkọ na Simpson na onye na-eme ihe nkiri Wilmer Valderrama nwere mmekọrịta ịhụnanya, na-eduga na asịrị nke 'ịhụnanya' n'etiti di na nwunye Valderrama bụbu enyi nwanyị Lindsay Lohan
N'agbanyeghị nke a, ndị nnọchiteanya nke Simpson kwuru na ha abụọ bụ enyi ruo ọtụtụ afọ, ọ dịghịkwa mmasị ịhụnanya ha nwere n'ebe ha onwe ha nọ
Simpson pụtara dị ka onye ọbịa egwu n'oge ọkara na 2005 Orange Bowl na Miami, Florida
Ọrụ ya nke 'La La' nwetara nnabata na-adịghị mma site na igwe mmadụ, na-eduga na okwu ikwa emo dị iche iche
Na February 2005, Simpson malitere njem nlegharị anya nke onwe ya na North America dum
N'igosi ihe ngosi iri atọ na asaa, njem ahụ hụrụ Simpson ka ọ na-agu egwu dị iche iche sitere na usoro egwu mbụ ya, yana ngughari nke egwu ewepụtara na mbụ
Mgbe ọ na-eme njem, Simpson dere ihe maka ọba egwu nke abụọ ya
Simpson nwere ọrụ nkwado na fim Undiscovered , na-egosi onye na-eme ihe nkiri na-achọsi ihe ike aha ya bụ Clea
Ma ihe nkiri ahụ bụ oké njọ na azụmahịa ọdịda, o wetara Simpson nhọpụta maka 'nwanyi kasị njọ na-eme ihe nkiri' na 2005 Golden Raspberry Awards
Simpson wepụtara usoro egwu ya nke abụọ, I Am Me , na Ọktoba 2005
Album ahụ gosipụtara isiokwu pop-rock yiri nke a hụrụ na mbọ mbụ ya, n'agbanyeghị na Simpson tụrụ anya itinye mmetụta nke egwu sitere na 1980s n'ime ụda ya
Dịka mweputa ya gara aga, Simpson dekọtara egwu niile na ọba ahụ
Ọ ghọrọ usoro egwu ya nke abụọ ka ọ malitere n'elu chaatị Billboard 200, na-ere ihe karịrị pụkụ narị abụọ na ịrị abụọ n'ahịa n'ime izu mbụ ya na United States
Ndekọ a enwetaghi ihe ịga nke ọma dika nke Autobiography, n'agbanyeghị na ọ gara n'ihu na-ere ihe karịrị nde atọ n'ụwa niile
Edere otu egwu nọrọ onwe ya nke a kpọrọ, ' Boyfriend,' ma dee ya n'ihi ihe gbasara asịrị dị n'etiti Simpson na Valderama, ọ ghọkwara egwu nke abụọ ya soro n'egwu iri abụọ dara uda na United States
Maka mwepụta nke usoro egwu ahụ, Simpson laghachiri na ntutu isi ya
Egwu nke abụọ na nke ikpeazụ n'usoro egwu a, ' LOVE,' batara n'ọkwa iri anọ na United States

Simpson pụtara nke ugboro abụọ dị ka onye na-agu egwu na Saturday Night Live, ọ gụrụ egwu 'Catch Me When I Fall,' nke sitere na ọdịdị mbụ ya na usoro ahụ, yana 'Boyfriend' Na nke ugbu a, a na-eme egwu abụọ ahụ n'enweghị nsogbu ọ bụla
N'etiti ọnwa Disemba, Simpson dara mgbe ọ rụchara ọrụ na Japan wee nọrọ n'ụlọ ọgwụ nwa oge, n'ihi ya a kagburu ihe ngosi ya na Redio Music Awards
Ihe kpatara ọdịda ahụ na ụlọ ọgwụ na-esote ya bụ ike ọgwụgwụ n'ihi usoro ọrụ ya siri ike
Simpson batara na njem m nke 'I Am Me' na ọnwa ikpeazụ nke 2005 wee malite ịyi onye na-akụ ịgba ya Braxton Olita
Na March 2006, Simpson meriri asọmpi 'MTV celebrity surfing invitational competition', nke gosikwara ndị ama ama dịka Meagan Good, Jack Osbourne, Ashley Parker Angel, na Tony Hawk

N'April 12, 2006, ọ kwadoro ma rụọ ọrụ na MTV Australia Video Music Awards, ebe ọ meriri 'Onye na-eme ihe nkiri kachasị mma' na 'Best Pop Video' maka egwu nke 'Boyfriend' Simpson nwere ọrụ imi n'April 2006
Na mbipụta nke May 2007 nke Harper's Bazaar , o kwuru na ya enweghị nchebe banyere ọdịdị ya ma ọ bụ na ọ dịbu mbụ
O kwuru na ịwa ahụ rọba bụ “nhọrọ onwe onye” nke mmadụ kwesịrị ikpebi naanị imere onwe ya ọ bụghị maka ndị ọzọ

N'ajụjụ ọnụ na September 2007, nna ya, Joe Simpson, kọwara maka ịwa ahụ Ashlee mere 'E nwere ezigbo nsogbu na iku ume ya, nke ahụ bu nke a gwọrọ' N'etiti afọ 2006, Simpson gbara ajụjụ ọnụ na magazin Marie Claire, bụ nke o kwuru na ya 'anabataghi echiche gbagọrọ agbagọ nke Hollywood banyere ịma mma nwanyị' e wee see foto ya na otu ìgwè ụmụ agbọghọ na-enweghị ihe ọ bụla si n'ụlọ akwụkwọ Los Angeles Green Dot Public School
Ka ọ na-erule oge akwụkwọ akụkọ ahụ ruru n'ụlọ ahịa akụkọ, Simpson enweelarị ọrụ imi ya, ụfọdụ ndị na-agụ Marie Claire mekwara mkpesa na nke a bụ ihu abụọ

Magazin ahụ nwetara akwụkwọ mkpesa karịrị otu puku, onye mbipụta ọhụrụ nke magazin ahụ gbasakwara akụkụ akwụkwọ ozi nke mbipụta September nke magazin ahụ iji nye ndị na-agụ akwụkwọ ohere ikwupụta nkụda mmụọ ha
Simpson malitere njem nlegharị anya North America nke atọ ya, njem maka egwu ya ọ kpọrọ LOVE iji kwalite ọba nke abụọ ya
A mara ọkwa na a ga-ewepụtakwa egwu 'I Am Me' n'ime ọnwa ndị na-esote na-egosi egwu ọhụrụ ' Invisible ,' ngughari nke egwu Jaded Era
E wepụtara otu egwu ahụ na June 2006 wee gaa n'ihu na ọnụ ọgụgụ iri abụo na otu na Hot 100
Ọ ghọrọ egwu ya nke abụọ ya ịbanye n'egwu iri kacha elu nke ndeputa Mainstream Top 40 dabere na ikuku redio pop
N'ikpeazụ, a kwadoro na a kagbuola mwepụtaghachi nke 'I Am Me'
Na 2006, Simpson mere ihe nkiri dị ka Roxie Hart na mmepụta egwu West End nke Chicago site na Septemba 25 ruo Ọktoba 28, 2006
Ọ nwetara nyocha kacha mma
A kọwara ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri ahụ dị ka nke 'na-egbu maramara na nso enweghị ntụpọ' Mgbe ya na Olita kewara, a kwadoro na Simpson nọ na mmekọrịta ya na onye òtù Fall Out Boy nke aha ya bu Pete Wentz
N'ịgbaso ọdịdị ya dị ka Roxie Hart, Simpson kwadoro na ọ malitere ịrụ ọrụ na ọbá egwu nke atọ ya, nke echere na mbụ na a ga- wwepụta ya na njedebe 2007

Onye isi oche Geffen Records Ron Fair kwuru na Disemba 2006 na ịrụ ọrụ na ọba egwu Simpson na-esote ga-abụ nke 'dị aghụghọ' n'ihi nyocha nke ndị nta akụkọ na 'ajọ mbunobi', mana na Geffen ga-eso ya rụkọọ ọrụ iji merie nke ahụ, n'ihi na o kwesịrị ka a nụ ya nakwa na o kwesịrị ka enye ya ohere' N'ịtụ anya ịtụgharị gaa na ụda ọhụrụ, Simpson depụtara ndị na-emepụta egwu Timbaland na The Neptunes ka ha nye ụda égwu maka ọrụ ahụ
Simpson weputara otu egwu dị n'ọbá egwu ya, ' Outta My Head (Ay Ya Ya) ', na Disemba 2007
Egwu ahụ nwere ihe dị iche iche nke synthpop ma ihe nkiri nke 1980 nwere mmetụta dị ukwuu
Otu ọ dị, egwu ahụ abataghi na chaati Hot 100 na United States, n'agbanyeghị na o nwere ihe ịga nke ọma n'oke na mpaghara mba ụwa
Bittersweet World, usoro egwu Simpson nke atọ, ka ewepụtara na Eprel 19, 2008
Ndekọ ahụ hụrụ mbelata nke Simpson, na-arụ ọrụ na nọmba nke anọ na Billboard 200 na ahịa izu mbụ nke mbipụta puku iri anọ na asaa
Simpson weputara mkpokọta uwe elu na mmekorita ya na onye na-ere uwe Wet Seal na Eprel 22, 2008, n'otu ụbọchị ahụ ewepụtara Bittersweet World na mbs United States
Ọbá egwu ahụ gara n'ihu na-ere mbipụta puku otu narị na iri abụọ na isii n'ime afọ mbụ nke ewepụtara ya, na-eme ka ọ bụrụ ọba egwu ya a kacha ere ruo taa
Ntọhapụ a rụrụ dị ka ọba egwu ikpeazụ Simpson site na Geffen Records
Na February 2008, Simpson malitere iyi mgbanaka diamond
O mechara kọwaa na ọ bụ mgbanaka nkwa sitere n'aka Wentz
N'April 2008, Simpson na Wentz kwadoro njikọ aka ha, ha lụrụ na Mee 17, 2008, n'ebe obibi nne na nna Simpson na Encino, California, ebe ọ bụ nna ya na-elekọta ememe ahụ
Ọ gbanwere aha nna ya site na Simpson gaa Wentz, na n'oge alụmdi na nwunye a maara ya dị ka Ashlee Simpson-Wentz
Ọ bụ n'oge a ka Simpson wepụtara abụ ' Little Miss Obsessive ' dịka nke abụọ sitere na Bittersweet World
Egwu ahụ enwetaghị mwepụta na Europe, mana o rutere n'ọnụ ọgụgụ kasị elu nke irí itoolu na isii na chaatị Hot 100 na United States
Ọ malitekwara ịpụta na mgbasa ozi maka ndị na-ere ahịa Canada Zellers iji kwalite ahịrị uwe ha nwere onwe ha, nke a kpọrọ Request, n'etiti 2008
Izu abụọ ka agbamakwụkwọ ya gasịrị, Simpson kwupụtara afọ ime ya, si otú a kwụsị nkwalite nke 'Little Miss Obsessive' na ọbá egwu nne na nna
Simpson mụrụ nwa nwoke aha ya bụ Bronx na November 20, 2008
Na 2009, Simpson laghachiri n'uju n'ime ihe nkiri telivishọn site n'ịrụ ọrụ nke Violet Foster na Melrose Place, Mgbanwe nke CW nke usoro 1990 nke otu aha ahụ
Ebu ụzọ bịanye aka na ihe ngosi ahụ dị ka onye na-eme ihe mgbe niile, mana ndị na-emepụta ihe na ndị isi CW kpebiri ịkwụsị àgwà ya
Simpson hapụrụ ihe nkiri ahụ ka ihe omume iri na abụọ gachara wee kwuo na ya amatala kamgbe na agwa ya ga-ahapụ ihe nkiri ahụ ozugbo e kwubiri akụkọ ihe omimi igbu ọchụ
N'agbanyeghị nke a, nwanne Ashlee ekwuwo okwu megide usoro a, na-ekwu na Simpson wetara ihe ngosi a n'efu
Mgbe ọ hapụrụ Melrose Place, Simpson kwughachiri ọrụ ya na mmepụta egwu Broadway Chicago
Ọ malitere nlọghachị Broadway ya na Nọvemba 30, 2009, wee mee ihe ngosi asatọ na New York otu izu ruo February 7, 2010
Na February 9, 2011, Simpson gbara akwụkwọ maka ịgba alụkwaghịm na Wentz, na-ekwu maka esemokwu na-enweghị ike imezi, ma rịọ ka eweghachi aha nwa agbọghọ ya
Emechara ịgba alụkwaghịm na Nọvemba 22, 2011

Di na nwunye mbụ ahụ wepụtara nkwupụta na-esote ọkwa ahụ, na-ekwupụta 'Anyị ka bụ ndị enyi na ndị nne na nna nwere obi ike na ịhụnanya nye nwa anyị nwoke Bronx, onye obi ụtọ na ọdịmma ya ka bụ ihe mbụ anyị na-ebute ụzọ' Simpson pụtara na ihe omume nke abụọ nke The CW's America's America's Next Top Model, Cycle 17 dị ka onye ọka ikpe ọbịa
O mepụtara ahịrị ejiji maka ụmụ agbọghọ dị afọ asaa ruo iri na isii na mmekorita ya na akara nwanne ya nwanyị na-aga nke ọma
Simpson bụ onye na-ahụ maka ngalaba okike nke ahịrị, nke ewepụtara n'oge oyi nke 2011

N'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe ya na Wentz kewapuru, a kwadoro na Simpson nọ na mmekọrịta ya na onye na-eme ihe nkiri Vincent Piazza, ọ bụ ezie na ha abụọ kwụsịrị mmekọrịta ha ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ otu afọ na ọkara mgbe ha malitere ịlụ

Simpson kwadoro n'oge a gbara ajụjụ ọnụ na 2011 na ọ malitere ịrụ ọrụ maka usoro egwu nke anọ ya, nke ọ kọwara dị ka inwe 'mmetụta ndị mmadụ' Na 2012, Simpson wepụtara otu egwu a kpọrọ 'Bat for a Heart' Ọ bụ ezie na otu egwu ahụ nwere egwu ndị doro anya na vidiyo egwu na-adịghị mma, ọ nweghị ihe ịga nke ọma
Ọ bụ onye ama ama na-ede abụ bụ Linda Perry dere ma deekwa egwu a
Egwu ahụ nwetara nnabata dị iche iche mgbe ewepụtara ya
Simpson mechara kwuo na ọba ahụ na-etolite dịka ụda eletrọnịkị
Agbanyeghị, 'Bat for a Heart' jere ozi dị ka mwepụta egwu ikpeazụ nke Simpson ruo ọtụtụ afọ mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, na-enweghị atụmatụ egwu ọ bụla ekwuputara nakwa weebụsaịtị ya bu nke e mechiri emechi
Na June 2012, a mara ọkwa na Simpson na-eme ihe nkiri Pawn Shop Chronicles na Baton Rouge, Louisiana, ihe nkiri na-atọ ọchị a kwadoro maka mwepụta na 2013
Simpson gosipụtara omume Roxie Hart nke ugboro atọ na egwu Chicago, oge a na emepụta mmepụta nke Hollywood Bowl nke ihe nkiri ahụ
Ọrụ Simpson nwetara ntụle dị iche iche, n'agbanyeghị na a kọwara ya dị ka 'ọkacha amasị ndị na-ege ntị'
Na July 2013, a kọrọ na Simpson amalitela ịlụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri Evan Ross, nwa onye ọbụ abụ Diana Ross
Simpson na Ross jikọrọ aka na Jenụwarị 2014, wee lụọ na Ọgọst 30, 2014 n'ụlọDiana Ross na Connecticut
Di na nwunye ahụ nabatara nwa nwanyị aha ya bụ Jagger Snow na Julaị 30, 2015
N'otu ọnwa ahụ, Simpson na di ya gbara akwụkwọ ka ha gbanwee aha nna ha ka ọ bụrụ Ross-Næss
Næss bụ aha nna nna ya nke iwu kwadoro (nke sitere na nna ya, onye ọchụnta ego Arne Næss Jr
), ebe Ross bụ aha nna nke nne ya

Na May 2016, Simpson kwuru na ya na-eche na ọ ga-ekwe omume ịlaghachi na-eme ihe iji lekwasị anya n'ịmepụta ọba ọhụrụ 'Mu na di m na-ede egwú na nke ahụ bụ ihe na-atọ ụtọ, anyị ka [na-agbalị ime] chọta ụda anyị, anyị edeela dị ka egwu irí mana anyị ga-edekwa ọtụtụ egwu ndi ọzọ' Mana na mbido 2005, webụsaịtị egwu ya gara na-anọghị n'ịntanetị—n'ihi na o nwere mperi—ruo ọnwa ndị na-esote ya, na mbido Septemba 2018, ọ nọgidere na-anọghị n'ịntanetị n'agbanyeghị na ọ na-ekwu na ọ ga-alaghachi n'egwu
N'otu afọ ahụ, Simpson kwupụtara olu Strelka na ihe nkiri Space Dogs Adventure to the Moon , n'akụkụ Alicia Silverstone
Simpson gosikwara anyị kwa izu na a ga-ewepụta egwu ọhụrụ na 2019, nke pụtara na-egosi na ọ na-arụ ọrụ na ọbá egwu ya nke anọ na-abịa mgbe afọ iri na otu gachara
Na Septemba 9, 2018, e mere ya ka ọ laghachi na ụwa nke ihe ngosi TV na Ashlee + Evan , na E! Entertainment Television
Simpson na Ross wepụtara otu egwu ha gụkọrọ ọnụ nke mbụ ha, 'I Do' na Septemba 7, 2018
A na-atụ anya na di na nwunye ahụ ga-eweputa usoro egwu zuru oke mgbe afọ ahụ gasịrị, mana kama ha wepụtara ndekọ egwu agbatịri,
N'April 2020, Simpson kwupụtara na ya dị ime nwa nke atọ, nwa nwoke
Ọ mụrụ Ziggy Blu na Ọktoba 29, 2020

Simpson akwadola mkpuchi nke ọtụtụ akwụkwọ akụkọ ejiji nke mba ụwa, gke ụnyere US Health Women's Health, Jane, CosmoGirl, Shape, Allure, YM, Marie Claire, Redbook na Seventeen ; Mermany 's Glamour Blenda nke Japan na Elle ; nRussia's Ele Girlnke Russia
Ọ pụtara na ọtụtụ mbipụta mba ụwa nke Cosmopolitan, dị ka Georgia, Serbia, Russia, Italy, Greece, Ukraine, Slovenia, Netherlands, US na Australia
Ọ pụtawo na mgbasa ozi telivishọn maka Liquid Ice, HP, Zellers na Pizza Hut
Ọ pụtara na mgbasa ozi mbipụta maka Skechers na ThermaSilk
Forbes depụtara Simpson dị ka otu n'ime ndị na-eto eto bara ọgaranya, a na-akọ na ọ nwetara ihe karịrị nde dọla asatọ na 2005
Forbes debere Simpson na di ya mgbe ahụ Pete Wentz na nke iri abụọ na ndepụta ha nke 'Top 20 Celebrity Cash Couples' na ego ha nwekọtara rụrụ nde dọla itoolu na pụkụ narị ise
Site na mwepụta nke Autobiography, Simpson bara n'ahịa ozugbo dị ka 'onye na-agba Britney mgba', na-atụnyere ndị na-agu egeu dị ka Avril Lavigne na Fefe Dobson
Mgbasa ozi gosipụtara onyonyo na ụdị ya dịka nke dị iche na nke nwanne ya nwanyị Jessica
Site na ihe ịga nke ọma nke usoro telivishọn nke Jessica, Newlyweds, ụmụnne nwanyị ghọrọ aha ezinụlọ na mgbasa ozi wee bụrụ ihe a na-elekwasị anya nke ukwuu
Ọ na-ekwu na ọ bụ mgbe ọ bụ nwata ka ọ malitere ịbụ abụ ma kweta na ọ rọrọ nrọ ịnọ na Broadway na ọ tụghị anya ịbanye na otu egwu pop
Ọ na-eji onye nchịkwa olu na-azụ ọzụzụ, ma mụọ Etta James na Aretha Franklin ọba maka mkpali olu

O kwupụtala Guns N 'Roses, Gwen Stefani, Enweghị obi abụọ, Joan Jett, The Runaways, Madonna, Pat Benatar, Green Day, Alanis Morissette, Fiona Apple, Chrissie Hynde, na Debbie Harry si Blondie dị ka mmetụta egwu ya
