Ashleigh Megan Plumptre (amụrụ na 8 Mee 1998) bụ onye na-agba bọọlụ nke na-agba ọsọ dị ka onye na-azụ Leicester City na English Women's Super League na ndị otu mba Naịjịria
Onye bụbu onye ntorobịa mba England, o mere nke mbụ ya na Naịjirịa na Febụwarị 2022
A mụrụ ya na Leicester, Plumptre tolitere ma gaa ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị na Melton Mowbray
Ọ malitere ịgba bọọlụ mgbe ọ dị afọ anọ mgbe ọ sonyeere Asfordby Amateurs
Mgbe ọ dị afọ asatọ, ọ sonyeere Leicester City Centre of Excellence, nọrọ afọ asaa na klọb ahụ na-egwuri egwu site na n'okpuru iri ruo n'okpuru iri ise
Ọ hapụrụ Leicester iji sonye n'òtù ndị na-erubeghị afọ iri na asaa nke Birmingham City na 2013 ebe o nwekwara ohere ịzụlite na ndị otu WSL 1
N'afọ 2014, Plumptre sonyeere ndị otu FA Women's Premier League nke atọ Derby County's Centre of Excellence
Plumptre sonyeere WSL 1 n'akụkụ Notts County na 2014
O mere nke mbụ ya na 24 Ọgọstụ 2014, dị ka onye na-anọchi Caitlin Friend na nkeji nke 57 na mmeri Liverpool
N'ime nke a, ọ ghọrọ onye kachasị nta na Notts County na-amalite na 16 afọ 108 ụbọchị
O bidoro nke mbụ ya na 1 Xia1 WSL 1 draw na Manchester City na 3 Septemba
Ụbọchị anọ ka e mesịrị, ọ pụtara dị ka onye nnọchi anya na mmalite nke oge mgbakwunye n'oge mmeri ikpeazụ nke League Cup na Arsenal
N'abalị mbụ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 2015, Plumptre bụ onye nnọchi anya a na-ejighị mee ihe maka asọmpi FA Women's Cup Final nke afọ 2015, nke mbụ a ga-egwu na Wembley Stadium
Ọ gbara goolu mbụ ya na naanị goolu ya maka Notts County na 30 Ọgọstụ 2015 na mmeri nke 5o0 League Cup n'ụlọ ya na Yeovil Town nke abụọ
Notts County ruru na ngwụcha nke League Cup na 2015, Arsenal meriri ya na Plumptre bụ onye a na-ejighị mee ihe maka ngwụcha iko nke abụọ n'usoro
N'afọ 2016, Plumptre kwagara United States igwu bọọlụ kọleji na Mahadum nke Southern California
Dị ka onye ọhụrụ, o mere 17 nnọchi anya dị ka onye na-agba bọọlụ n'etiti USC Trojans gụnyere na agba ọ bụla nke NCAA postseason
Ọ gbara nkeji iri abụọ na asaa nke asọmpi College Cup nke ikpeazụ ka USC meriri West Virginia 3o1 iji nweta asọmpi nke abụọ nke mba n'akụkọ ihe mere eme
Ọ gbara goolu mbụ ya na kọleji na 22 Ọktoba 2017, onye mmeri egwuregwu na mmeri 2 na 1 na Washington State
Mgbe ọ malitere naanị ugboro abụọ n'ime 17 ọzọ dị ka onye nọ n'afọ nke abụọ, ọ ghọrọ onye mbido dị ka onye na-eto eto na 2018, malite na 19 n'ime 20 pụtara
N'afọ 2019, Plumptre gbanwere ka ọ na-egwu egwuregwu etiti ma malite egwuregwu 23 USC niile n'oge oge ahụ nke gụnyere ọsọ postseason na NCAA Tournament quarter-finals
A nabatara arụmọrụ ya n'otu n'otu na ndị otu mbụ nke All-Pacific na ndị otu nke abụọ nke All-Pac-12 na 2019
N'ịga n'ihu na nkà mmụta ihe ndị dị ndụ mmadụ, ihe ịga nke ọma agụmakwụkwọ Plumptre mere ka ọ nweta nkwado agụmakwụkwọ Pac-12 na 2017 na 2018
A kpọkwara ya aha na 2018 CoSIDA Academic All-District nke abụọ na 2019 United Soccer Coaches Scholar All-America nke abụọ
Na Machị 2019, Plumptre bịanyere aka na UWS na LA Galaxy OC n'oge oge kọleji
Ndị otu ahụ mechara nke abụọ na West Conference n'azụ Calgary Foothills n'oge oge oge tupu ha emeri asọmpi ikpeazụ megide otu mmegide ahụ

N'ọnwa Disemba 2019, Plumptre họpụtara ịhapụ 2020 NWSL College Draft na-apụta na kọleji n'agbanyeghị na ọ na-eme atụmatụ dị ka agba nke mbụ ma ọ bụ agba nke abụọ ma laghachi England, laghachi na klọb obodo Leicester City na FA Women's Championship
A kọrọ na Foxes merikwara asọmpi FA WSL na mbinye aka ya
O mere nke mbụ ya na Leicester City na 19 Jenụwarị 2020, na-edebanye aha enyemaka na goolu Ella Rutherford na mmeri 3 na 1 na Crystal Palace
Oge izizi Plumptre na Leicester bụ naanị ugboro atọ ọ pụtara na league ka oge ahụ belatara n'ihi ọrịa coronavirus
E nyere Leicester ọnọdụ nke isii na akara ọ bụla n'egwuregwu ọ bụla
Tupu oge nke afọ 2020, King Power weghaara Leicester City Women ebe ọ bụbu klọb nwere onwe ya nke nwere njikọ na Foxes
Klọb ahụ ghọrọ ọkachamara zuru oke maka oge mbụ na usoro ahụ

N'ụbọchị nke anọ n'ọnwa Eprel 2021, Leicester City meriri London City Lionesses n'asọmpi league site na mmeri nke iri na abụọ ha meriri n'asọmpị league site n'ịmeri ha meriri otu ndị mmegide ahụ n'ụbọchị nke mbụ n'ọnwarị 2020
Nsonaazụ ahụ mere ka Leicester nweta nkwalite mbụ ha na FA WSL kachasị elu

N'agbanyeghi ihe dị ịrịba ama n'oge okpomọkụ iji dọta ndị nwere nkà WSL na mgbalị nke otu ahụ maka nkwalite, Plumptre nọgidere na-abụ onye isi ma na-egwuri egwu na egwuregwu niile ma e wezụga otu n'oge mmeri ahụ yana egwuregwu anọ niile nke League Cup ka Leicester ruru ọkwa knockout maka oge mbụ tupu mmeri na ọkara ikpeazụ
Plumptre nọchitere anya England n'okpuru afọ 15, n'okpuru 17, n'okpuru 19 na n'okpuru 23 gụnyere na asọmpi abụọ 2014 na 2015 UEFA Women's Under-17 Championship
N'ịbụ onye na-aga n'ihu ma ọ bụ onye na-awakpo n'etiti etiti n'ọkwa ndị ntorobịa, ọ gbara bọọlụ ugboro abụọ n'oge mmeri 9 na Moldova na 2015 UEFA Women's Under-17 Championship qualifying round
N'afọ 2016, Plumptre dị afọ iri na asaa bụ onye ọkpụkpọ kachasị nta aha ya na ndị otu na-erubeghị afọ iri abụọ na atọ maka asọmpi La Manga nke afọ 2016
O mere ngụkọta 30 na ọkwa ndị ntorobịa, na-agba goolu 10
N'ịbụ onye gosipụtara mmasị na mbụ na-anọchite anya Naijiria na ọkwa dị elu na June 2021, Plumptre natara oku mbụ ya maka ogige ọzụzụ ụbọchị asatọ e mere na Austria n'ọnwa na-esote
Ọ ruru eru igwu egwu maka Naịjirịa site n'aka nna nna ya, onye Yoruba si Lagos
O mere nke mbụ na-abụghị nke gọọmentị na 23 Julaị 2021, malite na mmeri enyi na enyi na Slovenia 1
SŽNL klọb Olimpija Ljubljana
N'ọnwa Nọvemba 2021, ọ gara ogige ọzụzụ na Naịjirịa
Na ngwụcha Disemba 2021, FIFA wepụrụ ya ka ọ nọchite anya Naịjirịa
O mere nke mbụ ya na 18 Febụwarị 2022, malite na mmeri 2 na Ivory Coast n'oge 2022 Africa Women Cup of Nations qualification
A mụrụ nna nna Plumptre na Naijiria
Ọ tolitere na-akwado Leicester City ma gaa ngagharị mgbe ndị otu ụmụ nwoke meriri 2015 na Premier League
N'afọ 2017, a kpọrọ Plumptre na White House dị ka akụkụ nke USC's National Championship winning celebrations
dị ka nken10 14, 3 octọba 2022

Ashley Callie (30 Disemba 1976 ruo Febrụwarị 15 ,2008) bụ onye ome ihe nkiri South Africa, onye amaaraa maka ọrụ ya dị ka Leone Haines na Isidingo (2000–08)
Ọ nwụrụ na 15 Febrụwarị 2008, n'ihi mmerụ ahụ n'isi site na mgbako ụgbọ ala na Johannesburg, South Africa na 8 February 2008
A mụrụ Ashley Callie na Johannesburg
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ St Mary Onye mechara nweta akara ugo mmụta BA Honors na nka omume ihe nkiri na Mahadum Witwatersrand
Ọ malitere ọrụ ya site na mmepụta SABC TV, Homeland, nke Neil Sundstrom duziri

Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ gbara n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri, gụnyere Natural Rhythm na United Quest Ọ nọrọkwa ụfọdụ oge na Cape Town, bụ ebe ọ Sonyere n'ọtụtụ mgbasa ozi maka ahịa mpaghara South Africa yana ahịa mba ofesi

N'abalị iri na ise n'onwa Maachị 2007, ọ gwara magazin Top Billing na ịrụ ọrụ nke Lee Haines na Isidingo abụwo ọchịchọ ogologo ndụ; ọ bụbu onye na-akwado soap opera South Africa kemgbe ọ malitere na 1998
N'ajụjụ ọnụ ya, ọ kọwara etu o si kpọghị aha ama nke bịara na onye ama ama ya, yana ka ezinụlọ ya si bụrụ akụkụ dị oke mkpa na ndụ ya
Ọ kọwakwara ihe kpatara àgwà ya, bụ Lee Haines, adịghị ka ya ma ọlị
N'ime afọ ahụ, ọ pụtara na akwụkwọ mkpuchi nke Top Billing

Nakwa na 2007, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na fim na Netherland mbụ Achọ uru ịkpọ ya Surprise; Otú ọ dị, a gbanwere aha ahụ ka ọ bụrụ Mafrika na mgbe ahụ ndị na-emepụta ya kwere nkwa inyefe ihe nkiri ahụ na ncheta Callie
Ewezuga Isidingo (nke o jigidere site na 2000 ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ na 2008), Callie bụ onye nwe ụlọ ọgbakọ mmekọrịta La Vista, na Melville, Gauteng mana o rere òkè ya na 2007
Na 2006, maka ọrụ ya na Isidingo, ọ ritere South Africa Film and Television Awards (SAFTA) maka onye na-eme ihe nkiri kacha mma
Ihe nrite ka emere n'abali iri abụọ na asatọ nke ọnwa Octoba 2006, na Edetu Gallagher na Johannesburg, South Africa
N'abalị iri abụọ na iteghete nke ọnwa Febrụwarị 2008, e nyere ya ihe nrite Mzansi Star Actress na emume nturu ugo nke Stars of Mzansi, nke emere na ụlọ ihe nkiri steeti South Africa na Johannesburg
Ndị otu Isidingo ibe ya bụ Robert Whitehead na Steven Miyambo nabatara ihe nrite a n'aha ya

Mgbe ọ nwụsịrị, onye minista na-ahụ maka nkà na omenala South Africa, Dr Zwelinga Pallo Jordan kpọrọ Callie ihe oyiyi ọhụrụ nke South Africa 'Anyị nwere n'ezie ihuoma maka inwe nwata, onye nwere nkà, South Africa,' ka o kwuru, 'onye gbatịpụrụ ihe niile bụ akwara dị n'ahụ ya iji gosipụta echiche nke ọha mmadụ dị n'otu, ndị na-abụghị ndị nkocha akpụ̀kpa ahụ na ndị na-abụghị nwoke ma ọ bụ nwanyị
ozi ahụ na-awụ akpata oyi n'ahụ ma wute ya'

Na 8 February 2008, Callie nọ na-ala site na mmeghe Pirelli Calendar na Hyde Park, mgbe ụgbọ ala ya kụ̀kọtara nke red Renault na akuku 4th Avenue n'okporo ụzọ Tana (na Linden ), n'oge dị ka 22 30 SAST
E bugara ya n'ụlọ ọgwụ General nke Johannesburg, ebe a wara ya ahụ iji belata nrụgide n'ụbụrụ ya

Ụbọchị anọ ka e mesịrị, nwanne ya nwanyị nke obere Lauren Callie gwara ndị mgbasa ozi na a sịrị na Callie nọ n'ọnọdụ emeharighị ahụ̀ n'ụlọ ọgwụ; Otú ọ dị ọ nwụrụ na Febrụwarị 15 site na nsogbu nke mmerụ ahụ ọ nwetara
Emere emume ncheta Callie na 21 Febrụwarị 2008, na ọgbakọ obodo Johannesburg

Omume Callie, Lee Haines, ka anọgidere na-egosipụta na nlereanya site na Febrụwarị ruo Maachị 2008 kemgbe Endemol, ụlọ ọrụ na-emepụta mmepụta ahụ, ka nwere ihe nkiri n'egosiputabeghi nke onye na-eme ihe nkiri ahụ; Otú ọ dị, àgwà e mesịrị dee si mgbe ọ na-apụ n'anya mgbe bụ ọ matara maka ọnwụ nne ya, na mgbe ahụ egosipụ̀taghikwa ka nke a si mee n'ezie
N'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe onye na-eme ihe nkiri nwụsịrị, ndị uweojii na Johannesburg Metro wepụtara nkwupụta, na-eche na Callie nwere ike ịnwe ụta maka ihe mberede ya
Dị ka nkwupụta gọọmentị si kwuo, Callie nyara ụgbọ n'akụkụ ụzọ na-ezighi ezi
Ọ bụ ezie na mmanya nwere ike ịbụ ihe kpatara ya, dị ka ọnye na-nekwuchitere metro Johannesburg, Edna Mamonya si kwuo, ọ dịghịkwa ọbara ndị ọkwọ ụgbọala n'oge ihe ahụ mere a nwalere maka mmanya ike
Otú ọ dị, na 28 August 2008, onye ọkwọ ụgbọ ala nke abụọ pụtara n'ụlọ ikpe nke Randburg , ebubo igbu ọchụ na-enweghị isi na ịkwọ ụgbọala na-enweghị isi
Isi mmalite na-akọwa ebubo ahụ dị ka 'triple-whammy' maka ezinụlọ ya nna ya gburu onwe ya otu ọnwa mgbe ihe mberede ahụ gasịrị, nne ya nwere ihe mberede nke ya n'April 2008
Ebubo ahụ bịara dị ka ihe ijuanya; Ezinụlọ ahụ nọ na-atụ anya 'nanị ịnụ ihe'
N'oge ihe mberede ahụ,onye ọkwọ ụgbọ ala ahụ akpọghị aha bu ndị enyi ise tinyerekwara onwe ya n'ugbọ ahụ
Onye isi mkpọpụ ikpe nke steeti ahụ kwuru na steeti ahụ nwere onye aka ebe dị na ọ hụrụ ihe merenụE yigharịrị ikpe ahụ ka onye ọkwọ ụgbọ ala ahụ nwee ike ikpọta onye mkpechite
N'abalị atọ nke ọnwa Octoba 2008, onye ọkwọ ụgbọ ala pụtara na onye ọka iwu ya, Ronald Lotz
E yigharịrị ikpe ahụ ọzọ na Nọvemba 2008
Lotz rịọrọ oge ịhọpụta ọkachamara ka ọ nyochaa docket ahụ
E yigharịrị ikpe ahụ ọzọ na Nọvemba 20,2008
Magistrate Fatima Khan yigharịrị ọzọ na 14 Jenụwarị 2009 inye Lotz oge iji nyochaa agba foto nke ihe mberede ahụ
O nweburu ike nyochaa naanị nke oji na nke ọcha
Mgbe e nweghachiri nnọkọ na 14 Jenụarị 2009, e kpebiri ịkwaga ikpe ahụ site na Randburg gaa na Ụlọikpe Majistrete na Johannesburg ka ikike n'ihi nrụrịta ụka okwu ahụ
E yigharịrị ikpe ahụ nke ugboro ise, ruo 13 Febrụwarị 2009
Na 13 February 2009, steeti wepụrụ ikpe megide onye ọkwọ ụgbọ ala nke abụọ
Onye ọka iwu na-agbachitere ya kwuru na enweghị ihe akaebe dị ka ihe kpatara iwepụ ya
Mgbe Graham nọrọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị, ya na ezinụlọ ya kwagara Lincoln, Nebraska
Mgbe ọ na-etolite, a chọpụtara na ọ na-arịa ADD na dyslexia
O nwere ụmụnne nwanyị abụọ ọ tọrọ
Ọ gara Scott Middle School site n'afọ 1999 ruo afọ 2002 wee gaa Lincoln Southwest High School site n'afọ 2002 ruo afọ 2005
Achọpụtara ya na 2000 site na ụlọ ọrụ I & I mgbe ọ na-azụ ahịa na Oak View Mall na Omaha, Nebraska

Graham nyere TED Talk na-akwado ịnabata onwe ya n'ihe gbasara ihe oyiyi ahụ, nke gụnyere ya ile anya n'ime enyo zuru oke ma nwee mkparịtaụka enyi na enyi, ya na akụkụ ahụ ya na-ekwu okwu dịka 'N'azụ abụba, ahụ m ị na-apụta n'elu brọ m taa
Mana nke ahụ dị mma
m ga-ahọrọ ịhụ gị n'anya'
Ụmụ nwanyị etoola Graham na Instagram maka ịkekọrịta foto na-egosi cellulite ya
N'ajụjụ ọnụ ya na Vogue, o kwuru, 'Echere m n'ezie na ahụ m agbanweela ndụ ọtụtụ ndị mmadụ

ejirila m ahụ m dị ka ngwá ọrụ iji kwuo maka isiokwu ndị a machibidoro iwu, dị ka cellulite ma ọ bụ enweghị ntụkwasị obi banyere afọ dị ala nakwa [otú] esi ekwu ndụ n'ime ahụ gị ma soro gị nwee ụdị mkparịta ụka
Amaara m ndụ ndị gbanwere ụmụ agbọghọ na ọbụna ụmụ nwanyị ọgbọ m bụ ndị dere m ma kwuo, 'Enwetụbeghị m akpụkpọ ahụ m nọ na ya ruo mgbe m nụrụ njem gị'

Graham ekwuola na ọ masịghị okwu ahụ bụ 'plus-size', na-ekwu, 'Echere m na mgbe ị na-eji okwu ahụ bụ 'plus-size' ị na-etinye ụmụ nwanyị ndị a niile n'otu ụdị 'Ị naghị eri nri nke ọma' 'Ị naghị arụ ọrụ' 'Ị pụghị ichegbu onwe gị banyere ahụ gị' 'Ị nọ n'udo' 'Ị nweghị obi ike' Nke ahụ abụghị ihe ọ bụla n'ime nke a (na-ezo aka n'ahụ ya)
Ụlọ ọrụ ejiji nwere ike ịnọgide na-akpọ m 'plus-size', mana ọ na-amasị m iche ya dị ka 'size m'
Ashley Titus (28 Disemba 1970 28 Nọvemba 2007), nke a maara nke ọma dị ka Mr Fat, bụ onye na-eti egwu na South Africa, onye na-agụ egwu na onye na-eme ihe ngosi telivishọn
A mụrụ Titus na Bonteheuwel, Cape Flats, South Africa
Ọ malitere ime egwu hip hop na 1980s, yana ịkwado ihe ngosi hip hop na Bush Radio

N'afọ ndị 1990 ọ rapara maka otu hip hop nke Cape Flats bụ Brasse vannie Kaap, bụ ndị meriri ndị na-ege ntị gafere ma egwu na agbụrụ, na-adọta ndị hip hop na ndị na-akwado egwu rock nke agbụrụ dị iche iche; a makwaara ha maka ojiji ha na-eji asụsụ Afrikaans eme ihe na egwu ha
Na BVK, a makwaara ya maka itinye aka siri ike na obodo, ilekwasị anya na egwu na nsogbu Cape Flats, na mgbalị ịbịakwute ndị ntorobịa nọ n'ụlọ mkpọrọ dị n'ógbè ahụ
Na mbido ruo n'etiti afọ ndị 2000, Titus gosipụtara ihe ngosi magazin a na-akpọ Hip Hop maka ọwa egwu MK89
Nke a lekwasịrị anya na ihe nkiri hip hop nke South Africa mgbe ọ na-egwuri egwu vidiyo site n'aka ndị na-ese ihe mba ụwa
A kpọgara Titus n'ụlọ ọgwụ n'ọnwa Ọktoba nke afọ 2007 n'ihi mkpesa obi nke ibu ya kpatara, mana a hapụrụ ya mgbe izu abụọ gasịrị
N'ọnwa sochirinụ, a kpọghachiri ya n'ụlọ ọgwụ na ọrịa ahụ, mana ọ nwụrụ n'ụtụtụ nke Novemba 28 na Groote Schuur Hospital na Cape Town, South Africa
Nne ya na nne nne ya hapụrụ ya
E mere emume olili ozu ya na 3 Disemba na chọọchị Metọdist dị na Bonteheuwel
Ashley Walters bụ onye na-ese ihe na South Africa nke na-arụ ọrụ foto na ihe nkiri
A mụrụ Walters na 1983 na Uitsig, mpaghara Cape Town, kilomita isii n'ebe ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Cape Town International Airport
N'afọ 1991, otu enyi ezinụlọ nke na-ese foto ihe omume obodo mere ka Walters mara foto
N'afọ 1996, Walters nwetara igwefoto ihe nkiri 35 mm mbụ ya
Ozugbo Walters nwetara kọmputa na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị, nnwale na njikwa oyiyi dijitalụ ga-ekwe omume
Walters malitere guba akwụkwọ n'afọ 2000 na ụlọ akwụkwọ St
Andrews High School tupu ọ gaa azụmaahịa na kọleji
O nwetara BA na Fine Art (2011) site na Mahadum nke Cape Town's Michaelis School of Fine Art
Walters na-eme afọ nke abụọ nke MA na Fine Art na Michaelis ugbu a
Ọrụ ya 'Na-agbanye gburugburu usoro nke nhazi mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya ma na-enyocha mmekọrịta dị n'etiti ihe owuwu mmekọrịta mmadụ na eze na oghere'
Ọrụ ya bụ Xray (2009), Fear (2009), Malawi (2010), Uitsig (2010) na Dark City (2011)
2013 Research Fellow Centre for Curating the Archive, Mahadum nke Cape Town
Ashoka (304 - 232 TOA) bụ eze ukwu nke atọ nke Alaeze Ukwu Maurya nke subcontinent India n'oge 268 ruo 232 TOA
Ọ bụ Eze India kacha ukwuu n'oge niile
Alaeze ya kpuchiri akụkụ buru ibu nke mpaghara India, na-esi na Afghanistan nke ugbu a dị n'ebe ọdịda anyanwụ ruo Bangladesh ugbu a dị n'ebe ọwụwa anyanwụ, isi obodo ya na Pataliputra
Onye na-akwado okpukpe Buddha, a na-ekwu na ọ na-ekere òkè dị mkpa na mgbasa nke okpukpe Buddha n'ofe Eshia oge ochie
Aha Ashour bụ aha nna
Ndị ama ama nwere aha nna gụnyere
Ashraf Abdel Baqi (Arabic أشرف عبد الباقي, a mụrụ na 1963) bụ onye Egypt na-eme ihe nkiri
A mụrụ Ashraf Abdel Baqi na Hada'iq El Qobbah, ọ bụ ya kacha nta, nwere ụmụnne ise tọrọ ya, ụmụnne atọ na ụmụnne nwanyị abụọ
Ọ gara Ahmed Maher Elementary School, ma gụsịrị akwụkwọ na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Nokrashy
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na abụọ, Ashraf malitere iso nna ya na-arụ ọrụ dịka onye ọrụ ngo, na-etinye oge ya n'oge ọkọchị na oge oyi iji nyere aka na ụlọ ọrụ ahụ
Ọ malitere ime ihe nkiri mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na isii n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na-ekere òkè n'ihe karịrị egwuregwu iri asatọ, ma ọ bụ n'ihu ma ọ bụ na azụ
N'oge a, ndị mụrụ ya ekwenyeghị n'echiche nke ime ihe nkiri, ọkachasị nne ya, ebe ọ na-atụ egwu na ọ ga-emetụta agụmakwụkwọ ya
Otú ọ dị, ndị nne na nna Abdel Baqi mechara gbanwee echiche ha mgbe ọ natara nkwado site n'aka nwanne ya nwoke nke okenye, onye kpọọrọ ha ịhụ otu n'ime egwuregwu Ashraf
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na asatọ, ọ meghere ụlọ ọrụ nke ya na-ahụ maka Aluminum na ọla dị iche iche
Abdel Baqi wee gaa n'ihu na-agụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum Ain Shams na-agụsị akwụkwọ na klas nke 86' na nzere azụmahịa
N'oge ahụ, ọ malitere ịmụ ihe n'onwe ya na Higher Institute for dramatic arts n'etiti afọ 1985 - 1987
N'ebe ahụ, ọ zutere ndị ọzọ na-eme ihe nkiri ga-aghọ ezigbo ndị enyi Abdel Baqi, gụnyere Alaa Wali Eddin, Mohamed Henedi, Tarek Lotfy, na Alaa Morsy
Ọ nọgidere na-arụ ọrụ ya dịka onye ọrụ ngo n'oge a, na-emeghe ihe ngosi Decor na ọfịs ya na otu n'ime ụmụnne ya ndị okenye
Abdel Baqi mechiri ụlọ ọrụ ahụ mgbe ọrụ ya dị ka onye na-eme ihe nkiri malitere

Ashraf Fahmy bụ onye nduzi ihe nkiri Ijipt, nke na-arụsi ọrụ ike na ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri Ijipti kemgbe ngwụcha afọ 1960
E nyere ya otuto site na ịmalite ọrụ ya ma duzie ihe nkiri mbụ ya (The Killers - n'asụsụ Arabic القتلة) nke onye na-eme ihe nkiri Salah Zulfikar na-eme nnukwu ihe ịga nke ọma

Fahmy bụ onye nduzi nwere obi ike nke a na-ahụkarị na mmemme ihe nkiri n'ụwa niile, na mgbakwunye, o dere edemede nke ihe nkiri atọ gụnyere (Until The End of Lifetime), nke a na-ewere dị ka ihe nkiri ya a kachasị echeta

Ashraf Fahmy nwetara nzere Bachelor of Arts (History major) na Mahadum Cairo na 1961, mgbe ahụ ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Egyptian High Cinema Institute na Giza na 1963 iji malite ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri Egypt, mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị ọ gụrụ Directing na Mahadim California site na 1964 ruo 1967
A mụrụ Ashraf Fahmy ma zụlite ya na Cairo, ọ bụ nwa nwoke nke a mụrụ nye nna Ijipt nke ezinụlọ dị elu nke Cairo na nne Turkish

Ọ lụrụ nwanyị ugboro abụọ ma nwee otu nwa nwoke Mostafa Ashraf Fahmiطفى مصطفى أشرفي na ụmụ nwanyị abụọ Jala Fahmy جالا ڕاستي site na nne dị iche na Ingy, Ọ nwụrụ na mbido afọ 2001 n'oge ịwa ahụ obi na-ahapụ ihe ncheta na sinima Ijipt

Ebe ọ bụ na ihe nkiri mbụ ya (The Killers - n'asụsụ Arabic القتلة) nke onye na-eme ihe nkiri Egypt bụ Salah Zulfikar mere ka ọ nwee ihe ịga nke ọma na ụlọ ọrụ ịkụ nzọ, ihe nkiri ya nke afọ 1970s, 1980s na 1990s nyere ya aha dị ka onye nduzi nke ihe egwu
O sonyere na Cinema Council Adarhmassh na 1969, e wee họpụta ya dị ka Onye isi oche nke ndị nduzi nke Studios, Production na High investment na 1977
N'oge ọrụ ya niile, ọ duziri, dee ma mepụta ihe nkiri 50
Emume ihe nkiri Egypt, Middle East & International sọpụrụ Fahmy
Ihe nrite ya a ma ama bụ maka ihe nkiri ndụ ọhụrụ na mmemme ihe nkiri Dok Leipzig nke Leipzig, East Germany
Onye na-eme ihe nkiri Salah Zulfikar
Salah Zulfikar
Ashraf Garda bụ onye mgbasa ozi na South Afrika

Ọ bụ onye na-eme ihe ngosi redio na SAfm ma na-akwado ihe ngosi 'Media@SAfm', yana 'Afternoon Talk' nke SAfm wee bụrụ onye na-akwado mmemme nyocha nke South African Broadcasting Corporation 'Special Assignment' na Eprel 2011
N'oge 2010 World Cup Ashraf nyere nyocha na egwuregwu yana nyocha mmetụta mmekọrịta nke World Cup na CNN, Al Jazeera, CBC Canada na SABC 2's Morning Live
A mụrụ ya na Johannesburg, South Africa na 4 June 1962
Ashraf na ndị mụrụ ya biri na Fietas ruo mgbe ha kwagara Lenasia n'ihi Group Areas Act nke ọchịchị ịkpa ókè agbụrụ South Afrika
Ọ lụrụ Jamela Cassim ma ha abụọ malitere azụmahịa na-ere akwa na Oriental Plaza, nke a na-akpọ 'Fabric Fantasy'
Ntinye Ashraf na redio malitere mgbe ọ kwadoro ihe ngosi egwuregwu na ụlọ ọrụ redio obodo 'Radio az-Zaheer' na mgbe e mesịrị 'Voice,954fm'
Ashraf rutere ọrụ akụkọ egwuregwu na ụlọ ọrụ redio South Africa a ma ama 5fm ma mesịa na SAfm
Garda ugbu a na-akwado ihe ngosi 'Afternoon Talk' site na elekere nke abuo ruo elekere nke anọ nke ehihie kwa ụbọchị obụla ma na-eme ihe ngosi Media@SAfm kwa Sunday 9-11am
Garda na-abụkarị onye ọbịa na-akwado 'Interface', ihe ngosi ihe omume SABC na-eduga ugbu a ma bụrụ onye na-elekọta mmemme nyocha nyocha nke SABC 'Special Assignment'
2007 South African Breweries Sports insert of the year (Safm)
2012 Turquoise Harmony Institute Nkụzi Ubuntu na ihe nrite nke mkparịta ụka (ihe nrite mgbasa ozi)
Ashu Kasim Rabo (amụrụ n'abalị iri abụọ n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 1984) bụ onye Ethiopia na-agba ọsọ ogologo oge onye nke gbadoro anya na ọkara marathon na ihe omume marathon
Ihe kacha mma ya bụ nkeji 68 56 na awa 2 23 09, n'otu n'otu
O meriri na Istanbul Marathon nke (afọ 2010) na Xiamen Marathon nke (afọ 2012)

Ashu nọchitere anya Ethiopia na mba ụwa ugboro atọ na 2003 IAAF World Half Marathon Championships, na 2006 IAAF World Road Running Championships, nakwa na mita 10,000 na 2007 All-Africa Games (ebe ọ bụ nke anọ)
O zoro na 2003 IAAF World Half Marathon Championships na Vilamoura, Portugal ma mechie na ebe iri anọ na asaa
N'ịgba ọsọ na 2006 IAAF World Road Running Championships, ọ mechara nke iri na asaa ma nyere ndị otu Ethiopia nke Dire Tune na Teyba Erkesso aka inweta ihe nrite ọlaọcha
Ọ gara n'ihu nwee ihe ịga nke ọma n'okporo ụzọ n'afọ sochirinụ dịka ọ bụ onye nke anọ na mita 10,000 na 2007 All-Africa Games
O meriri na 15K Boilermaker Road Race na 2008
Ashu mere marathon mbụ ya na afọ 2009 Paris Marathon ma dekọọ nke kacha mma nke 2 25 49 maka ọnọdụ nke anọ
N'ọnwa Ọktoba, ọ gara Istanbul Marathon dị ka onye nke abụọ n'azụ Bizunesh Urgesa
Ọ gbara ọsọ na 2010 Prague Marathon ma mechie n'ọnọdụ nke atọ na oge nke 2 29 54
Ọ laghachiri Istanbul n'afọ ahụ wee ruo n'elu ikpo okwu na ọsọ ndekọ nke 2 27 25
Ọ bidoro oge 2011 ya site na onye nke abụọ na Houston Marathon, gafee akara mgbe onye Ethiopia ibe ya Mamitu Daska
Ọ lụrụ Daska ọzọ na Paris Marathon na ọnwa Eprel wee merie onye iro ya, mana ọ bụ naanị nke isii n'ozuzu
N'ọnwa Ọktoba, ọ nwara ịgbachitere aha ya na Istanbul Marathon, mana ọ bịara nke anọ mgbe ndị Etiopia ndị ọzọ nwetara ihe nrite na asọmupi ụmụ nwanyị
Ashu meriri na 2012 Xiamen International Marathon na oge kachasị mma nke 2 23 09
Na ọnwa Juun, ọ bụ onye nke abụọ na Freihofer's Run for Women 5K na New York
Na asọmupi nke abụọ ya na China n'afọ ahụ, ọ bụ onye nke abụọ na Feyse Tadese na Shanghai Marathon, gafere akara na 2 24 09 awa
Ọkara marathon kacha mma bịara na afọ 2013 RAK Half Marathon na Febụwarị na-esote, ebe ọ gbara ọsọ 68 56 nkeji iji mechie ọzọ n'azụ Feyse Tadese na nke iri
Ọ nọ n'ọkwa nke anọ na Rome City Marathon na Machị wee merie na Lanzhou Marathon na June
Njem ya kachasị mma bụ nke ikpeazụ ya n'afọ ọ bịara nke atọ na Shanghai Marathon n'ime oge nke 2 26 34
Ashu bụ onye nke abụọ na asọmupi 2014 Seoul International Marathon, na-agwụ n'azụ Helah Kiprop
Asi Archibong-Arikpo (12 Nọvemba 1919 – 22 Nọvemba 2005) bụ onye nlekọta nwanyị dị ime na Naijiria, onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, na onye mmebe ejiji
A mụrụ Asi Archibong na Calabar, nwa nwanyi William Archibong Young na Umo Archibong Young, nne na nna nke agbụrụ Efik
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ Presbyterian Duke Town na Calabar, wee zụọ ya na Dublin, Ireland dị ka onye nlekọta nwanyị dị ime
Archibong-Arikpo bụ onye isi ụlọ ọgwụ na-amụ nwa na Ugep, Naijiria, afọ abụọ
Archibong-Arikpo chụkwara ọrụ na mmebe ejiji
N'afọ 1963, o kwuru na ya na-arụ ọrụ na uwe alumdi nke mba Naijiria
Uwe ya na-achakarị anụnụ anụnụ na ọla edo, agba ndị ejiri mara Ụka Presbyterian
Ọ rere uwe ya iji nweta ego maka ọrụ ozi ụka
Na 1969, e chiri ya echichi dị ka onye okenye na-achị achị na Ụka Presbyterian nke Naijiria
N'afọ 1975, a họpụtara ya ka onyeisi oche nke Na-edu Ụmụ nwanyi Presbyterian na Naijiria, ọrụ ọ rụrụ ruo n'afọ 1982
Dịka onye ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị, a họpụtara ya na Kansụl Munisipa Calabar na 1977, ma jee ozi na ọgbakọ omebe iwu Cross River steeti site na 1979 ruo 1983
Ya na di ya gara United Steeti na 1963 wee kọrọ ndị nta akụkọ okwu banyere ọrụ nke ya dị ka onye nlekọta nwanyi di ime na onye mmebe
Ọ gara Ugwu Amerịka ọzọ na 1969, ya na di ya, bụ́ onye nọ na-agwa United Nations okwu
N'ime oge ndụ ya nke ihe mmezu ụdị dị iche iche, a kwanyere ya ọgwụ ruru ya ma nye ya ọkwa ọchịchị na 1975, ma kpọọ ya 'Nne Nne nke Mba' site n'aka ndị Ọzụzụ Ndị Ụka nke Umu nwanyi na 1990
Asi Archibong zutere Okoi Arikpo na London mgbe ọ bụ nwa akwụkwọ doctoral; Ha lụrụ na London na 1950
Ha nwere otu nwa nwanyị, Itam
Asi Archibong-Arikpo mèchàrà bụrụ nwanyị dị ya nwụrụ mgbe di ya nwụrụ na 1995
Ọ nwụrụ mgbe afọ gara, mgbe ọ dị afọ 86
Asia bu aha bekee ana-kpo obodo na ala ukwu nwere ndi Japan ndi China ma ndi Ndia
Mgbe ozo, adi kpo ya Eurasia kama ala ndi ocha ana-kpo Mpaghara Russia no la ya
Afrịka soto ya na onu agugu madu bi na ya

Asida (Arabic) bụ nri sitere na Maghreb
Ọ bụ ụyọkọ ntụ ọka, nke a na-enweta site na ịpị ntụ ọka n'ime mmiri na-esi ísì, mgbe ụfọdụ na-agbakwunye bọta ma ọ bụ mmanụ aṅụ
Dị ka Fufu, a na-eri ya karịsịa na mba ndị dị na North Africa
A na-ewere ya dị ka otu n'ime nri ndị kachasị ewu ewu na nri ọdịnala n'ọtụtụ mba Arab
Asida na-ewu ewu na Libya, Algeria, Tunisia, Ethiopia, Eritrea, na Middle East ndị ọzọ
Dị ka ọtụtụ nri ọdịnala nke mba ndị a, a na-ejikarị aka eri ya, na-enweghị iji arịa

A na-ejikarị ya eme ihe n'oge ezumike okpukpe dị ka Mawlid na Eid, a na-ejikwa ya eme ihe na ememe ọdịnala ndị ọzọ, dịka ọmụmaatụ na-eso ọmụmụ nwa, dị ka nke a na-akpọ 意aqīqah, ịkpụ ntutu nke nwa ọhụrụ ụbọchị asaa mgbe amuchara
Nri dị mfe, ma ọ bara ọgaranya, nke a na-erikarị na-enweghị nri ndị ọzọ, a na-enye ya n'oge nri ụtụtụ ma na-enyekwa ya ụmụ nwanyị na-arụ ọrụ
Okwu asida bụ okwu Arabic nke sitere na mgbọrọgwụ ع Gin (asad), nke pụtara 'gbagọ ya'
Otu n'ime usoro nri mbụ e dere ede maka asida dị n'akwụkwọ nri Arabic nke narị afọ nke iri nke Ibn Sayyar al-Warraq kpọrọ Kitab al-Ṭabīī (Arabic , The Book of Dishes)
A kọwara ya dị ka pudding siri ike nke mkpụrụ osisi e ji bọta (samn) sie
A kpọtụrụ usoro nri maka asida aha n'akwụkwọ nri Hispano-Muslim na-amaghị aha nke malitere na narị afọ nke 13
Na narị afọ nke 13 na nke 14, n'ógbè ugwu nke Rif n'ụsọ oké osimiri Mediterenian nke Morocco, a na-eji ntụ ọka e ji ọka bali e siri esi mee ihe n'ọnọdụ ntụ ọka wit
Leo Africanus (ihe dị ka 1465-1550), onye Arab na-eme nchọpụta a maara dị ka Hasan al-Wazan na ụwa Arab, dere usoro nri maka asida nke na-agbakwunye mmanụ mkpụrụ argan
Dị ka onye ọkà mmụta French bụ Maxime Rodinson si kwuo, asida bụ nri a na-ahụkarị n'etiti ndị Bedouin nke pre-Islamic na, ma eleghị anya, oge ndị ọzọ
A na-eji syrup na-atọ ụtọ nke ukwu, na-abụkarị date ma ọ bụ carob syrup (rub), kamakwa na mmanụ aṅụ na-enye ụdị asida nke Libya
Tinyere bọta a gbazere agbaze gburugburu asida n'onwe ya
A na-enye ụdị nri a nke Tunisia ma ọ bụ ngwakọta mmanụ aṅụ na bọta ma ọ bụ ihe na-ekpo ọkụ (harissa)
Nke ikpeazụ bụ ihe a na-ahụkarị n'oge na-adịghị anya n'ụbọchị ahụ na nke mbụ n'oge gara aga
A na-ejikarị carob syrup ma ọ bụ date syrup na-eri Asida n'akụkụ ndịda Tunisia
Aseedah ma ọ bụ aseed (Arabic) bụ otu n'ime nri ndị a na-eri na Yemen ma na-ejikarị ya maka nri ehihie, nri abalị, ma ọ bụ ha abụọ
Ihe ndị mejupụtara ya gụnyere ọka wit, mmiri na-esi ísì, na nnu dị ka ọ dị mkpa
A na-etinye ite mmiri na okpomọkụ dị elu ruo mgbe ọ ga-esi
A na-eji nwayọọ nwayọọ, a na-agbakwunye obere ọka wit ma mesịa gwakọta ya ngwa ngwa na nnukwu spoon osisi iji zere ịghọ ụyọkọ
A na-ekwughachi usoro ahụ ruo mgbe ngwakọta ahụ siri ike
Dị ka omenala si dị, onye na-esi nri na-eme ka ite ahụ dị ala ebe ha ji ụkwụ ha jide ite ahụ ma na-emegharị ya nke ọma
N'ikpeazụ, a na-eji aka na-enweghị mmanụ emepụta ntụ ọka na-ekpo ọkụ, na-esi ísì ụtọ ma na-etinye ya n'ime efere osisi sara mbara
Mgbe ụfọdụ, a na-eme mkpọtụ n'etiti Aseedah a kpụrụ akpụ nke a nwere ike itinye tomato chili na-ekpo ọkụ ma ọ bụ Helba, ngwakọta fenugreek nke e ji parsley na galik mee
A na-awụnye nwa atụrụ ma ọ bụ anụ ọkụkọ gburugburu Aseedah
Mgbe ahụ, a na-enye ya ọkụ
A pụkwara iji ọka wit na-acha ọcha, nke na-acha ọbara ọbara mee Aseedah
Ọzọkwa, enwere ike iji mmanụ aṅụ mee ihe kama iji ngwaahịa na chili / Helba
Ọ bụ nri, na-eji naanị mmiri, ntụ ọka, na nnu esi

A na-enye ya na ghee ndị Etiopia a na-akpọ niter kibbeh, berbere (mgwakọta ihe na-esi ísì ụtọ nke Etiopia), ma ọ bụ ọbụna mmiri ara ehi

Asiimwe Evarlyne Buregyeya (amụrụ n'abalị iri abụọ na asatọ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1975) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Uganda, onye isi Captain na onye ọkà n'akparamàgwà mmadụ
Ọ bụkwa onye otu ndị omeiwu nke Uganda nke 10th Parliament na-anọchite anya onye nnọchi anya ndị agha nchekwa nke Uganda
Ọ gara Primary Leaving Examinations na Nyamwegabira Primary School na afọ 1987
N'afọ 1991, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Uganda Certificate of Education na Kihihi High School
O mechara nweta asambodo agụmakwụkwọ nke Uganda Advanced Certificate of Education na 1994
N'afọ 1996, ọ gụsịrị diplọma agụmakwụkwọ ya na National Teachers College, Kabale
O nwetara nzere bachelọ ya na agụmakwụkwọ na Mahadum Ndejje n'afọ 2006
N'afọ 2011, ọ laghachiri na mahadum iji mezue Master of Counselling and Psychology na Mahadum Kampala International
N'afọ 2015, o nwetara diplọma na Health Systems Management site na Galilee Institute, Israel
N'ọnwa Juun, na afọ 2020, a họpụtara ya dịka onye nduzi nke UPDG nke HIV&AIDS
Ọ rụburu ọrụ dị ka osote onye ọchịchị aka ike nke ntụziaka site na afọ 2015 ruo Junn, na afọ 2020, yana dịka osote onye nduzi nke mmemme mgbochi HIV Coordination n'etiti afọ 2012 na afọ 2015
N'afọ 2008-2009, e were ya n'ọrụ dị ka ndị isi na Uganda Military Academy Kabamba
Site na afọ 2001-2006, ọ bụ onye nkuzi na Bombo Military Secondary School ma site na afọ 1997-2000, ọ kụzikwaara na Kihihi High School, kihihi teachers college, St Pius secondary school
Site na afọ 2016 ruo taa, ọ bụ onye omeiwu na Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu nke Uganda
N'ọnwa Mee afọ 2016, ọ ṅụrụ iyi na Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu nke Uganda dị ka onye nnọchi anya UPDF Member of Parliament
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị omebe iwu nke tụụrụ vootu ee na ntinye iwu ahụ iji welie afọ afọ 75 maka ndị na-azọ ọkwa onye isi ala
Asiimwe na-eje ozi na ọrụ ọzọ na Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu nke Uganda dị ka kọmitii na-ahụ maka nje HIV / AIDS na ọrịa ndị metụtara ya na kọmitii gbasara ọrụ nwoke na nwanyị na mmepe mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya

Asiru Olatunde (1918–1993) bụ onye Naijiria na-ese ihe, onye na-akpụ ụzụ, na onye na-ese ihe, a na-ewerekarị ya dị ka otu n'ime ndị na-ese ihe a ma ama si Osogbo

Ọ bụ otu n'ime obere ìgwè ndị na-ese ihe bụ ndị so na obodo okike nke a maara dị ka Oshogbo School of art Ihe atụ ya gbara gburugburu akụkọ ifo ndị Yoruba yana akụkọ Bible, tinyere akụkọ ọdịnala obodo

A mụrụ Asiru Olatunde n'ime ezinụlọ nke ndị na-akpụ ụzụ mana ọrịa manyere ya ịhapụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-akpụ ụzụ na 1960s, ọ kpụrụ ụzụ nwa oge iji ree n'ahịa, tupu ọ banye na eserese na ndụmọdụ nke Uilli Beier na Suzanne Wenger na 1961
Ọ nakweere usoro a maara dị ka repousse metalwork, nke na-agụnyekarị ịkpụzi ọla kọpa, aluminum na ígwè iji nweta ihe osise ya, o kere ihe oyiyi anụmanụ site na ọla kọpa na aluminum
E gosipụtara ihe ngosi ya na isi ụlọ ọrụ IMF, yana Smithsonian Institution
Ọ nwụrụ n'afọ 1993

Asisat Lamina Oshoala MON (amụrụ n'abalị itoolu n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 1994) bụ onye Naijiria na-agba bọọlụ nke na-agba ọsọ dị ka onye na-agbachitere otu egwuregwu Primera División FC Barcelona Femení ma bụrụkwa onye isi otu ụmụ nwanyị Naijiria

A na-ewere ya dị ka otu n'ime ndị egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị Afrịka kachasị ukwuu n'oge niile na otu n'etiti ndị kachasị mma n'ụwa, ọ bụ onye bọọlụ bọọlụ nwanyị Afrịka kacha mma n'oge ọ bụla, yana onye na-agba bọọlụ n'afọ ugboro anọ
Oshoala na-egwuri egwu na klọb ndị England Arsenal na Liverpool, klọb China Dailan, na klọbu ndị Naijiria Rivers Angels na FC Robo
O meriri 2015 FA Women's Cup na Arsenal; abụọ league championships na otu iko title na Dalian; na 2019 Copa de la Reina na 201920 Supercopa de España Femenina na Barcelona
Ọ bụ onye egwuregwu Afrịka (na Naijiria) mbụ gbara goolu na UEFA Women's Champions League final ma nyere Barcelona aka iru ọkara ikpeazụ afọ atọ n'usoro, na otu nke ikpeazụ
N'abalị iri na isii n'ọnwa Mee n'afọ 2021, Oshoala ghọrọ nwanyị Afrịka mbụ meriri UEFA Champions League, mgbe Barcelona meriri Chelsea n'asọmpi ikpeazụ
Oshoala bụ onye kacha gbaa goolu na 2014 FIFA U-20 Women's World Cup ma kpọọ ya onye egwuregwu kachasị mma na asọmpi ahụ
A kpọkwara ya onye egwuregwu kachasị mma na onye nke abụọ kacha gbaa goolu na ndị otu Super Falcons bụ ndị meriri 2014 African Women's Championship
Na Septemba 2014, Onye isi ala Naịjirịa Goodluck Jonathan mere Oshoala onye otu Order of the Niger
N'afọ 2021, a kpọrọ aha ya na Forbes 30 Under 30
Na 23 Jenụwarị 2015, Oshoala sonyeere Liverpool na England's Women's Super League
Onye njikwa klọb ahụ, Matt Beard, kpọrọ ya 'otu n'ime ndị egwuregwu kachasị mma n'ụwa'
Ọ bụ ezie na asịrị jikọtara ya na klọb ndị ọzọ, obi dị ya ụtọ ịbanye na Liverpool
Ọ bụ onye egwuregwu mbụ si mba Afrịka na-asọ mpi na asọmpi ụmụ nwanyị kachasị elu n'England
N'agbanyeghị na ọ hapụrụ ọnwa abụọ n'afọ 2015 n'ihi mmerụ ahụ n'ikpere, Oshoala gbara goolu atọ n'egwuregwu itoolu ọ gbara dịka ndị na-agbachitere Liverpool mechara n'ọnọdụ nke asaa
Goolu mbụ ya n'oge ahụ bụ mmeghe egwuregwu nke mmeri 2[] megide Birmingham City na Eprel 1
N'oge klọb ahụ meriri Manchester City n'afọ 2, ọ gbara goolu mmeghe egwuregwu na nkeji nke iri
Ọ gbara goolu nke atọ nke klọb ahụ na mmeri 3 na 1 megide Arsenal na 12 Julaị
N'ọnwa Jenụwarị afọ 2016, Liverpool kọrọ na ntinye aka sitere na Arsenal emeela ka nkwekọrịta ntọhapụ dị na nkwekọrịta Oshoala nakwa na ya na klọb London na-ekwurịta okwu onwe onye
Na Machị 2016, Oshoala bịanyere aka na Arsenal
Onye njikwa Arsenal, Pedro Losa kwuru banyere mbinye aka ya, 'Asisat bụ ezigbo nkà ma ga-abụ nnukwu mgbakwunye na ndị otu anyị
Ọ na-agba ọsọ, nwere ụkwụ magburu onwe ya ma gosipụta na ọ nwere ike ịgba goolu n'ihi ya ọ dị ezigbo mma na o kpebiri isonyere anyị
Onye nkuzi Oshoala bụ Edwin Okon na-eje ozi dị ka onye njikwa oge nke otu mba mgbe o nyere ya okpu izizi na mmeri enyi na enyi nke ndị mmeri ụwa Japan na Septemba 2013
A kpọrọ Oshoala dị ka onye egwuregwu kachasị mma na 2014 FIFA U-20 Women's World Cup ma bụrụ onye kacha gbaa goolu na asọmpi ahụ na goolu asaa
A kpọkwara ya onye egwuregwu kachasị mma na onye nke abụọ kacha gbaa goolu na ndị otu Super Falcons bụ ndị meriri 2014 African Women's Championship
Na Septemba 2014, Onye isi ala Naịjirịa Goodluck Jonathan mere Oshoala onye otu Order of the Niger
Onye ọ bụla
Oshoala malitere Asisat Oshoala Foundation na 2019 lekwasịrị anya n'inye ụmụ agbọghọ na-agba bọọlụ n'Africa
Ntọala ahụ na-akwado asọmpi Asisat Oshoala Foundation Football4girls kwa afọ na Lagos
Ọ bụ onye nnọchi anya NIKE
N'afọ 2021, a kpọrọ aha ya na Forbes 30 Under 30
N'ọnwa Ọktoba 2021, a họpụtara ya n'òtù ndụmọdụ teknụzụ FIFA maka uto na ọganihu nke bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị
Onye isi otu ahụ bụ Jill Ellis ma nwee onye Afrịka ibe ya Doreen Nabwire dịka onye otu
Oshoala na-akọ na ndị mụrụ ya enweghị nkwado mgbe ọ hapụrụ ụlọ akwụkwọ iji chụsoo ọrụ bọọlụ
Ọ bụ onye Alakụba
Asiwaju Bọla Ahmed Tinubu (amuru 29 Maachị 1952) bula onye governor Lagos State na Naigeria, 29 Mee 1999 ru 29 Mee 2007
Obu onye ndi Action Congress (AC), bu otu ndi bidoro political party ahu
Na June 8, 2022, Tinubu meriri onye isi ala nke otu pati All Progressive Congress nyere 1271, iji merie osote onye isi ala Yemi Osinbajo na Rotimi Amaechi onye nwetara 235 na 316 n'otu n'otu

Asiwaju Yinka Mafe (4 Febụwarị 1974 - 4 Febụwarị 2020) bụ onye ọka iwu Naịjirịa, nakwa onye isi ndị isi nke Ogun State House of Assembly
Yinka Mafe gara ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị na Igudu Primary school, Warri, Delta steeti
Ọ gakwara ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị Nana, nke dịkwa na Warri, Delta steeti
Maka agụmakwụkwọ ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya, ọ gara Hussey College Warri, ebe o si kwaga kọleji Dom-Domingos, dịkwa na Warri, iji gụchaa ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya
N'afọ 1993, ọ nwetara nnabata iji gụọ iwu na Mahadum Benin
A kpọrọ ya na Nigerian Bar dịka Solicitor nke Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu nke Nigeria mgbe ọ gara Nigerian Law School Victoria Island Lagos n'afọ 2001
Asiwaju Yinka Mafe kwagara UK n'afọ 2004 wee nweta nzere masta ya na International Business Law na Mahadum Cambridge n'afọ 2006
O lere ma gafee ule nnyefe onye ọka iwu ruru eru na London College of Law ebe o nwetara nzere ya iji rụọ ọrụ dị ka onye ọka iwu nke Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu nke England na UK

Asiwaju rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye ọka iwu na ụlọ ọrụ iwu dị iche iche ma mesịa nwee ndị ọka iwu MIB na UK mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ merụrụ ụlọ ọrụ ahụ ma laghachi Nigeria n'afọ 2010 iji gaa n'ihu na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ya
A họpụtara Asiwaju 'Yinka Mafe ka ọ bụrụ Kansụl nke Ward atọ na Sagamu Local Government Legislative Council na Disemba 1998, ọchịchị nke biri na 2002
A hoputara Asiwaju Yinka Mafe dịka onye otu Ogun State House of Assembly n'afọ 2011 o wee bụrụ onye isi oche, Kọmitii Ụlọ na Mmụta, Sayensị na Teknụzụ ma họpụtkwa ya ọzọ na 2015
Ọ nọchitere anya mpaghara Sagamu 1 nke Ogun Steeti na House of Assembly
Ọ bụ onye isi ndị isi

N'oge ntuli aka n'ozuzu nke afọ 2019, Asiwaju Yinka Mafe si na All Progressives Congress (APC) pụọ ma zọọ ọkwa ịnọchite anya Remo Federal Constituency na Federal House of Representatives n'okpuru ikpo okwu nke Allied People's Movement (APM) ma merie
Ọ laghachiri na All Progressives Congress (APC) n'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2019

Onye otu Party of Progress and Socialism, ọ bụ nwanyị mbụ a họpụtara dịka onye isi obodo nke obodo mepere emepe na Morocco
Ọ bụ onye isi obodo Essaouira site na afo 2003 ruo 2009
Mgbe ọ kwụsịrị, Mrs
Chaabi kwuru na ọ ga-ahapụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Otú ọ dị, n'afọ 2016 ọ ghọrọ onye otu ndị omeiwu mba
Morocco na-aga n'ihu na-anọchite anya ụmụ nwanyị kachasị ala na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị n'ebe ugwu Afrịka
Ọ bụ nwa nwanyị nke onye ọchụnta ego Miloud Chaabi, onye isi ala na onye guzobere Ynna Holding, ụlọ ọrụ dịgasị iche iche na-elekwasị anya na ọrụ iwu na akụrụngwa
Asmaa Chaabi gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Westminster na London na afọ 1985
Tinyere ịbụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, onye ọchụnta ego, na onye na-akwado ụmụ nwanyị, Mrs
Chaabi bụkwa onye na-ese ihe na onye ọrụ ebere
Asma El Bakry (28 Ọktoba 1947 - 5 Jenụwarị 2015) (ihe edere dị ka Asmaa El-Bakri na ọdịiche ndị ọzọ) bụ onye nduzi ihe nkiri Egypt, onye edemede na onye na-ese ihe osise
A mụrụ ya na Cairo, ya na nne ya na nwanne ya nwoke kwagara Alexandria dị ka nwa agbọghọ
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ French a ma ama, Notre Dame de Sion na Lycée, wee nweta BA na akwụkwọ French na Mahadum Alexandria na 1970
El Bakry rụrụ ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri ruo ọtụtụ afọ, nke gụnyere dịka onye na-enyere onye nduzi Egypt a ma ama bụ Youssef Chahine aka, yana Saad Arafa na Khairy Beshara
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka odee, onye na-ese ihe osise na onye njikwa mmepụta
O mekwara ọtụtụ ihe nkiri dị mkpirikpi ma rụọ ọrụ na Raymond Depardon's Une Femme en Afrique O mere ihe ngosi mbụ ya dị ka onye nduzi na 1991, Beggars and Nobles, nke ya na ya rụkọkwara

Enwere ike ikwu na ọtụtụ n'ime ihe ndekọ ya na-ekpughe mmasị miri emi na akụkọ ihe mere eme nke Ijipt na ọchịchọ siri ike iji mee ka mmepeanya ya gara aga doo anya na ebumnuche ikpeazụ nke ịkụziri ọgbọ ọhụrụ
Na Dahsha, dịka ọmụmaatụ, ọ na-achọpụta akụkọ ihe mere eme nke ụgbọ mmiri osisi nke ndị Ijipt oge ochie ji ruo n'oge a
Na El Zaher District (Hay el Daher), ọ na-enye ìhè na akụkọ ihe mere eme nke mpaghara ahụ na Cairo, nke Sultan Zaher Bibars guzobere na narị afọ nke iri na atọ
Mmasị ya na mmepeanya Islam pụtara ìhè n'ọrụ ya na Fatimids na Ayubbids

Mgbe ọ na-ese ihe nkiri Mathaf al Iskandariya, ihe ngosi banyere Ebe Ngosi Ihe Mgbe Ochie nke Greco-Roman dị na Alexandria, El Bakry mere ihe nkiri maka iweghachite ihe e chere na ọ bụ ihe fọdụrụ na Pharos nke Alexandria
Mgbe ọ chọpụtara na ọrụ iji mee ka Citadel nke Qaitbay dị nso kwụsie ike na-ebibi ihe ochie oge ochie, ọ gara n'ihu ọha na nchegbu ya, na-amanye ndị ọchịchị Ijipt ịkwụsị ọrụ ha
Asma El Bakry enweghị nkwado nke ezinụlọ ya mgbe ọ bịara n'ọrụ ihe nkiri ya
Nne ya chere na ịgụ akwụkwọ na-azụlite Asma karịa ka ọ na-ekiri ihe nkiri
Ya mere, El Bakry nọ n'onwe ya n'ihe gbasara mmasị ya na ọrụ ihe nkiri, nke malitere na nwata
Mgbe ọ malitere n'ụlọ akwụkwọ, ọ ga-etinye ụmụ klas ya ma rụọ ọrụ onye nduzi n'onwe ya
N'ime afọ ikpeazụ ya na mahadum, ọ gara ihe nkiri A House Made of Sand (Bayt min al-rimâl) na 1972
El Bakry bụ onye mmeri na-egwu mmiri, o wepụtara onwe ya ime ihe siri ike nke ime ka mmiri ghara ịba n'oké osimiri oyi n'ọnọdụ Poussi, onye bụ onye isi
O wepụtara onwe ya iji nyere aka n'ozuzu ya, ma tinye aka na ime ihe nkiri ahụ nke na ọ ghọrọ aka dị mkpa na ebe

Ọ bụ izute Abdel Aziz Fahmy, onye nduzi foto nke ihe nkiri ahụ, nke ga-agbanwe ọnọdụ ndụ ya, n'ihi na ọ bụ ya nyeere ya aka ịbanye na azụmahịa ihe nkiri site n'ikwe ka ọ rụọ ọrụ dị ka onye enyemaka na ihe nkiri ya ọzọ Strangers (Ghorbâń), nke Saad Arafa duziri
Asma Lamnawar (Arabic; a mụrụ n'abalị 25 ọnwa Julaị afọ 1978 na Casablanca, Morocco) bụ onye na-agụ egwu Moroccan
O mere abụ mbụ ya n'afọ 1995 na 'Angham', emume nke Moroccan Radio na TV mepụtara, ebe ọ meriri ihe nrite maka ntụgharị kachasị mma, ọ bụ ezie na ọ na-egbu oge ịmalite ọrụ egwu ya ruo n'afọ 2002
O dekọrọ egwu maka ihe nkiri telivishọn na ihe nkiri Moroccan
Ọ gara njem na otu 'Oriental Mood' na Denmark, Sweden na karịsịa na Egypt
E wepụtara abọm mbụ ya, 'ناري' ('Fiery'), n'afọ 2002
'شي عادي' ('Ihe Dị Mma') ka Art-Jazeera Saudi Arabia wepụtara n'afọ 2005, ya na Abu bụrụ abụ abụọ n'otu afọ ahụ
Ọ bịanyere aka na Rotana n'afọ 2008, wee wepụta abọm 'من ና ና ና ና لبكره' ('Men Hina L Bukhra') n'otu afọ ahụ
E wepụtara abọm ọzọ (Rouh) na Rotana n'afọ 2010
Asma wepụtara abọm Sabiya, nke Rotana mepụtara, n'afọ 2017
Asma Mohamed Abdalla (nke a na-akpọkwa Asmaa, Abdallah, Abdullah; Arabic ) bụ onye nnọchi anya mba Sudan
Ọ ghọrọ nwanyị mbụ na-ahụ maka ihe gbasara mba ofesi na Sudan na mbido Septemba 2019 na kọmitii nke Praịm Minista Abdalla Hamdok, n'oge mgbanwe Sudan na 2019 na ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya
A mụrụ Asma na 1946 na Khartoum
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 1971 na Mahadum nke Khartoum mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ akụ na ụba na sayensị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Asma bụ onye nnọchi anya Sudan, nke Ministri Na-ahụ Maka Ihe Ndị Na-eme ná Mba Ọzọ nke Sudan were n'ọrụ, tupu onye isi ala Omar al-Bashir
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị atọ mbụ nke Ministri Na-ahụ Maka Mba Ọzọ were n'ọrụ
A chụpụrụ Asma n'ụlọ ọrụ ahụ mgbe nnupụisi ọchịchị nke Sudan na 1989 nke mere ka Omar al-Bashir chịa ọchịchị ma kpagbuo ya site na gọọmentị ọhụrụ

Dị ka akwụkwọ ndekọ UNICEF nke 1990, Asma bụ osote onye isi oche nke anọ nke UNICEF Executive Board n'oge 1990/1991 5 Ndepụta UNICEF nke 2010 nke akụkọ ihe mere eme nke UNICEF Executive board na-agbagha nke a, na-azọrọ na Chipo Zindoga si Zimbabwe bụ osote onyeisi oche nke anọ n'oge 90/1991 na 1991/1992 nakwa na Asma abụghị onye otu UNICEF Executive Board, ruo na gụnyere 2010
N'ịzaghachi mkpagbu ya site n'aka gọọmentị al-Bashir, Asma họọrọ ibi na Morocco
Mgbe ọ bi na Morocco, Asma rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye ndụmọdụ maka òtù mba ụwa gụnyere Islamic Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization (ISESCO)
N'oge ngagharị iwe ndị Sudan na 2018, Asma sonyeere ndị agha nnwere onwe na mgbanwe (FFC), na-aghọ onye otu FFC's Foreign Policy team

Praịm Minista Abdalla Hamdok gbakwunyere Asma na ndepụta nke ndị minista FFC nyere ya, n'ihi ọrụ ya na-emegide gọọmentị al-Bashir, nkwado ya maka ngagharị iwe na-akpọ maka mgbanwe ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, na ahụmịhe mmekọrịta ya
Hamdok họọrọ ya n'ihu ndị ọzọ
Asma si otú a ghọọ nwanyị mbụ na-ahụ maka ihe gbasara mba ofesi na Sudan na mbido Septemba 2019 na Transitional Cabinet nke mgbanwe Sudan nke 2019 gaa na ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya

Asma Abulyazeid bụ onye Egypt na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-agụ egwu
Ọ dọtara uche site na arụmọrụ ya nke onye 'Toka' na usoro TV a kpọrọ 'This evening' na 2016, ma sonye n'ọtụtụ usoro na ihe nkiri, sonye n'òtù 'Bahgaga' ma gosipụta ọtụtụ okwu n'ọtụtụ egwu
A mụrụ ya na Cairo, Egypt
Nna ya bu onye Cairo ebe nne ya si Sharqia

Asmaa nwere mmasị ime ihe nkiri site na nwata, mana ọ pụghị ime ihe nkiri n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ya n'ihi enweghị ihe nkiri ụlọ akwụkwọ, mana o mechara nweta ohere ime ihe nkiri na kọleji site na afọ mbụ, na Atelier Theater

Na 'Theater Atelier' ọ nwetara ọzụzụ n'aka onye nduzi Shadi Daly, ma sonye n'ọtụtụ ihe ngosi onwe, nke kachasị ọhụrụ bụ 'Magic Mix of Happiness', nke sonyere n'asọmpi Arab Theater Festival maka 'Sheikh Sultan Al Qasimi Award' maka ihe ngosi ihe nkiri Arab kacha mma maka afọ 2016
N'afọ 2014, o sonyere na usoro 'M hụrụ n'anya' nke Maryam Al Ahmadi, mana ọ bụ obere ọrụ nwere ọtụtụ ihe nkiri
Onye na-emepụta ihe bụ Ahmed Medhat Sadeq, nke Tamer Mohsen duziri, họpụtara ya ka ọ rụọ ọrụ 'Toka' n'uhuruchi a, mgbe ọ gafesịrị ule niile, nke dugara na ọrụ ọ nwetara ya

Ọ malitere ime ihe nkiri nke ọrụ ahụ na mmetụta nke egwu iguzo na nke mbụ ya n'ihu igwefoto na ọrụ nke nha a, ọkachasị maka obi ike a na-etinye na onye nduzi, onye na-agwa ya mgbe niile ka ọ ghara inwe mmetụta nke ọrụ ahụ iji mee nke ọma
Ọ hụrụ ọrụ Taqa n'anya n'ihi àgwà nke obiọma, ile ọbịa na mmetụta
Mana ha dị iche ma dị ike karịa ka ha dị n'ezie

Abulyazeid gafere ahụmịhe dị ka onye nduzi site n'ịduzi egwuregwu 'Melodrama', na 2013, dị ka 'Habhan', yana inyere onye nduzi Shadi Daly aka na egwuregwu 'Dream Plastic' nke ọ rụrụ ọrụ na ya, na 'Made in China', na The Revolution of the Dead
Asmaa Mahfouz bụ onye na agbatara ndi nmadụ ọtitọ nke si na obodo ndi Egypt ma bụrụ kwa otu n'ime ndi bidoro ihe ndi bekee na akpọ April 6 Youth Movement

Onye nta akụkọ nke ana akpọMona Eltahawy na ndi imeri ime ndi nta akụkọ kwekọritara na nwa ada Asmaa so na ndi kwalitere ogba aghara nke mere na obodo Egypt na afọ 2011, site na ihe onyonyo nke otinyere na akwụkwọ ntanet ya, otu izu ụka tupu ya bụ ogba aghara ebido
Nwa ada Asmaa so kwa na ndi otu nke eji eme ọnụ na otu nke bekee na akpọ Coalition of the Youth of the Revolution na obodo Egypt ma bụrụkwa onye isi nke ndi na akwalite ogba aghara na obodo ya
Asmae Leghzaoui (Arabic; amụrụ n'abalị iri atọ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1976) bụ onye Morocco na-agba ọsọ n'etiti
Ọ bụ onye egwuregwu Olimpik ugboro abụọ maka Morocco
N'afọ 1999, Leghzaoui mere ọganihu na-agba ọsọ site n'imeziwanye mita 3000 nke onwe ya kacha mma site na nkeji ma mebie ihe ndekọ ụwa maka ọsọ ụzọ 10K
Ọ bụ onye nke asaa na asọmpi ụmụ nwanyị dị mkpirikpi na afọ 1999 IAAF World Cross Country Championships, na-eduga ndị Moroccan na ọla nchara na asọmpi otu
N'okporo ụzọ, ọ gbara ọsọ na mita 10,000 na 1999 World Championships in Athletics, mana o nweghị ike ịmecha ọsọ ahụ
N'afọ 2000, ọ meriri Cinque Mulini cross country meet wee were aha 5000m track na afọ 2000 African Championships in Athletics n'ikpeazụ n'afọ ahụ
O ritere ihe nrite ọla edo na 10,000 mita na ọlaọcha na 5000 mita na 2001 Mediterranean Games
Ọ nọchitere anya Morocco na afọ 2001 World Championships in Athletics wee bụrụ onye nke asaa na 10,000 m ikpeazụ
Ọ meriri New York Mini 10K na afọ 2002, na-etinye oge ndekọ
Ọ dara ule ọgwụ maka EPO na afọ 2003, mana mgbe a machibidoro ya iwu afọ abụọ, ọ laghachiri na asọmpi asọmpi okporo ụzọ mba ụwa
Leghzaoui nwere ọtụtụ mmeri n'ọsọ n'okporo ụzọ na United States na Mee 2005, na-ewere utu aha na Lilac Bloomsday Run, Bay to Breakers na Freihofer's Run for Women
O nwetara ihe nrite ọlaọcha nke 5000 m na 10,000 m maka Morocco na 2005 Mediterranean Games
N'afọ 2007, ọ gbara nke iri na isii na 2007 World Championships
Ọ gbara ọsọ na 2008 Beijing Olympics mana o nweghị ike ịmecha na 10,000m
O nwere mmeri azụ azụ na azụ na National Capital Marathon na Ottawa site na afọ 2008 ruo 2009
O meriri asọmpi ọkara marathon na afọ 2011 Marrakesh Marathon, mezue ọsọ ahụ na oge ndekọ asọmpi nke 1 10 47
'Asmida is an Algerian industrial group leader in its field, which manages a portfolio of companies' development, production, and marketing 'of fertilizers and pesticides'
E guzobere Asmida n'afo 1984
N'afọ 2006, o mepụtara ihe dị ka nde tọn abụọ nke ngwaahịa fatịlaịza
Asmidal bụ onye ndu otu ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe nke Algeria n'ọhịa ya, nke na-ahụ maka mmepe, mmepụta na ịzụ ahịa nke ụlọ ọrụ 'nke fatịlaịza na ọgwụ pesticides'
E guzobere Asmidal n'afọ 1984
N'afọ 2006, o mepụtara ihe dị ka nde tọn abụọ nke ngwaahịa fatịlaịza
Mathedi Asnath Molekwa (amụrụ na 15 Febụwarị na afọ 1967) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Africa bụ onye otu National Assembly of South Africa si North West, na-eje ozi kemgbe afọ 2019
Molekwa bụ onye bụbu ọkà okwu nke Bojanala Platinum District Municipality na North West Province
Ọ bụ onye otu African National Congress
A mụrụ Molekwa na 15 Febụwarị 1na afọ 967 na Mphebatho (Wynanskraal)
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị nke Tlhaloganyo na Maubane Middle School tupu ọ banye na Nchaupe High School
Ọ gụrụ Local Government Management and Administration na Mahadum nke South Africa yana Project Planning and Management
Ọ nọ ugbu a [mgbe?] na-amụ maka nzere Bachelor of Arts na Public Administration
Molekwa sonyeere National Union of Metalworkers of South Africa (NUMSA) na afọ 1989 mgbe ọ na-arụ ọrụ maka ụlọ ọrụ Nissan na Rosslyn
Mgbe a machibidoro African National Congress iwu na 1990, ọ bụ onye otu ọrụ iwu ụlọ maka pati ahụ na Moretele

Molekwa bụkwa onye otu African National Congress Youth League na afọ 1990s ma jee ozi dị ka odeakwụkwọ mpaghara mbụ nke African National Congress Women's League na Eastern Region nke North West Province maka oge atọ
Ọ bụ onye otu nhazi nke e nyere ọrụ ijikọta mpaghara ọwụwa anyanwụ nke ANC yana mpaghara Rustenburg, Madikwe na Mankwe
Molekwa bụkwa onye otu Kọmitii Na-eme ka Obodo dị mfe
N'afọ 1994, United Nations họpụtara ya ka ọ kwado ogbako gọọmentị ime obodo na obodo ndị dị na North West Province

Molekwa rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nnọchi anya otu ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị maka ANC n'oge ntuli aka agbụrụ mbụ na afo 1994 na n'afọ sochirinụ, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye nhazi na-ahụ maka ndebanye aha ndị na-eme ntụli aka n'oge ntụli aka obodo nke afọ ahụ
A họpụtara Molekwa dị ka onye kansụl ANC na Eastern District Council na North West Province ma họpụta ya dịka onye isi nke caucus ANC
Molekwa bụkwa onye otu NOWELOGA (North West Local Government Association), nke mechara bụrụ akụkụ nke South African Local Government Association (SALGA)
N'afo 1995 na afọ 2000, ọ bụ onye isi oche nke kọmitii na-ahụ maka akụrụngwa nke distrikti
N'afọ 2000, a họpụtara Molekwa dị ka onye kansụl ANC na Moretele Local Municipality ma họpụta ya dị ka onye otu kọmitii na-ahụ maka obodo ahụ
Site na afo 1998 ruo afọ 2003, ọ bụ onye isi oche nke Moretele District Welfare Forum
O mechara rụọ ọrụ na kọmitii ndụmọdụ nke Ngalaba Ọrụ Ugbo n'etiti afọ 2003 na 2007
N'afọ 2004, a họpụtara Molekwa dị ka odeakwụkwọ mpaghara nke mpaghara Bojanala nke ANC
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye isi obodo Moretele na afọ 2006 wee bụrụ onyeisi oche nke SALGA
N'otu afọ ahụ, a họpụtara Molekwa ọzọ dị ka odeakwụkwọ mpaghara
A họpụtara Molekwa dị ka onye otu kọmitii ntụziaka mpaghara ANC (PEC) na nnọkọ mpaghara nke pati ahụ na 2008
Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ ghọrọ onye isi oche nke Kọmitii Mgbanwe Ọha ma sonye na kọmitii nke mba nke ANC
Ọ bụkwa onye a họpụtara ka ọ bụrụ onye otu kọmitii na-ahụ maka ndị inyom
N'afọ 2011, a họpụtara Molekwa ọzọ dị ka onye otu ANC PEC
Na nzukọ mbụ nke PEC mgbe nzukọ ahụ gasịrị, a họpụtara ya na kọmitii ọrụ mpaghara
A họpụtara Molekwa ka ọ bụrụ onyeisi oche nke Kọmitii Mgbanwe Akụnụba
Na ntuli aka ime obodo nke afọ 2011, a họpụtara Molekwa ọzọ dị ka onye kansụl ma họpụta ya dịka onye isi nke Bojanala Platinum District Municipality
N'afọ 2016, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ ọkà okwu nke obodo ahụ
N'abalị iri na asaa n'ọnwa Machị afọ 2019, a mara ọkwa na Molekwa bụ onye omeiwu ANC maka ntuli aka ndị omeiwu na ụbọchị asatọ n'ọnwe Mee afọ 2019

Ọ bụ onye nke asaa na ndepụta ANC na North West, n'azụ Itiseng Morolong, Philemon Mapulane, Nombuyiselo Adoons, Jane Manganye, Ezekiel Molala, Tidimalo Legwase ma họpụta ya dị ka otu n'ime ndị omeiwu ANC itoolu si North West
N'ọnwa Juun afọ 2019, ọ ghọrọ onye otu Portfolio Committee on Home Affairs na Portfolio Committee for Police
Aso Radio (935 FM) bụ ụlọ ọrụ redio Naijiria dị na Abuja, isi obodo nke ọchịchị nke Naijiria, nke Federal Capital Territori Administration nwere
Rtd guzobere ụlọ ọrụ ahụ n'agọ 1997
Brigadier General Jeremiah Timbut Useni, Minista nke Federal Capital Territory (FCT) n'oge ahụ
Ụlọ ihe nkiri na onye isi transmitter dị na Katampe Hill, yana ndị retransmitters na Karshi, Abaji, na Bwari
Na 19 Mee 1999, Rtd General Mamman T
Kontagora, Minista nke isi obodo nke ọchịchị nyere ụlọ ọrụ ahụ ọrụ ma malite mgbasa ozi mgbe niile
A mara ọkwa ụlọ ọrụ telivishọn, Aso TV, n'afọ 2008, mana ọ malitereghị ruo n'afọ 2012

Aso ebi (Yoruba), mgbe ụfọdụ a na-asụpụta ya dị ka Guarabi na Naijiria na ashobie na Sierra Leone na Gambia, bụ uwe ejiji ma ọ bụ koodu ejiji nke ndị Yoruba na ụfọdụ ọdịbendị ndị ọzọ nke Afrịka na-eyi dị ka ihe na-egosi imekọ ihe ọnụ, ọbụbụenyi na ịdị n'otu n'oge ememe, ihe omume na oge ememe
Ebumnuche nke iyi uwe ahụ nwere ike ịbụ iji gosipụta onwe onye na ndị ọgbọ, ndị ikwu ma ọ bụ ndị enyi n'oge mmemme ma ọ bụ olili ozu
Okwu aso n’asụsụ Yoruba pụtara akwa na ebi na-egosi ezinaụlọ, yabụ, a pụrụ ịkọwa aso ebi dị ka uwe ezinaụlọ a na-eyikarị n’oge olili ozu ma ọ bụ n’ememe ezinụlọ
Otú ọ dị, omume a agbasala karịa ejiji ezinụlọ n'ihi na ndị na-amabughị onye na-eme ememe nwere ike iyi aso ebi

Ayodele Olukoju, onye Naijiria na-akọ akụkọ ihe mere eme, kwenyere na aso ebi ghọrọ ihe ọhụrụ na 1920 n'oge ọganihu akụ na ụba nke Agha Ụwa Mbụ kpatara site na ọnụahịa dị elu maka ngwaahịa dịka nkwụ mmanụ
Otú ọ dị, William Bascom chọtara mmalite ya n'oge gara aga mgbe ndị otu Yoruba na-eyi uwe ejiji iji gosi njikọ nwanne
N'afọ 1950, ndị otu ụmụ nwanyị ma ọ bụ egbes gara ememe na ncheta ọmụmụ nke ndị ikwu n'otu ụdị ejiji, akpụkpọ ụkwụ, lappa, uwe elu, ma ọ bụ ihe olu; ọdịbendị ahụ na-egosi ezigbo ọbụbụenyi

Uwe ejiji nwekwara ike ịbụ ihe atụ nke akụ na ụba onwe onye, n'ihi na aso ebi na-agụnye asọmpi n'etiti egbes ma ọ bụ otu dị iche iche na otu ọ bụla na-asọ mpi iji mee ka ibe ha dị mma n'ihe gbasara ogo, ihe ọhụrụ na ọgaranya nke uwe ahụ
From the mid-1960s to the late 1970s, imported lace and george were incorporated into Nigerian fabrics and they became popular items used for aso ebi
Increased demand for handcrafted traditional dresses such as agbada led to a resurgence of tailors and fashion designers specialized in making native attires

The rise of aso ebi also coincided with an intense market of fashion and lifestyles magazines in Lagos; tailors look at designs for inspiration and their patrons buy the magazines to see whether they or their friends are pictured in them
Aso ebi n'oge na-adịbeghị anya aghọwo ihe omume obodo nke gbasara na ọdịbendị ndị ọzọ dị n'Ebe Ọdịda Anyanwụ Afrịka
Ndị na-ere ihe ndị si mba ọzọ na ihe ndị dị n'ógbè ahụ eritewo uru site na mmụba nke ọchịchọ maka ejiji ejiji
Ụfọdụ ndị na-ere ákwà na-enye ọrụ ndụmọdụ na ọnụego buru ibu maka nhọrọ na ọnụahịa nke uwe na ákwà
Ọ bụ ezie na ọnụahịa nke ákwà na-akwa akwa ọdịnala dị ọnụ ala, a ka na-eji omume aso ebi eme ihe mgbe ụfọdụ dị ka njirimara na ọgaranya
Ụfọdụ na-eyi ihe ịchọ mma dị oke ọnụ na akwa akwa ndị ọzọ, ebe ndị ọzọ, ndị na-enweghị ike ịzụta uwe zuru oke, na-agbakwunye naanị elu na mkpuchi isi
Aso ebi aghọwo uwe klas nke ndị ama ama na ndị isi na-eyi n'oge na-adịbeghị anya, ọkachasị ndị Naijiria Nollywood
Site na ndị na-emepụta ejiji na-emepụta uwe maka oge pụrụ iche iji zute ụtọ nke ndị ahịa ha bara ọgaranya na ndị bara ọgaraya, uwe aso ebi aghọwo ihe na-eme mgbe niile taa
Asona bụ otu n'ime ndị isi asatọ nke ndị Akan
Ihe bu oyiyi nke ndị Asona bụ ugoloọma ma ọ bụ agwọ
Obodo ukwu nke ndị Asona gụnyere;Begoro, New Juaben, Kukurantumi, Akim Tafo wdg

N'ihe dị ka ụbọchị asatọ n'ọnwa Mee nke afọ 2021, egosipụtala usoro ise na ịntanetị na ọwa Youtube TVF

Assaad Bouab (Arabic, a mụrụ na Julaị 31, 1980) bụ onye France-Moroccan na-eme ihe nkiri nke ọrụ mbụ ya bụ na Whatever Lola Wants, nke Nabil Ayouch duziri na Laura Ramsey dịka Lola
Bouab gara Cours Florent site n'afọ 1999 ruo 2002, ma gụsịrị akwụkwọ na CNSAD na Paris n'afọ 2006
Ọ na-arụ ọrụ mgbe niile na usoro ihe nkiri telivishọn French a na-enye onyinye na nke a ma ama Call My Agent!
Aha Assan (Arabic, Hebrew), nke a na-ejikwa mgbagwoju anya ma jiri ya mee ihe dị ka Hassan, bụ aha nna Arab, Anglo-Saxon na Ghanaian
Ọ bụ ihe a na-ahụkarị n'etiti ndị Ghana na akụkụ ụfọdụ nke Europe
A pụkwara ịchọta aha nna ahụ n'etiti ndị Lebanese gbara ọsọ ndụ si Ndịda Amerika bụ ndị gbanwere aha nna ha n'ihi agha ahụ, yana ndị Romanian
Assane Kouyaté (amụrụ n'afọ 1954) bụ onye nduzi ihe nkiri nke Mali
A mụrụ Assane Kouyaté na Bamako n'afọ 1954
N'afọ 1976, ọ nwetara akara ugo mmụta na nka na Ecole Normale Supérieure nke Bamako, wee gaa ụlọakwụkwọ Moscow Institute of Cinema and Television, ebe ọ nwetara diplọma ya nke ọmụmụ ihe nkiri na 1989
N'afọ 1988, ya na onye nduzi Russia Sergei Salaviov rụkọrọ ọrụ dị ka onye enyemaka na ihe nkiri Pigeon
Ya na ọtụtụ ndị nduzi n'ụwa niile rụkọtara ọrụ, dị ka onye Argentina Pablo César (Aphrodite, 1998)
N'afọ 2002, o mepụtara ihe nkiri mbụ ya zuru oke Kabala, nke na-akọ akụkọ banyere obodo Mandé nke olulu mmiri ya na-ata ata
Kabala meriri ma ihe nrite maka ihe nkiri kachasị mma na ihe nrite ndị ọka ikpe pụrụ iche na Pan-African Festival of Cinema and Television na Ouagadougou

Assassin's Creed bụ aha egwuregwu vidiyo na-emepe emepe na-eme ihe nkiri stealth nke Ubisoft bipụtara wee bụrụ nke ụlọ ọrụ studio ya Ubisoft Montreal mepụtara site na iji igwe egwuregwu Anvil na usoro ya dị elu karị

Nke Patrice Désilets, Jade Raymond, na Corey May mebere, usoro nke Assassin's Creed na-egosi ọgụ akụkọ ifo gara aga n'etiti ndị Assassins, ndị na-alụ maka udo na nnwere onwe ime nhọrọ, yana Templars, ndị chọrọ udo site n'usoro na njikwa
Usoro a nwere akụkọ ifo akụkọ ihe mere eme, akụkọ sayensị na akụkọ ifo jikọtara ya na ihe omume na ọnụ ọgụgụ dị adị n'ụwa
N'ọtụtụ egwuregwu, ndị egwuregwu na-achịkwa Assassin akụkọ ihe mere eme ka ha na-egwukwa dị ka Assassin Initiate ma ọ bụ onye ejidere na esemokwu Assassin-Templar na akụkọ nhazi nke ugbu a

N'ịbụ onye a na-ewere dị ka onye nọchiri anya usoro ime mmụọ nke usoro Prince nke Persia, Assassin's Creed nwetara mmụọ nsọ site na akwụkwọ akụkọ Alamut nke onye edemede Slovenia bụ Vladimir Bartol, dabere na òtù Hashashin akụkọ ihe mere eme nke Middle East￼

Assefa Mezgebu (amụrụ na ọnwa June 19, na afọ 1978 na Sidamo) bụ onye Etiopia na-agba ọsọ ogologo oge lara ezumike nká, nke a maara nke ọma maka inweta ọla nchara na ihe omume mita 10,000 na 2000 Summer Olympics
Ọ bụkwa onye nke abụọ na 2001 World Championships in Athletics, na-esote ọla nchara na 1999 World Championships na Athletics
O mekwara asọmupi na ịgba ọsọ na-agafe mba wee ruo n'elu ikpo okwu na IAAF World Cross Country Championships na 1998 na 2000
Assefa Mezgebu bụ nwanne nwoke nke Ayele Mezgebu

'Assemani' bụ aha nna Arabic nke pụtara nwa Simeon
Ndị ama ama nwere aha nna gụnyere
Asser Ashraf Fouad Yassin (Arabic; a mụrụ na Febụwarị 25, 1981) bụ onye Egypt na-eme ihe nkiri, onye edemede, na onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri
E nyela ya ihe nrite Best Actor maka ọtụtụ ọrụ ya

Yassin malitere ọrụ ya n'ọkwa nke Mahadum America dị na Cairo nke onye nduzi Khairy Beshara hụrụ ka ọ na-arụ ọrụ mbụ ya na TV na Qalb Habiba n'afọ 2006, nke ihe nkiri The Yacoubian Building sochiri n'afọ 2007
N'otu afọ ahụ, Yassin nwetara nnukwu ezumike ya ma rụọ ọrụ dị mkpa na ihe nkiri 'El Waad'
Nkwa ahụ, na-eche onye na-eme ihe nkiri a ma ama na onye ama ama Mahmoud Yassin ihu
N'afọ 2010, Yassin rụrụ ọrụ dị mkpa na ihe nkiri Daoud Abdel Sayed Messages from the Sea, nke e nyere ya onye na-eme ihe nkiri kacha mma na Carthage Film Festival, na Malmö Arab Film Festival
E nyekwara ya ihe nrite Best Actor maka mbipụta ọhụrụ ya Aswar El Qamar (2015) site na The Tetouan International Mediterranean Film Festival
Yassin gụrụ injinia na mahadum, mana ndị enyi ya gwara ya ka ọ nọchie onye na-eme ihe nkiri na-anọghị na egwuregwu mahadum
N'ihi ya, o kpebiri iwere usoro ihe nkiri ma sonye na mmepụta ndị ọzọ

Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, Yassin rụrụ ọrụ dịka onye enyemaka nkuzi injinia na Mahadum America dị na Cairo, tupu o kpebie ịhapụ ọrụ na-eto eto na injinia ma agụmakwụkwọ iji chụsoo mmasị ya maka ime ihe nkiri
Yassin pụtara na Beit Men Lahm (Ụlọ Anụ), nke a na-ese okwu ma na-eto nke ukwuu, nke dabeere na akwụkwọ akụkọ Arabic nke Yusuf Idris dere, nke Rami A
Jabbar duziri
Onye nduzi Khairy Beshara nyere ya ọrụ na Qalb Habiba, usoro TV nke gosipụtara nlọghachi Soheir El-Bablyńs
N'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe nke a gasịrị, nkiri mbụ ya sochiri obere ọrụ na The Yacoubian Building na Halim
Yassin pụtara na ọrụ nkwado dịka, nwanne ọjọọ nke Ashraf Abdel Baqi na Aala Ganb Yasta na dịka Mo, onye ọgwụ ọjọọ riri ahụ na Zay El Naharda
Ọrụ mbụ ya bụ n'akụkụ Mahmoud Yassin na nkiri Al Waad ma ọ bụ The Promise, nke Waheed Hamid dere ma bụrụ nke Mohamed Yassin duziri
Oge mgbanwe Yassin bụ ọrụ ya na Messages from the Sea, nke Daoud Abdel Sayed dere ma duzie

Rags and Tatters (2013) bụ ahụmahụ mbụ Yassin na-arụkọ ọrụ mgbe ya na Film Clinic na Graal na-arụ ọrụ na ihe nkiri banyere ndị na-enweghị ihe ùgwù nke Egypt na ọnọdụ ndụ ha mgbe mgbanwe nke Jan 25 gasịrị
Yassin rụkwara ọrụ dị mkpa nke na-adịghị ekwu okwu
nkiri ahụ meriri Golden Antigone na Montpellier Mediterranean Film Festival, a họpụtakwara ya na Abu Dhabi Film Festival, London Film Festival, Munich Film Festival na Thessaloniki Film Festival
N'afọ 2015, Yassin meriri onye na-eme ihe nkiri kachasị mma na Tetouan International Mediterranean Film Festival maka ntọhapụ ọhụrụ ya, Aswar El Qamar
N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2021, Al-Arab kwupụtara ihe nkiri na-abịanụ nke akpọrọ 'Venous' (Arabic) nke Yassin na onye Egypt na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-agụ egwu Ruby
Yassin bụ nwa mbụ n'ime ụmụ nwoke abụọ
Nne na nna ya abụọ bụ ndị injinia
Yassin lụrụ di ma nwee ụmụ atọ
N'izu ọ bụla n'ụbọchị Fraịdee]
Assia Dagher (6 Machị 1908 - 12 Jenụwarị 1986) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri na Lebanọn na Ijipt
A mụrụ Dagher (Almaza Dagher) na Tannourine, Lebanon na Machị 6, 1908
Ya na nwanne ya nwanyị Mary, na nwa nwanne ya nwanyị Marie Queeny kwagara Cairo na 1919, mgbe ọ dị naanị afọ iri na otu, mgbe ndị France weghaara Siria na Lebanọn
Ọ nọrọ na Asaad Dagher, nwa nwanne ya, onye bụ odee na onye nta akụkọ na akwụkwọ akụkọ Al-Ahram a ma ama
Ọ nwetara ikike ịbụ nwa amaala Ijipt na 1933
Oge mbụ o mere bụ na 1926 na ihe nkiri a na-akpọ Laila, nke Wadad Orfi duziri
Dagher bụ onye Lebanọn mbụ nọ na nnukwu ihuenyo
O mepụtara ihe karịrị otu nari ihe nkiri nke gụnyere Saladin (1963) ma bụrụ onye isi na naanị ịrị abụọ n'ime ha
Assia Raziki (amụrụ n'ụbọchị nke anọ n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 1996) bụ onye Morocco na-agba ọsọ
O meriri ọla nchara na ihe omume mita 200 nke ụmụ nwanyị na 2015 Arab Athletics Championships nke emere na Isa Town, Bahrain
N'afọ 2017, o ritere ihe nrite ọla edo anọ na 2017 Arab Athletics Championships nke e mere na Radès, Tunisia
Afọ abụọ ka e mesịrị, na 2019 Arab Athletics Championships nke emere na Cairo, Egypt, ọ meriri ọlaọcha na ọla nchara
Ọ mechara nke anọ na mita 100 wee nweta ọla nchara na mita 400 na 2017 Jeux de la Francophonie, wee bụrụ onye nke ise na mita 200 na 2017 Islamic Solidarity Games
O mekwara asọmpi na 2014 African Championships, 2016 African Championships na 2018 Mediterranean Games n'erughị nke ikpeazụ
N'afọ 2019, o sonyere na mita 200 nke ụmụ nwanyị na mita 400 nke ụmụ nwanyị n'egwuregwu Afrịka nke 2019 nke emere na Rabat, Morocco
Assia Zouhair (Arabic, amụrụ n'abalị iri atọ n'ọnwa Eprel n'afọ 1991) bụ onye Morocco na agba bọọlụ nke na agba dịka onye na edebe goolu maka Chabab Atlas Khénifra na ndị otu ụmụ nwanyị nke Morocco
Zouhair agbaala bọọlụ maka CAK na Morocco
Zouhair emeela maka Morocco na ọkwa dị elu
Assidat Zgougou (Tunisian Arabic) bụ nri Tunisian a na-akwadebe mgbe niile iji mee mmemme Mūled
E ji osisi Aleppo pine, ntụ ọka, mmiri ara ehi, mmiri ara na mkpụrụ osisi mee ya na mbụ, nke a maara otu ụdị nri ahụ ugbu a dị ka 'εasida Tunisia'
A na-eji mkpụrụ (mkpụrụ nut pine), nke osisi Aleppo pine, 'zgougou', mee ala ala ya, ka a ghara ịgbagwoju ya anya na mkpụrụ osisi pine nke osisi pine, ma ọ bụ pinus armandii
A na-asacha ọka ahụ, wee gwọọ ya na mmiri ma sie ya ka ọ dị obere
A na-agwakọta ihe na-atọ ụtọ na ntụ ọka wit na / ma ọ bụ starch dabere na ntụziaka
Mgbe ụfọdụ, a na-agbakwunye mmiri ara ehi
Mgbe ahụ, a na-esi ihe niile na okpomọkụ dị ala mgbe a na-agbanye ya
A na-eji nwayọọ nwayọọ na-agbakwunye shuga ntụ ka ngwakọta ahụ na-esiwanye ike, na-eme ka ọ na-acha nchara nchara

A na-awụnye nsonaazụ ya ọkụ n'ime efere ma kpuchie ya na mmiri ara ehi, starch, shuga, àkwá na obere okooko oroma, wee jiri almonds na mkpụrụ na mkpụrụ ndị ọzọ na mkpụrụ osisi, dum ma ọ bụ ala, na obere swiiti chọọ ya mma

O nwekwara ike ime assida site na mkpụrụ osisi ndị ọzọ kama ime mkpụrụ osisi allepo pine, dị ka hazelnuts, chestnuts, pistachios ma ọ bụ ndị ọzọ, mana n'ọnọdụ ahụ ọ gaghị abụ assidat zgougou, kama ọ ga-abụ assidat nke ihe e ji mee ihe
Dị ka omenala si dị, ndị Tunisia na-agbanwere efere nke Assidat Zgougou n'etiti ndị agbata obi na ndị ezinụlọ na Mūled, si otú a na-eme ka ịchọ mma dị mkpa dị ka ụtọ
Ọtụtụ na-eji ụdị mkpụrụ na mkpụrụ osisi niile, ala ma ọ bụ ihe niile, iji gbanwee ụdị na agba nke ihe ịchọ mma
Assil Diab (اصيل دياب) bụ onye Sudanese na-ese ihe nkiri, onye na-ese eserese na onye odee, nke bi na United States
A mụrụ ya na Romania
O wee soro ndị mụrụ ya kwaga Qatar mgbe ọ bụ nwata
Assil gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Virginia Commonwealth University (VCU) na 2011 na Richmond, Virginia na USA ebe o nwetara nzere Bachelor of Fine Arts Degree na Graphics Design
N'afọ 2021, ọ natara onyinye 10 Under 10 ma bụrụ onye a ma ama dị ka otu n'ime ndị gụsịrị akwụkwọ na VCU10 kachasị elu n'ime afọ iri gara aga maka ihe ndị ọ rụzuru n'ọrụ ya na obodo

Kemgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, ọ na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ese ihe osise na onye na-ede ihe osise, na-emepụta akara ngosi na akara maka ụlọ ọrụ yana inye ya ọrụ ise mgbidi ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ, kọfị, ụlọ ahịa na azụmaahịa
N'afọ 2020, o ritere ihe nrite mgbasa ozi site na UNESCO na i4policy maka mkpọsa nka n'okporo ámá nke ọ malitere na coronavirus na Sudan
Ọ bụkwa onye nnọchi anya ọdịbendị a na-asọpụrụ na Qatar Museums kemgbe 2018 ruo taa
Na mgbakwunye na ihe osise na mgbidi Sudan na Qatar, egosila ihe osise Assil na Bahrain, Germany, Bangladesh, na USA
E bipụtakwala ọrụ ya n'akwụkwọ, nke gụnyere Artisans of the Middle East na China
N'afọ 2019, ọ laghachiri Khartoum ma bụrụ onye a maara maka ihe osise ya na-asọpụrụ ụmụ amaala Sudan, ndị e gburu n'oge mgbanwe Sudan
N'oge ọ bụ nwata, ezinụlọ ya kwagara Qatar
Ọ gara Mahadum Virginia Commonwealth na Qatar na Richmond, Virginia, USA, wee gụsịa akwụkwọ na 2011 na Bachelor of Fine Arts na eserese eserese
O nwekwara diplọma na Digital Marketing na Advanced Social Media Marketing
Diab na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ese ihe osise n'onwe ya na onye na-ede ihe osise
A na-akpọ ya nwanyị mbụ na-ese ihe na Qatar na Sudan
Tupu ọ banye n'ọrụ onwe ya dị ka onye na-ese , ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Doha Film Institute (DFI) na Al Jazeera Children's Channel
N'afọ 2019, ọ laghachiri Sudan, ebe ọ malitere ọrụ nka iji sọpụrụ ụmụ amaala Sudan na-eme ngagharị iwe, ndị nwụrụ n'oge mgbanwe Sudan
Maka ọrụ a, o mepụtara mgbidi nke ndị ahụ nwụrụ na mgbidi nke ụlọ ezinụlọ ha
Associated Aviation bụ ụlọ ọrụ ụgbọ elu nke dị na Ikeja, Lagos State, Nigeria
E guzobere ya n'afọ 1996 ma na-arụ ọrụ ịbụ ndị ndị njem nakwa ịbụ ibu n'ime Naịjirịa na mpaghara ọdịda anyanwụ Africa
Isi ụlọ ọrụ ya bụ Murtala Mohammed International Airport, Lagos
Ka ọ na-erule June 2019, ọ naghịzi arụ ọrụ
Gọọmentị Naịjirịa setịpụrụ oge a kara aka n'April 30, 2007 maka ụlọ ọrụ ụgbọ elu niile na-arụ ọrụ na mba ahụ iji dozigharia ụlọọrụ ha ma ọ bụ ha kwụsị ọrụ, na mgbalị iji hụ na ọrụ na nchekwa ka mma
Ụlọ ọrụ ụgbọelu ahụ mezuru ụkpụrụ nke Nigerian Civil Aviation Authority (NCAA) n'ihe gbasara ndozighari ma debanye aha ya maka ọrụ
N'ọnwa Julaị afọ 2008, e rere ụlọ ọrụ ahụ nye otu ndị na-etinye ego bụ ndị malitere nnukwu mmụba ụzọ na nnweta ụgbọ elu ọhụrụ site na Embraer
Associated Aviation jere ozi n'ebe ndị a ka ọ na-erule Jenụwarị 2009
Ụgbọ elu ụlọọrụ Associated Aviation gụnyere ụgbọ elu ndị a (na Jụn 2017)
Assumpta Ingabire Bụ nwanyị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Rwanda, na-eje ozi dị ka Minista nke Steeti, na-ahụ maka ihe gbasara mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na Ministri nke Gọọmentị Obodo nke Rwanda
Tupu nhọpụta ya, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka odeakwụkwọ na-adịgide adịgide na Ministry of Gender and Family Planning, na odeakwụkwọ na Ministry of Local Government of Rwanda

Nkà mmụta kpakpando bụ ọtụtụ omume ịgba afa, nke a ghọtara dị ka pseudoscientific kemgbe narị afọ nke iri na asatọ, nke na-azọrọ na ọ na-achọpụta ozi gbasara ihe omume mmadụ na ihe ndị dị n'ụwa site n'ịmụ ọnọdụ doro anya nke ihe ndị dị na mbara igweKpọpụta njehie Invalid tag; refs with no name must have content Ọdịbendị dị iche iche ejirila ụdị ịgụ kpakpando mee ihe kemgbe ọ dịkarịa ala puku afọ nke abụọ BCE, omume ndị a malitere na usoro kalenda eji ebu amụma mgbanwe oge na ịkọwa okirikiri eluigwe dị ka ihe ịrịba ama nke nkwukọrịta Chineke

Ọtụtụ, ma ọ bụrụ na ọ bụghị ha niile, ọdịbendị etinyela ihe ha hụrụ n'eluigwe dị mkpa, na ụfọdụ dị ka ndị Hindu, ndị China, na ndị Maya mepụtara usoro dị iche iche maka ịkọ ihe omume ụwa site na nyocha nke eluigwe

Nkà mmụta kpakpando nke ọdịda anyanwụ, otu n'ime usoro ịgụ kpakpando kachasị ochie a ka na-eji eme ihe, nwere ike ịchọta mgbọrọgwụ ya na narị afọ nke 19th na 17 BCE Mesopotemia, ebe ọ gbasara na Gris oge ochie, Rom, ụwa Alakụba, na n'ikpeazụ Central na Western Europe

A na-ejikọkarị ịgụ kpakpando nke oge a na usoro nke horoscopes nke na-ekwu na ọ na-akọwa akụkụ nke àgwà mmadụ ma na-ebu amụma ihe ndị dị mkpa na ndụ ha dabere na ọnọdụ nke ihe ndị dị na mbara igwe; ọtụtụ ndị na-agụ kpakpando na-adabere na usoro ndị dị otú ahụ 83

N'ime ihe ka ukwuu n'akụkọ ihe mere eme ya, a na-ewere ịgụ kpakpando dị ka ọdịnala ndị ọkà mmụta ma bụrụkwa nke a na-ahụkarị na ngalaba agụmakwụkwọ, na-enwekarị mmekọrịta chiri anya na mbara igwe, alchemy, meteorology, na ọgwụ
Ọ dị na okirikiri ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, a kpọtụrụ ya aha n'akwụkwọ dị iche iche, site na Dante Alighieri na Geoffrey Chaucer ruo William Shakespeare, Lope de Vega, na Calderón de la Barca
Otú ọ dị, n'oge Enlightenment, ịgụ kpakpando tụfuru ọnọdụ ya dị ka akụkụ nke nchụso ndị ọkà mmụta ziri ezi
Na-esochi njedebe nke narị afọ nke 19 na nnabata sara mbara nke usoro sayensị, ndị nchọpụta agbaghawo ịgụ kpakpando nke ọma na usoro ọmụmụ 249 na ihe nnwale, ma gosi na ọ nwere
enweghị nkwado sayensị ma ọ bụ ike nkọwa
Ịgụ ịgụ kpakpando si otú a tụfuo ọnọdụ agụmakwụkwọ na echiche ya, na nkwenkwe nkịtị na ya agbadala nke ukwuu, ruo mgbe mweghachi malitere na 1960￼
Iyive, nke a na-akpọkwa Uive, Yiive, Ndir, Asumbos, bụ asụsụ Bantoid dị oke egwu nke a na'asụ na Naijiria na Cameroon
Agbụrụ akọwapụtara site na iji asụsụ a eme ihe bụ Ndir
Iyive bụ asụsụ Tivoid nke Cameroon dị nso na Tiv n'onwe ya
A na-asụ ya na mpaghara Southwest na mpaghara Manyu, n'ebe ugwu ọwụwa anyanwụ nke obodo Akwaya na ókèala Naịjirịa, obodo Yive
Ọ bụ ezie na ha bi na Cameroon, a manyere ọtụtụ ndị na-asụ asụsụ Iyivez ka ha kwaga Naịjirịa n'ihi esemokwu
Iyive nọ n'ihe ize ndụ nke ukwuu ma kewaa ya dị ka onye na-anwụ anwụ ebe ọ bụ na ọ bụ naanị ọgbọ ndị okenye nke Ndir na-asụ asụsụ ahụ ma ọ enyefeghi ya na ọgbọ ndị na-eto eto
Iyive anaghị akwado ụlọ ọrụ gọọmentị ọ bụla ma ọ bụ ụlọ ọrụ ọ bụlo
A na-ede Iyive site na iji mkpụrụedemede Latin
Ndunda bụ obere asụsụ Mambiloid nke Naijiria
Ọ bụkwa Roger Blench chọpụtara ya na nso obodo Zongo Ajiya na-asụ Mvanip
Obodo Ndunda dị ihe dị ka kilomita 5 (Ise) site na Yerimaru, n'ebe ndịda Zongo Ajiya
Ọ nwere njikọ chiri anya ma dị iche na Mvanip
Àtụ Northern Bantoid languages
Asu (nke a makwaara dị ka Abewa maọbụ Ebe) bụ asụsụ Nupoid a na-asụ na steeti Niger na Western Naijiria Ndị Asu bi n'ihe dị ka obodo iri na ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Kontagora
Atsam, nke a makwaara dị ka Cawai (Chawai), bụ asụsụ Kainji nke di na Naijiria
Ayere (Uwu) bụ asụsụ dị iche iche nke di Na Volta Níger nke Naijiria, nke nwere njikọ chiri anya naanị na Ahaan
A na-akpọ ya aha obodo Ayere na Ijumu LGA, Kogi Steeti
Obodo nta Ayere nwere dịka mmadụ 10,000, dị ka ọnụ ọgụgụ mmadụ si kwuo
Dị ka Ethnologue si kwuo, a na-asụ Ayere na Obodo
Ayu bụ obere asụsụ Plateau nọ n'ihe ize ndụ nke dị n'ebe ndịda Kaduna Steeti, nke eriri etiti Naijiria
Nchịkọta ya na-esote ejighị n'aka, mana ọ nwere ike ịbụ otu n'ime asụsụ Ninzic (Blench 2008)
A naghị enyefe ya ọtụtụ ụmụaka
Ethnologue (22nd ed) depụtara ebe Ayu dị ka Obodo Agamati, Amantu, Ambel, Anka, Arau, Digel, Gwade, Ikwa, Kongon, na obodo Tayu na Sanga, Naijiria

Basa, nke a na-akpọ Basa-Benue, a na-akpokwa ya Abacha, Abatsa, Bassa-Komo, Bassa, Rubasa, Rubassa, bụ asụsụ Kainji a na-asụ n'etiti Naịjirịa, na akuku Bassa, Ankpa, Nasarawa, na Kwali Local Government Areas na obodo Makurdi
Blench (2008) na-ekwu na Basa-Makurdi, Basa-Gurara (nke Gurara), na Basa-Kwali bụ ụdị dị iche iche site na Bassa nke Bassa LGA na ndị ọzọ na-asụ bassa bụ Bassa Nge
Ndị na-asụ asụsụ Basa na-asukarị Igala ma ọ bụ Nupe
